character_words: Don't underestimate me, Zhao! I will capture the Avatar before you!

full_text: [Gets up as well; sternly.] Prince Zuko, that's enough.
character_words: Prince Zuko, that's enough.

full_text: [Confidently.] You can't compete with me. I have hundreds of war ships under my command and you? You're just a banished prince. No home, no allies. Your own father doesn't even want you.
character_words: You can't compete with me. I have hundreds of war ships under my command and you? You're just a banished prince. No home, no allies. Your own father doesn't even want you.

full_text: [Angrily.] You're wrong! Once I deliver the Avatar to my father, he will welcome me home with honor, and restore my rightful place on the throne!
character_words: You're wrong! Once I deliver the Avatar to my father, he will welcome me home with honor, and restore my rightful place on the throne!

full_text: [Close-up of Zhao, as the camera pans to the right to slowly reveal his whole face.] If your father really wanted you home, he would have let you return by now, Avatar or no Avatar. But in his eyes you are a failure and a disgrace to the Fire Nation.
character_words: If your father really wanted you home, he would have let you return by now, Avatar or no Avatar. But in his eyes you are a failure and a disgrace to the Fire Nation.

full_text: [Cut to Zuko.] That's not true.
character_words: That's not true.

full_text: You have the scar to prove it.
character_words: You have the scar to prove it.

full_text: [Furiously.] Maybe you'd like one to match!
character_words: Maybe you'd like one to match!

full_text: [Slightly mockingly.] Is that a challenge?
character_words: Is that a challenge?

full_text: An Agni Kai. At sunset.
character_words: An Agni Kai. At sunset.

full_text: Very well. [Zhao erects himself.] It's a shame your father won't be here to watch me humiliate you. [Turns around.] I guess your uncle will do.
character_words: Very well.  It's a shame your father won't be here to watch me humiliate you.  I guess your uncle will do.

full_text: [Camera pans slowly to the right to a full close-up of Zuko. Worried.] Prince Zuko, have you forgotten what happened last time you dueled a master?
character_words: Prince Zuko, have you forgotten what happened last time you dueled a master?

full_text: [Darkly.] I will never forget.
character_words: I will never forget.

full_text: [Follows the lemur.] Hey! Come back! [Cut to a shot from inside the tent, as Aang pushes the decaying curtain of drapes out of the way. Happily looks around.] Come on out, little lemur! That hungry guy won't bother you anymore.
character_words: Hey! Come back!  Come on out, little lemur! That hungry guy won't bother you anymore.

full_text: [Shocked.] Firebenders? They were here?
character_words: Firebenders? They were here?

full_text: [Devastated.] Gyatso.
character_words: Gyatso.

full_text: [Happily.] Hey, Aang! You find my dinner yet? [Cut to a side-view of Aang sitting on his knees, his head cupped in his hands. Sokka walks toward him. Reassuring.] Aang, I wasn't really going to eat the lemur, okay? [He approaches Aang with a smile on his face, but shakes his head and does a double take.] Oh, man. [Switch to a shot of the skeleton of the monk, which slowly moves back to reveal that Sokka places a hand on Aang's shoulder.] Come on, Aang. Everything will be all right. Let's get out of here.
character_words: Hey, Aang! You find my dinner yet?  Aang, I wasn't really going to eat the lemur, okay?  Oh, man.  Come on, Aang. Everything will be all right. Let's get out of here.

full_text: [Worried.] Aang!
character_words: Aang!

full_text: Send word to the Fire Lord immediately! The Avatar has returned!
character_words: Send word to the Fire Lord immediately! The Avatar has returned!

full_text: [Alarmed.] Aang! Come on! Snap out of it!
character_words: Aang! Come on! Snap out of it!

full_text: Aaaaahh!
character_words: Aaaaahh!

full_text: [Shouting above the raging winds. Close-up of the two siblings. Katara looks worried at her brother.] What happened?
character_words: What happened?

full_text: [Shouting.] He found out firebenders killed Gyatso!
character_words: He found out firebenders killed Gyatso!

full_text: Oh no! It's his Avatar Spirit! [Raises her hand to protect herself against the winds and the flying debris.] He must have triggered it! I'm going to try and calm him down! [Closes an eye against the wind and starts to make her way toward Aang.]
character_words: Oh no! It's his Avatar Spirit!  He must have triggered it! I'm going to try and calm him down!

full_text: [Holds on to the rock in an attempt to keep from being blown away. Alarmed.] Well, do it! Before he blows us off the mountain!
character_words: Well, do it! Before he blows us off the mountain!

full_text: Remember your firebending basics, [Close-up of Iroh's upper body.] Prince Zuko. They are your greatest weapons.
character_words: Remember your firebending basics,  Prince Zuko. They are your greatest weapons.

full_text: [Close-up of Zuko's determined face.] I refuse to let him win.
character_words: I refuse to let him win.

full_text: [Confident whisper.] This will be over quickly.
character_words: This will be over quickly.

full_text: Basics, Zuko! [Close-up of Zuko's determined face.] Break his root!
character_words: Basics, Zuko!  Break his root!

full_text: [Challenging.] Do it!
character_words: Do it!

full_text: That's it? Your father raised a coward.
character_words: That's it? Your father raised a coward.

full_text: [Anger clearly audible in his voice.] Next time you get in my way, I promise, I won't hold back.
character_words: Next time you get in my way, I promise, I won't hold back.

full_text: No, Prince Zuko. Do not taint your victory. [Turns to face Zhao. Condescending.] So this is how the great Commander Zhao acts in defeat? [Close-up of Zhao lying on the floor.] Disgraceful. [Cut back to a closer shot of Zuko and Iroh.] Even in exile, my nephew is more honorable than you. [Zuko looks at Iroh upon hearing those last words. Switch to a shot from over Zhao's shoulders.] Thanks again for the tea. It was delicious.
character_words: No, Prince Zuko. Do not taint your victory.  So this is how the great Commander Zhao acts in defeat?  Disgraceful.  Even in exile, my nephew is more honorable than you.  Thanks again for the tea. It was delicious.

full_text: [Softly.] Did you really mean that, Uncle?
character_words: Did you really mean that, Uncle?

full_text: [Smiling slyly, while glancing at his nephew.] Of course. I told you ginseng tea is my favorite.
character_words: Of course. I told you ginseng tea is my favorite.

full_text: [In the background, Sokka is hunched over his rock, clenching his teeth together. Katara shouts calmly with a sad expression on her face. The camera slowly moves in on her.] Aang! I know you're upset and I know how hard it is to lose the people you love. I went through the same thing when I lost my mom. [Diverts her eyes. Shot switches to a frontal view of Aang, his tattoos glowing and wind swirling around him; his clothes flutter in the storm. Sokka runs over to his sister in the background.] Monk Gyatso and the other airbenders may be gone, [Close-up of her as she looks up at him.] but you still have a family. Sokka and I! [Sokka opens his eyes and glances at his sister.] We're your family now!
character_words: Aang! I know you're upset and I know how hard it is to lose the people you love. I went through the same thing when I lost my mom.  Monk Gyatso and the other airbenders may be gone,  but you still have a family. Sokka and I!  We're your family now!

full_text: [Gently.] Katara and I aren't going to let anything happen to you. Promise.
character_words: Katara and I aren't going to let anything happen to you. Promise.

full_text: [Sad and tired.] I'm sorry.
character_words: I'm sorry.

full_text: It's okay. It wasn't your fault.
character_words: It's okay. It wasn't your fault.

full_text: [Sadly.] But you were right. And if the firebenders found this temple, that means they found the other ones, too. [Close-up of his sad face, as he closes his eyes.] I really am the last airbender.
character_words: But you were right. And if the firebenders found this temple, that means they found the other ones, too.  I really am the last airbender.

full_text: Everything's packed. You ready to go?
character_words: Everything's packed. You ready to go?

full_text: [Closer shot of Aang and Katara's faces. Softly.] How is Roku supposed to help me if I can't talk to him?
character_words: How is Roku supposed to help me if I can't talk to him?

full_text: Maybe you'll find a way.
character_words: Maybe you'll find a way.

full_text: Looks like you made a new friend Sokka!
character_words: Looks like you made a new friend Sokka!

full_text: [Pushing the food in his mouth with his two hands. Looks up with an exhilarated look upon his face. With a full mouth.] Can't talk! Must eat! [Takes another big bite.]
character_words: Can't talk! Must eat!

full_text: [Looking at the lemur from the corners of his eye.] Hey, little guy!
character_words: Hey, little guy!

full_text: [To the winged-lemur.] You, me and Appa; [Frontal view as the camera closes in on them.] we're all that's left of this place. [Looks at the lemur.] We have to stick together. Katara, Sokka, [Switches to a shot of the duo fiddling with their luggage. They turn back to look at Aang as he calls them. Sokka is still eating a peach.] say hello to the newest member of our family.
character_words: You, me and Appa;  we're all that's left of this place.  We have to stick together. Katara, Sokka,  say hello to the newest member of our family.

full_text: [Aang approaches the duo.] What are you going to name him?
character_words: What are you going to name him?

full_text: Momo.
character_words: Momo.

full_text: [Calmly.] The only reason you should be interrupting me, is if you have news about the Avatar.
character_words: The only reason you should be interrupting me, is if you have news about the Avatar.

full_text: [Pushes open the door completely and enters the room, holding a rolled up scroll in his hands.] Well, there is news, Prince Zuko, but you might not like it. Don't get too upset.
character_words: Well, there is news, Prince Zuko, but you might not like it. Don't get too upset.

full_text: [Cut to shot of the prince sitting motionless, still assuming his meditative stance, his back to the camera. Calmly.] Uncle, you taught me that keeping a level head is a sign of a great leader. Now, whatever you have to say, I'm sure I can take it.
character_words: Uncle, you taught me that keeping a level head is a sign of a great leader. Now, whatever you have to say, I'm sure I can take it.

full_text: [Frontal view of Zuko, Iroh tugging his small beard in the background.] Okay then. [Hesitatingly.] We have no idea where he is.
character_words: Okay then.  We have no idea where he is.

full_text: [Enraged.] What!?
character_words: What!?

full_text: You really should open a window in here.
character_words: You really should open a window in here.

full_text: [He snatches the scroll from Iroh's hand.] Give me the map! [He unrolls it, scanning over the parchment.]
character_words: Give me the map!

full_text: Well, there have been multiple sightings of the Avatar, but he is impossible to track down.
character_words: Well, there have been multiple sightings of the Avatar, but he is impossible to track down.

full_text: [Desperately.] How am I going to find him, Uncle? [Cut to a shot of the map in Zuko's hand, several locations marked down with zigzagged lines connecting each point; Voice-over.] He is clearly a master of evasive maneuvering.
character_words: How am I going to find him, Uncle?  He is clearly a master of evasive maneuvering.

full_text: [To Aang.] You have no idea where you're going, do you?
character_words: You have no idea where you're going, do you?

full_text: Well ... [Happily.] I know it's near water.
character_words: Well ...  I know it's near water.

full_text: [Sarcastically.] I guess we're getting close then.
character_words: I guess we're getting close then.

full_text: Momo, marbles please. [Close-up of Momo who dives into his shirt and emerges, handing Aang two small, gray marbles.] Hey Katara, check out this airbending trick!
character_words: Momo, marbles please.  Hey Katara, check out this airbending trick!

full_text: [Nonchalantly, still focusing on her task at hand.] That's great, Aang.
character_words: That's great, Aang.

full_text: [Disappointed, stops performing the trick.] You didn't even look.
character_words: You didn't even look.

full_text: [Looks over Aang and attempts to show enthusiasm.] That's great!
character_words: That's great!

full_text: [Dismayed.] But I'm not doing it now.
character_words: But I'm not doing it now.

full_text: [Cut to shot of Katara and Sokka seated on Appa's saddle. Sokka waves his arm breezily at Aang as if he is trying to shoo him away.] Stop bugging her, airhead. You need to give girls space when they do their sewing.
character_words: Stop bugging her, airhead. You need to give girls space when they do their sewing.

full_text: [Close side-view shot of Katara as she casts her brother an annoyed glare; irritably.] What does me being a girl have to do with sewing?
character_words: What does me being a girl have to do with sewing?

full_text: [Cut to a shot of Sokka lazily resting with his arms behind his head.] Simple. Girls are better at fixing pants than guys and guys are better at hunting and fighting and stuff like that. [Cut back to an annoyed Katara.] It's just the natural order of things.
character_words: Simple. Girls are better at fixing pants than guys and guys are better at hunting and fighting and stuff like that.  It's just the natural order of things.

full_text: [Suddenly smiles. Sarcastically.] All done with your pants! [Shows that the pants are still ripped.] And look what a great job I did!
character_words: All done with your pants!  And look what a great job I did!

full_text: [Protesting and pleading.] Wait! I was just kidding. [Sticks one arm through the large hole in his pants.] I can't wear these! Katara, please!
character_words: Wait! I was just kidding.  I can't wear these! Katara, please!

full_text: [Cut to a frontal view of Aang with the duo in the background. Enthusiastically.] Relax, Sokka. Where we're going, you won't need any pants.
character_words: Relax, Sokka. Where we're going, you won't need any pants.

full_text: We just made a pit stop yesterday. Shouldn't we get a little more flying done before we camp out?
character_words: We just made a pit stop yesterday. Shouldn't we get a little more flying done before we camp out?

full_text: [Cut to close frontal view of Aang who is looking at something, his hand held against his brow. The siblings stand in the background.] He's right. At this rate, we won't get to the North Pole until spring.
character_words: He's right. At this rate, we won't get to the North Pole until spring.

full_text: [Camera moves back to reveal Appa as well. Innocently.] But Appa's tired, aren't you boy?
character_words: But Appa's tired, aren't you boy?

full_text: [Nudges Appa against his front leg with his elbow.] I said, aren't you boy?
character_words: I said, aren't you boy?

full_text: [Aang smiles over his shoulder at the duo. Sarcastically.] Yeah, that was real convincing.[Somewhat fearfully.] Still, hard to argue with a ten-ton magical monster.
character_words: Yeah, that was real convincing. Still, hard to argue with a ten-ton magical monster.

full_text: [Runs toward the shore, takes a sharp breath and points. Excitedly.] Look!
character_words: Look!

full_text: [Excited.] That's why we're here. [Starts to disrobe while more koi fish jump out of the water in the background.] Elephant koi, and I'm gonna ride it. Katara, you've got to watch me!
character_words: That's why we're here.  Elephant koi, and I'm gonna ride it. Katara, you've got to watch me!

full_text: Cold!
character_words: Cold!

full_text: [Switch to a close-up of Aang atop the fish's back, waving at his friends.] Hahaha, hahaha!
character_words: Hahaha, hahaha!

full_text: [Cut to Katara who enthusiastically waves back.] Whooh!
character_words: Whooh!

full_text: [Smiling.] He looks pretty good out there.
character_words: He looks pretty good out there.

full_text: [Unimpressed.] Are you kidding? [Lazily gestures at Aang in the water.] The fish is doing all the work.
character_words: Are you kidding?  The fish is doing all the work.

full_text: [Notices something behind Sokka and runs off screen.] No, Appa. Don't eat that! [Appa grunts.]
character_words: No, Appa. Don't eat that!

full_text: [Disappointed, the smile having faded off his face.] Oh man ...
character_words: Oh man ...

full_text: [Alarmed.] There's something in the water!
character_words: There's something in the water!

full_text: [Worried.] What's wrong?
character_words: What's wrong?

full_text: Aang's in trouble. Aang!
character_words: Aang's in trouble. Aang!

full_text: Get out of there!
character_words: Get out of there!

full_text: Get back here, Aang!
character_words: Get back here, Aang!

full_text: [Flailing his arms and legs.] Whaaaahh! Aaaah!
character_words: Whaaaahh! Aaaah!

full_text: [Frightened.] Whaaaahh!
character_words: Whaaaahh!

full_text: What was that thing?
character_words: What was that thing?

full_text: I don't know.
character_words: I don't know.

full_text: [Stands up and wipes his hands together.] Well, let's not stick around to find out. Time to hit the road.
character_words: Well, let's not stick around to find out. Time to hit the road.

full_text: Or, we could stay a while.
character_words: Or, we could stay a while.

full_text: [Voice-over.] You three have some explaining to do.
character_words: You three have some explaining to do.

full_text: [Voice-over.] And if you don't answer all our questions, we're throwing you back in the water with Unagi.
character_words: And if you don't answer all our questions, we're throwing you back in the water with Unagi.

full_text: [Close-up of the blindfolded Sokka. Challenging.] Show yourselves, cowards!
character_words: Show yourselves, cowards!

full_text: [Aggressively.] Who are you? Where are the men who ambushed us?
character_words: Who are you? Where are the men who ambushed us?

full_text: [Stepping forward, gesturing heavily with her clenched fist. Indignantly.] There were no men. We ambushed you. Now tell us, who are you and what are you doing here?
character_words: There were no men. We ambushed you. Now tell us, who are you and what are you doing here?

full_text: [Closer side-view shot of Sokka who stares at them in disbelief.] Wait a second, [He amusingly glance to his right to where Aang stands as if he is looking for confirmation. Mockingly.] there's no way that a bunch of girls took us down.
character_words: Wait a second,  there's no way that a bunch of girls took us down.

full_text: [Grabs Sokka by his collar. Angrily.] A bunch of girls, huh? Unagi is gonna eat well tonight.
character_words: A bunch of girls, huh? Unagi is gonna eat well tonight.

full_text: [Leans forward in her bonds. Pleading and apologetically.] No, don't hurt him! He didn't mean it. My brother is just an idiot sometimes. [Suki released Sokka, but still stares at him in dismay.]
character_words: No, don't hurt him! He didn't mean it. My brother is just an idiot sometimes.

full_text: It's my fault. [The three teenagers looks surprised at Aang's words. The camera pans the left to reveal a sorrowfully looking Aang.] I'm sorry we came here. I wanted to ride the elephant koi.
character_words: It's my fault.  I'm sorry we came here. I wanted to ride the elephant koi.

full_text: [Cut to a frontal view of Oyaji. Angrily.] How do we know you're not [Points at the bound three.] Fire Nation spies? Kyoshi stayed out of the war so far. And we intend to keep it that way!
character_words: How do we know you're not  Fire Nation spies? Kyoshi stayed out of the war so far. And we intend to keep it that way!

full_text: [Cut back to Aang, a brightened expression on his face.] This island is named for Kyoshi? I know Kyoshi!
character_words: This island is named for Kyoshi? I know Kyoshi!

full_text: [Humorless.] Ha! How could you possibly know her?
character_words: Ha! How could you possibly know her?

full_text: Avatar Kyoshi was born here four hundred years ago. [Close-up of the face of the statue. The colors have faded away a bit, but it is still clear that Kyoshi wears the same white face paint, with the red accentuated eyes as the modern Kyoshi Warriors wear.] She's been dead for centuries.
character_words: Avatar Kyoshi was born here four hundred years ago.  She's been dead for centuries.

full_text: [Cut to Aang who looks pensive at the statue before looking at the ground in front of him. He speaks in a soft, calm voice while the camera slowly zooms in on him.] I know her because I'm the Avatar.
character_words: I know her because I'm the Avatar.

full_text: [Not convinced by Aang's statement. Shaking her fist to emphasize her words.] That's impossible! The last Avatar was an airbender who disappeared a hundred years ago.
character_words: That's impossible! The last Avatar was an airbender who disappeared a hundred years ago.

full_text: [Cut to Aang and his friend from a point of view between Suki and Oyaji. Aang smiles sheepishly.] That's me!
character_words: That's me!

full_text: [Cut to frontal view of Suki and Oyaji who angrily points at Aang while looking at Suki.] Throw the impostor to Unagi!
character_words: Throw the impostor to Unagi!

full_text: [Nervously.] Aang ... do some airbending.
character_words: Aang ... do some airbending.

full_text: [Talking all at once.] Wow! Did you see that? Airbender!
character_words: Wow! Did you see that? Airbender!

full_text: [In awe.] It's true ... you are the Avatar!
character_words: It's true ... you are the Avatar!

full_text: [Cut to a frontal view of Aang with a serious look on his face, a relieved Sokka and Katara still tied up in the background to his left.] Now ... [He pulls his marbles out from underneath his robes.] check this out!
character_words: Now ...  check this out!

full_text: [Excited.] Did you hear the news? [The fisherman picks up his basket.] The Avatar's on Kyoshi!
character_words: Did you hear the news?  The Avatar's on Kyoshi!

full_text: [Due to his utter surprise, he drops his basket.] Huh?
character_words: Huh?

full_text: [Yells on a demanding tone.] The Avatar's on Kyoshi Island? [Cut to a frontal shot of Iroh as Zuko addresses him while leaving the room. Iroh looks at Zuko as he walks away.] Uncle, ready the rhinos. He's not getting away from me this time.
character_words: The Avatar's on Kyoshi Island?  Uncle, ready the rhinos. He's not getting away from me this time.

full_text: [Casually points at the smoking fish in front of him.] Are you going to finish that?
character_words: Are you going to finish that?

full_text: [Turns around and snatches the plate off the table. Aggressively.] I was going to save it for later!
character_words: I was going to save it for later!

full_text: [Throws his arms in the air while Momo digs in and chitters. Ecstatic.] All right! Dessert for breakfast!
character_words: All right! Dessert for breakfast!

full_text: These people sure know [The rest is kind of muffled out because he is cramming his desserts in his mouth.] how to treat an Avatar!
character_words: These people sure know  how to treat an Avatar!

full_text: [Impressed.] Mmm ... [Offers one of the desserts he is holding to Katara.] Katara you've got to try these!
character_words: Mmm ...  Katara you've got to try these!

full_text: [Puts down the orange dessert, accepts the dessert Aang offers her and takes a bit.] Well, maybe just a bite.
character_words: Well, maybe just a bite.

full_text: Sokka, what's your problem? Eat!
character_words: Sokka, what's your problem? Eat!

full_text: Not hungry.
character_words: Not hungry.

full_text: [Aang leans backward to be able to look past Katara to Sokka; his eyes wide open in surprise.] But you're always hungry!
character_words: But you're always hungry!

full_text: [Glancing amusingly at Aang. Slightly mocking.] He's just upset because a bunch of girls kicked his butt yesterday.
character_words: He's just upset because a bunch of girls kicked his butt yesterday.

full_text: [Protesting.] They snuck up on me!
character_words: They snuck up on me!

full_text: [Mockingly looks at her brother.] Right. And then they kicked your butt.
character_words: Right. And then they kicked your butt.

full_text: [Indignant.] Sneak attacks don't count! [Walks out of the scene with big strides. Mumbling to himself.] Tie me up with ropes! I'll show them a thing or two. [Comes back to the table to face Katara and Aang. Momo grabs some more pastries that lie around him.] I'm not scared of any girls. [Snatches some of the desert of the table.] Who do they think they are anyway? [He shoves one of the deserts in his mouth and stalks off again.] Mmm ... this is tasty.
character_words: Sneak attacks don't count!  Tie me up with ropes! I'll show them a thing or two.  I'm not scared of any girls.  Who do they think they are anyway?  Mmm ... this is tasty.

full_text: What's he so angry about? [Excited.] It's great here. They're giving us the royal treatment!
character_words: What's he so angry about?  It's great here. They're giving us the royal treatment!

full_text: Hey, don't get too comfortable. It's risky for us to stay in one place for very long.
character_words: Hey, don't get too comfortable. It's risky for us to stay in one place for very long.

full_text: [Lowers his arm with the pastry and offers it to Momo's grasping paw.] I'm sure we'll be fine. [The lemur feels the desert and quickly snatches it out of Aang's hand.] Besides, did you see how happy I'm making this town? [Aang moves closer to Katara and turns around to look out of the window at the statue.] They're even cleaning up that statue in my honor!
character_words: I'm sure we'll be fine.  Besides, did you see how happy I'm making this town?  They're even cleaning up that statue in my honor!

full_text: Well, it's nice to see you excited about being the Avatar. [Slightly concerned.] I just hope it doesn't all go to your head.
character_words: Well, it's nice to see you excited about being the Avatar.  I just hope it doesn't all go to your head.

full_text: [Reassuring.] Come on, you know me better than that. I'm just a simple monk.
character_words: Come on, you know me better than that. I'm just a simple monk.

full_text: [Muttering to himself.] Hmmm ... Painting the Avatar ... that's easy enough ... [He lowers the canvas and notices that another girl has pulled up next to Aang. Surprised.] Oh, there's another one ... [He obscures his models again from sight by raising his canvas and painting the outlines of the other girl.] Well, I'll make an adjustment here, and ... [He lowers the canvas to see that three more girls have joined Aang.] There's more ... [He obscures the Avatar and his fangirls from sight again with his canvas while he quickly paints Aang.] well that ...
character_words: Hmmm ... Painting the Avatar ... that's easy enough ...  Oh, there's another one ...  Well, I'll make an adjustment here, and ...  There's more ...  well that ...

full_text: [Angrily grunting to himself.] I can't believe I got beat up by a bunch of girls.
character_words: I can't believe I got beat up by a bunch of girls.

full_text: [Condescending.] Sorry ladies, [Suki and the other warriors stop their exercise and close their fans. They stare at Sokka with a serious look on their faces.] didn't mean to interrupt your dance lesson. [The camera moves back, revealing that Sokka was stretching.] I was just looking for somewhere to get a little workout?
character_words: Sorry ladies,  didn't mean to interrupt your dance lesson.  I was just looking for somewhere to get a little workout?

full_text: [Looks at how Sokka continues his warm up.] Well, you're in the right place. [Cut to a side-view while Sokka is loosening up his hips.] Sorry about yesterday. I didn't know that you were friends with the Avatar.
character_words: Well, you're in the right place.  Sorry about yesterday. I didn't know that you were friends with the Avatar.

full_text: [Stretching his arms.] It's all right. [Mockingly suppressing a laugh while speaking.] I mean, normally I'd hold a grudge, but seeing as you guys are a bunch of girls, I'll make an exception.
character_words: It's all right.  I mean, normally I'd hold a grudge, but seeing as you guys are a bunch of girls, I'll make an exception.

full_text: [Sarcastically.] I should hope so. A big strong man like you? We wouldn't stand a chance.
character_words: I should hope so. A big strong man like you? We wouldn't stand a chance.

full_text: [Smugly.] True. But don't feel bad. After all, I'm the best warrior in my village.
character_words: True. But don't feel bad. After all, I'm the best warrior in my village.

full_text: [Keeps using sarcasm without Sokka catching on to it. Leans slightly toward Sokka.] Wow! Best warrior, huh? [Glances back to the other Kyoshi Warriors.] In your whole village? [Looks back to Sokka.] Maybe you'd be kind enough to give us a little demonstration.
character_words: Wow! Best warrior, huh?  In your whole village?  Maybe you'd be kind enough to give us a little demonstration.

full_text: [Frontal view of Sokka as his eyes widen upon hearing the unexpected request.] Oh ... Well ... I mean ... I ...
character_words: Oh ... Well ... I mean ... I ...

full_text: [Turns to the other warriors.] Come on, girls! Wouldn't you like him to show us some moves?
character_words: Come on, girls! Wouldn't you like him to show us some moves?

full_text: Well, if that's what you want, I'd be happy to. [He places his hands on Suki's shoulder in order to push her back a little, but she does not move a bit.] All right, you stand over there. Now, this may be a little tough, but try to block me.
character_words: Well, if that's what you want, I'd be happy to.  All right, you stand over there. Now, this may be a little tough, but try to block me.

full_text: [Rubbing his hurt right shoulder. Impressed.] Aw! Heh heh ... Good. Of course, I was going easy on you.
character_words: Aw! Heh heh ... Good. Of course, I was going easy on you.

full_text: [Close-up of Suki's confident face.] Of course.
character_words: Of course.

full_text: [He starts with a mumble, raising his tone of voice with each word.] Let's see if you can [Shouting while he attempts to hit Suki with a roundhouse kick.] handle this!
character_words: Let's see if you can  handle this!

full_text: [His voice cracking in anger.] That does it!
character_words: That does it!

full_text: [Mockingly.] Anything else you want to teach us?
character_words: Anything else you want to teach us?

full_text: There she is, girls. Me in a past life.
character_words: There she is, girls. Me in a past life.

full_text: Ooohhh ...
character_words: Ooohhh ...

full_text: [Admiringly.] You were pretty!
character_words: You were pretty!

full_text: [Holding up a finger to draw their attention.] Excuse me for a second, ladies.
character_words: Excuse me for a second, ladies.

full_text: [Turns around in surprise, but is happy to see that the poke came from Aang.] Oh, good! Can you help me carry this back to the room? [She moves the pot toward Aang.] It's a little heavy.
character_words: Oh, good! Can you help me carry this back to the room?  It's a little heavy.

full_text: [Holding up his hands to fob off with the offered pot.] Actually, I can't right now.
character_words: Actually, I can't right now.

full_text: [Slightly irritated.] What do you mean, "you can't?"
character_words: What do you mean, "you can't?"

full_text: I promised the girls I'd give them a ride on Appa. Why don't you come with us? It'll be fun!
character_words: I promised the girls I'd give them a ride on Appa. Why don't you come with us? It'll be fun!

full_text: [Resumed filling the pot with more vegetables.] Watching you show off for a bunch of girls does not sound like fun.
character_words: Watching you show off for a bunch of girls does not sound like fun.

full_text: [Disappointed.] Well, neither does carrying your basket.
character_words: Well, neither does carrying your basket.

full_text: [Annoyed.] It's not my basket. These supplies are for our trip. I told you, we have to leave Kyoshi soon.
character_words: It's not my basket. These supplies are for our trip. I told you, we have to leave Kyoshi soon.

full_text: [Central focus on Aang.] I don't want to leave Kyoshi yet. I can't put my finger on it, [He puts his hand to his chin in a thinking posture; the camera pans to the right, showing Aang's fangirls better in the background.] but there's something I really like about this place.
character_words: I don't want to leave Kyoshi yet. I can't put my finger on it,  but there's something I really like about this place.

full_text: [Stomping her foot in annoyance and puts her hands on her hips, while another girl happily waves at Aang; irritated.] What's taking you so long, Aangy?
character_words: What's taking you so long, Aangy?

full_text: [Slightly mocking.] Aangy ...
character_words: Aangy ...

full_text: [Enthusiastically.] Just a second, Koko!
character_words: Just a second, Koko!

full_text: [Sarcastic.] "Simple monk", huh? [Annoyed.] I thought you promised me that this Avatar stuff wouldn't go to your head.
character_words: "Simple monk", huh?  I thought you promised me that this Avatar stuff wouldn't go to your head.

full_text: It didn't. You know what I think? You just don't want to come because you're jealous.
character_words: It didn't. You know what I think? You just don't want to come because you're jealous.

full_text: [Close-up; angrily.] Jealous? [More high pitched voice.] Of what?
character_words: Jealous?  Of what?

full_text: Jealous that we're having so much fun without you.
character_words: Jealous that we're having so much fun without you.

full_text: [Irritated.] That's ridiculous.
character_words: That's ridiculous.

full_text: It is a little ridiculous, but I understand.
character_words: It is a little ridiculous, but I understand.

full_text: [Turning away; irritated.] Urch!
character_words: Urch!

full_text: [Timidly.] Uh ... Hey, Suki.
character_words: Uh ... Hey, Suki.

full_text: [Hostile.] Hoping for another dance lesson?
character_words: Hoping for another dance lesson?

full_text: [Cut to a shot of Sokka who does not know how to act.] No ... I ... well, let me explain.
character_words: No ... I ... well, let me explain.

full_text: [Close-up of Suki; hostile.] Spit it out! What do you want?
character_words: Spit it out! What do you want?

full_text: [Sokka looks hurt at Suki's hostility. He humbly drops to his knees in front of her.] I would be honored if you would teach me.
character_words: I would be honored if you would teach me.

full_text: [Frog view of Suki; hostile.] Even if I'm a girl?
character_words: Even if I'm a girl?

full_text: [Averting his eyes.] I'm sorry if I insulted you earlier. I was ... wrong.
character_words: I'm sorry if I insulted you earlier. I was ... wrong.

full_text: [Cut to a side-view of the two; Suki has her arms crossed while looking down upon Sokka.] We normally don't teach outsiders, let alone boys.
character_words: We normally don't teach outsiders, let alone boys.

full_text: [Raises his head to face her; pleading.] Please make an exception. [Bowing again.] I won't let you down.
character_words: Please make an exception.  I won't let you down.

full_text: [Frog view; on a friendlier tone.] All right. But you have to follow all of our traditions.
character_words: All right. But you have to follow all of our traditions.

full_text: [Close-up; eagerly.] Of course!
character_words: Of course!

full_text: [Smiling.] And I mean all of them.
character_words: And I mean all of them.

full_text: [Embarrassed looking down at his wardrobe.] Do I really have to wear this? It feels a little ... [Lower his arms in defeat.] girly.
character_words: Do I really have to wear this? It feels a little ...  girly.

full_text: It's a warrior's uniform, you should be proud. [Closeup of Sokka, the camera pans down to reveal the entire uniform close by.] The silk threads symbolize the brave blood that flows through our veins. The gold insignia represents the honor of the warrior's heart.
character_words: It's a warrior's uniform, you should be proud.  The silk threads symbolize the brave blood that flows through our veins. The gold insignia represents the honor of the warrior's heart.

full_text: [Proudly.] Bravery and honor.
character_words: Bravery and honor.

full_text: [Popping in; smiling broadly.] Hey Sokka! [Sokka winces upon hearing his name and slants his eyes and shoulders in embarrassment.] Nice dress!
character_words: Hey Sokka!  Nice dress!

full_text: [Confidently.] Katara, remember how Unagi almost got me yesterday?
character_words: Katara, remember how Unagi almost got me yesterday?

full_text: [Slants up her eyes in annoyance, which Aang can't see while continuing to practice her bending.] Yeah.
character_words: Yeah.

full_text: [Bragging.] Well, I'm gonna go ride it now. It's gonna be real dangerous.
character_words: Well, I'm gonna go ride it now. It's gonna be real dangerous.

full_text: [Still not looking at Aang; disinterested.] Good for you.
character_words: Good for you.

full_text: [Surprised.] You're not going to stop me?
character_words: You're not going to stop me?

full_text: [Still disinterested.] Nope. Have fun.
character_words: Nope. Have fun.

full_text: [Crossing his arms; defiant.] I will.
character_words: I will.

full_text: [Growing irritated again.] Great.
character_words: Great.

full_text: [Annoyed at Katara's lack of interest.] I know it's great.
character_words: I know it's great.

full_text: [Irritated.] I'm glad you know.
character_words: I'm glad you know.

full_text: [Annoyed.] I'm glad you're glad.
character_words: I'm glad you're glad.

full_text: [Angry.] Good! [She loses control over the water and it splashed back into the bowl. Katara balls her fists in annoyance.]
character_words: Good!

full_text: [Emphasizing his reacting by swinging his hands.] Fine!
character_words: Fine!

full_text: You're not going to master it in one day. Even I'm not that good.
character_words: You're not going to master it in one day. Even I'm not that good.

full_text: I think I'm starting to get it.
character_words: I think I'm starting to get it.

full_text: Tah!
character_words: Tah!

full_text: [Peeks her head around the door to look at the hit tree before turning back to Sokka. Friendly.] It's not about strength. Our technique is about using your opponents' force against them. Loosen up. [Retracts her own fan from her belt and points it at Sokka, who takes on a battle position.] Think of the fan as an extension of your arm. [Close-up of Sokka.] Wait for an opening and then ...
character_words: It's not about strength. Our technique is about using your opponents' force against them. Loosen up.  Think of the fan as an extension of your arm.  Wait for an opening and then ...

full_text: [Looks surprised, quickly crosses his arms and looks smug.] Hmm ...
character_words: Hmm ...

full_text: [Quickly gets up; irritated.] I fell on purpose to make you feel better!
character_words: I fell on purpose to make you feel better!

full_text: [Points at Suki, exclaims ecstaticly.] I got you! Admit I got you!
character_words: I got you! Admit I got you!

full_text: Okay, it was a lucky shot. [Releases the finger while smiling broadly. On a more serious tone.] Let's see if you can do it again.
character_words: Okay, it was a lucky shot.  Let's see if you can do it again.

full_text: [Resting her head on her hand. Bored and impatiently.] What's taking so long?
character_words: What's taking so long?

full_text: [Close-up; reassuring.] I'm sure it will be here any second! [Looking for a way to entertain the girls.] What about this?
character_words: I'm sure it will be here any second!  What about this?

full_text: [Annoyed.] Not that again. Boring!
character_words: Not that again. Boring!

full_text: [The girls stand up. Waving her arms to emphasize her question.] Where's Unagi? It's getting late.
character_words: Where's Unagi? It's getting late.

full_text: [Waving from the water to the girls. Pleading.] Where're you going? Don't leave!
character_words: Where're you going? Don't leave!

full_text: [Holds her hands to her mouth to emphasize her yelling.] Sorry, Aang! Maybe next time.
character_words: Sorry, Aang! Maybe next time.

full_text: [Happily.] Katara! You showed up!
character_words: Katara! You showed up!

full_text: [Somewhat concerned.] I wanted to make sure you were safe. You really had me worried.
character_words: I wanted to make sure you were safe. You really had me worried.

full_text: Back there you acted like you didn't care.
character_words: Back there you acted like you didn't care.

full_text: [In a regretful voice.] I'm sorry.
character_words: I'm sorry.

full_text: [Lowering his eyes.] Me too. I did let all that attention go to my head. I was being a jerk.
character_words: Me too. I did let all that attention go to my head. I was being a jerk.

full_text: [Smiling. Puts her hands beside her mouth, yelling in a joking manner.] Well, get out of the water before you catch a cold, you big jerk!
character_words: Well, get out of the water before you catch a cold, you big jerk!

full_text: [Smiling broadly and starts to swing toward the shore.] On my way!
character_words: On my way!

full_text: [Worried.] Hang on, Aang!
character_words: Hang on, Aang!

full_text: Aang!
character_words: Aang!

full_text: [Carefully peeking over the rock.] Zuko!
character_words: Zuko!

full_text: I want the Avatar alive.
character_words: I want the Avatar alive.

full_text: [Worriedly.] Wake up, Aang!
character_words: Wake up, Aang!

full_text: [Coughing out the last of the water. In a weak voice.] Katara ... [Katara lovingly smiles at him with relief written all over her face.] don't ride Unagi. Not fun.
character_words: Katara ...  don't ride Unagi. Not fun.

full_text: [Smiling while impressed.] Not bad.
character_words: Not bad.

full_text: [Sokka and Suki worriedly turn to him. Alarmed.] Firebenders have landed on our shores! [Suki immediately runs to him while he turns to head back to the town.] Girls, come quickly!
character_words: Firebenders have landed on our shores!  Girls, come quickly!

full_text: [Protesting.] Hey, I'm not a ... [Momo jumps on his shoulder and pushes himself off toward the door. Conceding.] oh, whatever!
character_words: Hey, I'm not a ...  oh, whatever!

full_text: [Frog view close-up.] Come out, Avatar! [Camera pans from left to right, revealing how several villagers are hiding in the nearby houses.] You can't hide from me forever! [Camera focuses on the four riders while moving away from them over the main street, showing that there is not any movement in the village. Side-view of Zuko.] Find him.
character_words: Come out, Avatar!  You can't hide from me forever!  Find him.

full_text: I guess training's over.
character_words: I guess training's over.

full_text: Nice try, Avatar! But these little girls can't save you.
character_words: Nice try, Avatar! But these little girls can't save you.

full_text: [Close-up of Zuko.] Hey! Over here!
character_words: Hey! Over here!

full_text: Finally!
character_words: Finally!

full_text: Get inside.
character_words: Get inside.

full_text: [Sorrowful.] Look what I brought to this place.
character_words: Look what I brought to this place.

full_text: It's not your fault.
character_words: It's not your fault.

full_text: [Close-up. Upset.] Yes, it is. These people got their town destroyed trying to protect me.
character_words: Yes, it is. These people got their town destroyed trying to protect me.

full_text: Then let's get out of here. Zuko will leave Kyoshi to follow us. I know it feels wrong to run, but I think it's the only way.
character_words: Then let's get out of here. Zuko will leave Kyoshi to follow us. I know it feels wrong to run, but I think it's the only way.

full_text: [Sad.] I'll call Appa.
character_words: I'll call Appa.

full_text: There's no time to say goodbye.
character_words: There's no time to say goodbye.

full_text: What about, "I'm sorry?"
character_words: What about, "I'm sorry?"

full_text: [Surprised.] For what?
character_words: For what?

full_text: [Close-up. Regretful.] I treated you like a girl when I should've treated you like a warrior.
character_words: I treated you like a girl when I should've treated you like a warrior.

full_text: [Side-view.] I am a warrior. [She leans over and kisses Sokka on the cheek, before continuing again. A surprised Sokka touches his cheek where Suki just kissed him.] But I'm a girl, too. [Cut to shot of Sokka who blushes; cut to Suki who stands in the alleyway, her fan slid open to fight.] Now get out of here! We'll hold them off.
character_words: I am a warrior.  But I'm a girl, too.  Now get out of here! We'll hold them off.

full_text: [Pulling the reins.] Appa, yip yip!
character_words: Appa, yip yip!

full_text: Back to the ship! Don't lose sight of them!
character_words: Back to the ship! Don't lose sight of them!

full_text: [Peeking over the rim of the saddle to address a saddened Aang. Sokka is wiping of the face paint with his sleeve.] I know it's hard, but you did the right thing. [Gesturing toward the town.] Zuko would have destroyed the whole place if we had stayed. [Comforting.] They're going to be okay, Aang.
character_words: I know it's hard, but you did the right thing.  Zuko would have destroyed the whole place if we had stayed.  They're going to be okay, Aang.

full_text: [Shocked; off-camera.] What are you doing?
character_words: What are you doing?

full_text: [Gratefully smiling.] Thank you, Avatar.
character_words: Thank you, Avatar.

full_text: [Side-view of Aang mounting Appa's saddle.] I know, I know. That was stupid and dangerous.
character_words: I know, I know. That was stupid and dangerous.

full_text: [Smiling as Aang sits down.] Yes, it was.
character_words: Yes, it was.

full_text: The Earth Kingdom city of Omashu! [Camera pans up from the group to show the entire pyramid structured city of Omashu. Close-up of an excited Aang.] I used to always come here to visit my friend Bumi.
character_words: The Earth Kingdom city of Omashu!  I used to always come here to visit my friend Bumi.

full_text: [Close-up; impressed.] Wow. We don't have buildings like this in the South Pole!
character_words: Wow. We don't have buildings like this in the South Pole!

full_text: [Close-up; overwhelmed.] They have buildings here that don't melt!
character_words: They have buildings here that don't melt!

full_text: [Back view of the siblings, with Aang and the city visible between them. Excitedly.] Well let's go, slow pokes. The real fun's inside the city!
character_words: Well let's go, slow pokes. The real fun's inside the city!

full_text: [Stretching her arm out to him, halting Aang with her cry.] Wait, Aang! It could be dangerous if people find out you're the Avatar.
character_words: Wait, Aang! It could be dangerous if people find out you're the Avatar.

full_text: [Somewhat seriously.] You need a disguise.
character_words: You need a disguise.

full_text: [Shot of Aang looking up.] So what am I supposed to do? [In a slightly sarcastic tone.] Grow a mustache?
character_words: So what am I supposed to do?  Grow a mustache?

full_text: [Scratching underneath the wig.] Ugh. This is so itchy. [Cut to a broader shot; Aang is standing beside Appa. To Appa.] How do you live in this stuff?
character_words: Ugh. This is so itchy.  How do you live in this stuff?

full_text: Great! Now you look just like my grandfather.
character_words: Great! Now you look just like my grandfather.

full_text: [Glancing at Sokka.] Technically, Aang is 112 years old.
character_words: Technically, Aang is 112 years old.

full_text: [In an old man's voice.] Now let's get to skippin', young whipper-snappers. The big city awaits!
character_words: Now let's get to skippin', young whipper-snappers. The big city awaits!

full_text: You guys are going to love Omashu. [Cut to front view shot as the three friends walk toward the gate. Aang looks over his shoulder at Sokka.] The people here are the friendliest in the world.
character_words: You guys are going to love Omashu.  The people here are the friendliest in the world.

full_text: [Angrily.] Rotten cabbages?! [Far off shot of three guards and a cabbage merchant with his cart in front of the closed gate of Omashu; harshly.] What kind of slum do you think this is?!
character_words: Rotten cabbages?!  What kind of slum do you think this is?!

full_text: [Leaning over the rim of the path. Dramatically waving his arms in despair.] No! My cabbages!
character_words: No! My cabbages!

full_text: [Close-up, broadly smiling; somewhat nervously.] Just keep smiling!
character_words: Just keep smiling!

full_text: [Aggressively with a glare.] State your business!
character_words: State your business!

full_text: [In old man voice, poking the chest of the sentry.] My business is my business, young man, [Shot of the boulder crashing down due to the guards lack of concentration beside Katara and Sokka as they jump up slightly from the impact; close-up of Aang pointing a finger at the camera.] and none of yours! [Close-up of the guard, taken aback by the threateningly pointing finger just centimeters from his face.] I've got half a mind to [Close-up of Sokka, eyes and mouth wide open in shock at Aang's audacity to talk to the sentry like that, and Katara, shaking her head with eyes wide open in shock.] bend you over my knee and paddle your backside!
character_words: My business is my business, young man,  and none of yours!  I've got half a mind to  bend you over my knee and paddle your backside!

full_text: [In a calmer voice.] Settle down, old timer! Just tell me who you are.
character_words: Settle down, old timer! Just tell me who you are.

full_text: [Sokka and Katara are still in shock in the background; in old man voice.] Name's Bonzu Pippinpaddleopsicopolis, the Third, [Sokka raises a questioningly eyebrow while Katara walks up, smiling friendly.] and these are my grandkids.
character_words: Name's Bonzu Pippinpaddleopsicopolis, the Third,  and these are my grandkids.

full_text: [Waving.] Hi. June Pippinpaddleopsicopolis. Nice to meet you.
character_words: Hi. June Pippinpaddleopsicopolis. Nice to meet you.

full_text: [Pensively rubbing his beard, while eying the two children before him. Pointing at Katara.] You seem like a responsible young lady. See that your grandfather stays out of trouble. Enjoy Omashu!
character_words: You seem like a responsible young lady. See that your grandfather stays out of trouble. Enjoy Omashu!

full_text: [Lightheartedly.] We will!
character_words: We will!

full_text: [Eying Sokka as he passes.] Wait a minute! [Close-up of Sokka as he halts, eyes widening in fear as the guard grasps his shoulder. Aang and Katara turn around to see what the holdup is. The guard turns Sokka around; sternly.] You're a strong young boy! Show some respect for the elderly and carry your grandfather's bag!
character_words: Wait a minute!  You're a strong young boy! Show some respect for the elderly and carry your grandfather's bag!

full_text: [In old man voice.] Good idea!
character_words: Good idea!

full_text: [Back to regular voice; voice-over.] This is the Omashu delivery system. [Camera shows the top of the city.] Miles and miles of tubes and chutes.
character_words: This is the Omashu delivery system.  Miles and miles of tubes and chutes.

full_text: [Voice-over.] Earthbending brings the packages up, and gravity brings them down.
character_words: Earthbending brings the packages up, and gravity brings them down.

full_text: [Cut back to the trio; unimpressed.] Great, so they get their mail on time.
character_words: Great, so they get their mail on time.

full_text: [Excitedly.] They do get their mail on time, [Close-up of Aang.] but my friend Bumi found [Squints eyes mischievously.] a better use for these chutes.
character_words: They do get their mail on time,  but my friend Bumi found  a better use for these chutes.

full_text: [Excitedly.] Look around you! What do you see?
character_words: Look around you! What do you see?

full_text: [Unsurely.] Um ... The mail system?
character_words: Um ... The mail system?

full_text: [Pointing his finger in the air and waving it around while Aang walks up to him.] Instead of seeing what they want you to see, [Leaning toward Aang.] you got to open your brain to the possibilities.
character_words: Instead of seeing what they want you to see,  you got to open your brain to the possibilities.

full_text: [Uncomprehending.] A package-sending system?
character_words: A package-sending system?

full_text: [Excitedly; camera moves back to show the start of one of the chutes.] The world's greatest superslide!
character_words: The world's greatest superslide!

full_text: [Close-up of a crazed smiling Bumi, and a broadly smiling Aang.] Bumi, you're a mad genius!
character_words: Bumi, you're a mad genius!

full_text: [Raising one finger to emphasize his words; the cart rocking back and forth, creaking.] One ride. Then we're off to the North Pole. Airbender's honor.
character_words: One ride. Then we're off to the North Pole. Airbender's honor.

full_text: [Uneasy.] It sounded like fun at first, [Shot switches to a bird's eye view, fully revealing the steepness of the chute.] but now that I'm here, I'm starting to have second [Aang leans forward, tipping the balance of the box, sending it down the slope at a tremendous speed, making Katara scream out her last word.] th-o-o-oughts!
character_words: It sounded like fun at first,  but now that I'm here, I'm starting to have second  th-o-o-oughts!

full_text: [Excitedly.] I'm on it!
character_words: I'm on it!

full_text: Men, you'll be going off to combat soon. It's important that you be prepared for anything.
character_words: Men, you'll be going off to combat soon. It's important that you be prepared for anything.

full_text: [Scared.] Aang, do something! Use your airbending!
character_words: Aang, do something! Use your airbending!

full_text: [Excitedly.] Yeah! Good idea! That'll make us go even faster!
character_words: Yeah! Good idea! That'll make us go even faster!

full_text: Sorry!
character_words: Sorry!

full_text: [Grasping his head in despair.] My cabbages! [Angrily.] You're gonna pay for this!
character_words: My cabbages!  You're gonna pay for this!

full_text: [Sheepishly.] Two cabbages please.
character_words: Two cabbages please.

full_text: Your majesty, these juveniles were arrested for vandalism, traveling under false pretenses, and malicious destruction of cabbages.
character_words: Your majesty, these juveniles were arrested for vandalism, traveling under false pretenses, and malicious destruction of cabbages.

full_text: [Jumping agitatedly up and down, waving his left fist in the air.] Off with their heads! One for each head of cabbage!
character_words: Off with their heads! One for each head of cabbage!

full_text: [Gesturing at the merchant.] Silence! Only the king can pass down judgment. What is your judgment, sire?
character_words: Silence! Only the king can pass down judgment. What is your judgment, sire?

full_text: [Raising his hand.] Throw them ... [Sokka, Katara, and Aang gasp.] a feast!
character_words: Throw them ...  a feast!

full_text: [To Aang.] The people in my city have gotten fat from too many feasts, [Leaning in over Aang, grabbing the chicken leg that is on his plate, holding it in front of him.] so I hope you like your chicken with no skin.
character_words: The people in my city have gotten fat from too many feasts,  so I hope you like your chicken with no skin.

full_text: Thanks, but I don't eat meat.
character_words: Thanks, but I don't eat meat.

full_text: [To Sokka.] How about you? I bet you like meat.
character_words: How about you? I bet you like meat.

full_text: [Quietly to Aang.] Is it just me, or [Turns circles with her index finger beside her temple, implying the king is crazy.] is this guy's crown a little crooked?
character_words: Is it just me, or  is this guy's crown a little crooked?

full_text: [Aerial shot of the dining table as Bumi pulls up to his seat.] So tell me, young bald one, [Sitting down.] where are you from?
character_words: So tell me, young bald one,  where are you from?

full_text: [Close-up.] I'm from ... Kangaroo Island!
character_words: I'm from ... Kangaroo Island!

full_text: [Cut to the King, two guards standing watch behind him.] Oh, Kangaroo Island, eh? I hear that place is really hopping!
character_words: Oh, Kangaroo Island, eh? I hear that place is really hopping!

full_text: [Stops laughing; unsure.] What? It was pretty funny.
character_words: What? It was pretty funny.

full_text: [Cut back to the king, who lazily stretches his arms, and yawns.] Well, all these good jokes are making me tired. Guess it's time to hit the hay.
character_words: Well, all these good jokes are making me tired. Guess it's time to hit the hay.

full_text: [Gesturing at Aang.] There's an airbender in our presence, and not just any airbender. [Close-up as he decisively stands up.] The Avatar!
character_words: There's an airbender in our presence, and not just any airbender.  The Avatar!

full_text: [Sits down again.] Now, what do you have to say for yourself, [Close-up, smiling satisfied.] Mr. Pippinpaddleopsicopolis?
character_words: Now, what do you have to say for yourself,  Mr. Pippinpaddleopsicopolis?

full_text: [Standing up, throwing his hands in the air.] Okay, you caught me. [Frontal shot of the three friends.] I'm the Avatar. Doing my Avatar thing, keeping the world safe. Everything checks out. [Aang looks underneath table.] No firebenders here. So, good work, everybody! [Pulling Katara and Sokka into a hug.] Love each other, [Cut to a dismayed looking king.] respect all life, [Cut to a shot of the threesome walking backward toward the exit.] and don't run with your spears. We'll see you next time!
character_words: Okay, you caught me.  I'm the Avatar. Doing my Avatar thing, keeping the world safe. Everything checks out.  No firebenders here. So, good work, everybody!  Love each other,  respect all life,  and don't run with your spears. We'll see you next time!

full_text: [Accusingly.] You can't keep us here! Let us leave!
character_words: You can't keep us here! Let us leave!

full_text: Lettuce leaf?
character_words: Lettuce leaf?

full_text: [Cut to the threesome. Sokka holds his hand for his mouth; whispering.] We're in serious trouble. This guy is nuts.
character_words: We're in serious trouble. This guy is nuts.

full_text: [Close-up.] Tomorrow, the Avatar will [Slowly zooming in close-up of Aang.] face three deadly challenges. [Back to Bumi.] But for now, the guards will show you to your chamber.
character_words: Tomorrow, the Avatar will  face three deadly challenges.  But for now, the guards will show you to your chamber.

full_text: [Leaning in toward Bumi.] My liege, do you mean the good chamber or the bad chamber?
character_words: My liege, do you mean the good chamber or the bad chamber?

full_text: [Turning to the guard.] The newly refurbished chamber.
character_words: The newly refurbished chamber.

full_text: [Putting finger in the air.] Wait, which one are we talking about?
character_words: Wait, which one are we talking about?

full_text: The one that used to be the bad chamber, until the recent refurbishing, that is. Of course, we've been calling it the new chamber, but we really should number them. [Switch to a frontal shot of the three children as they are being led out of the room, flanked by two guards. Commanding.] Uh, take them to the refurbished chamber that was once bad!
character_words: The one that used to be the bad chamber, until the recent refurbishing, that is. Of course, we've been calling it the new chamber, but we really should number them.  Uh, take them to the refurbished chamber that was once bad!

full_text: This is a prison cell? But it's so nice.
character_words: This is a prison cell? But it's so nice.

full_text: [Momo jumps off Aang's shoulders and onto a bed.] He did say it was newly refurbished.
character_words: He did say it was newly refurbished.

full_text: Nice or not, we're prisoners!
character_words: Nice or not, we're prisoners!

full_text: [Close-up; worried.] I wonder what these challenges are gonna to be.
character_words: I wonder what these challenges are gonna to be.

full_text: [Determined.] We're not sticking around to find out. There's got to be some way out of here.
character_words: We're not sticking around to find out. There's got to be some way out of here.

full_text: [Excitedly pointing at something at the other side of the room.] The air vents!
character_words: The air vents!

full_text: [Harshly.] If you think we're going to fit through there, you're crazier than that king.
character_words: If you think we're going to fit through there, you're crazier than that king.

full_text: [Turning to Sokka.] We can't, but Momo can!
character_words: We can't, but Momo can!

full_text: [Hopeful.] Momo, I need you to find Appa and bust us outta here!
character_words: Momo, I need you to find Appa and bust us outta here!

full_text: Go on, boy, get Appa!
character_words: Go on, boy, get Appa!

full_text: Eh, how was Appa supposed to save us anyway?
character_words: Eh, how was Appa supposed to save us anyway?

full_text: [Voice-over.] Appa's a ten-ton flying bison; I think he could figure something out.
character_words: Appa's a ten-ton flying bison; I think he could figure something out.

full_text: [Climbing into her bed.] Well, no point arguing about it now. Get some rest, Aang. [Aang walks toward his bed.] Looks like you'll need it for tomorrow.
character_words: Well, no point arguing about it now. Get some rest, Aang.  Looks like you'll need it for tomorrow.

full_text: [Alarmed.] Sokka? [Switch to Aang's point of view; the other beds are empty.] Katara? [Frontal shot as Aang turns toward the guard.] Where are my friends?
character_words: Sokka?  Katara?  Where are my friends?

full_text: [Frontal shot.] The king will free them if you complete your challenges.
character_words: The king will free them if you complete your challenges.

full_text: [Frontal shot; unsure.] And if I fail?
character_words: And if I fail?

full_text: [Frontal shot.] He didn't say. [Extending his arm; switch back to a shot of the guard.] Your staff, please?
character_words: He didn't say.  Your staff, please?

full_text: [Serious.] First, Avatar, [Frontal shot as Bumi spread his arms, showing off his purple outfit; lighthearted.] what do you think of my new outfit? I want your honest opinion. [Frontal shot of Aang who blankly stares at the king. Someone coughs during the ensuing silence. Switch back to a frontal shot of Bumi.] I'm waiting.
character_words: First, Avatar,  what do you think of my new outfit? I want your honest opinion.  I'm waiting.

full_text: [Scratching his head.] I ... guess it's fine.
character_words: I ... guess it's fine.

full_text: Excellent! You passed the first test.
character_words: Excellent! You passed the first test.

full_text: Really?
character_words: Really?

full_text: [Upbeat.] Well, not one of the deadly tests. [Waving his finger from side to side, emphasizing his words.] The real challenges are much more, uh, challenging.
character_words: Well, not one of the deadly tests.  The real challenges are much more, uh, challenging.

full_text: [Aggressively.] I don't have time for your crazy games! [Close-up of King Bumi.] Give me my friends back! We're leaving!
character_words: I don't have time for your crazy games!  Give me my friends back! We're leaving!

full_text: Oh, I thought you might refuse, [Side shot of the two. A wall opens, revealing Katara and Sokka struggling in the grasp of a guard. Aang turns to them.] so I will give your friends some special souvenirs.
character_words: Oh, I thought you might refuse,  so I will give your friends some special souvenirs.

full_text: [Voice-over.] Those delightful rings are made of pure jennamite, also known as creeping crystal. It's a crystal that grows remarkably fast. [Close-up of Bumi; sinister.] By nightfall your friends will be completely covered in it. [Slightly sympathetic.] Terrible thing, really. [Serious.] I can stop it, but only if you cooperate.
character_words: Those delightful rings are made of pure jennamite, also known as creeping crystal. It's a crystal that grows remarkably fast.  By nightfall your friends will be completely covered in it.  Terrible thing, really.  I can stop it, but only if you cooperate.

full_text: [Panicking.] Ah! It's already creeping!
character_words: Ah! It's already creeping!

full_text: [Cut back to a side shot of Aang and Bumi; serious.] I'll do what you want.
character_words: I'll do what you want.

full_text: It seems I've lost my lunch box key and I'm hungry. Ooh, there it is! [Bumi points to inside the waterfall.] Would you mind fetching it for me?
character_words: It seems I've lost my lunch box key and I'm hungry. Ooh, there it is!  Would you mind fetching it for me?

full_text: [Sarcastically.] Ooh, climbing the ladder. No one's ever done that before.
character_words: Ooh, climbing the ladder. No one's ever done that before.

full_text: That's right. Keep diving head in. I'm sure it'll work eventually.
character_words: That's right. Keep diving head in. I'm sure it'll work eventually.

full_text: There! Enjoy your lunch! I want my friends back now!
character_words: There! Enjoy your lunch! I want my friends back now!

full_text: Ah, not yet. I need help with another matter. It seems I've lost my pet, Flopsie.
character_words: Ah, not yet. I need help with another matter. It seems I've lost my pet, Flopsie.

full_text: Okay! Found him!
character_words: Okay! Found him!

full_text: Bring him to me. Daddy wants a kiss from Flopsie!
character_words: Bring him to me. Daddy wants a kiss from Flopsie!

full_text: Come here, Flopsie. [Flopsie jumps down behind Aang, startling both him and the bunny.] Huh?
character_words: Come here, Flopsie.  Huh?

full_text: Flopsie, wait! Flopsie! [Cut to Bumi laughing. Back to Aang chasing the bunny.] Flopsie!
character_words: Flopsie, wait! Flopsie!  Flopsie!

full_text: Wait a minute. [Close-up of Flopsie snarling. Cut to behind Aang.] Flopsie?
character_words: Wait a minute.  Flopsie?

full_text: Flopsie!
character_words: Flopsie!

full_text: [Rubbing Flopsie's belly.] Oh, that's a good boy. Yes, who has a soft belly?
character_words: Oh, that's a good boy. Yes, who has a soft belly?

full_text: [Aang jumps up to where Katara and Sokka. Both are encased in crystal to their shoulders.] Guys, are you okay?
character_words: Guys, are you okay?

full_text: Other than the crystals slowly encasing my entire body, doing great!
character_words: Other than the crystals slowly encasing my entire body, doing great!

full_text: [Rubbing Flopsie's belly.] Oh, yes.
character_words: Oh, yes.

full_text: Come on! I'm ready for the next challenge.
character_words: Come on! I'm ready for the next challenge.

full_text: Your final test is a duel. And as a special treat, you may choose your opponent.
character_words: Your final test is a duel. And as a special treat, you may choose your opponent.

full_text: Point and choose.
character_words: Point and choose.

full_text: So ... you're saying whoever I point to, that's the person I get to fight?
character_words: So ... you're saying whoever I point to, that's the person I get to fight?

full_text: Choose wisely!
character_words: Choose wisely!

full_text: I ... choose ... you. [Aang points to the king.]
character_words: I ... choose ... you.

full_text: Wrong choice!
character_words: Wrong choice!

full_text: You thought I was a frail old man, but I'm the most powerful earthbender you'll ever see.
character_words: You thought I was a frail old man, but I'm the most powerful earthbender you'll ever see.

full_text: Can I fight the guy with the axe instead?
character_words: Can I fight the guy with the axe instead?

full_text: There are no take-backsies in my kingdom. You might need this. [Points to the guard standing near Katara and Sokka.]
character_words: There are no take-backsies in my kingdom. You might need this.

full_text: Typical airbender tactic: avoid and evade. I hoped the Avatar would be less predictable.
character_words: Typical airbender tactic: avoid and evade. I hoped the Avatar would be less predictable.

full_text: Don't you have any surprises for me? Sooner or later you'll have to strike back!
character_words: Don't you have any surprises for me? Sooner or later you'll have to strike back!

full_text: You'll have to be a little more creative than that!
character_words: You'll have to be a little more creative than that!

full_text: Did someone leave the windows open? It feels a little drafty in here. Are you hoping I'll catch a cold?
character_words: Did someone leave the windows open? It feels a little drafty in here. Are you hoping I'll catch a cold?

full_text: How are you going to get me from way over there?
character_words: How are you going to get me from way over there?

full_text: Well done, Avatar. You fight with much fire in your heart. [He tosses the boulder aside and bends up to the balcony where the two siblings are almost completely encased. Aang joins him.] You've passed all my tests. Now, you must answer one question.
character_words: Well done, Avatar. You fight with much fire in your heart.  You've passed all my tests. Now, you must answer one question.

full_text: That's not fair! You said you would release my friends if I finished your tests.
character_words: That's not fair! You said you would release my friends if I finished your tests.

full_text: Oh, but what's the point of tests if you don't learn anything?
character_words: Oh, but what's the point of tests if you don't learn anything?

full_text: Oh, come on!
character_words: Oh, come on!

full_text: Answer this one question and I will set your friends free. What ... is my name? From the looks of your friends I'd say you only have a few minutes.
character_words: Answer this one question and I will set your friends free. What ... is my name? From the looks of your friends I'd say you only have a few minutes.

full_text: How am I supposed to know his name?
character_words: How am I supposed to know his name?

full_text: Think about the challenges. Maybe it's some kind of riddle.
character_words: Think about the challenges. Maybe it's some kind of riddle.

full_text: I got it!
character_words: I got it!

full_text: Yeah?
character_words: Yeah?

full_text: He's an earthbender, right? Rocky. You know, because of all the rocks.
character_words: He's an earthbender, right? Rocky. You know, because of all the rocks.

full_text: We're going to keep trying, but that is a good back-up.
character_words: We're going to keep trying, but that is a good back-up.

full_text: Okay. So back to the challenges. I got a key from the waterfall, I saved his pet, and I had a duel.
character_words: Okay. So back to the challenges. I got a key from the waterfall, I saved his pet, and I had a duel.

full_text: And what did you learn?
character_words: And what did you learn?

full_text: Well, everything was different than I expected.
character_words: Well, everything was different than I expected.

full_text: [The jennamite grows as she talks with anxiety.] And?
character_words: And?

full_text: Well, they weren't straight forward. To solve each test, I had to think differently than I usually would. I know his name.
character_words: Well, they weren't straight forward. To solve each test, I had to think differently than I usually would. I know his name.

full_text: I solved the question the same way I solved the challenges. As you said a long time ago, I had to open my brain to the possibilities. [The king laughs with the same odd snort Bumi did a hundred years ago.] Bumi, you're a mad genius.
character_words: I solved the question the same way I solved the challenges. As you said a long time ago, I had to open my brain to the possibilities.  Bumi, you're a mad genius.

full_text: Oh Aang, it's good to see you. You haven't changed a bit. Literally.
character_words: Oh Aang, it's good to see you. You haven't changed a bit. Literally.

full_text: Uh, over here!
character_words: Uh, over here!

full_text: Little help?
character_words: Little help?

full_text: Jennamite is made of rock candy. [He takes a bite into the crystal.] Delicious!
character_words: Jennamite is made of rock candy.  Delicious!

full_text: So this crazy king is your old friend Bumi?
character_words: So this crazy king is your old friend Bumi?

full_text: Who are you calling old? Okay, I'm old.
character_words: Who are you calling old? Okay, I'm old.

full_text: Why did you do all of this instead of just telling Aang who you were?
character_words: Why did you do all of this instead of just telling Aang who you were?

full_text: First of all, it's pretty fun messing with people. [Snorts.] But I do have a reason. Aang, you have a difficult task ahead. The world has changed in the hundred years that you've been gone. It's the duty of the Avatar to restore balance to the world by defeating Fire Lord Ozai. You have much to learn. You must master the four elements and confront the Fire Lord. And when you do, I hope you will think like a mad genius. And it looks like you're in good hands. You'll need your friends to help defeat the Fire Nation. [Momo climbs up on Aang.] And you'll need Momo, too.
character_words: First of all, it's pretty fun messing with people.  But I do have a reason. Aang, you have a difficult task ahead. The world has changed in the hundred years that you've been gone. It's the duty of the Avatar to restore balance to the world by defeating Fire Lord Ozai. You have much to learn. You must master the four elements and confront the Fire Lord. And when you do, I hope you will think like a mad genius. And it looks like you're in good hands. You'll need your friends to help defeat the Fire Nation.  And you'll need Momo, too.

full_text: Thank you for your wisdom, but before we leave, I have a challenge for you.
character_words: Thank you for your wisdom, but before we leave, I have a challenge for you.

full_text: My cabbages!
character_words: My cabbages!

full_text: [Enthusiastically.] Great, you're back!
character_words: Great, you're back!

full_text: What's for dinner?
character_words: What's for dinner?

full_text: [Digs nuts from his bag.] We've got a few options. First; round nuts. And some kind of oval shaped nuts? And some rock-shaped nuts, that might just be rocks. [Throws the rock-shaped nut toward Momo.] Dig in! [Aang and Katara look at each other then back at Sokka.]
character_words: We've got a few options. First; round nuts. And some kind of oval shaped nuts? And some rock-shaped nuts, that might just be rocks.  Dig in!

full_text: Seriously ... what else you got?
character_words: Seriously ... what else you got?

full_text: What was that?
character_words: What was that?

full_text: It's coming from over there!
character_words: It's coming from over there!

full_text: [Aang and Katara run off-camera.] Shouldn't we run away from huge booms? Not toward them?
character_words: Shouldn't we run away from huge booms? Not toward them?

full_text: An earthbender!
character_words: An earthbender!

full_text: Let's go meet him!
character_words: Let's go meet him!

full_text: He looks dangerous, so we better approach cautiously.
character_words: He looks dangerous, so we better approach cautiously.

full_text: [Suddenly Katara is a few feet in front of them, excitedly addressing the earthbender.] Hello there! I'm Katara! What's your name?
character_words: Hello there! I'm Katara! What's your name?

full_text: [Sokka and Aang approach Katara; yelling.] Nice to meet you!
character_words: Nice to meet you!

full_text: [Shrugging.] I just wanted to say hi.
character_words: I just wanted to say hi.

full_text: Hey! That guy's gotta be running somewhere. Maybe we're near a village? And I bet that village has a market!
character_words: Hey! That guy's gotta be running somewhere. Maybe we're near a village? And I bet that village has a market!

full_text: [Excitedly.] Which means no nuts for dinner!
character_words: Which means no nuts for dinner!

full_text: [Katara and Aang chase after Haru.] Hey! I worked hard to get those nuts! [Momo flies overhead, chasing Katara and Aang.] Yeah, I hate 'em too. [Slowly follows Katara and Aang.]
character_words: Hey! I worked hard to get those nuts!  Yeah, I hate 'em too.

full_text: Great hat! [Tries on the hat.] I'll trade you some nuts for it.
character_words: Great hat!  I'll trade you some nuts for it.

full_text: [Notices the boy enter a shop. Speaks to herself in surprise.] Hey ...
character_words: Hey ...

full_text: Hi, Mom.
character_words: Hi, Mom.

full_text: Where have you been, Haru? You're late! Get started on your chores.
character_words: Where have you been, Haru? You're late! Get started on your chores.

full_text: [Enters the shop's front door, startling Haru.] Hey. You're that kid. Why did you run away before?
character_words: Hey. You're that kid. Why did you run away before?

full_text: Uh, you must have me confused with some other kid.
character_words: Uh, you must have me confused with some other kid.

full_text: [Aang and Sokka enter the shop.] No, she doesn't. We saw you earthbending.
character_words: No, she doesn't. We saw you earthbending.

full_text: [Standing by the window.] They saw you doing what?!
character_words: They saw you doing what?!

full_text: They're crazy, Mom! I mean, look at how they're dressed.
character_words: They're crazy, Mom! I mean, look at how they're dressed.

full_text: You know how dangerous that is! You know what would happen if they caught you earthbending!
character_words: You know how dangerous that is! You know what would happen if they caught you earthbending!

full_text: [Heavy knocks on the door.] Open up!
character_words: Open up!

full_text: [Sokka peeks through the window's blinds.] Fire Nation! Act natural!
character_words: Fire Nation! Act natural!

full_text: [The tax collector stares sourly toward the four children; aggressively.] What do you want? I've already paid you this week!
character_words: What do you want? I've already paid you this week!

full_text: The tax just doubled. [Arrogantly.] And we wouldn't want an accident now would we? [Creates a ball of fire between his hands, making everyone slightly back away.] Fire is sometimes so hard to control.
character_words: The tax just doubled.  And we wouldn't want an accident now would we?  Fire is sometimes so hard to control.

full_text: You can keep the copper ones. [Walks away, dropping four copper pieces to the floor, exits.]
character_words: You can keep the copper ones.

full_text: [Door slams.] Nice guy. How long has the Fire Nation been here?
character_words: Nice guy. How long has the Fire Nation been here?
