full_text: [Surprised.] We're finally here.
character_words: We're finally here.

full_text: [Fascinated.] I can't believe how many waterbenders live up here!
character_words: I can't believe how many waterbenders live up here!

full_text: [To Katara.] We'll find a master to teach us, no problem.
character_words: We'll find a master to teach us, no problem.

full_text: This place is beautiful.
character_words: This place is beautiful.

full_text: Yeah ... she is ...
character_words: Yeah ... she is ...

full_text: [Singing.] Winter, spring ... Summer, and fall ... Winter, spring ... Summer, and fall ... Four seasons ... four loves ... Four seasons ... for love.
character_words: Winter, spring ... Summer, and fall ... Winter, spring ... Summer, and fall ... Four seasons ... four loves ... Four seasons ... for love.

full_text: Tonight, we celebrate the arrival of our brother and sister from the Southern Tribe. And they have brought with them, someone very special, someone whom many of us believed disappeared from the world until now ... the Avatar! [Crowd applauds and cheers.] We also celebrate my daughter's sixteenth birthday. Princess Yue is now of marrying age!
character_words: Tonight, we celebrate the arrival of our brother and sister from the Southern Tribe. And they have brought with them, someone very special, someone whom many of us believed disappeared from the world until now ... the Avatar!  We also celebrate my daughter's sixteenth birthday. Princess Yue is now of marrying age!

full_text: Thank you, Father. May the great Ocean and Moon Spirits watch over us during these troubled times!
character_words: Thank you, Father. May the great Ocean and Moon Spirits watch over us during these troubled times!

full_text: Now, Master Pakku and his students will perform!
character_words: Now, Master Pakku and his students will perform!

full_text: Hi there. Sokka, Southern Water Tribe.
character_words: Hi there. Sokka, Southern Water Tribe.

full_text: [Smiling and bowing slightly.] Very nice to meet you. [They nervously share an awkward silence for a moment.]
character_words: Very nice to meet you.

full_text: [Nervously.] So ... uhhh ... you're a princess, huh? [She nods and smiles.] You know, back in my tribe, I'm kind of like a prince, myself. [Shot pans left to reveal Katara.]
character_words: So ... uhhh ... you're a princess, huh?  You know, back in my tribe, I'm kind of like a prince, myself.

full_text: [Hopping in on the conversation; teasingly.] Ha, prince of what?
character_words: Ha, prince of what?

full_text: A lot of things! Do you mind? I'm trying to have a conversation here.
character_words: A lot of things! Do you mind? I'm trying to have a conversation here.

full_text: [Sarcastically.] My apologies, Prince Sokka.
character_words: My apologies, Prince Sokka.

full_text: So, it looks like I'm going to be in town for a while. I'm thinking ... maybe we could ... do an activity, together?
character_words: So, it looks like I'm going to be in town for a while. I'm thinking ... maybe we could ... do an activity, together?

full_text: [Slightly confused; laughs.] Do an activity?
character_words: Do an activity?

full_text: Very smooth ...
character_words: Very smooth ...

full_text: Master Pakku, meet your newest student, the Avatar. [Aang bows.]
character_words: Master Pakku, meet your newest student, the Avatar.

full_text: Just because you're destined to save the world, don't expect any special treatment.
character_words: Just because you're destined to save the world, don't expect any special treatment.

full_text: My friend and I can't wait to start training with you! After we relax for a couple of days.
character_words: My friend and I can't wait to start training with you! After we relax for a couple of days.

full_text: If you want to relax, then I suggest visiting a tropical island. If not, I'll see you both at sunrise. Good night.
character_words: If you want to relax, then I suggest visiting a tropical island. If not, I'll see you both at sunrise. Good night.

full_text: For the last time, I'm not playing the tsungi horn!
character_words: For the last time, I'm not playing the tsungi horn!

full_text: No, it's about our plans. There's a bit of a problem.
character_words: No, it's about our plans. There's a bit of a problem.

full_text: I'm taking your crew.
character_words: I'm taking your crew.

full_text: [Cut to a shocked Zuko.] What?! [Turns around to face Zhao.]
character_words: What?!

full_text: I've recruited them for a little expedition to the North Pole.
character_words: I've recruited them for a little expedition to the North Pole.

full_text: Uncle, is that true?
character_words: Uncle, is that true?

full_text: I'm afraid so. He's taking everyone ... [Putting his arm over his face in woe.] even the cook.
character_words: I'm afraid so. He's taking everyone ...  even the cook.

full_text: Sorry you won't be there to watch me capture the Avatar. But I can't have you getting in my way again.
character_words: Sorry you won't be there to watch me capture the Avatar. But I can't have you getting in my way again.

full_text: [Cuts to a furious Zuko. Zuko charges at Zhao in anger, but Iroh cuts him off.] No!
character_words: No!

full_text: I didn't know you were skilled with broadswords, Prince Zuko.
character_words: I didn't know you were skilled with broadswords, Prince Zuko.

full_text: I'm not. They're antiques. Just decorative.
character_words: I'm not. They're antiques. Just decorative.

full_text: Have you heard of the Blue Spirit, General Iroh?
character_words: Have you heard of the Blue Spirit, General Iroh?

full_text: Just rumors. I don't think he is real.
character_words: Just rumors. I don't think he is real.

full_text: He's real, all right. [He hands the broad sword to Iroh.] He's a criminal, and an enemy of the Fire Nation. But I have a feeling justice will catch up with him soon. [Zhao moves to exit the cabin.] General Iroh, the offer to join my mission still stands ... if you change your mind.
character_words: He's real, all right.  He's a criminal, and an enemy of the Fire Nation. But I have a feeling justice will catch up with him soon.  General Iroh, the offer to join my mission still stands ... if you change your mind.

full_text: [Excitedly.] I've waited for this day my whole life. I finally get to learn from a real waterbending master!
character_words: I've waited for this day my whole life. I finally get to learn from a real waterbending master!

full_text: Good morning, Master Pakku!
character_words: Good morning, Master Pakku!

full_text: [Drops the water, and speaks in an annoyed tone.] No, please, march right in. I'm not concentrating or anything.
character_words: No, please, march right in. I'm not concentrating or anything.

full_text: Uhhh ... This is my friend, Katara. The one I told you about?
character_words: Uhhh ... This is my friend, Katara. The one I told you about?

full_text: I'm sorry, I think there's been a misunderstanding. You didn't tell me your friend was a girl. In our tribe, it is forbidden for women to learn waterbending.
character_words: I'm sorry, I think there's been a misunderstanding. You didn't tell me your friend was a girl. In our tribe, it is forbidden for women to learn waterbending.

full_text: [Angrily.] What do you mean you won't teach me? I didn't travel across the entire world so you could tell me no!
character_words: What do you mean you won't teach me? I didn't travel across the entire world so you could tell me no!

full_text: No.
character_words: No.

full_text: But there must be other female waterbenders in your tribe!
character_words: But there must be other female waterbenders in your tribe!

full_text: Here, the women learn from Yugoda to use their waterbending to heal. I'm sure she would be happy to take you as her student, despite your bad attitude.
character_words: Here, the women learn from Yugoda to use their waterbending to heal. I'm sure she would be happy to take you as her student, despite your bad attitude.

full_text: I don't want to heal, I want to fight!
character_words: I don't want to heal, I want to fight!

full_text: I can see that. But our tribe has customs, rules.
character_words: I can see that. But our tribe has customs, rules.

full_text: [Furious.] Well, your rules stink!
character_words: Well, your rules stink!

full_text: [Also just as angry.] Yeah, they're not fair! If you won't teach Katara, then ...
character_words: Yeah, they're not fair! If you won't teach Katara, then ...

full_text: Then what?
character_words: Then what?

full_text: Then I won't learn from you!
character_words: Then I won't learn from you!

full_text: Well, have fun teaching yourself! I'm sure you'll do a great job.
character_words: Well, have fun teaching yourself! I'm sure you'll do a great job.

full_text: Wait! Aang didn't mean that! [Goes to Aang.] You can't risk your training for me. You have to learn from Master Pakku, even if he is a big jerk.
character_words: Wait! Aang didn't mean that!  You can't risk your training for me. You have to learn from Master Pakku, even if he is a big jerk.

full_text: Why don't we get started, then? [Aang gets hit with a water blast from him.]
character_words: Why don't we get started, then?

full_text: Princess Yue, good morning! How about that picnic last night? Boy, your dad sure does know how to throw a party.
character_words: Princess Yue, good morning! How about that picnic last night? Boy, your dad sure does know how to throw a party.

full_text: I'm happy you enjoyed yourself.
character_words: I'm happy you enjoyed yourself.

full_text: Well, it wasn't as much fun after you left. [They both blush.] So, I'm still hoping we can see more of each other.
character_words: Well, it wasn't as much fun after you left.  So, I'm still hoping we can see more of each other.

full_text: Do an activity, you mean?
character_words: Do an activity, you mean?

full_text: Yes ... at a place ... for some time.
character_words: Yes ... at a place ... for some time.

full_text: [Laughs.] I'd love to. I'll meet you on that bridge tonight. [Points at a bridge.]
character_words: I'd love to. I'll meet you on that bridge tonight.

full_text: Great! I'll see you Ah! [Falls into the water.]
character_words: Great! I'll see you Ah!

full_text: [Laughs.] Sorry.
character_words: Sorry.

full_text: [Climbs out of the water.] That's okay, it was worth it. See you tonight.
character_words: That's okay, it was worth it. See you tonight.

full_text: I'm very impressed. You all seem highly qualified for the mission I have in mind.
character_words: I'm very impressed. You all seem highly qualified for the mission I have in mind.

full_text: That's some tasty gold.
character_words: That's some tasty gold.

full_text: What do you need us to do?
character_words: What do you need us to do?

full_text: I believe you're acquainted with Prince Zuko.
character_words: I believe you're acquainted with Prince Zuko.

full_text: Uhhh ... Hi. Are you Yugoda?
character_words: Uhhh ... Hi. Are you Yugoda?

full_text: Are you here for the healing lesson?
character_words: Are you here for the healing lesson?

full_text: [Looks at all the young girls, and speaks in a disappointed tone.] I guess I am.
character_words: I guess I am.

full_text: Welcome ... welcome!
character_words: Welcome ... welcome!

full_text: You're moving the water around, but you're not feeling the push and pull.
character_words: You're moving the water around, but you're not feeling the push and pull.

full_text: I'm trying ...
character_words: I'm trying ...

full_text: [Slurps some tea.] Maybe that move is too advanced for you. Why don't you try an easier one?
character_words: Maybe that move is too advanced for you. Why don't you try an easier one?

full_text: Thanks for the lesson.
character_words: Thanks for the lesson.

full_text: So, who's the lucky boy?
character_words: So, who's the lucky boy?

full_text: Huh?
character_words: Huh?

full_text: Your betrothal necklace. You're getting married, right?
character_words: Your betrothal necklace. You're getting married, right?

full_text: [Shocked.] Ah ... No. I don't think I'm ready for that yet. My grandmother gave my mother this necklace and my mother passed it down to me.
character_words: Ah ... No. I don't think I'm ready for that yet. My grandmother gave my mother this necklace and my mother passed it down to me.

full_text: I recognize this carving! I don't know why I didn't realize sooner; you're the spitting image of Kanna!
character_words: I recognize this carving! I don't know why I didn't realize sooner; you're the spitting image of Kanna!

full_text: [Confused.] Wait, how do you know my Gran-Gran's name?
character_words: Wait, how do you know my Gran-Gran's name?

full_text: When I was about your age, I was friends with Kanna. She was born here in the Northern Tribe.
character_words: When I was about your age, I was friends with Kanna. She was born here in the Northern Tribe.

full_text: She never told me.
character_words: She never told me.

full_text: Your grandmother had an arranged marriage with a young waterbender. He carved that necklace for her.
character_words: Your grandmother had an arranged marriage with a young waterbender. He carved that necklace for her.

full_text: If Gran-Gran was engaged, why did she leave?
character_words: If Gran-Gran was engaged, why did she leave?

full_text: I don't know. That's always been a mystery to me. She left without saying goodbye.
character_words: I don't know. That's always been a mystery to me. She left without saying goodbye.

full_text: Good luck!
character_words: Good luck!

full_text: [Cut to a shot of Prince Zuko lying in bed in the foreground of his cabin. The door opens and Iroh sticks his head in. Entering.] The crew wanted me to wish you safe travels.
character_words: The crew wanted me to wish you safe travels.

full_text: [Bitterly.] Good riddance to those traitors.
character_words: Good riddance to those traitors.

full_text: It's a lovely night for a walk. Why don't you join me? It would clear your head. [No response.] Or just stay in your room and sit in the dark. Whatever makes you happy.
character_words: It's a lovely night for a walk. Why don't you join me? It would clear your head.  Or just stay in your room and sit in the dark. Whatever makes you happy.

full_text: Careful with the blasting jelly!
character_words: Careful with the blasting jelly!

full_text: [Hearing the noise.] Uncle? Uncle, is that you? [Walks around the ship.]
character_words: Uncle? Uncle, is that you?

full_text: Zuko! [Runs back to see the ship destroyed.] Zuko ...
character_words: Zuko!  Zuko ...

full_text: Hi, Princess Yue. I made you something. I carved it myself.
character_words: Hi, Princess Yue. I made you something. I carved it myself.

full_text: It's a bear.
character_words: It's a bear.

full_text: Actually, it's supposed to be a fish. [Flips the carved creature around.] See, it has a fin.
character_words: Actually, it's supposed to be a fish.  See, it has a fin.

full_text: Oh. I'm sorry, I made a mistake. I shouldn't have asked you to come here. [Runs away.]
character_words: Oh. I'm sorry, I made a mistake. I shouldn't have asked you to come here.

full_text: How's warrior training going? [Sokka kicks his bag.]
character_words: How's warrior training going?

full_text: That bad?
character_words: That bad?

full_text: No, it's Princess Yue. I don't get it, one minute she wants to go out with me, and the next, she's telling me to get lost. [Changing the topic.] So, how's waterbending training?
character_words: No, it's Princess Yue. I don't get it, one minute she wants to go out with me, and the next, she's telling me to get lost.  So, how's waterbending training?

full_text: Master Poophead won't teach her because she's a girl.
character_words: Master Poophead won't teach her because she's a girl.

full_text: Why don't you just teach her, Aang?
character_words: Why don't you just teach her, Aang?

full_text: [Excited.] Why didn't I think of that? At night, you can teach me whatever moves you learn from Master Pakku! That way, you have someone to practice with, and I get to learn waterbending! Everyone's happy!
character_words: Why didn't I think of that? At night, you can teach me whatever moves you learn from Master Pakku! That way, you have someone to practice with, and I get to learn waterbending! Everyone's happy!

full_text: I'm not happy.
character_words: I'm not happy.

full_text: But you're never happy. Come on, Aang.
character_words: But you're never happy. Come on, Aang.

full_text: [Bending up some water.] Master Pakku said this move is all about sinking and floating. [Sends the water to her.]
character_words: Master Pakku said this move is all about sinking and floating.

full_text: [Bending the water.] I got it!
character_words: I got it!

full_text: That was amazing!
character_words: That was amazing!

full_text: That wasn't me.
character_words: That wasn't me.

full_text: I was just showing Katara a few moves.
character_words: I was just showing Katara a few moves.

full_text: You have disrespected me, my teachings, and my entire culture.
character_words: You have disrespected me, my teachings, and my entire culture.

full_text: I'm sorry, I ...
character_words: I'm sorry, I ...

full_text: You are no longer welcome as my student.
character_words: You are no longer welcome as my student.

full_text: What do you want me to do? Force Master Pakku to take Aang back as his student?
character_words: What do you want me to do? Force Master Pakku to take Aang back as his student?

full_text: Yes ... please!
character_words: Yes ... please!

full_text: I suspect he might change his mind, if you swallow your pride and apologize to him.
character_words: I suspect he might change his mind, if you swallow your pride and apologize to him.

full_text: Fine.
character_words: Fine.

full_text: I'm waiting, little girl.
character_words: I'm waiting, little girl.

full_text: No. [Begins cracking the ice inadvertently.] No way am I apologizing to a sour old man like you! [Two pots shatter.]
character_words: No.  No way am I apologizing to a sour old man like you!

full_text: Uhhh ... Katara?
character_words: Uhhh ... Katara?

full_text: I'll be outside if you're man enough to fight me.
character_words: I'll be outside if you're man enough to fight me.

full_text: I'm sure she didn't mean that.
character_words: I'm sure she didn't mean that.

full_text: Yeah, I think she did.
character_words: Yeah, I think she did.

full_text: I'm devastated to hear about Prince Zuko. Just ... devastated.
character_words: I'm devastated to hear about Prince Zuko. Just ... devastated.

full_text: The Fire Lord will not be pleased when he learns who was responsible.
character_words: The Fire Lord will not be pleased when he learns who was responsible.

full_text: You know who was behind the attack?
character_words: You know who was behind the attack?

full_text: Yes ... pirates. We had a run-in with them a while back. They wanted revenge.
character_words: Yes ... pirates. We had a run-in with them a while back. They wanted revenge.

full_text: [Sips his tea.] So, have you reconsidered my offer?
character_words: So, have you reconsidered my offer?

full_text: Yes, I accept. It will be an honor to serve as your general. To the Fire Nation!
character_words: Yes, I accept. It will be an honor to serve as your general. To the Fire Nation!

full_text: To victory!
character_words: To victory!

full_text: Are you crazy, Katara? You're not going to win this fight!
character_words: Are you crazy, Katara? You're not going to win this fight!

full_text: [Takes off her coat.] I know! I don't care!
character_words: I know! I don't care!

full_text: You don't have to do this for me. I can find another teacher.
character_words: You don't have to do this for me. I can find another teacher.

full_text: I'm not doing it for you! Someone needs to slap some sense into that guy! [Pakku comes down.] So, you decided to show up? [Pakku walks away.] Aren't you going to fight?
character_words: I'm not doing it for you! Someone needs to slap some sense into that guy!  So, you decided to show up?  Aren't you going to fight?

full_text: Go back to the healing huts with the other women where you belong. [Katara tightens her fist and sends water whips at him. Pakku halts.] Fine. You want to learn to fight so bad? Study closely! [He bends two streams of water from nearby pools and sends them both at a charging Katara, who falls back. He joins the two streams together, encircling both Katara and himself in a forceful ring of water.] Don't worry, I'm not going to hurt you!
character_words: Go back to the healing huts with the other women where you belong.  Fine. You want to learn to fight so bad? Study closely!  Don't worry, I'm not going to hurt you!

full_text: [Determined.] You can't knock me down!
character_words: You can't knock me down!

full_text: Go, Katara!
character_words: Go, Katara!

full_text: Well, I'm impressed. You are an excellent waterbender.
character_words: Well, I'm impressed. You are an excellent waterbender.

full_text: But you still won't teach me, will you?
character_words: But you still won't teach me, will you?

full_text: No.
character_words: No.

full_text: This fight is over.
character_words: This fight is over.

full_text: Come back here. I'm not finished yet!
character_words: Come back here. I'm not finished yet!

full_text: Yes, you are. [Notices the necklace.] This is my necklace ...
character_words: Yes, you are.  This is my necklace ...

full_text: No, it's not. It's mine! Give it back!
character_words: No, it's not. It's mine! Give it back!

full_text: I made this sixty years ago for the love of my life ... for Kanna.
character_words: I made this sixty years ago for the love of my life ... for Kanna.

full_text: [Unfreezing the ice; surprised.] My Gran-Gran was supposed to marry you?
character_words: My Gran-Gran was supposed to marry you?

full_text: Our plan is working perfectly. Zhao doesn't suspect a thing.
character_words: Our plan is working perfectly. Zhao doesn't suspect a thing.

full_text: You didn't have to do this.
character_words: You didn't have to do this.

full_text: No nephew of mine is going to stow away on a ship without some backup.
character_words: No nephew of mine is going to stow away on a ship without some backup.

full_text: Thank you, Uncle.
character_words: Thank you, Uncle.

full_text: Someone's coming. Stay hidden until we get to the North Pole and the Avatar will be yours. Good luck. [The two head their separate ways.]
character_words: Someone's coming. Stay hidden until we get to the North Pole and the Avatar will be yours. Good luck.

full_text: I carved this necklace for your grandmother when we got engaged. I thought we would have a long, happy life together. I loved her.
character_words: I carved this necklace for your grandmother when we got engaged. I thought we would have a long, happy life together. I loved her.

full_text: But she didn't love you, did she? It was an arranged marriage. Gran-Gran wouldn't let your tribe's stupid customs run her life. That's why she left. It must have taken a lot of courage.
character_words: But she didn't love you, did she? It was an arranged marriage. Gran-Gran wouldn't let your tribe's stupid customs run her life. That's why she left. It must have taken a lot of courage.

full_text: [To Sokka.] Go get her.
character_words: Go get her.

full_text: What do you want from me?
character_words: What do you want from me?

full_text: Nothing. I just want you to know, I think you're beautiful, and, I never thought a girl like you would even notice a guy like me.
character_words: Nothing. I just want you to know, I think you're beautiful, and, I never thought a girl like you would even notice a guy like me.

full_text: You don't understand.
character_words: You don't understand.

full_text: No, no. See, that's the thing. I think I do understand now. You're a Princess, and I'm ... I'm just a Southern peasant.
character_words: No, no. See, that's the thing. I think I do understand now. You're a Princess, and I'm ... I'm just a Southern peasant.

full_text: No, Sokka ...
character_words: No, Sokka ...

full_text: It's okay. You don't have to say anything. I'll see you around, okay? [Yue grabs him and kisses him.] Okay, now I'm really confused. Happy, but confused.
character_words: It's okay. You don't have to say anything. I'll see you around, okay?  Okay, now I'm really confused. Happy, but confused.

full_text: I do like you, a lot. But we can't be together, and not for the reason you think. It's because ... I'm engaged. [She pulls down the collar of her coat and shows him her betrothal necklace.] I'm sorry. [Runs off.]
character_words: I do like you, a lot. But we can't be together, and not for the reason you think. It's because ... I'm engaged.  I'm sorry.

full_text: Not bad, not bad. [Laughs.] Keep practicing and maybe you'll get it by the time you're my age.
character_words: Not bad, not bad.  Keep practicing and maybe you'll get it by the time you're my age.

full_text: Hey, Katara!
character_words: Hey, Katara!

full_text: What do you think you're doing? [Pause as Katara looks up.] It's past sunrise. You're late.
character_words: What do you think you're doing?  It's past sunrise. You're late.

full_text: Good to see you here.
character_words: Good to see you here.

full_text: You, too.
character_words: You, too.

full_text: My fleet is ready. Set a course for the Northern Water Tribe.
character_words: My fleet is ready. Set a course for the Northern Water Tribe.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Displeased.] Nice try, Pupil Sangok. [Shows Sangok trying to break free.] A couple of more years and you might be ready to fight a sea sponge. [He unfreezes the ice; Sangok falls to the ground dazed.] Would anyone care for a rematch with Katara? [The scene cuts to several students sitting by the sidelines, the camera panning to the right showing all of them to be tired and unamused.] Katara, you've advanced more quickly than any student I've ever trained. [Cuts to a shot of Katara, who smiles brightly.] You have proven that with fierce determination, passion and hard work, you can accomplish anything. [Turns to Aang irritably.] Raw talent alone is not enough. [Cut to Aang who is lying on the ground with a lazy smile, floating Momo around on an airball above him.] Pupil Aang!
character_words: Nice try, Pupil Sangok.  A couple of more years and you might be ready to fight a sea sponge.  Would anyone care for a rematch with Katara?  Katara, you've advanced more quickly than any student I've ever trained.  You have proven that with fierce determination, passion and hard work, you can accomplish anything.  Raw talent alone is not enough.  Pupil Aang!

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Stops bending at the sound of his name; Momo lands on his head.] Yes, Master Pakku?
character_words: Yes, Master Pakku?

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Sarcastically.] Care to step into the sparring circle? I figure since you've found time to play with house pets, you must have already mastered waterbending.
character_words: Care to step into the sparring circle? I figure since you've found time to play with house pets, you must have already mastered waterbending.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Jumps off the ground with airbending.] I wouldn't say mastered, but check this out.
character_words: I wouldn't say mastered, but check this out.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: So they don't have palaces in the Southern Tribe?
character_words: So they don't have palaces in the Southern Tribe?

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Sitting down on the ledge.] Are you kidding? I grew up in a block of ice. It's not exactly a cultural hub.
character_words: Are you kidding? I grew up in a block of ice. It's not exactly a cultural hub.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Laughs and places her hand on Sokka's shoulder; when Sokka smiles at her, she gets a little upset and looks at him seriously.] Sokka, this is wrong.
character_words: Sokka, this is wrong.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Protesting.] What's wrong? We're taking a walk!
character_words: What's wrong? We're taking a walk!

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Unsurely.] I'm engaged. It just feels ...
character_words: I'm engaged. It just feels ...

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Brightens.] I know what you need. [He hops off the rail to stand by her side.] You need to meet my good friend, Appa.
character_words: I know what you need.  You need to meet my good friend, Appa.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Curiously.] Who?
character_words: Who?

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Opening his arms out in enthusiasm.] Appa and I go way back, don't we, boy? [The thunder of Appa's shifting bulk is heard and Sokka's features turn to surprise. Appa enters from the left and lands on top of him and licks him, much to Sokka's dismay.] Ah, ah, easy! Down boy! Agh! No, up!
character_words: Appa and I go way back, don't we, boy?  Ah, ah, easy! Down boy! Agh! No, up!

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: Looks like you haven't been giving Appa enough attention!
character_words: Looks like you haven't been giving Appa enough attention!

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Excitedly.] So, how does this work?
character_words: So, how does this work?

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: You holding on tight? [Yue nods; in a cool tone.] Yip ... [Cut to a close up of Sokka's face.] yip.
character_words: You holding on tight?  Yip ...  yip.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Impressed.] Oh ... my ... goodness! [Cuts to where Appa is soaring over the ocean; Yue is looking over the saddle.] Wow, I can't believe you do this every day.
character_words: Oh ... my ... goodness!  Wow, I can't believe you do this every day.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Stretches.] Yeah, we pretty much live up here.
character_words: Yeah, we pretty much live up here.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: Is it always this cold in the sky? [Moves closer to Sokka.]
character_words: Is it always this cold in the sky?

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Happily.] Not when you're with someone.
character_words: Not when you're with someone.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Turning to face Sokka, blushing.] It's beautiful up here.
character_words: It's beautiful up here.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: Yeah ... [The two turn to each other and slowly begin to lean in, but at the very last moment, Sokka widens his eyes, turns away and pretends to act cool again.] Woo, yeah! Ahhh, good times, good times. [Snow and black soot start to fall from the sky.] Hey, look!
character_words: Yeah ...  Woo, yeah! Ahhh, good times, good times.  Hey, look!

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Camera zooms out to Appa flying through the gray snowfall; worried.] What's happening?
character_words: What's happening?

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Nervous.] Oh no ...
character_words: Oh no ...

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Picking up handful of black snow.] Soot.
character_words: Soot.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: What?
character_words: What?

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: I've seen this before, right before my village was attacked. It's soot mixed with snow. [Rises.]
character_words: I've seen this before, right before my village was attacked. It's soot mixed with snow.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: But, why?
character_words: But, why?

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Looking out over the horizon.] It's the Fire Nation. [Looks at Yue concerned.] They've closed in on the North Pole and from the looks of this stuff, [Camera zooms out to show the enormity of the sooty snowfall.] I'd say there's a lot of them.
character_words: It's the Fire Nation.  They've closed in on the North Pole and from the looks of this stuff,  I'd say there's a lot of them.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Voice-over.] This will truly be one for the history books, General Iroh. [Cuts to Zhao and Iroh standing on deck.] Just think, centuries from now, people will study the great Admiral Zhao, who destroyed the last of the Water Tribe civilization. You're lucky you're here to see it.
character_words: This will truly be one for the history books, General Iroh.  Just think, centuries from now, people will study the great Admiral Zhao, who destroyed the last of the Water Tribe civilization. You're lucky you're here to see it.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Tersely.] Be careful what you wish for, Admiral. History is not always kind to its subjects.
character_words: Be careful what you wish for, Admiral. History is not always kind to its subjects.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: I suppose you speak from experience, but rest assured. This will be nothing like your legendary failure at Ba Sing Se. [Walks forward.]
character_words: I suppose you speak from experience, but rest assured. This will be nothing like your legendary failure at Ba Sing Se.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Sadly.] I hope not, for your sake.
character_words: I hope not, for your sake.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: Tell the captains to prepare for first strike.
character_words: Tell the captains to prepare for first strike.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Secretly.] We'll be landing soon. Do you have a plan?
character_words: We'll be landing soon. Do you have a plan?

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Removes face covering to reveal his face covered in cuts.] I'm working on it, Uncle. [Puts covering back in place.]
character_words: I'm working on it, Uncle.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Trying to drag her along.] What's wrong? [Pointing up to the citadel.] We have to go!
character_words: What's wrong?  We have to go!

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Sadly; lets go of Sokka's hand.] No, Sokka, wait, I can't see you anymore. Not at all.
character_words: No, Sokka, wait, I can't see you anymore. Not at all.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Protesting.] What? We're just friends.
character_words: What? We're just friends.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: I wish we could just be friends, but I like you too much and it's too confusing to be around you. I'm marrying someone else! [Turns away sorrowfully.]
character_words: I wish we could just be friends, but I like you too much and it's too confusing to be around you. I'm marrying someone else!

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: You don't love him, do you? You don't even seem to like him.
character_words: You don't love him, do you? You don't even seem to like him.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: But I do love my people.
character_words: But I do love my people.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Objecting.] You're not marrying them.
character_words: You're not marrying them.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Turns to face Sokka.] You don't understand. I have duties to my father, to my tribe. I have to do this. Goodbye.
character_words: You don't understand. I have duties to my father, to my tribe. I have to do this. Goodbye.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: The day we have feared for so long has arrived. The Fire Nation is on our doorstep. It is with great sadness I call my family here before me, knowing well that some of these faces are about to vanish from our tribe, [While saying this line, the scene flashes from Yue to Pakku to Hahn.] but they will never vanish from our hearts. Now, as we approach the battle for our existence, I call upon the great spirits. Spirit of the Ocean! Spirit of the Moon! Be with us! I'm going to need volunteers for a dangerous mission.
character_words: The day we have feared for so long has arrived. The Fire Nation is on our doorstep. It is with great sadness I call my family here before me, knowing well that some of these faces are about to vanish from our tribe,  but they will never vanish from our hearts. Now, as we approach the battle for our existence, I call upon the great spirits. Spirit of the Ocean! Spirit of the Moon! Be with us! I'm going to need volunteers for a dangerous mission.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Rising from his seat.] Count me in!
character_words: Count me in!

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: Sokka ...
character_words: Sokka ...

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: Be warned, many of you will not return. [Several Water Tribe men rise and walk forward.] Come forward to receive my mark, if you accept the task.
character_words: Be warned, many of you will not return.  Come forward to receive my mark, if you accept the task.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: The stillness before battle is unbearable. Such a quiet dread.
character_words: The stillness before battle is unbearable. Such a quiet dread.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: I wasn't there when the Fire Nation attacked my people. [Determined.] I'm going to make a difference this time.
character_words: I wasn't there when the Fire Nation attacked my people.  I'm going to make a difference this time.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: Yip-yip!
character_words: Yip-yip!

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Pulls his arm free from the snow.] Katara!
character_words: Katara!

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: I'll take it from here, boy.
character_words: I'll take it from here, boy.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Brightening.] Appa!
character_words: Appa!

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: Thanks for the rescue, buddy!
character_words: Thanks for the rescue, buddy!

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Shocked.] You've got to be kidding me ...
character_words: You've got to be kidding me ...

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: Men, you'll be infiltrating the Fire Nation Navy. That means you'll all need one of these uniforms.
character_words: Men, you'll be infiltrating the Fire Nation Navy. That means you'll all need one of these uniforms.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Angrily.] What's your problem?
character_words: What's your problem?

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: Fire Navy uniforms don't look like that.
character_words: Fire Navy uniforms don't look like that.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Irritably.] Of course they do. These are real uniforms captured from actual Fire Navy soldiers.
character_words: Of course they do. These are real uniforms captured from actual Fire Navy soldiers.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Sarcastically.] When, like, a hundred years ago?
character_words: When, like, a hundred years ago?

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: Eighty-five.
character_words: Eighty-five.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Walks over and flings one of the shoulder spikes with his finger.] The Fire Nation doesn't wear shoulder spikes anymore. The newer uniforms are more streamlined.
character_words: The Fire Nation doesn't wear shoulder spikes anymore. The newer uniforms are more streamlined.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: How do we know we can trust this guy? [Turns to growl at Sokka, who glares at him in return.] Such bold talk for a new recruit.
character_words: How do we know we can trust this guy?  Such bold talk for a new recruit.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: Sokka is from our sister tribe, Hahn. He's a capable warrior and I value his input. [Sokka shoots Hahn a smug look; Arnook turns to the rest of the regiment.] Now, our first objective is to determine the identity of their commanding officer.
character_words: Sokka is from our sister tribe, Hahn. He's a capable warrior and I value his input.  Now, our first objective is to determine the identity of their commanding officer.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: His name is Zhao. Middle-aged, [Tracing imaginary sideburns with his fingers.] big sideburns, bigger temper ...
character_words: His name is Zhao. Middle-aged,  big sideburns, bigger temper ...

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: Sokka, I want you to tell everything you know to Hahn. He's leading this mission. Hahn, show Sokka your respect. [Beginning to walk away.] I expect nothing less from my future son-in-law.
character_words: Sokka, I want you to tell everything you know to Hahn. He's leading this mission. Hahn, show Sokka your respect.  I expect nothing less from my future son-in-law.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Stares at Hahn, mouth agape; points at him and narrows his eyes.] Princess Yue's marrying you?
character_words: Princess Yue's marrying you?

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Irritated.] Yeah, what of it?
character_words: Yeah, what of it?

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Turns away from Hahn, upset.] Nothing. Congratulations.
character_words: Nothing. Congratulations.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Pointing to the sky.] Stop those fireballs!
character_words: Stop those fireballs!

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: It's almost twilight, Admiral. As your military consultant, I must advise you to halt your attack. [Cuts to shot of the ship, sailing past a rising moon.] The waterbenders draw their power from the moon, and it is nearly full tonight. You should wait and resume the attack at daybreak. [Cuts back to Iroh and Zhao.]
character_words: It's almost twilight, Admiral. As your military consultant, I must advise you to halt your attack.  The waterbenders draw their power from the moon, and it is nearly full tonight. You should wait and resume the attack at daybreak.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: Oh, I'm well aware of the moon problem and I am working on a solution. But for now, daybreak it is.
character_words: Oh, I'm well aware of the moon problem and I am working on a solution. But for now, daybreak it is.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: They've stopped firing.
character_words: They've stopped firing.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: Aang!
character_words: Aang!

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Clearly exhausted, placing his hands on his head.] I can't do it ... I can't do it.
character_words: I can't do it ... I can't do it.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: What happened?
character_words: What happened?

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Dimly.] I must have taken out a dozen Fire Navy ships, but there's just too many of them. I can't fight them all.
character_words: I must have taken out a dozen Fire Navy ships, but there's just too many of them. I can't fight them all.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Pleadingly.] But, you have to. You're the Avatar.
character_words: But, you have to. You're the Avatar.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Solemnly.] I'm just one kid.
character_words: I'm just one kid.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: If you're fishing for an octopus my nephew, you need a tightly woven net, or he will squeeze through the tiniest hole and escape.
character_words: If you're fishing for an octopus my nephew, you need a tightly woven net, or he will squeeze through the tiniest hole and escape.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: I don't need your wisdom right now, Uncle.
character_words: I don't need your wisdom right now, Uncle.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: I'm sorry. I just nag you, because ... well, [Voice breaking slightly.] ever since I lost my son ...
character_words: I'm sorry. I just nag you, because ... well,  ever since I lost my son ...

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: Uncle, you don't have to say it.
character_words: Uncle, you don't have to say it.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: ... I think of you as my own.
character_words: ... I think of you as my own.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Faces his uncle, a softer expression on his face.] I know, Uncle. We'll meet again. [Iroh hugs him.] After I have the Avatar. [He turns away and gets on the boat.]
character_words: I know, Uncle. We'll meet again.  After I have the Avatar.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: Remember your breath of fire. It could save your life out there.
character_words: Remember your breath of fire. It could save your life out there.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: I will. [Lowers the boat, suspended by ropes, down the side of the ship into the water.]
character_words: I will.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: And put your hood up. Keep your ears warm!
character_words: And put your hood up. Keep your ears warm!

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: I'll be fine!
character_words: I'll be fine!

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Smugly.] Let me tell you Sokka, I've courted a lot of girls, but Yue is the finest and she comes with the most perks.
character_words: Let me tell you Sokka, I've courted a lot of girls, but Yue is the finest and she comes with the most perks.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Annoyed.] Perks? What does that mean?
character_words: Perks? What does that mean?

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: I mean, Yue's nice and everything, but the points I'll gain with the chief aren't bad either.
character_words: I mean, Yue's nice and everything, but the points I'll gain with the chief aren't bad either.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Angered.] Princess Yue is wasted on a self-absorbed weasel like you!
character_words: Princess Yue is wasted on a self-absorbed weasel like you!

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Camera begins closing up on Hahn.] Whoa, hang on. What do you care? [Sokka closes his eyes sorrowfully.] You're just a simple rube from the Southern Tribe. What would you know of the political complexities of our life? [Smirking.] No offense.
character_words: Whoa, hang on. What do you care?  You're just a simple rube from the Southern Tribe. What would you know of the political complexities of our life?  No offense.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Shouts and tackles Hahn; the two begin rolling around on the floor in a struggle.] You're just a jerk without a soul, no offense!
character_words: You're just a jerk without a soul, no offense!

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: That's enough! Sokka, you're off the mission!
character_words: That's enough! Sokka, you're off the mission!

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: All right, fall in men! Everybody listen to what I say and we'll take out this Admiral Ch in no time!
character_words: All right, fall in men! Everybody listen to what I say and we'll take out this Admiral Ch in no time!

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Irritated, waves arms in gesture.] It's Admiral Zhao!
character_words: It's Admiral Zhao!

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Peering down into the hole.] Where are they going? [Cuts to a shot of the hole, his face reflected in the water.] They're coming up for air somewhere.
character_words: Where are they going?  They're coming up for air somewhere.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Off camera.] The legends say the moon was the first waterbender. [Cuts to shot of her, Katara and Aang standing on a balcony, looking up at the sky.] Our ancestors saw how it pushed and pulled the tides and learned how to do it themselves.
character_words: The legends say the moon was the first waterbender.  Our ancestors saw how it pushed and pulled the tides and learned how to do it themselves.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: I've always noticed my waterbending is stronger at night.
character_words: I've always noticed my waterbending is stronger at night.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: Our strength comes from the spirit of the moon. Our life comes from the spirit of the ocean. [Camera pans slightly downward, showing Aang with a dull expression on his face.] They work together to keep balance.
character_words: Our strength comes from the spirit of the moon. Our life comes from the spirit of the ocean.  They work together to keep balance.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Brightening.] The spirits! [Raises head, startling Momo.] Maybe I can find them and get their help!
character_words: The spirits!  Maybe I can find them and get their help!

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: How can you do that?
character_words: How can you do that?

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Approaching her.] The Avatar is the bridge between our world and the Spirit World! Aang can talk to them!
character_words: The Avatar is the bridge between our world and the Spirit World! Aang can talk to them!

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [To Aang.] Maybe they'll give you the wisdom to win this battle!
character_words: Maybe they'll give you the wisdom to win this battle!

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Waves arms out in gesture.] Or maybe they'll unleash a crazy amazing spirit attack on the Fire Nation! [The two girls look at him oddly; Aang looks at them and straightens up.] Or wisdom. That's good, too.
character_words: Or maybe they'll unleash a crazy amazing spirit attack on the Fire Nation!  Or wisdom. That's good, too.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: The only problem is, last time you got to the Spirit World by accident. How are you going to get there this time?
character_words: The only problem is, last time you got to the Spirit World by accident. How are you going to get there this time?

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: I have an idea. Follow me.
character_words: I have an idea. Follow me.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Walking up to the door.] So, is this the way to the Spirit World?
character_words: So, is this the way to the Spirit World?

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Laughs.] No. You'll have to get there on your own. [Leans inward.] But I can take you to the most spiritual place in the entire North Pole. [Opens the door.]
character_words: No. You'll have to get there on your own.  But I can take you to the most spiritual place in the entire North Pole.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Runs to the back of the oasis and rolls around on the ground.] I never thought I'd miss grass this much!
character_words: I never thought I'd miss grass this much!

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Approaching the oasis.] It's so warm here! How is that possible?
character_words: It's so warm here! How is that possible?

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: It's the center of all spiritual energy in our land.
character_words: It's the center of all spiritual energy in our land.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: You're right, Yue. I can feel ... something. It's so tranquil. [Positions himself to meditate.]
character_words: You're right, Yue. I can feel ... something. It's so tranquil.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [To the barking turtle seals.] Be quiet!
character_words: Be quiet!

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: Is something wrong, Sokka?
character_words: Is something wrong, Sokka?

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Sarcastically.] Oh, no. Hahn's out there on the top-secret mission while I'm here sharpening my boomerang. Everything's fine.
character_words: Oh, no. Hahn's out there on the top-secret mission while I'm here sharpening my boomerang. Everything's fine.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: Listen to me. I took you off the mission for selfish reasons. I have a special task in mind for you.
character_words: Listen to me. I took you off the mission for selfish reasons. I have a special task in mind for you.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: What, you want me to scrub the barracks?
character_words: What, you want me to scrub the barracks?

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: I want you to guard my daughter, Princess Yue.
character_words: I want you to guard my daughter, Princess Yue.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Rises and tries to act cool.] Oh ... Sure. That ... shouldn't be too hard.
character_words: Oh ... Sure. That ... shouldn't be too hard.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: Why is he sitting like that?
character_words: Why is he sitting like that?

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: He's meditating, trying to cross over into the Spirit World. [Aang scrunches up his face in concentration.] It takes all his concentration.
character_words: He's meditating, trying to cross over into the Spirit World.  It takes all his concentration.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: Is there any way we can help?
character_words: Is there any way we can help?

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Angrily.] How about some quiet? Come on guys, I can hear every word you're saying!
character_words: How about some quiet? Come on guys, I can hear every word you're saying!

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Worried.] Is he okay?
character_words: Is he okay?

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: He's crossing into the Spirit World. He'll be fine as long as we don't move his body. [Cuts to overhead shot of the pond.] That's his way back to the physical world.
character_words: He's crossing into the Spirit World. He'll be fine as long as we don't move his body.  That's his way back to the physical world.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: Maybe we should get some help.
character_words: Maybe we should get some help.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Smiling.] No, he's my friend. I'm perfectly capable of protecting him.
character_words: No, he's my friend. I'm perfectly capable of protecting him.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Sarcastically.] Well, aren't you a big girl now.
character_words: Well, aren't you a big girl now.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Alarmed and dismayed.] No ...
character_words: No ...

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Determined.] Yes. Hand him over and I won't have to hurt you.
character_words: Yes. Hand him over and I won't have to hurt you.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Rising.] I see you've learned a new trick, but I didn't come this far to lose to you.
character_words: I see you've learned a new trick, but I didn't come this far to lose to you.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: You little peasant. You've found a master, haven't you?
character_words: You little peasant. You've found a master, haven't you?

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: It's daybreak at last. Let's write history.
character_words: It's daybreak at last. Let's write history.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: You rise with the moon ... I rise with the sun.
character_words: You rise with the moon ... I rise with the sun.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: The Water Tribe can try to resist the inevitable, but their city will fall today.
character_words: The Water Tribe can try to resist the inevitable, but their city will fall today.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: Aang!
character_words: Aang!

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: What happened? Where's Zuko?
character_words: What happened? Where's Zuko?

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Dismayed.] He took Aang. He took him right out from under me.
character_words: He took Aang. He took him right out from under me.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 1
full_text: [Off-camera.] Where did they go ...
character_words: Where did they go ...

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: [Off-screen; sorrowfully.] I can't believe I lost him.
character_words: I can't believe I lost him.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: You did everything you could, and now we need to do everything we can to get him back. [Cuts to shot of Katara who looks up at her brother, tears in her eyes.] Zuko can't have gotten far. We'll find him. Aang's gonna be fine.
character_words: You did everything you could, and now we need to do everything we can to get him back.  Zuko can't have gotten far. We'll find him. Aang's gonna be fine.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: Okay. [Closes eyes and gets up. Camera pans over to where Momo remains motionless on the ground. Cuts to shot of Appa, Katara having mounted the bison.] It's all right. You stay here, Momo, in case Aang comes back.
character_words: Okay.  It's all right. You stay here, Momo, in case Aang comes back.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: Yip, yip.
character_words: Yip, yip.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: Hello? I'm sorry to disturb you. I just really need to find the Moon and the Ocean Spirits.
character_words: Hello? I'm sorry to disturb you. I just really need to find the Moon and the Ocean Spirits.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: [Cut to a frontal shot of the baboon spirit.] Go. Away. [Opens one eye. Cut back to the side-shot.] You're still here?
character_words: Go. Away.  You're still here?

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: Yes, I need -
character_words: Yes, I need -

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: [Cut to close-up of the baboon spirit who shuts his eyes tightly. Louder, trying to distract himself.] Ohm! [A firefly flies past; points at the insect.] Perhaps that thing will help you. Chase it. [Aang runs after it. The mystical monkey keeps his eyes shut for a second more before opening one to confirm Aang's departure. He shakes his head and breathes a sigh of relief.] Finally.
character_words: Ohm!  Perhaps that thing will help you. Chase it.  Finally.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: Come back!
character_words: Come back!

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: Hello, Aang.
character_words: Hello, Aang.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: [Looking at him; surprised.] Roku!
character_words: Roku!

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: Shelter. [Drags Aang into the cave and ties him up.]
character_words: Shelter.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: Roku, the Water Tribe's under attack. I need to find the Ocean and the Moon Spirits.
character_words: Roku, the Water Tribe's under attack. I need to find the Ocean and the Moon Spirits.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: [Pops out of the reflection in front of Aang.] The Ocean and the Moon are ancient spirits. They crossed over the Spirit World to the mortal world very near the beginning. There is only one spirit I know of who is old enough to remember.
character_words: The Ocean and the Moon are ancient spirits. They crossed over the Spirit World to the mortal world very near the beginning. There is only one spirit I know of who is old enough to remember.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: Who?
character_words: Who?

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: The spirit's name is Koh, but he is very dangerous. They call him the Face Stealer. [Aang looks horrified.] When you speak with him, you must be very careful to show no emotion at all. Not the slightest expression, or he will steal your face. [Aang looks even more horrified but calmly nods, understanding the situation.]
character_words: The spirit's name is Koh, but he is very dangerous. They call him the Face Stealer.  When you speak with him, you must be very careful to show no emotion at all. Not the slightest expression, or he will steal your face.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: I finally have you, but I can't get you home because of this blizzard. [Stands up and looks outside the cave.] There's always something. Not that you would understand. You're like my sister. Everything always came easy to her. She's a firebending prodigy, and everyone adores her. My father says she was born lucky. He says I was lucky to be born. I don't need luck, though. I don't want it. I've always had to struggle and fight and that's made me strong. It's made me who I am.
character_words: I finally have you, but I can't get you home because of this blizzard.  There's always something. Not that you would understand. You're like my sister. Everything always came easy to her. She's a firebending prodigy, and everyone adores her. My father says she was born lucky. He says I was lucky to be born. I don't need luck, though. I don't want it. I've always had to struggle and fight and that's made me strong. It's made me who I am.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: I don't need to remind you we have a time limit. If we don't defeat the Water Tribe before the full moon rises, they will be undefeatable.
character_words: I don't need to remind you we have a time limit. If we don't defeat the Water Tribe before the full moon rises, they will be undefeatable.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: I assure you I have everything under control. I intend to remove the moon as a factor.
character_words: I assure you I have everything under control. I intend to remove the moon as a factor.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: [Shocked.] Remove the moon? How?
character_words: Remove the moon? How?

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: Admiral Choi! Prepare to meet your fate!
character_words: Admiral Choi! Prepare to meet your fate!

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: [Continuing as if nothing happened.] As I was saying, years ago I stumble upon a great and powerful secret: the identity of the Moon Spirit's mortal form.
character_words: As I was saying, years ago I stumble upon a great and powerful secret: the identity of the Moon Spirit's mortal form.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: What?
character_words: What?

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: I was a young lieutenant serving under General Shu in the Earth Kingdom. [Fade to a flashback of a young Zhao tearing through scrolls in a library.] I discovered a hidden library. Underground, in fact. I tore through scroll after scroll. One of them contained a detailed illustration, and the words "moon" and "ocean". I knew then that these spirits could be found and killed. [The memory ends with a close up of Zhao's eyes, fade to the present.] And that it was my destiny to do so.
character_words: I was a young lieutenant serving under General Shu in the Earth Kingdom.  I discovered a hidden library. Underground, in fact. I tore through scroll after scroll. One of them contained a detailed illustration, and the words "moon" and "ocean". I knew then that these spirits could be found and killed.  And that it was my destiny to do so.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: [Somewhat angrily.] Zhao, the spirits are not to be trifled with!
character_words: Zhao, the spirits are not to be trifled with!

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: Yes, yes ... I know you fear the spirits, Iroh. I've heard rumors about your journey into the Spirit World. But the Ocean and Moon gave up their immortality to become a part of our world. And now they will face the consequences.
character_words: Yes, yes ... I know you fear the spirits, Iroh. I've heard rumors about your journey into the Spirit World. But the Ocean and Moon gave up their immortality to become a part of our world. And now they will face the consequences.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: You're just a curly tailed blue nose.
character_words: You're just a curly tailed blue nose.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: [Startled.] Aaahhh! [Aang takes a deep breath and speaks with his and Avatar Roku's voices combined.] Show no fear. Show no emotion at all.
character_words: Aaahhh!  Show no fear. Show no emotion at all.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: Hello? I-I'm looking for a spirit named 'Koh'.
character_words: Hello? I-I'm looking for a spirit named 'Koh'.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: [Creepily, circling Aang.] Welcome!
character_words: Welcome!

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: [Emotionlessly.] Thank you. [Koh wheels around Aang to look at him from behind. His voice is low and melodic, almost purring.]
character_words: Thank you.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: My old friend, the Avatar. It's been a long time.
character_words: My old friend, the Avatar. It's been a long time.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: You know me?
character_words: You know me?

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: [Now facing the camera, away from Aang.] How could I forget [He switches with a "winking" effect, as if some sort of nictitating membrane closes briefly over the old face to reveal a new one, to a mad face of a middle-aged, mustached man with thick eyebrows, long mustache, and beard; angrily.] you? One of your previous incarnations tried to slay me! Nearly eight or nine hundred years ago.
character_words: How could I forget  you? One of your previous incarnations tried to slay me! Nearly eight or nine hundred years ago.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: [Confused, yet seriously.] I didn't know that. Why did he, or I, try to kill you?
character_words: I didn't know that. Why did he, or I, try to kill you?

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: [Switches to Ummi's scared, sad face.] Oh, it was something about stealing the face of someone you loved. [Cut to a close-up of Aang with the camera slowing, zooming in on his face. Cut back to Koh, whose face turns malicious and switches to a baboon's while laughing. Switch to a side-shot; Aang keeps a straight face while not taking his eyes off Koh as he circles around him.] Of course, that's all behind us. Why should I hold a grudge against you for something in a past life? After all, you're a different person now. [Speaks into Aang's ear from behind.] You've come to me ... with a new face.
character_words: Oh, it was something about stealing the face of someone you loved.  Of course, that's all behind us. Why should I hold a grudge against you for something in a past life? After all, you're a different person now.  You've come to me ... with a new face.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: Guess we'll be here awhile.
character_words: Guess we'll be here awhile.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: Don't worry, Prince Zuko can't be getting too far in this weather.
character_words: Don't worry, Prince Zuko can't be getting too far in this weather.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: I'm not worried they'll get away in the blizzard. I'm worried that they won't.
character_words: I'm not worried they'll get away in the blizzard. I'm worried that they won't.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: They're not going to die in this blizzard. If we know anything, it's that Zuko never gives up. They'll survive, and we'll find them.
character_words: They're not going to die in this blizzard. If we know anything, it's that Zuko never gives up. They'll survive, and we'll find them.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: [Continues to circle around Aang.] It's been a long time since I've added a child's face to my collection. [His face is now that of an owl.] So ... how may I help you?
character_words: It's been a long time since I've added a child's face to my collection.  So ... how may I help you?

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: I need to find the moon and the ocean.
character_words: I need to find the moon and the ocean.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: Their spirit names are Tui and La, push and pull. And that has been the nature of their relationship for all time.
character_words: Their spirit names are Tui and La, push and pull. And that has been the nature of their relationship for all time.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: [Side-view of Aang.] Please. Help me find them. An entire culture could be destroyed if I don't get their help. [Top-down view of Koh who changes his face to that of an old man. Aang is visible below him.]
character_words: Please. Help me find them. An entire culture could be destroyed if I don't get their help.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: Oh, you think you need their help. [Koh looks to the side.] Actually it's quite the other way round. [In an instant, Koh turns and bolts to Aang, stopping just short of the young Avatar; with an angry blue ogre-like face with red eyes and upright fangs.] Someone's going to kill them! [Aang closes his eyes briefly before opening them to look at Koh.]
character_words: Oh, you think you need their help.  Actually it's quite the other way round.  Someone's going to kill them!

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: What do you mean? How can I find them and protect them?
character_words: What do you mean? How can I find them and protect them?

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: [Flipping back to his white face.] You've already met them, actually. [View of Koh from behind Aang as Koh moves to look away, turning his back on Aang.] Tui and La, your moon and ocean, have always circled each other in an eternal dance. They balance each other, push and pull, life and death, [Close-up of Aang's face.] good and evil, yin and yang.
character_words: You've already met them, actually.  Tui and La, your moon and ocean, have always circled each other in an eternal dance. They balance each other, push and pull, life and death,  good and evil, yin and yang.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: [Excitedly.] The koi fish! [Hearing the emotion in Aang's voice, Koh quickly reels around to stare at the now expressionless face of Aang.] I must be going now.
character_words: The koi fish!  I must be going now.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: [Flipping to the face of a bald, young man.] We'll meet again.
character_words: We'll meet again.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: The spirits are in trouble, I need to get back to the physical world.
character_words: The spirits are in trouble, I need to get back to the physical world.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: [Cut to Roku's image on the ground.] A friend is here, to guide you back.
character_words: A friend is here, to guide you back.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: [Aang turns around; excitedly.] Hei Bai!
character_words: Hei Bai!

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: We'll be following this map to a very special location. And when we get there, we're going fishing. [He smirks.]
character_words: We'll be following this map to a very special location. And when we get there, we're going fishing.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: This is where I came in, but how do I get back?
character_words: This is where I came in, but how do I get back?

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: [Cut to baboon spirit sitting on a rock. Opening his eyes.] Good riddance.
character_words: Good riddance.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: Momo! [Walking toward Momo. Closer view of Aang with Momo.] Momo. Oh no, where's my body?
character_words: Momo!  Momo. Oh no, where's my body?

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: Look, that's gotta be Aang! Yip-yip!
character_words: Look, that's gotta be Aang! Yip-yip!

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: Welcome back.
character_words: Welcome back.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: [Cut to close-up of Aang as he narrows his eyes.] It's good to be back.
character_words: It's good to be back.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: [Zuko pulls Aang up by his collar as seen from behind Aang.] That won't be enough to escape.
character_words: That won't be enough to escape.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: [On seeing Appa.] Appa!
character_words: Appa!

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: [Throwing the tied-up Aang aside who yelps.] Here for a rematch?
character_words: Here for a rematch?

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: [Confidently while countering his fire blasts.] Trust me Zuko, it's not going to be much of a match.
character_words: Trust me Zuko, it's not going to be much of a match.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: Hey, this is some quality rope!
character_words: Hey, this is some quality rope!

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: We need to get to the oasis; the spirits are in trouble!
character_words: We need to get to the oasis; the spirits are in trouble!

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: Wait, we can't just leave him here.
character_words: Wait, we can't just leave him here.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: Sure we can. Let's go.
character_words: Sure we can. Let's go.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: No, if we leave him he'll die.
character_words: No, if we leave him he'll die.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: [Sarcastically.] Yeah, this makes a lot of sense. Let's bring the guy who's constantly trying to kill us.
character_words: Yeah, this makes a lot of sense. Let's bring the guy who's constantly trying to kill us.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: [Yue grabs her head as if in pain.] Are you okay?
character_words: Are you okay?

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: I feel faint.
character_words: I feel faint.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: [Cut to Aang. Holding his head with one hand.] I feel it, too. The Moon Spirit is in trouble.
character_words: I feel it, too. The Moon Spirit is in trouble.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: [Cut back to the saddle.] I owe the Moon Spirit my life.
character_words: I owe the Moon Spirit my life.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: What do you mean?
character_words: What do you mean?

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: [Close-up of Yue.] When I was born I was very sick and very weak. [Flashback to Yue as a baby.] Most babies cry when they're born, but I was born as if I was asleep, my eyes closed. [Cut to waterbenders attempting to heal Yue as a baby.] Our healers did everything they could. [Panning shot of Yue and the waterbenders, along with Yue's parents.] They told my mother and father I was going to die. [Cut to Arnook staring at the moon.] My father pleaded with the spirits to save me. [Cut to shot panning down from the moon to the oasis.] That night, beneath the full moon, he brought me to the oasis and placed me in the pond. [Cut to Yue being placed into the pond.] My dark hair turned white. [Close-up of Yue in the oasis.] I opened my eyes and began to cry, and they knew I would live. [Cut to Yue in her parents arms with the archway and moon behind them.] That's why my mother named me Yue. [Cut back to Appa's saddle.] For the moon.
character_words: When I was born I was very sick and very weak.  Most babies cry when they're born, but I was born as if I was asleep, my eyes closed.  Our healers did everything they could.  They told my mother and father I was going to die.  My father pleaded with the spirits to save me.  That night, beneath the full moon, he brought me to the oasis and placed me in the pond.  My dark hair turned white.  I opened my eyes and began to cry, and they knew I would live.  That's why my mother named me Yue.  For the moon.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: [Cut to Zhao at the oasis.] I am ... a legend, now! [Cut to panning shot from Zhao's hand, grasping the bag with Tui in it, down to his head.] The Fire Nation will, for generations, tell stories about the great Zhao, who darkened the moon. They will call me, Zhao the Conqueror, Zhao the Moon Slayer, Zhao the Invincible! [Momo jumps on top of Zhao's head.] Ugh ... Get it off! Get it off!
character_words: I am ... a legend, now!  The Fire Nation will, for generations, tell stories about the great Zhao, who darkened the moon. They will call me, Zhao the Conqueror, Zhao the Moon Slayer, Zhao the Invincible!  Ugh ... Get it off! Get it off!

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: Don't bother. [Close-up of Zhao as he lifts the sack up threatening to kill Tui.]
character_words: Don't bother.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: [Cut to Aang and the others surrendering.] Zhao, don't!
character_words: Zhao, don't!

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: [Cut to panning side-view.] It's my destiny, to destroy the moon and the Water Tribe.
character_words: It's my destiny, to destroy the moon and the Water Tribe.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: [Close-up side-view of Aang.] Destroying the moon won't hurt just the Water Tribe. [Close-up panning shot of the sack with Tui inside and Zhao.] It will hurt everyone, including you. [Cut to panning shot of the oasis.] Without the moon, everything would fall out of balance. You have no idea what kind of chaos that would unleash on the world. [Cut to Zhao.]
character_words: Destroying the moon won't hurt just the Water Tribe.  It will hurt everyone, including you.  Without the moon, everything would fall out of balance. You have no idea what kind of chaos that would unleash on the world.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: [Off-screen.] He is right Zhao.
character_words: He is right Zhao.

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: [Cut to wide shot of oasis; calmly to Iroh.] General Iroh, why am I not surprised to discover your treachery?
character_words: General Iroh, why am I not surprised to discover your treachery?

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
full_text: [Close-up of Iroh while he takes off his hood.] I'm no traitor, Zhao, the Fire Nation needs the moon, too; we all depend on the balance. Whatever you do to that spirit I'll unleash on you ten-fold. Let it go, now!
character_words: I'm no traitor, Zhao, the Fire Nation needs the moon, too; we all depend on the balance. Whatever you do to that spirit I'll unleash on you ten-fold. Let it go, now!

chapter: The Siege of the North, Part 2
