full_text: [After a pause where he looks stunned.] The Boulder's over his conflicted feelings, [Narrows his eyes.] and now he's ready to bury you screen [Expands instantly and the Boulder makes a dramatic, crushing gesture.] in a rock-alanche!
character_words: The Boulder's over his conflicted feelings,  and now he's ready to bury you screen  in a rock-alanche!

full_text: Whenever you're ready, The Pebble! [Throws her head back and laughs.]
character_words: Whenever you're ready, The Pebble!

full_text: It's on!
character_words: It's on!

full_text: [Painfully.] Ooooooh!
character_words: Ooooooh!

full_text: Your winner, and still the champion, [Cut to a wider shot of the Bandit, who raises her right fist in victory.] the Blind Bandit!
character_words: Your winner, and still the champion,  the Blind Bandit!

full_text: How did she do that?
character_words: How did she do that?

full_text: She waited ... and listened.
character_words: She waited ... and listened.

full_text: To make things a little more interesting, I'm offering up this sack of gold pieces to anyone who can defeat [He motions toward the champion.] the Blind Bandit! [He motions toward Toph once again. Silence.] What? No one dares to face her?
character_words: To make things a little more interesting, I'm offering up this sack of gold pieces to anyone who can defeat  the Blind Bandit!  What? No one dares to face her?

full_text: I will!
character_words: I will!

full_text: Go Aang! Avenge The Boulder!
character_words: Go Aang! Avenge The Boulder!

full_text: Do people really want to see two little girls fighting out here?
character_words: Do people really want to see two little girls fighting out here?

full_text: Oooh.
character_words: Oooh.

full_text: [Aang puts his hands up in a conciliatory gesture.] I don't really want to fight you. I want to talk to you.
character_words: I don't really want to fight you. I want to talk to you.

full_text: Boo! No [Katara turns to her brother with a look of disapproval.] talking!
character_words: Boo! No  talking!

full_text: [Slaps Sokka.] Don't boo at him!
character_words: Don't boo at him!

full_text: Somebody's a little light on his feet! What's your fighting name: [Cut to Aang.] the Fancy Dancer? [Aang grins sheepishly before Toph launches another pillar, which lifts him up.] Where'd you go?
character_words: Somebody's a little light on his feet! What's your fighting name:  the Fancy Dancer?  Where'd you go?

full_text: Please, wait!
character_words: Please, wait!

full_text: There you are!
character_words: There you are!

full_text: [Going after her.] Please, listen! I need an earthbending teacher, and I think it's supposed to be you!
character_words: Please, listen! I need an earthbending teacher, and I think it's supposed to be you!

full_text: [Angrily.] Whoever you are, just leave me alone.
character_words: Whoever you are, just leave me alone.

full_text: Wait!
character_words: Wait!

full_text: [Gets the belt and gold.] Way to go, champ!
character_words: Way to go, champ!

full_text: I've got to admit, now I'm really glad I bought this bag. It matches the belt, perfectly.
character_words: I've got to admit, now I'm really glad I bought this bag. It matches the belt, perfectly.

full_text: [Sarcastically.] That is a big relief.
character_words: That is a big relief.

full_text: If we want to find the Blind Bandit, the Earthbending Academy is a great place to start.
character_words: If we want to find the Blind Bandit, the Earthbending Academy is a great place to start.

full_text: Oh great, you again.
character_words: Oh great, you again.

full_text: [Glares at them, causing them to back off.] Yeah, I didn't think so.
character_words: Yeah, I didn't think so.

full_text: [Smugly.] Nicely done.
character_words: Nicely done.

full_text: Hey! You're that kid who beat the Blind Bandit!
character_words: Hey! You're that kid who beat the Blind Bandit!

full_text: We need to talk to her. Do you guys know where she lives?
character_words: We need to talk to her. Do you guys know where she lives?

full_text: The Blind Bandit's a mystery. [Raises fist dramatically.] She shows up to fight, then disappears.
character_words: The Blind Bandit's a mystery.  She shows up to fight, then disappears.

full_text: [Lays hands on Aang's shoulder.] Let me handle this. [Approaches the second student with a stern look; says accusingly.] You're not telling us everything!
character_words: Let me handle this.  You're not telling us everything!

full_text: [Holds hand up defensively.] No, no, I-I swear it's true. No one knows where she goes, or who she really is.
character_words: No, no, I-I swear it's true. No one knows where she goes, or who she really is.

full_text: That's because we're asking about the wrong person. In my vision, I saw a girl, in a white dress, with a pet flying boar. Know anybody like that?
character_words: That's because we're asking about the wrong person. In my vision, I saw a girl, in a white dress, with a pet flying boar. Know anybody like that?

full_text: Well, a flying boar is the symbol of the Beifong family. They're the richest people in town. Probably the whole world.
character_words: Well, a flying boar is the symbol of the Beifong family. They're the richest people in town. Probably the whole world.

full_text: Yeah, but they don't have a daughter.
character_words: Yeah, but they don't have a daughter.

full_text: A flying boar is good enough for me. Let's check it out.
character_words: A flying boar is good enough for me. Let's check it out.

full_text: [Quietly.] Yeah, you better leave.
character_words: Yeah, you better leave.

full_text: Hey, I got my eye on you.
character_words: Hey, I got my eye on you.

full_text: [States coolly.] Water Tribe.
character_words: Water Tribe.

full_text: I'm telling you, The Boulder was standing right there. I saw the kid strike, but there was no earthbending. Nothing made contact. The Blind Bandit just fell out of the ring. She must've took a dive and split the money with the kid.
character_words: I'm telling you, The Boulder was standing right there. I saw the kid strike, but there was no earthbending. Nothing made contact. The Blind Bandit just fell out of the ring. She must've took a dive and split the money with the kid.

full_text: [Slams the wall, causing rocks to land on his feet; cries out in anger and pain.] Nobody cheats Xin Fu.
character_words: Nobody cheats Xin Fu.

full_text: That's the flying boar from my vision. Come on!
character_words: That's the flying boar from my vision. Come on!

full_text: What are you doing here, Twinkle Toes?!
character_words: What are you doing here, Twinkle Toes?!

full_text: How did you know it was me?
character_words: How did you know it was me?

full_text: Don't answer to Twinkle Toes, it's not manly!
character_words: Don't answer to Twinkle Toes, it's not manly!

full_text: You're the one whose bag matches his belt.
character_words: You're the one whose bag matches his belt.

full_text: How did you find me?
character_words: How did you find me?

full_text: Well, a crazy king told me I had to find an earthbender who listens to the earth. And then I had a vision in a magic swamp, [Toph raises her eye in disbelief.] and -
character_words: Well, a crazy king told me I had to find an earthbender who listens to the earth. And then I had a vision in a magic swamp,  and -

full_text: [Cutting off Aang.] What Aang is trying to say is, he's the Avatar. And if he doesn't master earthbending soon, he won't be able to defeat the Fire Lord.
character_words: What Aang is trying to say is, he's the Avatar. And if he doesn't master earthbending soon, he won't be able to defeat the Fire Lord.

full_text: Not my problem. Now, [Begins walking away.] get out of here, or I'll call the guards.
character_words: Not my problem. Now,  get out of here, or I'll call the guards.

full_text: Look, we all have to do our part to win this war, and yours is to teach Aang earthbending.
character_words: Look, we all have to do our part to win this war, and yours is to teach Aang earthbending.

full_text: Guards! Guards, help!
character_words: Guards! Guards, help!

full_text: Toph, what happened?
character_words: Toph, what happened?

full_text: I ... thought I heard someone. I got scared.
character_words: I ... thought I heard someone. I got scared.

full_text: You know your father doesn't want you wandering the grounds without supervision, Toph.
character_words: You know your father doesn't want you wandering the grounds without supervision, Toph.

full_text: [Takes a sip of tea.] I'm pleased to hear that Toph's private lessons are going well. But I want to be sure she's not trying anything too dangerous.
character_words: I'm pleased to hear that Toph's private lessons are going well. But I want to be sure she's not trying anything too dangerous.

full_text: Absolutely not. I am keeping her at a beginner's level. Basic forms and breathing exercises only.
character_words: Absolutely not. I am keeping her at a beginner's level. Basic forms and breathing exercises only.

full_text: Very good. [A servant comes in.]
character_words: Very good.

full_text: Excuse me, sir, but you have a visitor.
character_words: Excuse me, sir, but you have a visitor.

full_text: Who thinks they are so important they can just come to my home unannounced?
character_words: Who thinks they are so important they can just come to my home unannounced?

full_text: Uh ... the Avatar, sir. [Toph's eyes widen in shock and surprise.]
character_words: Uh ... the Avatar, sir.

full_text: Blow on it. It's too hot for her.
character_words: Blow on it. It's too hot for her.

full_text: Allow me. [Sends a small tornado at the cup. Everyone claps.]
character_words: Allow me.

full_text: Avatar Aang, it's an honor to have you visit us.
character_words: Avatar Aang, it's an honor to have you visit us.

full_text: In your opinion, how much longer do think the war will last?
character_words: In your opinion, how much longer do think the war will last?

full_text: I'd like to defeat the Fire Lord by the end of summer, but I can't do that without finding an earthbending teacher first. [Close-up of Toph with a annoyed look.]
character_words: I'd like to defeat the Fire Lord by the end of summer, but I can't do that without finding an earthbending teacher first.

full_text: [Chuckles.] Well, Master Yu is the finest teacher in the land. [The camera pans to Yu.] He's been teaching Toph since she was little.
character_words: Well, Master Yu is the finest teacher in the land.  He's been teaching Toph since she was little.

full_text: Then she must be a great earthbender! Probably good enough to teach someone else! [Toph sends a fissure under the table at him.] Ow!
character_words: Then she must be a great earthbender! Probably good enough to teach someone else!  Ow!

full_text: Toph is still learning the basics.
character_words: Toph is still learning the basics.

full_text: Yes, and sadly, because of her blindness, I don't think she will ever become a true master.
character_words: Yes, and sadly, because of her blindness, I don't think she will ever become a true master.

full_text: Oh, I'm sure she's better than you think she is.
character_words: Oh, I'm sure she's better than you think she is.

full_text: [Angrily.] What's your problem?!
character_words: What's your problem?!

full_text: [Just as angrily.] What's your problem?
character_words: What's your problem?

full_text: Well, shall we move to the living room for desert, then?
character_words: Well, shall we move to the living room for desert, then?

full_text: Good night, buddy.
character_words: Good night, buddy.

full_text: Relax. Look, I'm sorry about dinner. Let's call a truce, okay? [Aang lets down his defensive position and the two head out to the yard. Toph walks along the side of a bridge.] Even though I was born blind, I've never had a problem seeing. [Jumps down.] I see with earthbending. It's kind of like seeing with my feet. I feel the vibrations in the Earth, and I can see where everything is. [The camera shows an aerial view.] You, that tree ... [Cut back to the ground.] even those ants.
character_words: Relax. Look, I'm sorry about dinner. Let's call a truce, okay?  Even though I was born blind, I've never had a problem seeing.  I see with earthbending. It's kind of like seeing with my feet. I feel the vibrations in the Earth, and I can see where everything is.  You, that tree ...  even those ants.

full_text: [Looks around.] That's amazing.
character_words: That's amazing.

full_text: My parents don't understand. They've always treated me like I was helpless.
character_words: My parents don't understand. They've always treated me like I was helpless.

full_text: Is that why you became the Blind Bandit?
character_words: Is that why you became the Blind Bandit?

full_text: Yeah.
character_words: Yeah.

full_text: Then why stay here where you're not happy?
character_words: Then why stay here where you're not happy?

full_text: They're my parents. Where else am I supposed to go?
character_words: They're my parents. Where else am I supposed to go?

full_text: You could come with us.
character_words: You could come with us.

full_text: Yeah. You guys get to go wherever you want. No one telling you what to do, that's the life. It's just not my life. [She detects something and touches the ground.] We're being ambushed!
character_words: Yeah. You guys get to go wherever you want. No one telling you what to do, that's the life. It's just not my life.  We're being ambushed!

full_text: I think you kids owe me some money.
character_words: I think you kids owe me some money.

full_text: Whoever took Aang and Toph left this. [Hands the note to Katara.]
character_words: Whoever took Aang and Toph left this.

full_text: "If you want to see your daughter again, bring five hundred gold pieces to the arena." It's signed Xin Fu and The Boulder.
character_words: "If you want to see your daughter again, bring five hundred gold pieces to the arena." It's signed Xin Fu and The Boulder.

full_text: [Serious.] I can't believe it ... [Grabs the note much to Katara's surprise and runs off a few feet. Cut to a further off shot; enthusiastically.] I have The Boulder's autograph!
character_words: I can't believe it ...  I have The Boulder's autograph!

full_text: Master Yu, I need you to help me get my daughter back.
character_words: Master Yu, I need you to help me get my daughter back.

full_text: We're going with you.
character_words: We're going with you.

full_text: Poor Toph, she must be so scared ...
character_words: Poor Toph, she must be so scared ...

full_text: You think you're so tough? [The camera zooms back to show her case and Aang's suspended from chains. She points somewhere below her.] Why don't you come up here so I can snap that grin off your face? [Cut to Xin Fu and The Boulder looking from below them on the floor of the arena.]
character_words: You think you're so tough?  Why don't you come up here so I can snap that grin off your face?

full_text: [Narrows his eyes. Dryly.] I'm not smiling.
character_words: I'm not smiling.

full_text: Toph!
character_words: Toph!

full_text: Here's your money. [Sets the bag of gold on the ground.] Now let them go.
character_words: Here's your money.  Now let them go.

full_text: What about Aang?
character_words: What about Aang?

full_text: [Showing the Fire Nation wanted poster.] I think the Fire Nation will pay a hefty price for the Avatar. Now, get out of my ring.
character_words: I think the Fire Nation will pay a hefty price for the Avatar. Now, get out of my ring.

full_text: Go, I'll be okay.
character_words: Go, I'll be okay.

full_text: Toph, there's too many of them. We need an earthbender. We need you!
character_words: Toph, there's too many of them. We need an earthbender. We need you!

full_text: My daughter is blind. She is blind and tiny and helpless and fragile. She cannot help you!
character_words: My daughter is blind. She is blind and tiny and helpless and fragile. She cannot help you!

full_text: Yes, I can.
character_words: Yes, I can.

full_text: Let him go! I beat you all before and I'll do it again!
character_words: Let him go! I beat you all before and I'll do it again!

full_text: The Boulder takes issue with that comment.
character_words: The Boulder takes issue with that comment.

full_text: Wait! [Listens to their vibrations as they run toward her; turns head to Sokka.] They're mine.
character_words: Wait!  They're mine.

full_text: Hit it harder!
character_words: Hit it harder!

full_text: I'm trying!
character_words: I'm trying!

full_text: I never knew. Your daughter's amazing!
character_words: I never knew. Your daughter's amazing!

full_text: She's the greatest earthbender I've ever seen.
character_words: She's the greatest earthbender I've ever seen.

full_text: Dad, I know it's probably hard for you to see me this way. But the obedient little helpless blind girl that you think I am just isn't me. I love fighting. I love being an earthbender, and I'm really, really good at it. I know I've kept my life secret from you, but you were keeping me secret from the whole world. You were doing it to protect me, but I'm twelve years old and I've never had a real friend. So, now that you see who I really am, I hope it doesn't change the way you feel about me.
character_words: Dad, I know it's probably hard for you to see me this way. But the obedient little helpless blind girl that you think I am just isn't me. I love fighting. I love being an earthbender, and I'm really, really good at it. I know I've kept my life secret from you, but you were keeping me secret from the whole world. You were doing it to protect me, but I'm twelve years old and I've never had a real friend. So, now that you see who I really am, I hope it doesn't change the way you feel about me.

full_text: Of course it doesn't change the way I feel about you, Toph. It's made me realize something.
character_words: Of course it doesn't change the way I feel about you, Toph. It's made me realize something.

full_text: It has?
character_words: It has?

full_text: Yes. I've let you had far too much freedom. From now on you'll be cared for and guarded twenty-four hours a day.
character_words: Yes. I've let you had far too much freedom. From now on you'll be cared for and guarded twenty-four hours a day.

full_text: But, Dad!
character_words: But, Dad!

full_text: We're doing this for your own good, Toph.
character_words: We're doing this for your own good, Toph.

full_text: Please escort the Avatar and his friends out. They are no longer welcome here.
character_words: Please escort the Avatar and his friends out. They are no longer welcome here.

full_text: I'm sorry, Toph.
character_words: I'm sorry, Toph.

full_text: I'm sorry too. Goodbye, Aang. [She sheds a tear.]
character_words: I'm sorry too. Goodbye, Aang.

full_text: Don't worry, we'll find you a teacher. There are plenty of amazing earthbenders out there.
character_words: Don't worry, we'll find you a teacher. There are plenty of amazing earthbenders out there.

full_text: [Cut to a wider shot from behind them. The full moon shines in the distance.] Not like her.
character_words: Not like her.

full_text: Toph! What are you doing here?
character_words: Toph! What are you doing here?

full_text: My dad changed his mind. He said I was free to travel the world. [Katara and Sokka look at each other with unsure looks, but smile at Toph.]
character_words: My dad changed his mind. He said I was free to travel the world.

full_text: Well, we'd better get out of here, before your dad changes his mind again.
character_words: Well, we'd better get out of here, before your dad changes his mind again.

full_text: Good idea.
character_words: Good idea.

full_text: You're going to be a great teacher, Toph.
character_words: You're going to be a great teacher, Toph.

full_text: Speaking of which, I want to show you something.
character_words: Speaking of which, I want to show you something.

full_text: Okay.
character_words: Okay.

full_text: Now we're even. Um, I'll take the belt back.
character_words: Now we're even. Um, I'll take the belt back.

full_text: Ow! [Cut to a wide shot Appa and Toph still laid out flat.]
character_words: Ow!

full_text: Sorry.
character_words: Sorry.

full_text: I know you two are very different. But I believe you have a common interest. [A servant brings out a chest of gold. Xin Fu and Yu exchange glances at one another.] The Avatar has kidnapped my daughter. I want you to do whatever it takes to bring her home.
character_words: I know you two are very different. But I believe you have a common interest.  The Avatar has kidnapped my daughter. I want you to do whatever it takes to bring her home.

full_text: Come on, spider snake-eyes! [He rolls a pair of dice and they land with two fives, face-up.] Ha! Ha! Yeah!
character_words: Come on, spider snake-eyes!  Ha! Ha! Yeah!

full_text: Could I get some water, a bag of feed and something hot to eat? [Zuko holds out his hand. In it are two coins.]
character_words: Could I get some water, a bag of feed and something hot to eat?

full_text: Not enough here for a hot meal. I can get you two bags of feed.
character_words: Not enough here for a hot meal. I can get you two bags of feed.

full_text: Ow!
character_words: Ow!

full_text: Hey! You throwing eggs at us, stranger?
character_words: Hey! You throwing eggs at us, stranger?

full_text: No.
character_words: No.

full_text: You see who did throw it?
character_words: You see who did throw it?

full_text: [Turns to face them.] No.
character_words: No.

full_text: That your favorite word, no?
character_words: That your favorite word, no?

full_text: Egg had to come from somewhere.
character_words: Egg had to come from somewhere.

full_text: [Turns around.] Maybe a chicken flew over.
character_words: Maybe a chicken flew over.

full_text: Thanks for your contribution. The army appreciates your support. [He throws the bags to one of his fellow soldiers.] You better leave town. Penalty for stayin's a lot steeper than you can afford, stranger. Trust me. [He pats his hammer at his side menacingly.]
character_words: Thanks for your contribution. The army appreciates your support.  You better leave town. Penalty for stayin's a lot steeper than you can afford, stranger. Trust me.

full_text: Those soldiers are supposed to protect us from the Fire Nation. But they're just a bunch of thugs.
character_words: Those soldiers are supposed to protect us from the Fire Nation. But they're just a bunch of thugs.

full_text: Thanks for not ratting me out!
character_words: Thanks for not ratting me out!

full_text: I'll take you to my house and feed your ostrich horse for you. Come on, I owe you! [Lee leads the way, pulling along the animal.]
character_words: I'll take you to my house and feed your ostrich horse for you. Come on, I owe you!

full_text: No one can ever sneak up on us.
character_words: No one can ever sneak up on us.

full_text: No kidding.
character_words: No kidding.

full_text: You a friend of Lee's?
character_words: You a friend of Lee's?

full_text: This guy just stood up to the soldiers! By the end, he practically had them running away!
character_words: This guy just stood up to the soldiers! By the end, he practically had them running away!

full_text: Does this guy have a name?
character_words: Does this guy have a name?

full_text: [Nervously.] I'm ... uh ...

[Off-camera.] He doesn't have to say who he is if he doesn't want to, Sela. [Cuts to shot of him standing with his family.] Anyone who can hold his own against those bully soldiers is welcome here. Those men should be ashamed to wear Earth Kingdom uniforms.
character_words: He doesn't have to say who he is if he doesn't want to, Sela.  Anyone who can hold his own against those bully soldiers is welcome here. Those men should be ashamed to wear Earth Kingdom uniforms.

full_text: The real soldiers are off fighting the War, [Cuts to shot of Lee.] like Lee's big brother Sensu. [Pause.] Supper's going to be ready soon. Would you like to stay?
character_words: The real soldiers are off fighting the War,  like Lee's big brother Sensu.  Supper's going to be ready soon. Would you like to stay?

full_text: I can't. I should be moving on. [The wife frowns and casts a glance at her husband.]
character_words: I can't. I should be moving on.

full_text: Gansu could use some help on the barn. Why don't you two work for a while, and then we'll eat.
character_words: Gansu could use some help on the barn. Why don't you two work for a while, and then we'll eat.

full_text: You don't seem like you're from around here.
character_words: You don't seem like you're from around here.

full_text: [Shaking his head.] Mm-mm.
character_words: Mm-mm.

full_text: Where are you from then?
character_words: Where are you from then?

full_text: [Lowers his hammer.] Far away.
character_words: Far away.

full_text: Ohhh. Where are you going?
character_words: Ohhh. Where are you going?

full_text: Lee, give it a rest. Stop asking the man personal questions, got it?
character_words: Lee, give it a rest. Stop asking the man personal questions, got it?

full_text: [Disappointed and rests his head on his arm. He sighs.] Yes. [Pause.] So how'd you get that scar?
character_words: Yes.  So how'd you get that scar?

full_text: It's not nice to bother people about things they might not want to talk about. A man's past is his business.
character_words: It's not nice to bother people about things they might not want to talk about. A man's past is his business.

full_text: Hey Mom, want to see how Azula feeds turtle ducks? [Zuko throws the rest of the loaf of bread into the water and hits one of the baby turtle ducks. Ursa is shocked.]
character_words: Hey Mom, want to see how Azula feeds turtle ducks?

full_text: Zuko! Why would you do that?
character_words: Zuko! Why would you do that?

full_text: Ow! Ow ow! Ouch! [Ursa removes the turtle duck from Zuko and gently throws her back into the pond, where she swims off with her babies. Zuko is pouting.]
character_words: Ow! Ow ow! Ouch!

full_text: Stupid turtle duck. Why she'd do that?
character_words: Stupid turtle duck. Why she'd do that?

full_text: Zuko. That's what moms are like. [Puts her arm around Zuko.] If you mess with their babies,[She playfully bites behind Zuko's ear.], they're gonna bite you back! [They laugh.]
character_words: Zuko. That's what moms are like.  If you mess with their babies,, they're gonna bite you back!

full_text: Ugh! Azula!
character_words: Ugh! Azula!

full_text: [Whispering in Ty Lee's ear as her friend giggles.] Watch this! [Runs toward her mother and Zuko.] Mom! Can you make Zuko play with us? We need equal teams to play a game!
character_words: Watch this!  Mom! Can you make Zuko play with us? We need equal teams to play a game!

full_text: I am not cart-wheeling.
character_words: I am not cart-wheeling.

full_text: You won't have to. [Rolls her eyes.] Cart-wheeling's not a game, dum-dum.
character_words: You won't have to.  Cart-wheeling's not a game, dum-dum.

full_text: I don't care. I don't want to play with you!
character_words: I don't care. I don't want to play with you!

full_text: We are brother and sister. It's important for us to spend time together! Don't you think so, Mom? [Shoots her mother an innocent smile.]
character_words: We are brother and sister. It's important for us to spend time together! Don't you think so, Mom?

full_text: [Places her hands on Zuko's shoulder.] Yes, darling, I think it's a good idea to play with your sister. [Ruffles his hair.] Go on now, just for a little while. [Walks away, with Zuko glaring at his sister.]
character_words: Yes, darling, I think it's a good idea to play with your sister.  Go on now, just for a little while.

full_text: [Off-camera.] Here's the way it goes. [After placing apple on Mai's head, she runs back several feet.] Now what you do is, try to knock the apple off the other person's head, like this. [Azula shots a small jet of flame to the apple with her firebending and knowingly sets it on fire.]
character_words: Here's the way it goes.  Now what you do is, try to knock the apple off the other person's head, like this.

full_text: [Lays a hand on Ty Lee's shoulder.] See, I told you it would work!
character_words: See, I told you it would work!

full_text: Aww, they're so cute together!
character_words: Aww, they're so cute together!

full_text: You two are such ... ugh!
character_words: You two are such ... ugh!

full_text: I was just coming to get you. Uncle Iroh sent us a letter from the war-front. [Zuko stomps past her, leaving small puddles behind him as he goes.] You're soaking wet?
character_words: I was just coming to get you. Uncle Iroh sent us a letter from the war-front.  You're soaking wet?

full_text: [Raises hands in frustration.] Girls are crazy!
character_words: Girls are crazy!

full_text: [Voice-over.] If the city is as magnificent as its wall, Ba Sing Se must be something to behold. I hope you all may see it someday, if we don't burn it to the ground first! [Laughs.]
character_words: If the city is as magnificent as its wall, Ba Sing Se must be something to behold. I hope you all may see it someday, if we don't burn it to the ground first!

full_text: Until then, enjoy these gifts.
character_words: Until then, enjoy these gifts.

full_text: For Zuko, a pearl dagger from the general who surrendered when we broke through the Outer Wall. Note the inscription and the superior craftsmanship.
character_words: For Zuko, a pearl dagger from the general who surrendered when we broke through the Outer Wall. Note the inscription and the superior craftsmanship.

full_text: [Zuko picks up the dagger admiringly, unsheathes it and reads the inscription.] Never give up without a fight.
character_words: Never give up without a fight.

full_text: And for Azula, a new friend. She wears the latest fashion for Earth Kingdom girls.
character_words: And for Azula, a new friend. She wears the latest fashion for Earth Kingdom girls.

full_text: If Uncle doesn't make it back from war, then Dad will be next in line for Fire Lord, wouldn't he?
character_words: If Uncle doesn't make it back from war, then Dad will be next in line for Fire Lord, wouldn't he?

full_text: Azula, we don't speak that way. It would be awful if Uncle Iroh didn't return. And besides, Fire Lord Azulon is a picture of health.
character_words: Azula, we don't speak that way. It would be awful if Uncle Iroh didn't return. And besides, Fire Lord Azulon is a picture of health.

full_text: How would you like it if cousin Lu Ten wanted Dad to die?
character_words: How would you like it if cousin Lu Ten wanted Dad to die?

full_text: I still think our dad would make a much better Fire Lord than His Royal Tea-Loving Kookiness. [Sets the doll's head on fire.]
character_words: I still think our dad would make a much better Fire Lord than His Royal Tea-Loving Kookiness.

full_text: You're holding them wrong.
character_words: You're holding them wrong.

full_text: Keep in mind, these are dual swords. Two halves of a single weapon. Don't think of them as separate, 'cause they're not. They're just two different parts of the same whole.
character_words: Keep in mind, these are dual swords. Two halves of a single weapon. Don't think of them as separate, 'cause they're not. They're just two different parts of the same whole.

full_text: I think you'd really like my brother Sensu. He used to show me stuff like this all the time.
character_words: I think you'd really like my brother Sensu. He used to show me stuff like this all the time.

full_text: [Reaches up and offers Zuko a package.] Here. This ought to get you through a few meals.
character_words: Here. This ought to get you through a few meals.

full_text: What do you think they want?
character_words: What do you think they want?

full_text: Trouble.
character_words: Trouble.

full_text: What do you want, Gow?
character_words: What do you want, Gow?

full_text: Just thought someone ought to tell you that your son's battalion got captured. [To his fellow soldiers.] You boys hear what the Fire Nation did with their last group of Earth Kingdom prisoners?
character_words: Just thought someone ought to tell you that your son's battalion got captured.  You boys hear what the Fire Nation did with their last group of Earth Kingdom prisoners?

full_text: Dressed 'em up in Fire Nation uniforms and put 'em on the front line unarmed, the way I heard it. [Spits on the ground.] Then they just watched.
character_words: Dressed 'em up in Fire Nation uniforms and put 'em on the front line unarmed, the way I heard it.  Then they just watched.

full_text: [Angrily.] You watch your mouth!
character_words: You watch your mouth!

full_text: Why bother rooting around in the mud with these pigs?
character_words: Why bother rooting around in the mud with these pigs?

full_text: Iroh has lost his son. Your cousin Lu Ten did not survive the battle.
character_words: Iroh has lost his son. Your cousin Lu Ten did not survive the battle.

full_text: What's going to happen to my brother?
character_words: What's going to happen to my brother?

full_text: I'm going to the front. I'm going to find Sensu and bring him back.
character_words: I'm going to the front. I'm going to find Sensu and bring him back.

full_text: When my dad goes ... will you stay?
character_words: When my dad goes ... will you stay?

full_text: No. I need to move on.
character_words: No. I need to move on.

full_text: Here. I want you to have this. Read the inscription.
character_words: Here. I want you to have this. Read the inscription.

full_text: [Unsheathes the dagger.] Made in Earth Kingdom.
character_words: Made in Earth Kingdom.

full_text: The other one.
character_words: The other one.

full_text: Never give up without a fight.
character_words: Never give up without a fight.

full_text: You waste all your time playing with knives. You're not even good!
character_words: You waste all your time playing with knives. You're not even good!

full_text: Put an apple on your head and we'll find out how good I am!
character_words: Put an apple on your head and we'll find out how good I am!

full_text: By the way, Uncle's coming home.
character_words: By the way, Uncle's coming home.

full_text: Does that mean ... we won the War?
character_words: Does that mean ... we won the War?

full_text: No, it means Uncle's a quitter and a loser.
character_words: No, it means Uncle's a quitter and a loser.

full_text: What are you talking about? Uncle's not a quitter!
character_words: What are you talking about? Uncle's not a quitter!

full_text: Oh yes he is! He found out his son died and he just fell apart! A real general would stay and burn Ba Sing Se to the ground, not lose the battle and come home crying.
character_words: Oh yes he is! He found out his son died and he just fell apart! A real general would stay and burn Ba Sing Se to the ground, not lose the battle and come home crying.

full_text: How do you know what he should do? He's probably just sad his only kid is gone. Forever.
character_words: How do you know what he should do? He's probably just sad his only kid is gone. Forever.

full_text: Your father has requested an audience with Fire Lord Azulon. Best clothes, hurry up!
character_words: Your father has requested an audience with Fire Lord Azulon. Best clothes, hurry up!

full_text: [In a bored tone.] Fire Lord Azulon ... can't you just call him 'Grandfather'? He's not exactly the powerful Fire Lord he used to be. Someone will probably end up taking his place soon.
character_words: Fire Lord Azulon ... can't you just call him 'Grandfather'? He's not exactly the powerful Fire Lord he used to be. Someone will probably end up taking his place soon.

full_text: [Angrily.] Young lady! Not another word!
character_words: Young lady! Not another word!

full_text: What is wrong with that child?
character_words: What is wrong with that child?

full_text: And how was it Great-Grandfather Sozin managed to win the Battle of Han Tui?
character_words: And how was it Great-Grandfather Sozin managed to win the Battle of Han Tui?

full_text: [Confusedly.] Great-Grandfather won ... because ...
character_words: Great-Grandfather won ... because ...

full_text: Because even though his army was outnumbered, he cleverly calculated his advantages. The enemy was downwind and there was a drought. Their defenses burned to a crisp in minutes.
character_words: Because even though his army was outnumbered, he cleverly calculated his advantages. The enemy was downwind and there was a drought. Their defenses burned to a crisp in minutes.

full_text: Correct, my dear. Now, would you show Grandfather the new moves you demonstrated to me?
character_words: Correct, my dear. Now, would you show Grandfather the new moves you demonstrated to me?

full_text: She's a true prodigy! Just like her grandfather for whom she's named.
character_words: She's a true prodigy! Just like her grandfather for whom she's named.

full_text: [Sits back down, and looks at Zuko out of the corner of her eye and whispers.] You'll never catch up ...
character_words: You'll never catch up ...

full_text: [Stands up angrily.] I'd like to demonstrate what I've been learning.
character_words: I'd like to demonstrate what I've been learning.

full_text: I failed.
character_words: I failed.

full_text: No. I loved watching you. That's who you are, Zuko. Someone who keeps fighting even though it's hard.
character_words: No. I loved watching you. That's who you are, Zuko. Someone who keeps fighting even though it's hard.

full_text: Prince Ozai, why are you wasting my time with this pomp? Just tell me what you want. Everyone else, go!
character_words: Prince Ozai, why are you wasting my time with this pomp? Just tell me what you want. Everyone else, go!

full_text: What are you -?
character_words: What are you -?

full_text: Shh!
character_words: Shh!

full_text: Father, you must have realized as I have, that with Lu Ten gone, Iroh's bloodline has ended. After his son's death, my brother abandoned the siege at Ba Sing Se, and who knows when he will return home. But I am here, Father, and my children are alive.
character_words: Father, you must have realized as I have, that with Lu Ten gone, Iroh's bloodline has ended. After his son's death, my brother abandoned the siege at Ba Sing Se, and who knows when he will return home. But I am here, Father, and my children are alive.

full_text: Say what it is you want!
character_words: Say what it is you want!

full_text: Father, revoke Iroh's birthright. I am your humble servant, here to serve you and our nation. Use me.
character_words: Father, revoke Iroh's birthright. I am your humble servant, here to serve you and our nation. Use me.

full_text: You dare suggest I betray Iroh? My first born? Directly after the demise of his only beloved son? I think Iroh has suffered enough! But you ... your punishment has scarcely begun!
character_words: You dare suggest I betray Iroh? My first born? Directly after the demise of his only beloved son? I think Iroh has suffered enough! But you ... your punishment has scarcely begun!

full_text: [Sing-songy.] Dad's going to kill you! [Seriously.] Really, he is.
character_words: Dad's going to kill you!  Really, he is.

full_text: Ha-ha, Azula. Nice try.
character_words: Ha-ha, Azula. Nice try.

full_text: Fine, don't believe me. But I heard everything. Grandfather said Dad's punishment should fit his crime. [Imitates Azulon.] "You must know the pain of losing a first-born son. By sacrificing your own!"
character_words: Fine, don't believe me. But I heard everything. Grandfather said Dad's punishment should fit his crime.  "You must know the pain of losing a first-born son. By sacrificing your own!"

full_text: Liar!
character_words: Liar!

full_text: I'm only telling you for your own good. I know! Maybe you could find a nice Earth Kingdom family to adopt you!
character_words: I'm only telling you for your own good. I know! Maybe you could find a nice Earth Kingdom family to adopt you!

full_text: Stop it! You're lying! Dad would never do that to me!
character_words: Stop it! You're lying! Dad would never do that to me!

full_text: Your father would never do what to you? What is going on here?
character_words: Your father would never do what to you? What is going on here?

full_text: I don't know ...
character_words: I don't know ...

full_text: It's time for a talk!
character_words: It's time for a talk!

full_text: [Chanting in a low voice.] Azula always lies. Azula always lies.
character_words: Azula always lies. Azula always lies.

full_text: Azula always lies.
character_words: Azula always lies.

full_text: You have to help! It's Lee  the thugs from town came back as soon as Gansu left. When they ordered us to give them food, Lee pulled a knife on them! I don't even know where he got a knife! Then they took him away. [Begins to sob.] They told me if he's old enough to fight, he's old enough to join the army. I know we barely know you, but ...
character_words: You have to help! It's Lee  the thugs from town came back as soon as Gansu left. When they ordered us to give them food, Lee pulled a knife on them! I don't even know where he got a knife! Then they took him away.  They told me if he's old enough to fight, he's old enough to join the army. I know we barely know you, but ...

full_text: [Stands up dramatically.] I'll get your son back.
character_words: I'll get your son back.

full_text: Hey! There he is! I told you he'd come!
character_words: Hey! There he is! I told you he'd come!

full_text: Let the kid go.
character_words: Let the kid go.

full_text: [Laughs loudly, but quickly regains composure.] Who do you think you are, telling us what to do?
character_words: Who do you think you are, telling us what to do?

full_text: It doesn't matter who I am. But I know who you are. You're not soldiers; you're bullies. Freeloaders, abusing your power. Mostly over women and kids. You don't want Lee in your army  you're sick cowards messing with a family who's already lost one son to the war.
character_words: It doesn't matter who I am. But I know who you are. You're not soldiers; you're bullies. Freeloaders, abusing your power. Mostly over women and kids. You don't want Lee in your army  you're sick cowards messing with a family who's already lost one son to the war.

full_text: [To a fellow soldier.] Are you gonna let this stranger stand there and insult you like this?
character_words: Are you gonna let this stranger stand there and insult you like this?

full_text: Give him a left! A left!
character_words: Give him a left! A left!

full_text: It's not a fistfight ...
character_words: It's not a fistfight ...

full_text: He's got a left sword, don't he?
character_words: He's got a left sword, don't he?

full_text: Look out!
character_words: Look out!

full_text: Behind you!
character_words: Behind you!

full_text: ... Mom?
character_words: ... Mom?

full_text: Zuko, please, my love, listen to me. Everything I've done, I've done to protect you.
character_words: Zuko, please, my love, listen to me. Everything I've done, I've done to protect you.

full_text: Remember this, Zuko. No matter how things may seem to change, never forget who you are.
character_words: Remember this, Zuko. No matter how things may seem to change, never forget who you are.

full_text: [Whispers worriedly.] Get up ...!
character_words: Get up ...!

full_text: Who ... who are you?
character_words: Who ... who are you?

full_text: My name is Zuko. Son of Ursa and Fire Lord Ozai. Prince of the Fire Nation, and heir to the throne.
character_words: My name is Zuko. Son of Ursa and Fire Lord Ozai. Prince of the Fire Nation, and heir to the throne.

full_text: Liar! I heard of you! You're not a prince, you're an outcast! His own father burned and disowned him!
character_words: Liar! I heard of you! You're not a prince, you're an outcast! His own father burned and disowned him!

full_text: Not a step closer.
character_words: Not a step closer.

full_text: [Zuko kneels down in front of Sela, with Lee peeking around his mother's back, offering the knife.]It's yours. You should have it.
character_words: It's yours. You should have it.

full_text: No! I hate you!
character_words: No! I hate you!

full_text: Mom? [Zuko leaps out of bed and runs out of his room down the hallway.] Mom? Mom!
character_words: Mom?  Mom? Mom!

full_text: Where's Mom?
character_words: Where's Mom?

full_text: No one knows. Oh, and last night, Grandpa passed away.
character_words: No one knows. Oh, and last night, Grandpa passed away.

full_text: Not funny, Azula! You're sick. And I want my knife back, now. [Zuko tries to grab it, but misses as Azula quickly moves out of the way, and loudly grunts.]
character_words: Not funny, Azula! You're sick. And I want my knife back, now.

full_text: [Tauntingly.]Who's going to make me?Mom?
character_words: Who's going to make me?Mom?

full_text: Where is she?
character_words: Where is she?

full_text: Azulon. Fire Lord to our nation for twenty-three years. You were our fearless leader in the Battle of Garsai. Our matchless conqueror of the Hu Xin Provinces. You were father of Iroh, father of Ozai, husband of Ilah, now passed. Grandfather of Lu Ten, now passed. Grandfather of Zuko, and Azula. We lay you to rest.
character_words: Azulon. Fire Lord to our nation for twenty-three years. You were our fearless leader in the Battle of Garsai. Our matchless conqueror of the Hu Xin Provinces. You were father of Iroh, father of Ozai, husband of Ilah, now passed. Grandfather of Lu Ten, now passed. Grandfather of Zuko, and Azula. We lay you to rest.

full_text: As was your dying wish, you are now succeeded by your second son.
character_words: As was your dying wish, you are now succeeded by your second son.

full_text: Hail Fire Lord Ozai!
character_words: Hail Fire Lord Ozai!

full_text: Hey! You guys picked a great campsite. [This directs everyone's attention to her. She wriggles her toes in the thick mat of fur covering the ground around the bison.] The grass is so soft.
character_words: Hey! You guys picked a great campsite.  The grass is so soft.

full_text: That's not grass. [Somewhat displeased.] Appa's shedding.
character_words: That's not grass.  Appa's shedding.

full_text: [Displeased, raises foot warily.] Oh, gross!
character_words: Oh, gross!

full_text: [Cheerfully.] That's not gross, it's just a part of spring! You know, rebirth, flowers blooming and Appa gets a new coat.
character_words: That's not gross, it's just a part of spring! You know, rebirth, flowers blooming and Appa gets a new coat.

full_text: [Sarcastically.] Ah, the beauty of spring.
character_words: Ah, the beauty of spring.

full_text: [Waving arms about, now coated in fur.] Stop! Appa, stop! Ugh! [Coughs.]
character_words: Stop! Appa, stop! Ugh!

full_text: [Bending over, his back turned to her.] It's not that bad, Katara. [He turns to reveal a wig made of fur, done up in a towering beehive.] It makes a great wig!
character_words: It's not that bad, Katara.  It makes a great wig!

full_text: [Wearing a beard of fur.] And a great beard! [Aang and Sokka laugh while pointing at each other.]
character_words: And a great beard!

full_text: [Wiping fur off her clothing with her eyes closed.] I'm just glad we finally have another girl in the group, because you two are disgusting.
character_words: I'm just glad we finally have another girl in the group, because you two are disgusting.

full_text: [Walking up from behind the two boys.] Excuse me, does anyone have a razor? Because I've got some hairy pits!
character_words: Excuse me, does anyone have a razor? Because I've got some hairy pits!

full_text: So Toph, usually when setting up camp, we try to divide up the work.
character_words: So Toph, usually when setting up camp, we try to divide up the work.

full_text: [Shrugging casually.] Hey, don't worry about me. I'm good to go.
character_words: Hey, don't worry about me. I'm good to go.

full_text: Well, actually what I'm trying to say is, [Holds arms out in gesture.] some of us might fetch water, while someone else might set up the fire pit, or put up the tent. [Momo flies over to her, dropping several berries he had collected into her hands.] Even Momo does his fair share.
character_words: Well, actually what I'm trying to say is,  some of us might fetch water, while someone else might set up the fire pit, or put up the tent.  Even Momo does his fair share.

full_text: [Breezily.] Katara, I'm fine. I can carry my own weight. I don't need a fire, [Pats bag.] I've already collected my own food and look, [Earthbends a rock tent over her.] my tent's all set up.
character_words: Katara, I'm fine. I can carry my own weight. I don't need a fire,  I've already collected my own food and look,  my tent's all set up.

full_text: [Slightly irritated.] Well, that's great for you, but we still need to finish -
character_words: Well, that's great for you, but we still need to finish -

full_text: [Angered.] I don't understand what's the problem here!
character_words: I don't understand what's the problem here!

full_text: [Waves her hand dismissively and walks away.] Never mind.
character_words: Never mind.

full_text: [Landing onto the ground to aid Sokka.] Sorry!
character_words: Sorry!

full_text: [Rubs back of head sheepishly.] Hey Toph, I wanted to apologize for earlier. I think we're all just a little tired and getting on each other's nerves.
character_words: Hey Toph, I wanted to apologize for earlier. I think we're all just a little tired and getting on each other's nerves.

full_text: [Casually.] Yeah, you do seem pretty tired.
character_words: Yeah, you do seem pretty tired.

full_text: [Growing disgusted.] I meant all of us.
character_words: I meant all of us.

full_text: Well, good night.
character_words: Well, good night.

full_text: [Slightly irked.] Good night.
character_words: Good night.

full_text: There's something coming toward us!
character_words: There's something coming toward us!

full_text: What is it?
character_words: What is it?

full_text: [Pressing hand to the ground.] It feels like an avalanche, but also not an avalanche.
character_words: It feels like an avalanche, but also not an avalanche.

full_text: [Sarcastically.] Your powers of perception are frightening.
character_words: Your powers of perception are frightening.

full_text: Should we leave?
character_words: Should we leave?

full_text: Better safe than sorry.
character_words: Better safe than sorry.

full_text: What is that thing?
character_words: What is that thing?

full_text: [Leaping off Appa and lying on the ground, relieved.] Ah, land sweet land! [Rises and says cheerfully.] See you guys in the morning!
character_words: Ah, land sweet land!  See you guys in the morning!

full_text: Actually, can you help us unload?
character_words: Actually, can you help us unload?

full_text: [Sarcastically.] Really? You need me to help unload Sokka's funky-smelling sleeping bag?
character_words: Really? You need me to help unload Sokka's funky-smelling sleeping bag?

full_text: [Curtly.] Well, yeah. That and everything else. You're a part of our team now, and -
character_words: Well, yeah. That and everything else. You're a part of our team now, and -

full_text: [Points a finger at Katara in irritation.] Look! I didn't ask you to help unload my stuff! [Turns and begins walking away.] I'm carrying my own weight.
character_words: Look! I didn't ask you to help unload my stuff!  I'm carrying my own weight.

full_text: [Angrily.] That's not the point. [Approaches Toph.] Ever since you joined us, you've been nothing but selfish and unhelpful!
character_words: That's not the point.  Ever since you joined us, you've been nothing but selfish and unhelpful!

full_text: [Enraged.] What? Look here, sugar queen, [Points finger at Katara.] I gave up everything I had so that I could teach Aang earthbending. So don't you talk to me about being selfish!
character_words: What? Look here, sugar queen,  I gave up everything I had so that I could teach Aang earthbending. So don't you talk to me about being selfish!

full_text: [Furiously.] "Sugar queen"?![Toph uses earthbending to close the door of the tent.] D-did you just slam the door in my face?! How can you be so infuriating?!
character_words: "Sugar queen"?! D-did you just slam the door in my face?! How can you be so infuriating?!

full_text: Should we do something?
character_words: Should we do something?

full_text: [Amused.] Hey, I'm just enjoying the show.
character_words: Hey, I'm just enjoying the show.

full_text: [Approaching Katara.] Okay, okay, you both need to calm down.
character_words: Okay, okay, you both need to calm down.

full_text: "Both"?! [Rapidly turns to face Aang, her expression crazed and her eyes bloodshot.] I'm completely calm!!
character_words: "Both"?!  I'm completely calm!!

full_text: [Awkwardly.] I ... can see that. [Backs off.]
character_words: I ... can see that.

full_text: [Mockingly.] The stars sure are beautiful tonight. Too bad you can't see them, Toph!
character_words: The stars sure are beautiful tonight. Too bad you can't see them, Toph!

full_text: [Annoyed; pushes Katara off to the side.] Hey, how's a guy supposed to sleep with all this yelling [To Toph.] and earthquaking?
character_words: Hey, how's a guy supposed to sleep with all this yelling  and earthquaking?

full_text: [Reopens her tent.] That thing is back!
character_words: That thing is back!

full_text: Well, how far away is it? [Lies down and pulls covers of his sleeping bag over his head; says in a muffled voice.] Maybe we can close our eyes just for a few minutes.
character_words: Well, how far away is it?  Maybe we can close our eyes just for a few minutes.

full_text: [Notices the smoke.] I don't think so, Sokka.
character_words: I don't think so, Sokka.

full_text: Seriously, what is that thing?
character_words: Seriously, what is that thing?

full_text: And how does it keep finding us?
character_words: And how does it keep finding us?

full_text: [Resting against the saddle; Sokka is seen lying on his back, sleeping.] I don't know. But this time, I'm going to make sure we lose it.
character_words: I don't know. But this time, I'm going to make sure we lose it.

full_text: [Lands onto the ground.] Okay, forget about setting up camp. [Crawls along the ground in sleeping bag.] I'm finding the softest pile of dirt and going to sleep.
character_words: Okay, forget about setting up camp.  I'm finding the softest pile of dirt and going to sleep.

full_text: [Angrily; pulling her sleeping bag under her head as a pillow.] That's good because Toph wasn't going to help anyway!
character_words: That's good because Toph wasn't going to help anyway!

full_text: [Irritated; lying on bag.] Oh, I didn't realize the baby still needed someone to tuck her in bed.
character_words: Oh, I didn't realize the baby still needed someone to tuck her in bed.

full_text: Come on guys, there's something after us and we don't even know what [Pulls top part of his shirt over his head; says in a muffled voice.] or who it is.
character_words: Come on guys, there's something after us and we don't even know what  or who it is.

full_text: It could be Zuko. [Rolls over on her side.] We haven't seem him since the North Pole.
character_words: It could be Zuko.  We haven't seem him since the North Pole.

full_text: Who's Zuko?
character_words: Who's Zuko?

full_text: [Puts his head down.] Oh, just some angry freak with a ponytail who's tracked us all over the world.
character_words: Oh, just some angry freak with a ponytail who's tracked us all over the world.

full_text: [Mockingly.] What's wrong with ponytails, Ponytail?
character_words: What's wrong with ponytails, Ponytail?

full_text: [Points to his top-knot.] This is a warrior's wolf tail.
character_words: This is a warrior's wolf tail.

full_text: [Jokingly.] Well, it certainly tells the other warriors that you're fun and perky.
character_words: Well, it certainly tells the other warriors that you're fun and perky.

full_text: [Raises head, unamused.] Anyway, whoever's chasing us couldn't have followed us here, so, now would everyone just shhh?
character_words: Anyway, whoever's chasing us couldn't have followed us here, so, now would everyone just shhh?

full_text: [Hold up finger to silence the lemur.] No Momo, shhh. [Relaxes.] Sleepy time.
character_words: No Momo, shhh.  Sleepy time.

full_text: [Buries face in hands.] Oh, don't tell me ...
character_words: Oh, don't tell me ...

full_text: That's impossible. There's no way they could have tracked us.
character_words: That's impossible. There's no way they could have tracked us.

full_text: I can feel it with my own two feet!
character_words: I can feel it with my own two feet!

full_text: [Nervously.] Let's get out of here.
character_words: Let's get out of here.

full_text: [Calmly.] Maybe we should face them. Find out who they are. Who knows, maybe they're friendly.
character_words: Maybe we should face them. Find out who they are. Who knows, maybe they're friendly.

full_text: [Hopelessly.] Always the optimist ...
character_words: Always the optimist ...

full_text: [Alarmed.] It's those three girls from Omashu!
character_words: It's those three girls from Omashu!

full_text: [Determined.] We can take them. Three on three.
character_words: We can take them. Three on three.

full_text: Actually Toph, there's four of us.
character_words: Actually Toph, there's four of us.

full_text: [Sheepishly.] Oh, I'm sorry, I didn't count you. You know, no bending and all.
character_words: Oh, I'm sorry, I didn't count you. You know, no bending and all.

full_text: [Turning to her, his face distorted with rage.] I can still fight!
character_words: I can still fight!

full_text: [Smugly.] Okay, three on three plus Sokka.
character_words: Okay, three on three plus Sokka.

full_text: [Face turns red.] Errrgh!
character_words: Errrgh!

full_text: Well, we wanted to find out who they were and we found out. [Puts boomerang away; Aang and Katara are seen fleeing.] Now let's get out of here.
character_words: Well, we wanted to find out who they were and we found out.  Now let's get out of here.

full_text: Appa, yip yip!
character_words: Appa, yip yip!

full_text: [Shocked.] I can't believe those girls followed us all the way from Omashu.
character_words: I can't believe those girls followed us all the way from Omashu.

full_text: [Grumpily.] I still think we could have taken them.
character_words: I still think we could have taken them.

full_text: Are you kidding me? [Points fingers upward repeatedly in gesture.] The crazy blue firebending and the flying daggers are bad enough, but last time we saw them, one of those girls did something that took my bending away. That's scary.
character_words: Are you kidding me?  The crazy blue firebending and the flying daggers are bad enough, but last time we saw them, one of those girls did something that took my bending away. That's scary.

full_text: [Complaining.] Oh no, the sun is rising. We've been up all night with no sleep!
character_words: Oh no, the sun is rising. We've been up all night with no sleep!

full_text: [Calmly.] Sokka, we'll be okay.
character_words: Sokka, we'll be okay.

full_text: [Nervously.] Are you sure? I've never not slept before! [Holds hands up to his head.] What if I fall asleep now and something happens? [Freaks out; eyes bulge out.] And something always happens!
character_words: Are you sure? I've never not slept before!  What if I fall asleep now and something happens?  And something always happens!

full_text: Every time we land, those girls are there. So we'll just have to keep flying.
character_words: Every time we land, those girls are there. So we'll just have to keep flying.

full_text: We can't keep flying forever.
character_words: We can't keep flying forever.

full_text: [Yawns.] So what's our plan?
character_words: So what's our plan?

full_text: [Slumped against the saddle, exhausted.] Don't know ... too tired to think.
character_words: Don't know ... too tired to think.

full_text: I'm sure we'll come up with something after a short nap. [Smiles.]
character_words: I'm sure we'll come up with something after a short nap.

full_text: [Relieved.] Yes ... sleep.
character_words: Yes ... sleep.

full_text: [Frantically.] What's going on?
character_words: What's going on?

full_text: Appa fell asleep!
character_words: Appa fell asleep!

full_text: [Urgently.] Wake up, buddy!
character_words: Wake up, buddy!

full_text: Appa's exhausted.
character_words: Appa's exhausted.

full_text: [Trudging across the ground, carrying his sleeping bag.] Okay, we've put in a lot of distance between us and them. The plan right now is to follow Appa's lead and get some sleep.
character_words: Okay, we've put in a lot of distance between us and them. The plan right now is to follow Appa's lead and get some sleep.

full_text: [Irritated.] Of course, we could've gotten some sleep earlier, [Depicts shot of Toph lying on the ground sleepily.] if Toph didn't have such issues.
character_words: Of course, we could've gotten some sleep earlier,  if Toph didn't have such issues.

full_text: [Wakes up and slams the ground; screams furiously.] What!?
character_words: What!?

full_text: [Trying to calm the tension.] All right, all right, everyone's exhausted! Let's just get some rest.
character_words: All right, all right, everyone's exhausted! Let's just get some rest.

full_text: [Rises and faces Katara.] No, I want to hear what Katara has to say. You think I have issues?
character_words: No, I want to hear what Katara has to say. You think I have issues?

full_text: [Irritated.] I'm just saying. Maybe if you helped out earlier, we could have set up our camp faster and gotten some sleep [Shouting.] and then maybe we wouldn't be in this situation!
character_words: I'm just saying. Maybe if you helped out earlier, we could have set up our camp faster and gotten some sleep  and then maybe we wouldn't be in this situation!

full_text: You're blaming me for this?
character_words: You're blaming me for this?

full_text: [Desperately.] No! No, she's not blaming you.
character_words: No! No, she's not blaming you.

full_text: [Angrily.] No, I'm blaming her!
character_words: No, I'm blaming her!

full_text: Hey, [Shoves Aang out of the way.] I never asked you for diddly-doo-dah. [Points her thumb at herself.] I carry my own weight. Besides, if there's anyone to blame, it's Sheddy over here!
character_words: Hey,  I never asked you for diddly-doo-dah.  I carry my own weight. Besides, if there's anyone to blame, it's Sheddy over here!

full_text: [Sitting on Appa's tail.] What? You're blaming Appa?
character_words: What? You're blaming Appa?

full_text: Yeah, you want to know how they keep finding us? [Grabs a handful of Appa's fur and lets the sheddings blow away in the wind.] He's leaving a trail everywhere we go!
character_words: Yeah, you want to know how they keep finding us?  He's leaving a trail everywhere we go!

full_text: [Jumps down to face her.] How dare you blame Appa! He saved your life three times today! If there's anyone to blame it's you! You're always talking about how you carry your own weight, but you're not. He is! Appa's carrying your weight. He never had a problem flying when it was just the three of us!
character_words: How dare you blame Appa! He saved your life three times today! If there's anyone to blame it's you! You're always talking about how you carry your own weight, but you're not. He is! Appa's carrying your weight. He never had a problem flying when it was just the three of us!

full_text: [Stomps the ground, launching her pack into the air which she catches.] I'm out of here.
character_words: I'm out of here.

full_text: [Moves in front of Toph, his arms outstretched to halt her.] Wait!
character_words: Wait!

full_text: What did I just do? [Slumps.] I can't believe I yelled at my earthbending teacher. Now she's gone.
character_words: What did I just do?  I can't believe I yelled at my earthbending teacher. Now she's gone.

full_text: [Regretfully.] I know. We're all just trying to get used to each other. And I was so mean to her.
character_words: I know. We're all just trying to get used to each other. And I was so mean to her.

full_text: [From afar, drinking from a cup.] Yeah, you two were pretty much jerks.
character_words: Yeah, you two were pretty much jerks.

full_text: [Sarcastically.] Thanks, Sokka.
character_words: Thanks, Sokka.

full_text: No problem.
character_words: No problem.

full_text: We need to find Toph and apologize.
character_words: We need to find Toph and apologize.

full_text: Okay, but what are we going to do about the tank full of dangerous ladies chasing us?
character_words: Okay, but what are we going to do about the tank full of dangerous ladies chasing us?

full_text: [Grabs a handful of fur and watches as it blows away in the wind.] I have a plan.
character_words: I have a plan.

full_text: Toph was right. The fur was leaving a trail right to us. But now that he's clean, no more trail.
character_words: Toph was right. The fur was leaving a trail right to us. But now that he's clean, no more trail.

full_text: Are you sure he's okay to fly?
character_words: Are you sure he's okay to fly?

full_text: He'll be fine as long as we leave his saddle and all our stuff here. [Kneels down and places pieces of Appa's fur into his satchel.] I'm going to use Appa's fur to make a fake trail to lead the tank off-course.
character_words: He'll be fine as long as we leave his saddle and all our stuff here.  I'm going to use Appa's fur to make a fake trail to lead the tank off-course.

full_text: Ow ... That really hurt my tailbone.
character_words: Ow ... That really hurt my tailbone.

full_text: [Off camera; dryly.] Wads of wet fur. How delightful.
character_words: Wads of wet fur. How delightful.

full_text: [Thoughtfully.] Hmmm ... they're not wads, they're more like bundles, or bunches? [Scratching her head.] It's got an "uh" sound.
character_words: Hmmm ... they're not wads, they're more like bundles, or bunches?  It's got an "uh" sound.

full_text: [Unamused.] Clumps?
character_words: Clumps?

full_text: [Clasps her hands together and says brightly.] Clumps! They're clumps! [Hugs Mai.]
character_words: Clumps! They're clumps!

full_text: [To Azula, pointing in direction of the trail.] The trail goes this way.
character_words: The trail goes this way.

full_text: The Avatar's trying to give us the slip. [Pointing to the broken treetops.] You two head in that direction and keep your eye out for the bison. [Looking down at fur trail.] I'll follow this trail.
character_words: The Avatar's trying to give us the slip.  You two head in that direction and keep your eye out for the bison.  I'll follow this trail.

full_text: [Surveying the woods.] Toph couldn't have made it too far. [Momo begins to chitter and rears up defensively.] What is it, Momo? Ooooh, no! Katara!
character_words: Toph couldn't have made it too far.  What is it, Momo? Ooooh, no! Katara!

full_text: [Shocked; urges Appa forward.] How did they find us?
character_words: How did they find us?

full_text: [Urgently.] Appa, come on, we need to go faster!
character_words: Appa, come on, we need to go faster!

full_text: He's too tired!
character_words: He's too tired!

full_text: [Frantically.] Not good, not good! [Appa grunts;. Cuts to ground level view of Mai and Ty Lee chasing after them. Cuts to shot of Appa heading toward the river.] We just need to make it across that river!
character_words: Not good, not good!  We just need to make it across that river!

full_text: [Pleading.] Come on Appa, just a little further ...
character_words: Come on Appa, just a little further ...

full_text: [Voice-over.] We made it! We're safe.
character_words: We made it! We're safe.

full_text: [Voice-over.] You did it Appa!
character_words: You did it Appa!

full_text: [Well off-balance.] Good try, but no.
character_words: Good try, but no.

full_text: How are you doing?
character_words: How are you doing?

full_text: [Frantically.] Well, you know ...
character_words: Well, you know ...

full_text: [Dryly.] I thought when Ty Lee and I finally caught you guys, it would be more exciting. Oh well, victory is boring.
character_words: I thought when Ty Lee and I finally caught you guys, it would be more exciting. Oh well, victory is boring.

full_text: [Still lying on the ground.] Thanks Appa, I don't know what we'd do without you.
character_words: Thanks Appa, I don't know what we'd do without you.

full_text: [Wringing out her braid.] Was it just me, or was that guy kind of cute?
character_words: Was it just me, or was that guy kind of cute?

full_text: All right, you've caught up with me. Now, who are you and what do you want?
character_words: All right, you've caught up with me. Now, who are you and what do you want?

full_text: [Coolly.] You mean you haven't guessed? You don't see the family resemblance? Here's a hint. [Covers her eye and deepens her voice, imitating Zuko.] I must find the Avatar to restore my honor! [Aang remains silent; back in her normal voice.] It's okay, you can laugh. It's funny.
character_words: You mean you haven't guessed? You don't see the family resemblance? Here's a hint.  I must find the Avatar to restore my honor!  It's okay, you can laugh. It's funny.

full_text: So what now?
character_words: So what now?

full_text: [Cuts to view of her left side.] Now? Now, it's over. You're tired and you have no place to go. [Cuts to view of her face.] You can run, but I'll catch you.
character_words: Now? Now, it's over. You're tired and you have no place to go.  You can run, but I'll catch you.

full_text: [Rises to face her.] I'm not running.
character_words: I'm not running.

full_text: [Handing her a cup of tea.] Here is your tea. [Cuts to shot of Toph staring blankly at the ground and back to Iroh.] You seem a little too young to be traveling alone.
character_words: Here is your tea.  You seem a little too young to be traveling alone.

full_text: [Taking the tea from his hand.] You seem a little too old.
character_words: You seem a little too old.

full_text: [Laughs.] Perhaps I am.
character_words: Perhaps I am.

full_text: [Casually.] I know what you're thinking ... I look like I can't handle being by myself.
character_words: I know what you're thinking ... I look like I can't handle being by myself.

full_text: I wasn't thinking that.
character_words: I wasn't thinking that.

full_text: You wouldn't even let me pour my own cup of tea!
character_words: You wouldn't even let me pour my own cup of tea!

full_text: I poured your tea because I wanted to and for no other reason.
character_words: I poured your tea because I wanted to and for no other reason.

full_text: People see me and think I'm weak. They want to take care of me, but I can take care of myself, by myself.
character_words: People see me and think I'm weak. They want to take care of me, but I can take care of myself, by myself.

full_text: You sound like my nephew, always thinking you need to do things on your own, without anyone's support. There is nothing wrong with letting the people who love you help you. Not that I love you, I just met you.
character_words: You sound like my nephew, always thinking you need to do things on your own, without anyone's support. There is nothing wrong with letting the people who love you help you. Not that I love you, I just met you.

full_text: [Laughs.] So where is your nephew?
character_words: So where is your nephew?

full_text: I've been tracking him actually.
character_words: I've been tracking him actually.

full_text: Is he lost?
character_words: Is he lost?

full_text: [Looks away; slightly sad.] Yes, a little bit. [Cuts to shot of the rocky ledge where the two sit, the mountain region in the background; voice-over.] His life has recently changed and he's going through very difficult times. He's trying to figure out who he is and he went away.
character_words: Yes, a little bit.  His life has recently changed and he's going through very difficult times. He's trying to figure out who he is and he went away.

full_text: So now you're following him.
character_words: So now you're following him.

full_text: I know he doesn't want me around him right now, but if he needs me, I'll be there.
character_words: I know he doesn't want me around him right now, but if he needs me, I'll be there.

full_text: Your nephew is very lucky, even if he doesn't know it. [Gets up to leave.] Thank you.
character_words: Your nephew is very lucky, even if he doesn't know it.  Thank you.

full_text: My pleasure. Sharing tea with a fascinating stranger is one of life's true delights.
character_words: My pleasure. Sharing tea with a fascinating stranger is one of life's true delights.

full_text: [Happily.] No, thank you for what you said. It helped me.
character_words: No, thank you for what you said. It helped me.

full_text: I'm glad.
character_words: I'm glad.

full_text: [Rises to leave, but turns around briefly.] Oh, and about your nephew, maybe you should tell him that you need him, too.
character_words: Oh, and about your nephew, maybe you should tell him that you need him, too.

full_text: Do you really want to fight me?
character_words: Do you really want to fight me?

full_text: Yes, I really do.
character_words: Yes, I really do.

full_text: [Alarmed.] Zuko!
character_words: Zuko!

full_text: [Calmly.] I was wondering when you'd show up, Zuzu.
character_words: I was wondering when you'd show up, Zuzu.

full_text: [Covers mouth to suppress laughter.] "Zuzu"?
character_words: "Zuzu"?

full_text: [Determined.] Back off, Azula! He's mine!
character_words: Back off, Azula! He's mine!

full_text: [Assumes a fighting stance.] I'm not going anywhere.
character_words: I'm not going anywhere.

full_text: [Thrilled.] Katara!
character_words: Katara!

full_text: [Slightly dazed.] Uncle ...
character_words: Uncle ...

full_text: Get up!
character_words: Get up!

full_text: I thought you guys could use a little help.
character_words: I thought you guys could use a little help.

full_text: [Happily.] Thanks.
character_words: Thanks.

full_text: [Coolly, backing up as her enemies surround her.] Well, look at this. Enemies and traitors, all working together. I'm done. [Raises her hands in surrender.] I know when I'm beaten. You got me. A princess surrenders with honor.
character_words: Well, look at this. Enemies and traitors, all working together. I'm done.  I know when I'm beaten. You got me. A princess surrenders with honor.

full_text: [Horrified.] Aaaah!
character_words: Aaaah!

full_text: [Angrily.] Ugggh! [Looks at Team Avatar.] Get away from us!
character_words: Ugggh!  Get away from us!

full_text: Zuko, I can help.
character_words: Zuko, I can help.

full_text: [Blasts an arc of fire.] Leave!
character_words: Leave!

full_text: Today's the day! [Lands near a sleeping Sokka.] Can you believe it? After all that time searching for a teacher, I'm finally starting earthbending! [Momo chitters and lands on Sokka.] And this place, [Momo moves on to Appa's head.] it's perfect, don't you think? Sokka? [Sokka grumbles and glares at Aang with tired eyes.] Oh, you're still sleeping, huh? [Sokka again grumbles and puts his head back down. Aang whispers.] Sorry.
character_words: Today's the day!  Can you believe it? After all that time searching for a teacher, I'm finally starting earthbending!  And this place,  it's perfect, don't you think? Sokka?  Oh, you're still sleeping, huh?  Sorry.

full_text: Goooood morning, [She puts both her hands on her hips.] earthbending student!
character_words: Goooood morning,  earthbending student!

full_text: Good morning, Sifu Toph.
character_words: Good morning, Sifu Toph.

full_text: [Aang bows slightly to Toph; disappointed and tiredly.] Hey, you never called me Sifu Katara.
character_words: Hey, you never called me Sifu Katara.

full_text: [Scratches the back of his head.] Well, if you think I should ...
character_words: Well, if you think I should ...

full_text: Sorry, Snoozles, we'll do our earthbending as [Whispers slightly, though with amusement in her voice.] quietly as we can.
character_words: Sorry, Snoozles, we'll do our earthbending as  quietly as we can.

full_text: [Excitedly.] So what move are you going to teach me first? [Stretches out his right arm, his fist clenched, and brings it down like a hammer.] Rock-a-lanche? [He brings his left clenched fist to his right elbow, while his right arm is bent upward, the fist also clenched. He trembles with the motion.] The Trembler? Oh, maybe I could learn to make a [Stretches both arms over his head and starts to spin around.] whirlpool out of land!
character_words: So what move are you going to teach me first?  Rock-a-lanche?  The Trembler? Oh, maybe I could learn to make a  whirlpool out of land!

full_text: [Puts a hand on Aang's chest.] Let's start with ... [Makes the gesture.] move a rock.
character_words: Let's start with ...  move a rock.

full_text: [Claps excitedly.] Sounds good, sounds good!
character_words: Sounds good, sounds good!

full_text: The key to earthbending is your stance. You've got to be steady and strong. Rock is a stubborn element. If you're going to move it, you've got to be like a rock yourself.
character_words: The key to earthbending is your stance. You've got to be steady and strong. Rock is a stubborn element. If you're going to move it, you've got to be like a rock yourself.

full_text: Like a rock. Got it.
character_words: Like a rock. Got it.

full_text: Good. Now the actual motion of this one is pretty simple. [Slams the rock against the canyon wall.] Okay, you ready to give it a try?
character_words: Good. Now the actual motion of this one is pretty simple.  Okay, you ready to give it a try?

full_text: I'm ready. [Tries to move it, but instead he is forced backward into Appa.]
character_words: I'm ready.

full_text: [Amused.] Rock beats airbender!
character_words: Rock beats airbender!

full_text: I got you, Dad! [Playfully jumps on top of Iroh.]
character_words: I got you, Dad!

full_text: My beloved Lu Ten, I will see you again.
character_words: My beloved Lu Ten, I will see you again.

full_text: Uncle ... you were unconscious. Azula did this to you. It was a surprise attack.
character_words: Uncle ... you were unconscious. Azula did this to you. It was a surprise attack.

full_text: Somehow, that's not so surprising. [Groans.]
character_words: Somehow, that's not so surprising.

full_text: [Hands Iroh some tea.] I hope I made it the way you like it. [Iroh takes a sip from the cup and his eyes widen. He lets out a cry of disgust, but manages to mask it.]
character_words: I hope I made it the way you like it.

full_text: [Grimaces.] Good. That was very ... uhhh ... bracing. [He is handed another cup, which he throws out secretly behind his shoulder.]
character_words: Good. That was very ... uhhh ... bracing.

full_text: So Uncle, I've been thinking. It's only a matter of time before I run into Azula again. I'm going to need to know more advanced firebending if I want to stand a chance against her. I know what you're going to say: she's my sister and I should be trying to get along with her.
