character_words: Believe me, I kicked it hard enough to feel plenty of vibrations.

full_text: It's one of the gliders the sandbenders use! And look! It's got some kind of compass on it! [Tapping the compass.] I bet it can point us out of here! Aang, you can bend a breeze so we can sail it. We're going to make it!
character_words: It's one of the gliders the sandbenders use! And look! It's got some kind of compass on it!  I bet it can point us out of here! Aang, you can bend a breeze so we can sail it. We're going to make it!

full_text: It is an honor to welcome such a high-ranking member of the Order of the White Lotus. Being a Grand Master, you must know so many secrets.
character_words: It is an honor to welcome such a high-ranking member of the Order of the White Lotus. Being a Grand Master, you must know so many secrets.

full_text: [Annoyed.] Now that you played Pai Sho, are you going to do some flower arranging, or is someone in this club going to offer some real help?
character_words: Now that you played Pai Sho, are you going to do some flower arranging, or is someone in this club going to offer some real help?

full_text: You must forgive my nephew. He is not an initiate and has little appreciation for the cryptic arts.
character_words: You must forgive my nephew. He is not an initiate and has little appreciation for the cryptic arts.

full_text: Who knocks at the guarded gate?
character_words: Who knocks at the guarded gate?

full_text: One who has eaten the fruit and tasted its mysteries.
character_words: One who has eaten the fruit and tasted its mysteries.

full_text: I'm afraid it's members only. Wait out here.
character_words: I'm afraid it's members only. Wait out here.

full_text: The needle on this compass doesn't seem to be pointing north according to my charts.
character_words: The needle on this compass doesn't seem to be pointing north according to my charts.

full_text: [Dreamily.] Take it easy little lady. I'm sure the sand folks who built this baby know how to get around here.
character_words: Take it easy little lady. I'm sure the sand folks who built this baby know how to get around here.

full_text: That's what the compass is pointing to! That giant rock! It must be the magnetic center of the desert.
character_words: That's what the compass is pointing to! That giant rock! It must be the magnetic center of the desert.

full_text: [Ecstatic.] A rock?! Yes! Let's go!
character_words: A rock?! Yes! Let's go!

full_text: [Hopeful.] Maybe we can find some water there!
character_words: Maybe we can find some water there!

full_text: [Darkly.] Maybe we can find some sandbenders.
character_words: Maybe we can find some sandbenders.

full_text: Ahhh ... Finally! Solid ground!
character_words: Ahhh ... Finally! Solid ground!

full_text: [Breathes deeply.] I think my head is starting to clear out the cactus juice. And look!
character_words: I think my head is starting to clear out the cactus juice. And look!

full_text: Tastes like rotten penguin meat! Awww, I feel woozy.
character_words: Tastes like rotten penguin meat! Awww, I feel woozy.

full_text: [Irritated.] You've been hallucinating on cactus juice all day and then you just lick something you find stuck to the wall of a cave?!
character_words: You've been hallucinating on cactus juice all day and then you just lick something you find stuck to the wall of a cave?!

full_text: I have a natural curiosity.
character_words: I have a natural curiosity.

full_text: I don't think this is a normal cave. This was carved by something.
character_words: I don't think this is a normal cave. This was carved by something.

full_text: Yeah ... look at the shape.
character_words: Yeah ... look at the shape.

full_text: [Close-up of her feet.] There's something buzzing in here. [Camera pans up to her.] Something that's coming for us!
character_words: There's something buzzing in here.  Something that's coming for us!

full_text: [Surprised.] What are you doing? That rock almost crushed me!
character_words: What are you doing? That rock almost crushed me!

full_text: Sorry, I can't tell where they are in the air!
character_words: Sorry, I can't tell where they are in the air!

full_text: I got this one.
character_words: I got this one.

full_text: Sokka, there's nothing there!
character_words: Sokka, there's nothing there!

full_text: I guess my head's not as clear as I thought.
character_words: I guess my head's not as clear as I thought.

full_text: We have to get out of here! I'm completely out of water to bend!
character_words: We have to get out of here! I'm completely out of water to bend!

full_text: Momo! I'm not losing anyone else out here.
character_words: Momo! I'm not losing anyone else out here.

full_text: Come on, we're going down.
character_words: Come on, we're going down.

full_text: Toph, shoot a rock right there. Fire!
character_words: Toph, shoot a rock right there. Fire!

full_text: Yeah! You got it! She got it, right?
character_words: Yeah! You got it! She got it, right?

full_text: Yes. Now let's move.
character_words: Yes. Now let's move.

full_text: On your left!
character_words: On your left!

full_text: What's going on? Is the club meeting over?
character_words: What's going on? Is the club meeting over?

full_text: Everything is taken care of. We're heading to Ba Sing Se.
character_words: Everything is taken care of. We're heading to Ba Sing Se.

full_text: Ba Sing Se? Why would we go to the Earth Kingdom capital?
character_words: Ba Sing Se? Why would we go to the Earth Kingdom capital?

full_text: [Calmly.] The city is filled with refugees. No one will notice two more.
character_words: The city is filled with refugees. No one will notice two more.

full_text: We can hide in plain sight there. And it's the safest place in the world from the Fire Nation. Even I couldn't break through to the city. [Happily shrugs his shoulders.]
character_words: We can hide in plain sight there. And it's the safest place in the world from the Fire Nation. Even I couldn't break through to the city.

full_text: I have the passports for our guests, but there are two men out on the street looking for them.
character_words: I have the passports for our guests, but there are two men out on the street looking for them.

full_text: You seen these guys?
character_words: You seen these guys?

full_text: What are you doing in our land with a sandbender sailer?  From the looks of it, you stole it from the Hami tribe.
character_words: What are you doing in our land with a sandbender sailer?  From the looks of it, you stole it from the Hami tribe.

full_text: We found the sailer abandoned in the desert. We're traveling with the Avatar. [She gestures at Aang. The leader's eyes widen a bit at this information.] Our bison was stolen and we have to get to Ba Sing Se.
character_words: We found the sailer abandoned in the desert. We're traveling with the Avatar.  Our bison was stolen and we have to get to Ba Sing Se.

full_text: You dare accuse our people of theft while you ride in on a stolen sand sailer?!
character_words: You dare accuse our people of theft while you ride in on a stolen sand sailer?!

full_text: Quiet, Ghashiun. No one accused our people of anything. If what they say is true, we must give them hospitality.
character_words: Quiet, Ghashiun. No one accused our people of anything. If what they say is true, we must give them hospitality.

full_text: Sorry, father.
character_words: Sorry, father.

full_text: I recognize the son's voice. He's the one that stole Appa.
character_words: I recognize the son's voice. He's the one that stole Appa.

full_text: Are you sure?
character_words: Are you sure?

full_text: I never forget a voice.
character_words: I never forget a voice.

full_text: [Angry.] You stole Appa! Where is he? What did you do to him?
character_words: You stole Appa! Where is he? What did you do to him?

full_text: They're lying! They're the thieves!
character_words: They're lying! They're the thieves!

full_text: [Enraged.] Where is my bison?
character_words: Where is my bison?

full_text: Hey you, where are these men? I got a tip that they're in your shop.
character_words: Hey you, where are these men? I got a tip that they're in your shop.

full_text: [Calmly.] As you can see, no one is here but us.
character_words: As you can see, no one is here but us.

full_text: We know all about your secret back room. [To Xin Fu.] Kick it down.
character_words: We know all about your secret back room.  Kick it down.

full_text: Hey! That room is for flowers only!
character_words: Hey! That room is for flowers only!

full_text: Some unlucky soul has an incomplete Pai Sho set.
character_words: Some unlucky soul has an incomplete Pai Sho set.

full_text: Let's go back to finding the girl.
character_words: Let's go back to finding the girl.

full_text: You tell me where he is now!
character_words: You tell me where he is now!

full_text: [To Ghashiun.] What did you do?
character_words: What did you do?

full_text: I-It wasn't me!
character_words: I-It wasn't me!

full_text: You said to put a muzzle on him!
character_words: You said to put a muzzle on him!

full_text: [Enraged.] You muzzled Appa?
character_words: You muzzled Appa?

full_text: I'm sorry! I didn't know that it belonged to the Avatar!
character_words: I'm sorry! I didn't know that it belonged to the Avatar!

full_text: [With the voices of all the Avatars.] Tell me where Appa is!
character_words: Tell me where Appa is!

full_text: [Frightened.] I traded him! To some merchants! He's probably in Ba Sing Se by now! They were going to sell him there! [The sandbenders raise their hands as if to ward off the Avatar's bright, angry glare.] Please! We'll escort you out of the desert! We'll help however we can!
character_words: I traded him! To some merchants! He's probably in Ba Sing Se by now! They were going to sell him there!  Please! We'll escort you out of the desert! We'll help however we can!

full_text: Just get out of here! Run!
character_words: Just get out of here! Run!

full_text: [Excitedly.] Waterbending bomb! Yeah! [Jumps into the water.]
character_words: Waterbending bomb! Yeah!

full_text: [Sarcastically.] Sure, five thousand year-old maps from the spirit library. Just splash some water on 'em.
character_words: Sure, five thousand year-old maps from the spirit library. Just splash some water on 'em.

full_text: Sorry. [Wrings her hair dry and bends the water off the map.]
character_words: Sorry.

full_text: So, did you figure out what route we're going to take?
character_words: So, did you figure out what route we're going to take?

full_text: Okay, we just got out of the desert, so we must be around here. And we need to go to Ba Sing Se, which is here. It looks like the only passage connecting the south to the north is this sliver of land called the Serpent's Pass.
character_words: Okay, we just got out of the desert, so we must be around here. And we need to go to Ba Sing Se, which is here. It looks like the only passage connecting the south to the north is this sliver of land called the Serpent's Pass.

full_text: You sure that's the best way to go?
character_words: You sure that's the best way to go?

full_text: It's the only way. I mean, it's not like we have Appa to fly us there.
character_words: It's the only way. I mean, it's not like we have Appa to fly us there.

full_text: [Quietly.] Shush up about Appa. Can't you at least try to be sensitive?
character_words: Shush up about Appa. Can't you at least try to be sensitive?

full_text: Katara, it's okay. I know I was upset about losing Appa before, but I just want to focus on getting to Ba Sing Se and telling the Earth King about the solar eclipse.
character_words: Katara, it's okay. I know I was upset about losing Appa before, but I just want to focus on getting to Ba Sing Se and telling the Earth King about the solar eclipse.

full_text: [Surprised.] Oh ... well, okay. I'm glad you're doing better.
character_words: Oh ... well, okay. I'm glad you're doing better.

full_text: Then to Ba Sing Se we go. No more distractions.
character_words: Then to Ba Sing Se we go. No more distractions.

full_text: Hello there, fellow refugees!
character_words: Hello there, fellow refugees!

full_text: So, you guys are headed to Ba Sing Se, too?
character_words: So, you guys are headed to Ba Sing Se, too?

full_text: Sure are. We're trying to get there before my wife Ying has her baby.
character_words: Sure are. We're trying to get there before my wife Ying has her baby.

full_text: Great! We can travel through the Serpent's Pass together.
character_words: Great! We can travel through the Serpent's Pass together.

full_text: The Serpent's Pass? Only the truly desperate take that deadly route!
character_words: The Serpent's Pass? Only the truly desperate take that deadly route!

full_text: Deadly route. [Punches Sokka in the arm.] Great pick, Sokka!
character_words: Deadly route.  Great pick, Sokka!

full_text: Well, we are desperate.
character_words: Well, we are desperate.

full_text: You should come with us to Full Moon Bay. Ferries take refugees across the lake. It's the fastest way to Ba Sing Se.
character_words: You should come with us to Full Moon Bay. Ferries take refugees across the lake. It's the fastest way to Ba Sing Se.

full_text: And it's hidden, so the Fire Nation can't find it.
character_words: And it's hidden, so the Fire Nation can't find it.

full_text: Hmm ... peaceful ferry ride or deadly pass?
character_words: Hmm ... peaceful ferry ride or deadly pass?

full_text: I can't believe how many people's lives have been uprooted by the Fire Nation.
character_words: I can't believe how many people's lives have been uprooted by the Fire Nation.

full_text: We're all looking for a better life, safe behind the walls of Ba Sing Se.
character_words: We're all looking for a better life, safe behind the walls of Ba Sing Se.

full_text: Who would have thought after all these years, I'd return to the scene of my greatest military disgrace ... [Turns away for a second before turning back with a floral hat on his head.] as a tourist!
character_words: Who would have thought after all these years, I'd return to the scene of my greatest military disgrace ...  as a tourist!

full_text: Look around. We're not tourists, we're refugees. [Sips food and spits it out.] Ugh! I'm sick of eating rotten food, sleeping in the dirt. I'm tired of living like this!
character_words: Look around. We're not tourists, we're refugees.  Ugh! I'm sick of eating rotten food, sleeping in the dirt. I'm tired of living like this!

full_text: Aren't we all? My name's Jet and these are my Freedom Fighters, Smellerbee and Longshot.
character_words: Aren't we all? My name's Jet and these are my Freedom Fighters, Smellerbee and Longshot.

full_text: Hey. [Longshot nods.]
character_words: Hey.

full_text: Hello.
character_words: Hello.

full_text: Here's the deal. I hear the captain's eating like a king while the refugees have to feed off his scraps. Doesn't seem fair, does it?
character_words: Here's the deal. I hear the captain's eating like a king while the refugees have to feed off his scraps. Doesn't seem fair, does it?

full_text: What sort of king is he eating like?
character_words: What sort of king is he eating like?

full_text: The fat, happy kind. [At this, Iroh's mouth hangs open as he starts to drool.] You want to help us "liberate" some food?
character_words: The fat, happy kind.  You want to help us "liberate" some food?

full_text: [Tosses the bowl of rotten food into the water.] I'm in.
character_words: I'm in.

full_text: I told you already ... no vegetables on the ferry! One cabbage slug could destroy the entire ecosystem of Ba Sing Se! Security!
character_words: I told you already ... no vegetables on the ferry! One cabbage slug could destroy the entire ecosystem of Ba Sing Se! Security!

full_text: Ahhh! My cabbages! [He is carried away.]
character_words: Ahhh! My cabbages!

full_text: Next!
character_words: Next!

full_text: Um, four tickets for the ferry to Ba Sing Se, please.
character_words: Um, four tickets for the ferry to Ba Sing Se, please.

full_text: Passports?
character_words: Passports?

full_text: Uh ... no one told us we had to have passports.
character_words: Uh ... no one told us we had to have passports.

full_text: Don't you know who this is? He's the Avatar!
character_words: Don't you know who this is? He's the Avatar!

full_text: Ah, I see fifty Avatars a day and, by the way, not a very impressive costume. [The screen pans to show several impostors; notices Momo.] Besides, no animals allowed. Do I need to call security?
character_words: Ah, I see fifty Avatars a day and, by the way, not a very impressive costume.  Besides, no animals allowed. Do I need to call security?

full_text: That won't be necessary.
character_words: That won't be necessary.

full_text: Next!
character_words: Next!

full_text: I'll take care of this. My name is Toph Beifong, and I'll need four tickets. [Presents her passport.]
character_words: I'll take care of this. My name is Toph Beifong, and I'll need four tickets.

full_text: Ah, the golden seal of the flying boar! It is my pleasure to help anyone of the Beifong family.
character_words: Ah, the golden seal of the flying boar! It is my pleasure to help anyone of the Beifong family.

full_text: It is your pleasure. As you can see, I am blind and these three imbeciles are my valets. [Sweeps her arm behind her, presenting her friends to the hesitant clerk.]
character_words: It is your pleasure. As you can see, I am blind and these three imbeciles are my valets.

full_text: But, the animal-
character_words: But, the animal-

full_text: -is my seeing-eye lemur.
character_words: -is my seeing-eye lemur.

full_text: Well, normally it's only one ticket per passport, but this document is so official ... I guess it's worth four tickets. [Stamps an approval seal on the tickets.]
character_words: Well, normally it's only one ticket per passport, but this document is so official ... I guess it's worth four tickets.

full_text: Thank you very much.
character_words: Thank you very much.

full_text: All right, we scammed that lady good!
character_words: All right, we scammed that lady good!

full_text: Tickets and passports please.
character_words: Tickets and passports please.

full_text: Is there a problem?
character_words: Is there a problem?

full_text: Yeah, I got a problem with you! I've seen your type before. Probably sarcastic, think you're hilarious and let me guess, you're traveling with the Avatar.
character_words: Yeah, I got a problem with you! I've seen your type before. Probably sarcastic, think you're hilarious and let me guess, you're traveling with the Avatar.

full_text: Do I know you?
character_words: Do I know you?

full_text: You mean you don't remember? Maybe you'll remember this! [Kisses Sokka on the cheek.]
character_words: You mean you don't remember? Maybe you'll remember this!

full_text: Suki! [Embraces her.]
character_words: Suki!

full_text: Sokka, it's good to see you!
character_words: Sokka, it's good to see you!

full_text: You look so different without your makeup! And the new outfit.
character_words: You look so different without your makeup! And the new outfit.

full_text: That crabby lady makes all the security guards wear them. And look at you, sleeveless guy. Been working out?
character_words: That crabby lady makes all the security guards wear them. And look at you, sleeveless guy. Been working out?

full_text: Ahhh, I'll grab a tree branch and do a few chin touches every now and then. Nothing major.
character_words: Ahhh, I'll grab a tree branch and do a few chin touches every now and then. Nothing major.

full_text: Are the other Kyoshi Warriors around?
character_words: Are the other Kyoshi Warriors around?

full_text: Yeah. After you left Kyoshi, we wanted to find a way to help people. We ended up escorting some refugees and we've been here ever since. [Momo jumps up next to her.] Hi, Momo! Good to see you too! [Scratches his head near his ear.] So why are you guys getting tickets for the ferry? Wouldn't you just fly across on Appa?
character_words: Yeah. After you left Kyoshi, we wanted to find a way to help people. We ended up escorting some refugees and we've been here ever since.  Hi, Momo! Good to see you too!  So why are you guys getting tickets for the ferry? Wouldn't you just fly across on Appa?

full_text: Appa is missing. We hope to find him in Ba Sing Se.
character_words: Appa is missing. We hope to find him in Ba Sing Se.

full_text: I'm so sorry to hear that. [To Aang.] Are you doing okay?
character_words: I'm so sorry to hear that.  Are you doing okay?

full_text: I'm doing fine. Would everybody stop worrying about me?
character_words: I'm doing fine. Would everybody stop worrying about me?

full_text: Avatar Aang, you have to help us! Someone took all of our belongings; our passports, our tickets, everything's gone!
character_words: Avatar Aang, you have to help us! Someone took all of our belongings; our passports, our tickets, everything's gone!

full_text: I'll talk to the lady for you.
character_words: I'll talk to the lady for you.

full_text: No passports, no tickets! [Stamps a "denied" stamp on Aang's forehead.]
character_words: No passports, no tickets!

full_text: But she's pregnant and all of her stuff was stolen! You have to make an exception!
character_words: But she's pregnant and all of her stuff was stolen! You have to make an exception!

full_text: No exceptions! If I just gave away tickets willy-nilly to anyone, there would be no more order! You know what that means, no more civilization!
character_words: No exceptions! If I just gave away tickets willy-nilly to anyone, there would be no more order! You know what that means, no more civilization!

full_text: What if we gave them our tickets?
character_words: What if we gave them our tickets?

full_text: No!
character_words: No!

full_text: But ...
character_words: But ...

full_text: Next!
character_words: Next!

full_text: Don't worry, you'll get to the city safely. I'll lead you through the Serpent's Pass.
character_words: Don't worry, you'll get to the city safely. I'll lead you through the Serpent's Pass.

full_text: I can't believe we gave up our tickets and now we're going through the Serpent's Pass.
character_words: I can't believe we gave up our tickets and now we're going through the Serpent's Pass.

full_text: I can't believe you're still complaining about it.
character_words: I can't believe you're still complaining about it.

full_text: [In her normal Kyoshi Warrior attire.] I'm coming too!
character_words: I'm coming too!

full_text: Are you sure that's a good idea?
character_words: Are you sure that's a good idea?

full_text: Sokka, I thought you'd want me to come.
character_words: Sokka, I thought you'd want me to come.

full_text: I do, it's just
character_words: I do, it's just

full_text: Just what?
character_words: Just what?

full_text: Nothing. I'm glad you're coming.
character_words: Nothing. I'm glad you're coming.

full_text: This is the Serpent's Pass? I thought it would be a little more wind-y, you know, like a serpent. Huh, I guess they misnamed it.
character_words: This is the Serpent's Pass? I thought it would be a little more wind-y, you know, like a serpent. Huh, I guess they misnamed it.

full_text: Look at this writing! How awful!
character_words: Look at this writing! How awful!

full_text: What does it say?
character_words: What does it say?

full_text: It says, "abandon hope".
character_words: It says, "abandon hope".

full_text: How can we abandon hope? It's all we have!
character_words: How can we abandon hope? It's all we have!

full_text: I don't know. The monks used to say that hope was just a distraction, so maybe we do need to abandon it.
character_words: I don't know. The monks used to say that hope was just a distraction, so maybe we do need to abandon it.

full_text: What are you talking about?
character_words: What are you talking about?

full_text: Hope is not going to get us into Ba Sing Se and it's not going to help find Appa. We need to focus on what we're doing right now and that's getting across this path.
character_words: Hope is not going to get us into Ba Sing Se and it's not going to help find Appa. We need to focus on what we're doing right now and that's getting across this path.

full_text: Okay, if you say so.
character_words: Okay, if you say so.

full_text: The Fire Nation controls the western lake. Rumor has it they're working on something big on the other side of it and don't want anyone to find out what it is.
character_words: The Fire Nation controls the western lake. Rumor has it they're working on something big on the other side of it and don't want anyone to find out what it is.

full_text: I'm okay! [The rock falls to the water, which the Fire Nation ship notices. It fires.]
character_words: I'm okay!

full_text: They've spotted us! Let's go, let's go!
character_words: They've spotted us! Let's go, let's go!

full_text: Suki, are you okay? You have to be more careful! Come on!
character_words: Suki, are you okay? You have to be more careful! Come on!

full_text: [Pretending to be Sokka.] "Thanks for saving my life, Toph." Hey, no problem, Sokka.
character_words: "Thanks for saving my life, Toph." Hey, no problem, Sokka.

full_text: Suki, you shouldn't sleep there. Who knows how stable this ledge is, it could give away at any moment! [Moves her sleeping bag.]
character_words: Suki, you shouldn't sleep there. Who knows how stable this ledge is, it could give away at any moment!

full_text: Sokka, I'm fine, stop worrying!
character_words: Sokka, I'm fine, stop worrying!

full_text: You're right, you're right, you're perfectly capable of taking care of yourself! Wait! Oh, never mind, I thought I saw a spider, but, you're fine.
character_words: You're right, you're right, you're perfectly capable of taking care of yourself! Wait! Oh, never mind, I thought I saw a spider, but, you're fine.

full_text: Guard's coming!
character_words: Guard's coming!

full_text: You know, it's okay to miss Appa. [Aang remains silent.] What's going on with you? In the desert, all you cared about was finding Appa and now it's like you don't care about him at all.
character_words: You know, it's okay to miss Appa.  What's going on with you? In the desert, all you cared about was finding Appa and now it's like you don't care about him at all.

full_text: You saw what I did out there. I was so angry about losing Appa that I couldn't control myself. I hated feeling like that.
character_words: You saw what I did out there. I was so angry about losing Appa that I couldn't control myself. I hated feeling like that.

full_text: But now you're not letting yourself feel anything. I know sometimes it hurts more to hope and it hurts more to care. But you have to promise me that you won't stop caring. [ Holds out her arms.] Come on, you need a hug.
character_words: But now you're not letting yourself feel anything. I know sometimes it hurts more to hope and it hurts more to care. But you have to promise me that you won't stop caring.  Come on, you need a hug.

full_text: [Bows before her.] Thank you for your concern, Katara. [Exits.]
character_words: Thank you for your concern, Katara.

full_text: It's a beautiful moon.
character_words: It's a beautiful moon.

full_text: Yeah, it really is.
character_words: Yeah, it really is.

full_text: Look, I know you're just trying to help, but I can take care of myself.
character_words: Look, I know you're just trying to help, but I can take care of myself.

full_text: I know you can.
character_words: I know you can.

full_text: Then why are you acting so overprotective?
character_words: Then why are you acting so overprotective?

full_text: It's so hard to lose someone you care about. Something happened at the North Pole and I couldn't protect someone. I don't want anything like that to ever happen again.
character_words: It's so hard to lose someone you care about. Something happened at the North Pole and I couldn't protect someone. I don't want anything like that to ever happen again.

full_text: I lost someone I care about. He didn't die, he just went away. I only had a few days to get to know him, but he was smart and brave and funny ...
character_words: I lost someone I care about. He didn't die, he just went away. I only had a few days to get to know him, but he was smart and brave and funny ...

full_text: [Jealous.] Who is this guy? Is he taller than me?
character_words: Who is this guy? Is he taller than me?

full_text: No, he's about your height.
character_words: No, he's about your height.

full_text: Is he better-looking?
character_words: Is he better-looking?

full_text: It is you, stupid!
character_words: It is you, stupid!

full_text: Oh!
character_words: Oh!

full_text: I can't.
character_words: I can't.

full_text: I'm sorry.
character_words: I'm sorry.

full_text: No, you shouldn't be. [Exits.]
character_words: No, you shouldn't be.

full_text: So, Smellerbee. That's an unusual name for a young man.
character_words: So, Smellerbee. That's an unusual name for a young man.

full_text: Maybe it's because I'm not a man ... I'm a girl! [Walks away.]
character_words: Maybe it's because I'm not a man ... I'm a girl!

full_text: [Calling out to her.] Oh, now I see. It's a beautiful name for a lovely girl!
character_words: Oh, now I see. It's a beautiful name for a lovely girl!

full_text: I know, you're right. As long as I'm confident with who I am, it doesn't matter what other people think. Thanks, Longshot.
character_words: I know, you're right. As long as I'm confident with who I am, it doesn't matter what other people think. Thanks, Longshot.

full_text: From what I heard, people eat like this every night in Ba Sing Se. I can't wait to set my eyes on that giant wall.
character_words: From what I heard, people eat like this every night in Ba Sing Se. I can't wait to set my eyes on that giant wall.

full_text: It is a magnificent site.
character_words: It is a magnificent site.

full_text: So you've been there before?
character_words: So you've been there before?

full_text: Once. When I was a ... different man.
character_words: Once. When I was a ... different man.

full_text: I've done some things in my past that I'm not proud of, but that's why I'm going to Ba Sing Se: for a new beginning. A second chance.
character_words: I've done some things in my past that I'm not proud of, but that's why I'm going to Ba Sing Se: for a new beginning. A second chance.

full_text: That's very noble of you. I believe people can change their lives if they want to. I believe in second chances.
character_words: That's very noble of you. I believe people can change their lives if they want to. I believe in second chances.

full_text: Everyone single file! [She divides the water, allowing everyone to walk through the drowned out path.] Aang, I need help! [Aang helps by creating an air bubble.]
character_words: Everyone single file!  Aang, I need help!

full_text: What is that thing?
character_words: What is that thing?

full_text: I think I just figured out why they call it the Serpent's Pass! Suki, you know about giant sea monsters, make it go away!
character_words: I think I just figured out why they call it the Serpent's Pass! Suki, you know about giant sea monsters, make it go away!

full_text: Just because I live near the unagi doesn't mean I'm an expert!
character_words: Just because I live near the unagi doesn't mean I'm an expert!

full_text: [Holds up Momo.] Oh great and powerful sea serpent, please accept this humble and tasty offering. Thank you.
character_words: Oh great and powerful sea serpent, please accept this humble and tasty offering. Thank you.

full_text: Sokka!
character_words: Sokka!

full_text: [Blasts the Serpent back with a burst of air.] I'll distract it. Katara, get everyone across! [Takes off on his glider.]
character_words: I'll distract it. Katara, get everyone across!

full_text: Toph, come on, it's just ice!
character_words: Toph, come on, it's just ice!

full_text: [Feels the ice but her sense of sight is restricted.] Actually, I'm going to stay on my little island, where I can see! [The serpent takes out half the island.] Okay, I'm coming! [Slowly crosses the ice.]
character_words: Actually, I'm going to stay on my little island, where I can see!  Okay, I'm coming!

full_text: You're doing great! Just follow the sound of my voice!
character_words: You're doing great! Just follow the sound of my voice!

full_text: It's hard to ignore.
character_words: It's hard to ignore.

full_text: You're almost there!
character_words: You're almost there!

full_text: Help! I can't swim!
character_words: Help! I can't swim!

full_text: I'm coming, Toph!
character_words: I'm coming, Toph!

full_text: Help!
character_words: Help!

full_text: [Thinking it is Sokka.] Oh Sokka, you saved me! [Kisses Suki on the cheek.]
character_words: Oh Sokka, you saved me!

full_text: Actually, it's me.
character_words: Actually, it's me.

full_text: Oh ... well ... [Chuckles. Embarrassed.] you can go ahead and let me drown now.
character_words: Oh ... well ...  you can go ahead and let me drown now.

full_text: There's the wall! Now it's nothing but smooth sailing to Ba Sing Se.
character_words: There's the wall! Now it's nothing but smooth sailing to Ba Sing Se.

full_text: [Groans in pain.] Oh no!
character_words: Oh no!

full_text: What's wrong?
character_words: What's wrong?

full_text: The baby's coming!
character_words: The baby's coming!

full_text: [Panicked.] What? Now? Can't you hold it in or something?
character_words: What? Now? Can't you hold it in or something?

full_text: Sokka, calm down. I helped Gran-Gran deliver lots of babies back home.
character_words: Sokka, calm down. I helped Gran-Gran deliver lots of babies back home.

full_text: This isn't the same as delivering an arctic seal! This is a real ... human ... thing!
character_words: This isn't the same as delivering an arctic seal! This is a real ... human ... thing!

full_text: It's called a baby and I helped her deliver plenty of those, too. Aang, get some rags. Sokka, water. Toph, I need you to make an earth tent, a big one. [Toph earthbends the rock to form a tent.] Suki, come with me.
character_words: It's called a baby and I helped her deliver plenty of those, too. Aang, get some rags. Sokka, water. Toph, I need you to make an earth tent, a big one.  Suki, come with me.

full_text: You know, as soon as I saw your scar, I knew exactly who you were. You're an outcast, like me. And us outcasts have to stick together. We have to watch each other's backs. Because no one else will.
character_words: You know, as soon as I saw your scar, I knew exactly who you were. You're an outcast, like me. And us outcasts have to stick together. We have to watch each other's backs. Because no one else will.

full_text: I've realized lately that being on your own isn't always the best path.
character_words: I've realized lately that being on your own isn't always the best path.

full_text: You're doing great, Ying. Sokka, where's that water? Now get ready to push. One ... two ... [Sokka enters.] ... three, push!
character_words: You're doing great, Ying. Sokka, where's that water? Now get ready to push. One ... two ...  ... three, push!

full_text: [From inside the tent.] It's a girl!
character_words: It's a girl!

full_text: So, you want to go see the baby, or are you going to faint like an old lady again?
character_words: So, you want to go see the baby, or are you going to faint like an old lady again?

full_text: No, no, I'm good this time. [Toph and Sokka enter the tent.]
character_words: No, no, I'm good this time.

full_text: Aang, you have to come see this.
character_words: Aang, you have to come see this.

full_text: She sounds healthy.
character_words: She sounds healthy.

full_text: She's beautiful.
character_words: She's beautiful.

full_text: It's so ... squishy looking.
character_words: It's so ... squishy looking.

full_text: What should we name her?
character_words: What should we name her?

full_text: I want our daughter's name to be unique. I want it to mean something.
character_words: I want our daughter's name to be unique. I want it to mean something.

full_text: [Sheds some tears.] I've been going through a really hard time lately. But you've made me ... hopeful again.
character_words: I've been going through a really hard time lately. But you've made me ... hopeful again.

full_text: I know what I want to name our baby now. Hope.
character_words: I know what I want to name our baby now. Hope.

full_text: That's a perfect name. Hope.
character_words: That's a perfect name. Hope.

full_text: I thought I was trying to be strong. But really I was just running away from my feelings. Seeing this family together, so full of happiness and love, it's reminded me how I feel about Appa ... and how I feel about you.
character_words: I thought I was trying to be strong. But really I was just running away from my feelings. Seeing this family together, so full of happiness and love, it's reminded me how I feel about Appa ... and how I feel about you.

full_text: I promise, I'll find Appa as fast as I can. I just really need to do this.
character_words: I promise, I'll find Appa as fast as I can. I just really need to do this.

full_text: See you in the big city.
character_words: See you in the big city.

full_text: Say hi to that big fuzzball for me. [Punches Aang in the arm.]
character_words: Say hi to that big fuzzball for me.

full_text: You'll find him, Aang.
character_words: You'll find him, Aang.

full_text: I know. Thank you, Katara. You ready, Momo? [Aang and Momo fly off. The rest wave goodbye.]
character_words: I know. Thank you, Katara. You ready, Momo?

full_text: Sokka, it's been really great to see you again.
character_words: Sokka, it's been really great to see you again.

full_text: Whoa, hold on. Why does it sound like you're saying goodbye?
character_words: Whoa, hold on. Why does it sound like you're saying goodbye?

full_text: I came along because I wanted to make sure you got through the Serpent's Pass safely. But now I need to get back to the other Kyoshi Warriors.
character_words: I came along because I wanted to make sure you got through the Serpent's Pass safely. But now I need to get back to the other Kyoshi Warriors.

full_text: So you came along to protect me?
character_words: So you came along to protect me?

full_text: Listen, I'm really sorry about last night. We were talking ... and saying things ... and I just got carried away and before I knew it -
character_words: Listen, I'm really sorry about last night. We were talking ... and saying things ... and I just got carried away and before I knew it -

full_text: [Kisses Suki.] You talk too much.
character_words: You talk too much.

full_text: Sorry Momo, Appa's going to have to wait.
character_words: Sorry Momo, Appa's going to have to wait.

full_text: This drill is a feat of scientific ingenuity and raw destructive power. Once it tunnels through the wall, our troops will storm their city. The Earth Kingdom will finally fall, and you can claim Ba Sing Se in the name of your father. Nothing can stop us.
character_words: This drill is a feat of scientific ingenuity and raw destructive power. Once it tunnels through the wall, our troops will storm their city. The Earth Kingdom will finally fall, and you can claim Ba Sing Se in the name of your father. Nothing can stop us.

full_text: [Looking through the telescope.] Hmmm, what about those muscle-y guys down there?
character_words: Hmmm, what about those muscle-y guys down there?

full_text: [Strikes the periscope roughly alarming Ty Lee.] Please. The drill's metal shell is impervious to any earthbending attack.
character_words: Please. The drill's metal shell is impervious to any earthbending attack.

full_text: Oh, I'm sure it is, War Minister Qin, but just to be on the safe side ... [Sharply while looking at the two girls.] Mai and Ty Lee, take the earthbenders out!
character_words: Oh, I'm sure it is, War Minister Qin, but just to be on the safe side ...  Mai and Ty Lee, take the earthbenders out!

full_text: [Swinging a knife around her finger; relieved.] Finally, something to do. [Rises and walks out.]
character_words: Finally, something to do.

full_text: [Surprised.] Aang, what are you doing here? I thought you were looking for Appa.
character_words: Aang, what are you doing here? I thought you were looking for Appa.

full_text: I was, but something stopped me. Something big.
character_words: I was, but something stopped me. Something big.

full_text: Now what's so big that Appa has to wait?
character_words: Now what's so big that Appa has to wait?

full_text: [Camera zooms out to drill.] That.
character_words: That.

full_text: [Despairingly.] We made it to Ba Sing Se and we're still not safe. No one is! [Huddles with family members.]
character_words: We made it to Ba Sing Se and we're still not safe. No one is!

full_text: What are you people doing here? Civilians aren't allowed on the wall!
character_words: What are you people doing here? Civilians aren't allowed on the wall!

full_text: I'm the Avatar. Take me to whoever is in charge.
character_words: I'm the Avatar. Take me to whoever is in charge.

full_text: [Happily.] It is an honor to welcome you to the Outer Wall, young Avatar, but your help is not needed.
character_words: It is an honor to welcome you to the Outer Wall, young Avatar, but your help is not needed.

full_text: Not needed?
character_words: Not needed?

full_text: [Calmly.] Not needed. I have the situation under control. I assure you the Fire Nation cannot penetrate this wall. Many have tried to break through it, but none have succeeded.
character_words: Not needed. I have the situation under control. I assure you the Fire Nation cannot penetrate this wall. Many have tried to break through it, but none have succeeded.

full_text: What about the Dragon of the West? He got in.
character_words: What about the Dragon of the West? He got in.

full_text: [Slightly taken aback.] Well ... uh, technically yes, but he was quickly expunged. [Confidently.] Nevertheless, that is why the city is named Ba Sing Se. It's the "impenetrable city". They don't call it Na Sing Se. [Laughs, but subsequently turns serious.] That means "penetrable city."
character_words: Well ... uh, technically yes, but he was quickly expunged.  Nevertheless, that is why the city is named Ba Sing Se. It's the "impenetrable city". They don't call it Na Sing Se.  That means "penetrable city."

full_text: Yeah, thanks for the tour, but we still got the drill problem.
character_words: Yeah, thanks for the tour, but we still got the drill problem.

full_text: Not for long. To stop it, I've sent an elite platoon of earthbenders called the Terra Team.
character_words: Not for long. To stop it, I've sent an elite platoon of earthbenders called the Terra Team.

full_text: That's a good group name. Very catchy.
character_words: That's a good group name. Very catchy.

full_text: Ready ... attack!
character_words: Ready ... attack!

full_text: [Upon witnessing the defeat of the Terra Team.] We're doomed! [Flails arms in panic.]
character_words: We're doomed!

full_text: [Slaps him across the face.] Get a hold of yourself, man!
character_words: Get a hold of yourself, man!

full_text: [Rubbing cheek.] You're right. I'm sorry.
character_words: You're right. I'm sorry.

full_text: Maybe you'd like the Avatar's help now?
character_words: Maybe you'd like the Avatar's help now?

full_text: [Meekly stands before the Avatar. Humbly.] Yes, please.
character_words: Yes, please.

full_text: The question is, how are we going to stop that thing? [All turn their heads to Sokka.]
character_words: The question is, how are we going to stop that thing?

full_text: Why are you all looking at me?
character_words: Why are you all looking at me?

full_text: You're the idea guy.
character_words: You're the idea guy.

full_text: [Complaining.] So I'm the only one who can ever come up with a plan? That's a lot of pressure.
character_words: So I'm the only one who can ever come up with a plan? That's a lot of pressure.

full_text: And also the complaining guy.
character_words: And also the complaining guy.

full_text: That part I don't mind.
character_words: That part I don't mind.

full_text: So, Mr. Lee and Mr. ummm ... Mushy, is it?
character_words: So, Mr. Lee and Mr. ummm ... Mushy, is it?

full_text: It's pronounced Mushi.
character_words: It's pronounced Mushi.

full_text: [Annoyed.] You telling me how to do my job?
character_words: You telling me how to do my job?

full_text: [Approaches the ticket booth.] Uh, no, no. But may I just say you're like a flower in bloom. Your beauty is intoxicating.
character_words: Uh, no, no. But may I just say you're like a flower in bloom. Your beauty is intoxicating.

full_text: [Flirtatiously.] You're pretty easy on the eyes yourself, handsome. Raorr! Welcome to Ba Sing Se. [Stamps their tickets.]
character_words: You're pretty easy on the eyes yourself, handsome. Raorr! Welcome to Ba Sing Se.

full_text: [Disgusted.] I'm going to forget I saw that. [Grabs ticket and walks away.]
character_words: I'm going to forget I saw that.

full_text: I think Lee would make a good Freedom Fighter. He's just trying to find his way in the world, like us.
character_words: I think Lee would make a good Freedom Fighter. He's just trying to find his way in the world, like us.

full_text: You don't know anything about him, Jet.
character_words: You don't know anything about him, Jet.

full_text: I know he didn't get that scar from a waterbender.
character_words: I know he didn't get that scar from a waterbender.

full_text: Besides, I thought we were going straight now.
character_words: Besides, I thought we were going straight now.

full_text: We are, and the new Freedom Fighters could use a guy like Lee. What do you think, Longshot?
character_words: We are, and the new Freedom Fighters could use a guy like Lee. What do you think, Longshot?

full_text: I can respect that.
character_words: I can respect that.

full_text: What's wrong with him? He doesn't look injured.
character_words: What's wrong with him? He doesn't look injured.

full_text: His chi is blocked. [Stops healing.] Who did this to you?
character_words: His chi is blocked.  Who did this to you?

full_text: Two girls ambushed us. One of them hit me with a bunch of quick jabs and suddenly I couldn't earthbend anymore and I could barely move. Then she cartwheeled away.
character_words: Two girls ambushed us. One of them hit me with a bunch of quick jabs and suddenly I couldn't earthbend anymore and I could barely move. Then she cartwheeled away.

full_text: [Eyes widen in realization.] Ty Lee. She doesn't look dangerous, but she knows the human body and its weak points. It's like she takes you down from the inside.
character_words: Ty Lee. She doesn't look dangerous, but she knows the human body and its weak points. It's like she takes you down from the inside.

full_text: [Excitedly.] Ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh! Ooh!
character_words: Ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh! Ooh!

full_text: Yes?
character_words: Yes?

full_text: What you just said! That's how we're going to take down the drill! The same way Ty Lee took down all those big earthbenders!
character_words: What you just said! That's how we're going to take down the drill! The same way Ty Lee took down all those big earthbenders!

full_text: By hitting its pressure points!
character_words: By hitting its pressure points!

full_text: [Looking out over the wall with a determined look.] We'll take it down from the inside.
character_words: We'll take it down from the inside.

full_text: [Gesturing toward the drill.] Once I whip up some cover, you're not going to be able to see. So, stay close to me.
character_words: Once I whip up some cover, you're not going to be able to see. So, stay close to me.

full_text: Run!
character_words: Run!

full_text: Hey, look at that dust cloud. [Periscope view shows front of drill and billowing cloud.] It's so ... poofy. [Cut back to Ty Lee who looks away from the periscope with a spaced-out expression.] Poof.
character_words: Hey, look at that dust cloud.  It's so ... poofy.  Poof.

full_text: Don't worry, Princess. I'm sure it's nothing. [Azula casts a doubtful look.]
character_words: Don't worry, Princess. I'm sure it's nothing.

full_text: Everyone into the hole!
character_words: Everyone into the hole!

full_text: It's so dark down here, I can't see a thing!
character_words: It's so dark down here, I can't see a thing!

full_text: [Sarcastically.] Oh no, what a nightmare!
character_words: Oh no, what a nightmare!

full_text: [Sheepishly.] Sorry.
character_words: Sorry.

full_text: There!
character_words: There!

full_text: Toph, come on!
character_words: Toph, come on!

full_text: No way am I going in that metal monster. I can't bend in there. I'll try to slow it down out here.
character_words: No way am I going in that metal monster. I can't bend in there. I'll try to slow it down out here.

full_text: Okay, good luck! [He and Aang disappear into the drill.]
character_words: Okay, good luck!

full_text: I need a plan of this machine. Some schematics that show what the inside looks like. Then we can find its weak points.
character_words: I need a plan of this machine. Some schematics that show what the inside looks like. Then we can find its weak points.

full_text: Where are we going to get something like that? [Sokka unexpectedly cuts off a steam valve with his machete.] What are you doing? Someone's going to hear us!
character_words: Where are we going to get something like that?  What are you doing? Someone's going to hear us!

full_text: That's the point. I figure a machine this big needs engineers to run it. And when something breaks ...
character_words: That's the point. I figure a machine this big needs engineers to run it. And when something breaks ...

full_text: They come to fix it!
character_words: They come to fix it!

full_text: [Appears behind him.] Hi.
character_words: Hi.

full_text: This'll work. Thanks!
character_words: This'll work. Thanks!

full_text: It looks like the drill is made up of two main structures. There's the inner mechanism where we are now and the outer shell. The inner part and the outer part are connected by these braces. If we cut through them, the entire thing will collapse.
character_words: It looks like the drill is made up of two main structures. There's the inner mechanism where we are now and the outer shell. The inner part and the outer part are connected by these braces. If we cut through them, the entire thing will collapse.

full_text: So, you guys got plans once you're inside the city?
character_words: So, you guys got plans once you're inside the city?

full_text: Get your hot tea here! Finest tea in Ba Sing Se!
character_words: Get your hot tea here! Finest tea in Ba Sing Se!

full_text: [Waves hand.] Ooh! Jasmine please.
character_words: Ooh! Jasmine please.

full_text: Blaugh! Ugh, coldest tea in Ba Sing Se is more like it! What a disgrace!
character_words: Blaugh! Ugh, coldest tea in Ba Sing Se is more like it! What a disgrace!

full_text: Hey, can I talk to you for a second?
character_words: Hey, can I talk to you for a second?

full_text: You and I have a much better chance of making it in the city if we stick together. You want to join the Freedom Fighters?
character_words: You and I have a much better chance of making it in the city if we stick together. You want to join the Freedom Fighters?

full_text: Thanks, but I don't think you want me in your gang.
character_words: Thanks, but I don't think you want me in your gang.

full_text: Come on, we made a great team looting that captain's food. Think of all the good we could do for these refugees.
character_words: Come on, we made a great team looting that captain's food. Think of all the good we could do for these refugees.

full_text: [Walking away.] I said no.
character_words: I said no.

full_text: Have it your way.
character_words: Have it your way.

full_text: Hey!
character_words: Hey!

full_text: [Gritting in a whisper.] What are you doing firebending your tea? For a wise, old man, that was a pretty stupid move!
character_words: What are you doing firebending your tea? For a wise, old man, that was a pretty stupid move!

full_text: [Mourning.] I know you're not supposed to cry over spilled tea, but ... [Sniffs. The cup is shown overturned in a puddle.] it's just so sad!
character_words: I know you're not supposed to cry over spilled tea, but ...  it's just so sad!

full_text: Wow, it looks a lot thicker in person than it does in the plans. We're going to have to work pretty hard to cut through that.
character_words: Wow, it looks a lot thicker in person than it does in the plans. We're going to have to work pretty hard to cut through that.

full_text: [Crosses her arms.] What's this "we" stuff? Aang and I are going to have to do all the work.
character_words: What's this "we" stuff? Aang and I are going to have to do all the work.

full_text: [Turns and gestures to self.] Look, I'm the plan guy. You two [Makes rapid chop-chop gestures.] are the cut stuff up with waterbending guys. [Strikes a heroic pose.] Together, we're Team Avatar!
character_words: Look, I'm the plan guy. You two  are the cut stuff up with waterbending guys.  Together, we're Team Avatar!

full_text: [Pumping arms in the air.] C'mon team. Don't quit now. [Katara grinds her teeth as she seethes with rage.] We're ...
character_words: C'mon team. Don't quit now.  We're ...

full_text: [Explodes with frustration.] Grrr!
character_words: Grrr!

full_text: I mean, [Recovers and points reassuringly.] you're almost there.
character_words: I mean,  you're almost there.

full_text: [Panting in exhaustion.] At this rate, we won't do enough damage before the drill reaches the wall.
character_words: At this rate, we won't do enough damage before the drill reaches the wall.

full_text: I don't know how many more of those I have in me.
character_words: I don't know how many more of those I have in me.

full_text: Do you hear that? We took it down! We better get out of here fast!
character_words: Do you hear that? We took it down! We better get out of here fast!

full_text: Congratulations, crew. The drill has made contact with the wall of Ba Sing Se. [Cuts to him standing in the command module.] Start the countdown to victory!
character_words: Congratulations, crew. The drill has made contact with the wall of Ba Sing Se.  Start the countdown to victory!

full_text: [Pushing against brace.] C'mon brace ... budge! [Makes several more attempts to move it.]
character_words: C'mon brace ... budge!

full_text: This is bad, really bad.
character_words: This is bad, really bad.

full_text: We're putting everything we've got into busting these braces, but it's taking too long!
character_words: We're putting everything we've got into busting these braces, but it's taking too long!

full_text: [Struck with realization.] Maybe we don't need to cut all the way through. Toph has been teaching me that you shouldn't give one hundred percent of your energy into any one strike. [Rises.] Sokka, take a fighting stance. You've got to be quick and accurate. Hit a series of points and break your opponent's stance. [Strikes Sokka several times.] And when he's reeling back, you deliver the final blow. [Hits him softly on the head.] His own weight becomes his downfall, literally.
character_words: Maybe we don't need to cut all the way through. Toph has been teaching me that you shouldn't give one hundred percent of your energy into any one strike.  Sokka, take a fighting stance. You've got to be quick and accurate. Hit a series of points and break your opponent's stance.  And when he's reeling back, you deliver the final blow.  His own weight becomes his downfall, literally.

full_text: So we just need to weaken the braces, instead of cutting all the way through.
character_words: So we just need to weaken the braces, instead of cutting all the way through.

full_text: Then I'll go to the top of this thing and deliver the final blow.
character_words: Then I'll go to the top of this thing and deliver the final blow.

full_text: [Rising.] And boom! It all comes crashing down!
character_words: And boom! It all comes crashing down!

full_text: Everyone inside that wall. The whole world is counting on us.
character_words: Everyone inside that wall. The whole world is counting on us.

full_text: The whole world minus the Fire Nation that is.
character_words: The whole world minus the Fire Nation that is.

full_text: [Straining as the drill continues to push her back.] C'mon, Twinkle Toes, hurry up!
character_words: C'mon, Twinkle Toes, hurry up!

full_text: That's enough! We need to get to the next one!
character_words: That's enough! We need to get to the next one!

full_text: War Minister, an engineer was ambushed! His schematics were stolen!
character_words: War Minister, an engineer was ambushed! His schematics were stolen!

full_text: War Minister, a brace on the starboard side has been cut clean through! It's sabotage, sir!
character_words: War Minister, a brace on the starboard side has been cut clean through! It's sabotage, sir!

full_text: [Sharply.] Let's go, ladies!
character_words: Let's go, ladies!

full_text: Good work, Team Avatar! Now Aang just needs to ... [Glances up in horror.] duck!
character_words: Good work, Team Avatar! Now Aang just needs to ...  duck!

full_text: [Barely misses another fire blast.] Whoa!
character_words: Whoa!

full_text: Wow, Azula, you were right! It is the Avatar! [Cut to a close-up of Ty Lee; she smiles flirtatiously at Sokka.] ... and friends.
character_words: Wow, Azula, you were right! It is the Avatar!  ... and friends.

full_text: [Smiles and waves.] Hey.
character_words: Hey.

full_text: Guys, get out of here. I know what I need to do.
character_words: Guys, get out of here. I know what I need to do.

full_text: Wait. [Throws him her water skin.] You need this water more than I do!
character_words: Wait.  You need this water more than I do!

full_text: Follow them! The Avatar's mine!
character_words: Follow them! The Avatar's mine!

full_text: [Reads a sign nearby, while Sokka struggles to open the hatch.] Slurry pipeline? What does that mean?
character_words: Slurry pipeline? What does that mean?

full_text: [Having successfully opened hatch which leads to a canal channeling slurry.] It's rock and water mixed together. It means our way out!
character_words: It's rock and water mixed together. It means our way out!

full_text: [Holds her hands over the slurry.] Ugh, disgusting!
character_words: Ugh, disgusting!

full_text: C'mon! You heard Azula. We have to follow them!
character_words: C'mon! You heard Azula. We have to follow them!

full_text: She can shoot all the lightning she wants at me. I am not going in that wall sludge juice. [Shivers in disgust.]
character_words: She can shoot all the lightning she wants at me. I am not going in that wall sludge juice.

full_text: [Hatefully and tauntingly.] Why don't you try blocking my chi now, circus freak?
character_words: Why don't you try blocking my chi now, circus freak?

full_text: Katara, keep that up. The pressure will build up in the drill. Then when Aang delivers the final blow, it'll be ready to pop!
character_words: Katara, keep that up. The pressure will build up in the drill. Then when Aang delivers the final blow, it'll be ready to pop!

full_text: [Halting.] This looks like a good spot, Momo. [Looks up to find boulders being hurtled down the wall, nearly crushing him. Yelling.] General Sung, tell your soldiers to stop shooting rocks down here!
character_words: This looks like a good spot, Momo.  General Sung, tell your soldiers to stop shooting rocks down here!

full_text: [Frantically.] Soldiers, whatever you do, don't stop shooting rocks down there!
character_words: Soldiers, whatever you do, don't stop shooting rocks down there!

full_text: Good technique, little sister! Keep it up! Don't forget to breathe!
character_words: Good technique, little sister! Keep it up! Don't forget to breathe!

full_text: [Irritated.] You know, I'm just about sick and tired of you telling me what to do all day! You're like a chattering hog-monkey!
character_words: You know, I'm just about sick and tired of you telling me what to do all day! You're like a chattering hog-monkey!

full_text: [Screaming.] Just bend the slurry, woman!
character_words: Just bend the slurry, woman!

full_text: [Approaching Katara.] You guys need some help?
character_words: You guys need some help?

full_text: Toph, help me plug up this drain.
character_words: Toph, help me plug up this drain.

full_text: [Exhausted.] What I'd give to be a metalbender.
character_words: What I'd give to be a metalbender.

full_text: [Assuming a fighting stance.] Momo, get out of here!
character_words: Momo, get out of here!

full_text: Thanks, Momo. I owe you one. [Runs over to the wedge he sliced in the drill.] Now all I need ... [A boulder falls before him.] Actually, that is what I need for once.
character_words: Thanks, Momo. I owe you one.  Now all I need ...  Actually, that is what I need for once.

full_text: Woohoo!
character_words: Woohoo!

full_text: Here it comes!
character_words: Here it comes!

full_text: [Dryly.] We lost.
character_words: We lost.

full_text: Last call for Ba Sing Se!
character_words: Last call for Ba Sing Se!

full_text: Jet, relax. So the old guy had some hot tea. Big deal.
character_words: Jet, relax. So the old guy had some hot tea. Big deal.

full_text: He heated it himself! [Darkly.] Those guys are firebenders!
character_words: He heated it himself!  Those guys are firebenders!

full_text: What a handsome baby. [Strokes the infant.]
character_words: What a handsome baby.

full_text: Thank you.
character_words: Thank you.

full_text: I just want to say, good effort out there today, Team Avatar!
character_words: I just want to say, good effort out there today, Team Avatar!

full_text: [Unamused.] Enough with the Team Avatar stuff. No matter how many times you say it, it's not going to catch on.
character_words: Enough with the Team Avatar stuff. No matter how many times you say it, it's not going to catch on.

full_text: How about ... [Pulls out boomerang.] the Boomeraang Squad! See it's good because it's got "Aang" in it. Boomeraang.
character_words: How about ...  the Boomeraang Squad! See it's good because it's got "Aang" in it. Boomeraang.

full_text: [Grins.] I kind of like that one.
character_words: I kind of like that one.

full_text: [Begins walking away.] Let's talk about this on our way into the city.
character_words: Let's talk about this on our way into the city.

full_text: The Aang Gang?
character_words: The Aang Gang?

full_text: Sokka ...
character_words: Sokka ...

full_text: The Fearsome Foursome?
character_words: The Fearsome Foursome?

full_text: [Also walking away.] You're crazy.
character_words: You're crazy.

full_text: Why? We're fearsome!
character_words: Why? We're fearsome!

full_text: [Excitedly.] Look, the Inner Wall! [Cut to a shot of the monorail approaching the wall. Cut back inside monorail.] I can't believe we finally made it to Ba Sing Se in one piece.
character_words: Look, the Inner Wall!  I can't believe we finally made it to Ba Sing Se in one piece.

full_text: [Slightly skeptically.] Hey, don't jinx it! We can still be attacked by some giant exploding Fire Nation spoon. Or find out the city's been submerged in an ocean full of killer shrimp!
character_words: Hey, don't jinx it! We can still be attacked by some giant exploding Fire Nation spoon. Or find out the city's been submerged in an ocean full of killer shrimp!

full_text: [Slightly annoyed, yet still jokingly.] You been hitting the cactus juice again?
character_words: You been hitting the cactus juice again?

full_text: I'm just sayin', weird stuff happens to us.
character_words: I'm just sayin', weird stuff happens to us.

full_text: [Sympathetically.] Don't worry Aang, we'll find Appa.
character_words: Don't worry Aang, we'll find Appa.

full_text: [Doubtfully.] It's such a big city.
character_words: It's such a big city.

full_text: [Somewhat optimistically.] He's a giant bison! Where could someone possibly hide him?
character_words: He's a giant bison! Where could someone possibly hide him?

full_text: [Realizing the city's gigantic size.] Oh.
character_words: Oh.

full_text: [Sighs.] Back in the city. Great.
character_words: Back in the city. Great.

full_text: [Excitedly.] What's the problem? It's amazing!
character_words: What's the problem? It's amazing!

full_text: [Shot shows Sokka and Toph with Momo resting on her shoulder.] It's just a bunch of walls and rules. You wait, you'll get sick of it in a couple of days.
character_words: It's just a bunch of walls and rules. You wait, you'll get sick of it in a couple of days.

full_text: I'm comin' for ya, buddy. [Katara walks over to the downtrodden Aang, and places her hand on his shoulder. More confidently.] He's here; I can feel it.
character_words: I'm comin' for ya, buddy.  He's here; I can feel it.

full_text: [Excited.] Hello, my name is Joo Dee! I have been given the great honor of showing the Avatar around Ba Sing Se. And you must be Sokka, Katara, and Toph! Welcome to our wonderful city. Shall we get started?
character_words: Hello, my name is Joo Dee! I have been given the great honor of showing the Avatar around Ba Sing Se. And you must be Sokka, Katara, and Toph! Welcome to our wonderful city. Shall we get started?

full_text: Yes. We have information about the Fire Nation army that we need to deliver to the Earth King, immediately.
character_words: Yes. We have information about the Fire Nation army that we need to deliver to the Earth King, immediately.

full_text: Great! Let's begin our tour. And then I'll show you to your new home here. I think you'll like it!
character_words: Great! Let's begin our tour. And then I'll show you to your new home here. I think you'll like it!

full_text: [Slightly annoyed.] Ugh! [Walks up to Joo Dee.] Maybe you missed what I said. We need to talk to the king about the War, it's important.
character_words: Ugh!  Maybe you missed what I said. We need to talk to the king about the War, it's important.

full_text: [Close-up on Joo Dee's face.] You're in Ba Sing Se now. Everyone is safe here.
character_words: You're in Ba Sing Se now. Everyone is safe here.

full_text: This is the Lower Ring.
character_words: This is the Lower Ring.

full_text: What's that wall for?
character_words: What's that wall for?

full_text: Oh, Ba Sing Se has many walls! There are the ones outside protecting us, and the ones inside, that help maintain order. [Shot changes to outside the carriage as the camera pans across some refugees.] This is where our newest arrivals live, as well as our craftsman and artisans, people that work with their hands. [Shot changes back to inside the carriage.] It's so quaint and lively!
character_words: Oh, Ba Sing Se has many walls! There are the ones outside protecting us, and the ones inside, that help maintain order.  This is where our newest arrivals live, as well as our craftsman and artisans, people that work with their hands.  It's so quaint and lively!

full_text: [Nervously.] You do want to watch your step, though.
character_words: You do want to watch your step, though.

full_text: [Nervous look on her face.] Why do they have all these poor people blocked off in one part of the city?
character_words: Why do they have all these poor people blocked off in one part of the city?

full_text: [Upset and somewhat bored.] This is why I never came here before. I always heard it was so different from the way the monks taught us to live. [Looks out the window.]
character_words: This is why I never came here before. I always heard it was so different from the way the monks taught us to live.

full_text: I just want our place to look nice, in case someone brings home a lady friend! [He gives Zuko a nudge with the elbow.]
character_words: I just want our place to look nice, in case someone brings home a lady friend!

full_text: [Bleakly.] This city is a prison. I don't want to make a life here.
character_words: This city is a prison. I don't want to make a life here.

full_text: Life happens wherever you are, whether you make it or not. Now come on, I found us some new jobs, and we start this afternoon!
character_words: Life happens wherever you are, whether you make it or not. Now come on, I found us some new jobs, and we start this afternoon!

full_text: Look at them, firebenders living right under everyone's nose.
character_words: Look at them, firebenders living right under everyone's nose.

full_text: Jet, you saw a man with a hot cup of tea. It doesn't prove he's a firebender. And what if he is, are we supposed to attack them? I thought we were starting over here, changing our ways.
character_words: Jet, you saw a man with a hot cup of tea. It doesn't prove he's a firebender. And what if he is, are we supposed to attack them? I thought we were starting over here, changing our ways.

full_text: We are. When I get the evidence I need, I'll report them to the police and let them handle it. [Walks forward a bit and turns his head to face the pair.] Okay?
character_words: We are. When I get the evidence I need, I'll report them to the police and let them handle it.  Okay?

full_text: This is the Middle Ring of Ba Sing Se, home to the financial district, shops and restaurants, and the university.
character_words: This is the Middle Ring of Ba Sing Se, home to the financial district, shops and restaurants, and the university.

full_text: Yeah, we met a professor from the Ba Sing Se University. He took us to an ancient underground library where we discovered information about the war that is [Cut to inside carriage. Leaning toward Joo Dee, losing his patience.] absolutely crucial for the Earth King to hear!
character_words: Yeah, we met a professor from the Ba Sing Se University. He took us to an ancient underground library where we discovered information about the war that is  absolutely crucial for the Earth King to hear!

full_text: [Smiling; excitedly.] Isn't history fascinating? Look, here's one of the oldest buildings in the Middle Ring, Town Hall!
character_words: Isn't history fascinating? Look, here's one of the oldest buildings in the Middle Ring, Town Hall!

full_text: Is that woman deaf? She only seems to hear every other word I say.
character_words: Is that woman deaf? She only seems to hear every other word I say.

full_text: It's called "being handled". Get used to it. [Crosses her arms as everyone else glares sadly at Sokka.]
character_words: It's called "being handled". Get used to it.

full_text: Well, you certainly look like official tea servers. [Cut to close-up of Pao.] How do you feel?
character_words: Well, you certainly look like official tea servers.  How do you feel?

full_text: [Annoyed.] Ridiculous.
character_words: Ridiculous.

full_text: Uh, does this possibly come in a larger size? [Cut to a view behind Iroh with the apron strings not quite long enough to tie.]
character_words: Uh, does this possibly come in a larger size?

full_text: I have extra string in the back. Have some tea while you wait!
character_words: I have extra string in the back. Have some tea while you wait!

full_text: [Quickly holds the cup at a distance.] Blech! [Looks at it in disgust.] This tea is nothing more than hot leaf juice!
character_words: Blech!  This tea is nothing more than hot leaf juice!

full_text: [Iroh closely examines his cup. In an annoyed tone.] Uncle, that's what all tea is.
character_words: Uncle, that's what all tea is.

full_text: [Angrily.] How could a member of my own family say something so horrible?! We'll have to make some major changes around here.
character_words: How could a member of my own family say something so horrible?! We'll have to make some major changes around here.

full_text: The Upper Ring is home to our most important citizens. Your house is not too far from here!
character_words: The Upper Ring is home to our most important citizens. Your house is not too far from here!

full_text: [Close-up.] What's inside that wall?
character_words: What's inside that wall?

full_text: And who're the mean-looking guys in robes?
character_words: And who're the mean-looking guys in robes?

full_text: Inside is the Royal Palace. Those men are agents of the Dai Li, the cultural authority of Ba Sing Se. They are the guardians of all our traditions!
character_words: Inside is the Royal Palace. Those men are agents of the Dai Li, the cultural authority of Ba Sing Se. They are the guardians of all our traditions!

full_text: [Close-up view. Bored and annoyed.] Can we see the king now?
character_words: Can we see the king now?

full_text: [Close-up view.] Oh no, one doesn't just pop in on the Earth King!
character_words: Oh no, one doesn't just pop in on the Earth King!

full_text: Here we are! Your new home.
character_words: Here we are! Your new home.

full_text: [Close-up view.] More good news! Your request for an audience with the Earth King is being processed, and should be put through in about month. [Cut to behind the gang looking down at Joo Dee.] Much more quickly than usual!
character_words: More good news! Your request for an audience with the Earth King is being processed, and should be put through in about month.  Much more quickly than usual!

full_text: [Close-up view of Team Avatar. Surprised.] A month?
character_words: A month?

full_text: [Close-up view. Smiling widely.] Six to eight weeks, actually. [Closes her eyes and grins.]
character_words: Six to eight weeks, actually.

full_text: [Close-up side-view.] Isn't it nice? I think you'll really enjoy it here.
character_words: Isn't it nice? I think you'll really enjoy it here.

full_text: [Cut to view of entire room from the back.] I think we would enjoy it more if we weren't staying for so long. Can't we see the Earth King any sooner?
character_words: I think we would enjoy it more if we weren't staying for so long. Can't we see the Earth King any sooner?

full_text: [Close-up view over Sokka's shoulder. Smiling.] The Earth King is very busy running the finest city in the world! [Close-up on Sokka, as an annoyed expression covers his face.] But he will see you as soon as time permits.
character_words: The Earth King is very busy running the finest city in the world!  But he will see you as soon as time permits.

full_text: [Cut to Momo and Aang. Aang turns to look out the window determined.] If we're going to be here for a month, we should spend our time looking for Appa. [At the sound of Appa's name, Momo wakes up.]
character_words: If we're going to be here for a month, we should spend our time looking for Appa.

full_text: [Side-view of Aang with Joo Dee behind. Bows.] I'd like to escort you anywhere you'd like to go.
character_words: I'd like to escort you anywhere you'd like to go.

full_text: [Cut to Katara and Toph. Annoyed.] We don't need a babysitter.
character_words: We don't need a babysitter.

full_text: Oh, I won't get in the way. [She takes a step, blocking Toph's path.] And to leave you alone would make me a bad host! [Close-up of Toph, from behind, with Joo Dee in front.] Where shall we start?
character_words: Oh, I won't get in the way.  And to leave you alone would make me a bad host!  Where shall we start?

full_text: [Close-up shot.] I'm sorry, but I haven't heard anything about a flying bison. I didn't even know there were any.
character_words: I'm sorry, but I haven't heard anything about a flying bison. I didn't even know there were any.

full_text: [Cut to shot of Aang and Sokka, Joo Dee lurking behind.] If someone wanted to sell a stolen animal without anyone knowing, where would they go?
character_words: If someone wanted to sell a stolen animal without anyone knowing, where would they go?

full_text: [Slightly frustrated.] Where's the black market? Who runs it? [Pointing at him accusingly.] Come on, you know!
character_words: Where's the black market? Who runs it?  Come on, you know!

full_text: [Close-up shot. Nervous and perspiring.] Uh ... [Looks at Joo Dee, who is standing behind Sokka and Aang, shaking her head.] That would be illegal. You'll have to leave now; your lemur is harassing my sparrowkeets.
character_words: Uh ...  That would be illegal. You'll have to leave now; your lemur is harassing my sparrowkeets.

full_text: Hmm ... I've never seen any sandbenders or nomads around here. [Frontal shot.] You should ask Professor Zei, he teaches the class on desert cultures.
character_words: Hmm ... I've never seen any sandbenders or nomads around here.  You should ask Professor Zei, he teaches the class on desert cultures.

full_text: [Annoyed.] Right. And which of your professors could we ask about the war with the Fire Nation?
character_words: Right. And which of your professors could we ask about the war with the Fire Nation?

full_text: [Nervously.] Uh ...
character_words: Uh ...

full_text: [Close-up shot. Still very nervous.] I don't know. I'm not a political science student ... I've got to get to class.
character_words: I don't know. I'm not a political science student ... I've got to get to class.

full_text: Well, I'm sorry no one has seen your bison. Why don't you go get some rest? [Smiling.] Someone will be over with dinner, later.
character_words: Well, I'm sorry no one has seen your bison. Why don't you go get some rest?  Someone will be over with dinner, later.

full_text: [He gestures to the rest of Team Avatar to follow him.] Hey, come with me.
character_words: Hey, come with me.

full_text: You're the Avatar! [Side-view of gang.] I heard you were in town. [Overhead view.] I'm Pong.
character_words: You're the Avatar!  I heard you were in town.  I'm Pong.

full_text: [Side-view of gang. Smiles.] Nice to meet you, Pong.
character_words: Nice to meet you, Pong.

full_text: So, Pong, what's goin' on with this city? Why is everyone here so scared here to talk about the war?
character_words: So, Pong, what's goin' on with this city? Why is everyone here so scared here to talk about the war?

full_text: [Frontal view. Shifts his eyes to the sides.] War? Scared? What do you mean?
character_words: War? Scared? What do you mean?

full_text: [Frontal view. Slightly annoyed.] I can feel you shaking.
character_words: I can feel you shaking.

full_text: [Frontal view.] Look, I'm just a minor government official. [Looks to the sides to confirm that no one is present except them.] I've waited three years to get this house. I don't want go get into trouble.
character_words: Look, I'm just a minor government official.  I've waited three years to get this house. I don't want go get into trouble.

full_text: [Tight side-view of the gang and Pong.] Get in trouble with who?!
character_words: Get in trouble with who?!

full_text: [Puts his finger on his mouth, and whispers.] Shh, listen, you can't mention the War here. [Overhead view.] And whatever you do, stay away from the Dai Li.
character_words: Shh, listen, you can't mention the War here.  And whatever you do, stay away from the Dai Li.

full_text: Would you like a pot of tea?
character_words: Would you like a pot of tea?
