full_text: [Close-up of Jet.] We've been working in a tea shop all day! [View from the outside in to the window where Zuko lays on a bed.] I'm sick of tea!
character_words: We've been working in a tea shop all day!  I'm sick of tea!

full_text: [Pan across to Iroh through another window.] "Sick of tea?" That's like being sick of breathing! [He rummages through the cupboard beneath the counter, where he is standing. Close-up view of kettle.] Have you seen the spark rocks to heat up the water?
character_words: "Sick of tea?" That's like being sick of breathing!  Have you seen the spark rocks to heat up the water?

full_text: [Side-view. Whispering to himself.] They're not there. [Opens his fist to show some emerald colored rocks. Close-up side-view.] You'll have to firebend, old man. [He sees Iroh going inside, and narrows his eyes.] Where're you going?
character_words: They're not there.  You'll have to firebend, old man.  Where're you going?

full_text: [View through window. Coming back to the counter.] I borrowed our neighbors'. Such kind people.
character_words: I borrowed our neighbors'. Such kind people.

full_text: I got it! I know how we're going to see the Earth King!
character_words: I got it! I know how we're going to see the Earth King!

full_text: [Frontal view.] How are we supposed to do that? [Mimicking Joo Dee.] "One doesn't just pop in on the Earth King!"
character_words: How are we supposed to do that?  "One doesn't just pop in on the Earth King!"

full_text: [Side-view of her and Aang. Reading from the papers.] The king is having a party at the palace tonight for his pet bear.
character_words: The king is having a party at the palace tonight for his pet bear.

full_text: You mean, platypus bear?
character_words: You mean, platypus bear?

full_text: No, it just says 'bear'.
character_words: No, it just says 'bear'.

full_text: [Close-up view. He is lying upside down.] Certainly you mean his pet skunk bear.
character_words: Certainly you mean his pet skunk bear.

full_text: [Frontal view.] Or his armadillo bear.
character_words: Or his armadillo bear.

full_text: [Frontal view.] Gopher bear?
character_words: Gopher bear?

full_text: [Side-view of room.] Just ... bear.
character_words: Just ... bear.

full_text: This place ... is weird.
character_words: This place ... is weird.

full_text: [Growing excited again.] The palace will be packed. We can sneak in with the crowd!
character_words: The palace will be packed. We can sneak in with the crowd!

full_text: [Lies down.] Won't work.
character_words: Won't work.

full_text: [Frontal view. Slightly confused.] Why not?
character_words: Why not?

full_text: [Over Katara's shoulder view.] Well, no offense to you simple country folk, but a real society crowd will spot you a mile away. You've got no manners! [Takes a pastry from a bowl and eats it.]
character_words: Well, no offense to you simple country folk, but a real society crowd will spot you a mile away. You've got no manners!

full_text: [Frontal view.] Excuse me? I've got no manners?! You're not exactly "lady fancy fingers!"
character_words: Excuse me? I've got no manners?! You're not exactly "lady fancy fingers!"

full_text: [Burps. Over Katara's shoulder view.] I learned proper society behavior and chose to leave it. [Throws the half eaten pastry to the side.] You never learned anything. And frankly, it's a little too late. [She picks her nose and flicks the snot off her finger.]
character_words: I learned proper society behavior and chose to leave it.  You never learned anything. And frankly, it's a little too late.

full_text: [Side-view of room. Excitedly.] Aha, but you learned it! You could teach us!
character_words: Aha, but you learned it! You could teach us!

full_text: Yeah, I'm mastering every element. How hard could manners be?
character_words: Yeah, I'm mastering every element. How hard could manners be?

full_text: Good evening, Mr. Sokka Water Tribe, Ms. Katara Water Tribe, Lord Momo of the Momo Dynasty. Your Momo-ness. [Frontal view of Momo as he peeks at Aang from under the carpet and slightly bows.]
character_words: Good evening, Mr. Sokka Water Tribe, Ms. Katara Water Tribe, Lord Momo of the Momo Dynasty. Your Momo-ness.

full_text: [Stands up also wearing a curtain like a robe. Mimicking a typical high class person.] Avatar Aang, how do you do? Go on.
character_words: Avatar Aang, how do you do? Go on.

full_text: Katara might be able to pull it off, but you two would be lucky to pass as busboys!
character_words: Katara might be able to pull it off, but you two would be lucky to pass as busboys!

full_text: But I feel so fancy! [Toph's snot falls on Sokka's forehead.]
character_words: But I feel so fancy!

full_text: [Closing his hands into a fist.] Earth!
character_words: Earth!

full_text: [Wriggling his hands.] Fire!
character_words: Fire!

full_text: [Stunned.] Wow, you look beautiful.
character_words: Wow, you look beautiful.

full_text: Don't talk to the commoners, Katara. First rule of society.
character_words: Don't talk to the commoners, Katara. First rule of society.

full_text: [To Sokka and Aang.] We'll get in the party, and then find a way to let you in through the side gate.
character_words: We'll get in the party, and then find a way to let you in through the side gate.

full_text: Jet, we need to talk.
character_words: Jet, we need to talk.

full_text: What? Oh great, it's you guys. Where have you been? [Overhead view of alley.] I could use some help with surveillance here!
character_words: What? Oh great, it's you guys. Where have you been?  I could use some help with surveillance here!

full_text: We've been talking, [Cut to side-view of the threesome, tea shop in background.] and we think you're becoming obsessed with this. It's not healthy.
character_words: We've been talking,  and we think you're becoming obsessed with this. It's not healthy.

full_text: [Close-up shot.] Oh, really? You both think this?
character_words: Oh, really? You both think this?

full_text: We came here to make a fresh start. But you won't let this go. Even though there is no real proof!
character_words: We came here to make a fresh start. But you won't let this go. Even though there is no real proof!

full_text: Well, maybe if you'd help me!
character_words: Well, maybe if you'd help me!

full_text: [Side-view of threesome.] Jet, you gotta stop this.
character_words: Jet, you gotta stop this.

full_text: Maybe you've forgotten why we need to start over. [View of Longshot and Smellerbee from behind Jet. Longshot and Smellerbee look down, guiltily.] Maybe you've forgotten about how the Fire Nation left us all homeless. How they wiped out all the people we loved. If you don't want to help me, I'll get the evidence on my own. [He goes toward the tea shop.]
character_words: Maybe you've forgotten why we need to start over.  Maybe you've forgotten about how the Fire Nation left us all homeless. How they wiped out all the people we loved. If you don't want to help me, I'll get the evidence on my own.

full_text: This is the best tea in the city!
character_words: This is the best tea in the city!

full_text: [Frontal view.] The secret ingredient is love. [He waves a hand through the steam coming from the teapot and walks toward the back of the shop where the owner is, while Zuko gives him a disgusted look.]
character_words: The secret ingredient is love.

full_text: [Side-view. Turning to Iroh.] I think you're due for a raise.
character_words: I think you're due for a raise.

full_text: I'm tired of waiting! [Pointing an accusing finger at Iroh and Zuko.] These two men are firebenders!
character_words: I'm tired of waiting!  These two men are firebenders!

full_text: I know they're firebenders, I saw the old man heating his tea!
character_words: I know they're firebenders, I saw the old man heating his tea!

full_text: [Frontal view. Bleakly.] He works in a tea shop.
character_words: He works in a tea shop.

full_text: [Frontal view.] He's a firebender! I'm telling you!
character_words: He's a firebender! I'm telling you!

full_text: [Frontal view. Stands up, along with another man.] Drop your swords, boy. Nice and easy.
character_words: Drop your swords, boy. Nice and easy.

full_text: [Frontal view. To Zuko.] You'll have to defend yourself. Then everyone will know. Go ahead, show them what you can do.
character_words: You'll have to defend yourself. Then everyone will know. Go ahead, show them what you can do.

full_text: You want a show? I'll give you a show!
character_words: You want a show? I'll give you a show!

full_text: Invitation please.
character_words: Invitation please.

full_text: [Formally.] I think this will do.
character_words: I think this will do.

full_text: No entry without an invitation. Step out of line, please.
character_words: No entry without an invitation. Step out of line, please.

full_text: [Irritated.] Look, the Pangs and the Yum Soon Hans are waiting in there for us! I'm going to have to tell them who didn't let me in.
character_words: Look, the Pangs and the Yum Soon Hans are waiting in there for us! I'm going to have to tell them who didn't let me in.

full_text: [Unyielding.] Step out of line please.
character_words: Step out of line please.

full_text: [Side-view.] Sir, I'm sorry to bother you, but my cousin lost our invitations. [Whispering.] She's blind. [Again, normally.] Do you think you could help us? Our family's inside and I'm sure they're very worried.
character_words: Sir, I'm sorry to bother you, but my cousin lost our invitations.  She's blind.  Do you think you could help us? Our family's inside and I'm sure they're very worried.

full_text: [Close-up view as he smiles and bows his head.] I am honored, please come with me.
character_words: I am honored, please come with me.

full_text: He's taking all the good stuff!
character_words: He's taking all the good stuff!

full_text: Quiet! You don't know what I had to do to get seats this near the bear!
character_words: Quiet! You don't know what I had to do to get seats this near the bear!

full_text: It's beautiful, isn't it? [Close-up shot. Turning to the girls.] By the way, I'm Long Feng. I'm a cultural minister to the king.
character_words: It's beautiful, isn't it?  By the way, I'm Long Feng. I'm a cultural minister to the king.

full_text: [View of her and Toph.] I'm Kwa Mai, and this is ... Dum. [Toph frowns and pulls a string hanging from Katara's headdress, causing her pain.] Ow!
character_words: I'm Kwa Mai, and this is ... Dum.  Ow!

full_text: [Close-up shot.] Now where is your family? I'd love to meet them.
character_words: Now where is your family? I'd love to meet them.

full_text: [Side-view. Feigning looking around.] Uh ... I don't see them right now, but I'm sure we'll find them soon. [Smiles.] Thanks for all your help.
character_words: Uh ... I don't see them right now, but I'm sure we'll find them soon.  Thanks for all your help.

full_text: Don't worry, as your escort it would be dishonorable to abandon you ladies without finding your family first. We'll keep looking. [He turns around and leads the two girls, while Katara glances at Toph, nervously.]
character_words: Don't worry, as your escort it would be dishonorable to abandon you ladies without finding your family first. We'll keep looking.

full_text: [Worried and nervous.] Where are they?
character_words: Where are they?

full_text: Look, I came up with a back-up plan. [He picks Momo up.] We dress Momo like a ghost, okay? [Moves Momo in a circle.] He flies by the guards, creating a distraction. Then, we blast a hole in the wall-
character_words: Look, I came up with a back-up plan.  We dress Momo like a ghost, okay?  He flies by the guards, creating a distraction. Then, we blast a hole in the wall-

full_text: Or we could go in as these guys. Toph said we might pass as busboys!
character_words: Or we could go in as these guys. Toph said we might pass as busboys!

full_text: Okay ... [Rolls his eyes.] But remember that Momo ghost plan. I think it's a winner. [Smiling, he and Aang sink behind the pedestal.]
character_words: Okay ...  But remember that Momo ghost plan. I think it's a winner.

full_text: [Close-up shot with a sinister grin.] You must be getting tired of using those swords. [Close-up shot of Zuko with a look of annoyance.] Why don't you go ahead and firebend at me?
character_words: You must be getting tired of using those swords.  Why don't you go ahead and firebend at me?

full_text: Please, son, you're confused! You don't know what you're doing!
character_words: Please, son, you're confused! You don't know what you're doing!

full_text: Bet you wish he'd help you out with a little fire blast right now.
character_words: Bet you wish he'd help you out with a little fire blast right now.

full_text: You're the one who needs help.
character_words: You're the one who needs help.

full_text: You see that?! [Aerial view.] The Fire Nation is trying to silence me. [View behind Zuko looking at Jet.] It'll never happen.
character_words: You see that?!  The Fire Nation is trying to silence me.  It'll never happen.

full_text: [A little worried.] Where are Toph and Katara?
character_words: Where are Toph and Katara?

full_text: Forget about them! Just keep an eye out for the king. [He grows slightly annoyed as Momo's tail, which has been sticking out of Aang's hat, begins to wag in his face.]
character_words: Forget about them! Just keep an eye out for the king.

full_text: [Slightly nervous.] I don't know what he looks like.
character_words: I don't know what he looks like.

full_text: You know, royal, flowing robe, fancy jewelry. [He grabs Momo's tail, still wagging in his face, and vigorously stuffs it back into Aang's hat.]
character_words: You know, royal, flowing robe, fancy jewelry.

full_text: That could be anyone!
character_words: That could be anyone!

full_text: [Trying to speak in a fancy voice.] Another crab puff, please. [Sokka leans in, eyes closed, with his tray to hand her a puff, unaware it's her.]
character_words: Another crab puff, please.

full_text: [Surprised and happy.] You found us!
character_words: You found us!

full_text: [Back to her normal voice.] I'd know your little footsteps anywhere, Twinkle Toes.
character_words: I'd know your little footsteps anywhere, Twinkle Toes.

full_text: [Opening his eyes, realizing who they are. Sarcastically.] Thanks for letting us in!
character_words: Thanks for letting us in!

full_text: [Close-up of her face.] Sorry, but the guy who escorted us in won't let us out of his sight!
character_words: Sorry, but the guy who escorted us in won't let us out of his sight!

full_text: [Slightly confused, not seeing anyone following them.] What guy?
character_words: What guy?

full_text: What are you doing here? You have to leave immediately, or we will be in terrible trouble!
character_words: What are you doing here? You have to leave immediately, or we will be in terrible trouble!

full_text: Not until we see the king.
character_words: Not until we see the king.

full_text: [Close-up of her face.] You don't understand. You must go.
character_words: You don't understand. You must go.

full_text: Aarrrh! Oh!
character_words: Aarrrh! Oh!

full_text: Sorry. No, don't shout.
character_words: Sorry. No, don't shout.

full_text: [Amazed.] The Avatar! I didn't know the Avatar would be here.
character_words: The Avatar! I didn't know the Avatar would be here.

full_text: [Whispers.] You keep their attention while I look for the king.
character_words: You keep their attention while I look for the king.

full_text: [View of Aang from above.] Watch this, everybody!
character_words: Watch this, everybody!

full_text: Drop your weapons.
character_words: Drop your weapons.

full_text: Arrest them, [Frontal view.] they're firebenders!
character_words: Arrest them,  they're firebenders!

full_text: [Panning view from behind Jet facing Iroh and Zuko.] This poor boy is confused, we're just simple refugees.
character_words: This poor boy is confused, we're just simple refugees.

full_text: [Pointing to Jet.] This young man wrecked my tea shop, and assaulted my employees!
character_words: This young man wrecked my tea shop, and assaulted my employees!

full_text: It's true sir, we saw the whole thing. This crazy kid attacked the finest tea maker in the city.
character_words: It's true sir, we saw the whole thing. This crazy kid attacked the finest tea maker in the city.

full_text: [Frontal view. Blushing.] Oh, ho, ho. That's very sweet.
character_words: Oh, ho, ho. That's very sweet.

full_text: Come with us, son.
character_words: Come with us, son.

full_text: You don't understand! They're Fire Nation! You have to believe me!
character_words: You don't understand! They're Fire Nation! You have to believe me!

full_text: Aang! The Earth King!
character_words: Aang! The Earth King!

full_text: Greetings, Your Majesty.
character_words: Greetings, Your Majesty.

full_text: Hey, let me go!
character_words: Hey, let me go!

full_text: Avatar, it is a great honor to meet you. [He bows.] I am Long Feng, Grand Secretariat of Ba Sing Se and head of the Dai Li. I'd like to talk to you. Your friends will be waiting for us in the library.
character_words: Avatar, it is a great honor to meet you.  I am Long Feng, Grand Secretariat of Ba Sing Se and head of the Dai Li. I'd like to talk to you. Your friends will be waiting for us in the library.

full_text: Why won't you let us talk to the king? We have information that could defeat the Fire Nation!
character_words: Why won't you let us talk to the king? We have information that could defeat the Fire Nation!

full_text: The Earth King has no time to get involved with political squabbles and the day to day minutia of military activities.
character_words: The Earth King has no time to get involved with political squabbles and the day to day minutia of military activities.

full_text: This could be the most important thing he's ever heard.
character_words: This could be the most important thing he's ever heard.

full_text: What's most important to his royal majesty is maintaining the cultural heritage of Ba Sing Se. All his duties relate to issuing decrees on such matters. It's my job to oversee the rest of the city's resources, including the military.
character_words: What's most important to his royal majesty is maintaining the cultural heritage of Ba Sing Se. All his duties relate to issuing decrees on such matters. It's my job to oversee the rest of the city's resources, including the military.

full_text: [Frontal view.] So the king is just a figurehead.
character_words: So the king is just a figurehead.

full_text: [Angry.] He's your puppet!
character_words: He's your puppet!

full_text: [Frontal view.] Oh, no, no. His Majesty is an icon, a god to his people. He can't sully his hands with the hourly change of an endless war.
character_words: Oh, no, no. His Majesty is an icon, a god to his people. He can't sully his hands with the hourly change of an endless war.

full_text: [Side-view of room.] But we found out about a solar eclipse that will leave the Fire Nation defenseless. You could lead an invasion ...
character_words: But we found out about a solar eclipse that will leave the Fire Nation defenseless. You could lead an invasion ...

full_text: [Stands up, annoyed. Shot changes briefly to a confused Sokka.] Enough! I don't want to hear your ridiculous plan. [Cut back to Long Feng.] It is the strict policy of Ba Sing Se that the War not be mentioned within the walls. [Scene changes as he talks to the two Dai Li agents dragging Jet into a dark room, making him sit on a stone chair.] Constant news of an escalating war will throw the citizens of Ba Sing Se into a state of panic.
character_words: Enough! I don't want to hear your ridiculous plan.  It is the strict policy of Ba Sing Se that the War not be mentioned within the walls.  Constant news of an escalating war will throw the citizens of Ba Sing Se into a state of panic.

full_text: You have to believe me, they're firebenders! They won't stop until they win the War.
character_words: You have to believe me, they're firebenders! They won't stop until they win the War.

full_text: [Frontal view.] Calm down, you're safe now.
character_words: Calm down, you're safe now.

full_text: Our economy would be ruined, our peaceful way of life  our traditions  would disappear.
character_words: Our economy would be ruined, our peaceful way of life  our traditions  would disappear.

full_text: There's no war in Ba Sing Se.
character_words: There's no war in Ba Sing Se.

full_text: What're you talking about? [Camera changes to an aerial view zooming out.] Where do you think all the refugees come from? You can't hide it!
character_words: What're you talking about?  Where do you think all the refugees come from? You can't hide it!

full_text: In silencing talk of conflict, Ba Sing Se remains a peaceful, orderly utopia: the last one on Earth.
character_words: In silencing talk of conflict, Ba Sing Se remains a peaceful, orderly utopia: the last one on Earth.

full_text: There is no war within the walls. Here we are safe. Here, we are free.
character_words: There is no war within the walls. Here we are safe. Here, we are free.

full_text: You can't keep the truth from all these people. They have to know.
character_words: You can't keep the truth from all these people. They have to know.

full_text: [Stepping forward, pointing a finger at Long Feng.] I'll tell them! I'll make sure everyone knows!
character_words: I'll tell them! I'll make sure everyone knows!

full_text: [Side-view of room.] Until now, you've been treated as our honored guest. [Cut to side-view of Long Feng and Aang. Long Feng steps forward and bends down to look Aang in the eye. Aang stares back at Long Feng, angrily.] But from now on, you will be watched every moment by Dai Li agents. If you mention the War to anyone, you will be expelled from the city. [He turns around and walks over to the hearth with the green fire.] I understand you've been looking for your bison. [View of Long Feng turning slightly to look at Aang.] It would be quite a shame if you were not able to complete your quest. [Aang appears frightened, but his expression soon changes to that of anger. Cut to an overhead shot of the room. Long Feng sits down, as Joo Dee opens the doors and walks toward the group.] Now, Joo Dee will show you to your home.
character_words: Until now, you've been treated as our honored guest.  But from now on, you will be watched every moment by Dai Li agents. If you mention the War to anyone, you will be expelled from the city.  I understand you've been looking for your bison.  It would be quite a shame if you were not able to complete your quest.  Now, Joo Dee will show you to your home.

full_text: Come with me, please.
character_words: Come with me, please.

full_text: [Surprised.] What happened to Joo Dee?
character_words: What happened to Joo Dee?

full_text: I'm Joo Dee. [Bows her head.] I'll be your host as long as you're in our wonderful city.
character_words: I'm Joo Dee.  I'll be your host as long as you're in our wonderful city.

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: Toph! Aren't you gonna get ready for the day?
character_words: Toph! Aren't you gonna get ready for the day?

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: I'm ready.
character_words: I'm ready.

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: You're not gonna wash up? You've got a little dirt on your ... everywhere, actually.
character_words: You're not gonna wash up? You've got a little dirt on your ... everywhere, actually.

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: You call it dirt, I call it a healthy coating of earth!
character_words: You call it dirt, I call it a healthy coating of earth!

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: Hmm ... [Thinking.] You know what we need? A girl's day out!
character_words: Hmm ...  You know what we need? A girl's day out!

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: Do I have to?!
character_words: Do I have to?!

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: It'll be fun!
character_words: It'll be fun!

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: The Fancy Lady Day Spa? [Sarcastically.] Sounds like my kinda place.
character_words: The Fancy Lady Day Spa?  Sounds like my kinda place.

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: Are you ready for some serious pampering?
character_words: Are you ready for some serious pampering?

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: Sure, Katara, whatever you say. As long as they don't touch my feet.
character_words: Sure, Katara, whatever you say. As long as they don't touch my feet.

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: Well, that wasn't so bad. I'm not usually into that stuff but I actually feel ... girly.
character_words: Well, that wasn't so bad. I'm not usually into that stuff but I actually feel ... girly.

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: I'm glad. It's about time we did something fun together.
character_words: I'm glad. It's about time we did something fun together.

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: Wow, great make-up.
character_words: Wow, great make-up.

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: Thanks.
character_words: Thanks.

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: For a clown!
character_words: For a clown!

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: Don't listen to them, let's just keep walking.
character_words: Don't listen to them, let's just keep walking.

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: I think she looks cute. Like that time we put a sweater on your pet poodle monkey.
character_words: I think she looks cute. Like that time we put a sweater on your pet poodle monkey.

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: Good one, Star.
character_words: Good one, Star.

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: [Angrily.] Let's go, Toph.
character_words: Let's go, Toph.

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: [Sarcastically.] No, no, that was a good one. Like your poodle monkey. [She laughs.] You know what else is a good one? [She earthbends the bridge, removing a circular part above which the three girls are standing, causing the girls to fall into the creek below. Cut to Katara's face from the hole.]
character_words: No, no, that was a good one. Like your poodle monkey.  You know what else is a good one?

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: Now that was funny.
character_words: Now that was funny.

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: Those girls don't know what they're talking about.
character_words: Those girls don't know what they're talking about.

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: It's okay. One of the good things about being blind, is I don't have to waste my time worrying about appearance. [Cut to a close-up of Toph's face.] I don't care what I look like. I'm not looking for anyone's approval. I know who I am. [She stops walking, and she cries a bit.]
character_words: It's okay. One of the good things about being blind, is I don't have to waste my time worrying about appearance.  I don't care what I look like. I'm not looking for anyone's approval. I know who I am.

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: That's what I really admire about you, Toph. You're so strong, and confident, and self-assured. [Toph sniffs.] And I know it doesn't matter, but ... [Keeps her palm on Toph's shoulder.] You're really pretty.
character_words: That's what I really admire about you, Toph. You're so strong, and confident, and self-assured.  And I know it doesn't matter, but ...  You're really pretty.

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: [Turning to Katara, smiling.] I am?
character_words: I am?

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: Yeah, you are.
character_words: Yeah, you are.

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: I'd return the compliment, but I've no idea how you look like. [Katara laughs.] Thank you, Katara. [She punches Katara's shoulder, her way of showing affection.]
character_words: I'd return the compliment, but I've no idea how you look like.  Thank you, Katara.

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: Ow!
character_words: Ow!

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: If this is for a romantic picnic, may I suggest this lavender one? [He points to another basket.]
character_words: If this is for a romantic picnic, may I suggest this lavender one?

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: No, it's not a romantic picnic, but it is a special occasion. [He hands a coin to the owner, and takes the basket. As he goes, he sees a vase that contains a moon flower. He slides the vase into the shade, which causes the flowers to bloom instantly.] The moon flower likes partial shade. [He bows to the shop owner and walks away.]
character_words: No, it's not a romantic picnic, but it is a special occasion.  The moon flower likes partial shade.

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: Shhh. It's okay. Shhh.
character_words: Shhh. It's okay. Shhh.

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: [He takes an instrument from the shop, and starts singing, walking toward the boy. Iroh gets down on one knee near the boy as he begins to sing.] Leaves from the vine, falling so slow. Like fragile, tiny shells, drifting in the foam. Little soldier boy, come marching home. Brave soldier boy, comes marching home.
character_words: Leaves from the vine, falling so slow. Like fragile, tiny shells, drifting in the foam. Little soldier boy, come marching home. Brave soldier boy, comes marching home.

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: Hey!
character_words: Hey!

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: It is usually best to admit mistakes when they occur, and seek to restore honor.
character_words: It is usually best to admit mistakes when they occur, and seek to restore honor.

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: [Angrily.] When I'm through with you kids, the window won't be the only thing that's broken.
character_words: When I'm through with you kids, the window won't be the only thing that's broken.

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: But not this time. Run!
character_words: But not this time. Run!

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: You, give me all your money!
character_words: You, give me all your money!

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: [Confused.] What are you doing?
character_words: What are you doing?

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: I'm mugging you!
character_words: I'm mugging you!

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: [Confused.] With that stance?
character_words: With that stance?

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: [Looks at his stance in a confused manner.] Huh? What're you talking about? Just give me your money, old man!
character_words: Huh? What're you talking about? Just give me your money, old man!

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: [He shakes his head.] With a poor stance, you are unbalanced, and you can be easily knocked over. [He quickly grabs the arm of the mugger and disarms him, while pushing his attacker and knocking him to the ground. He smiles, while twirling the dagger in his hand, and helps Tycho to his feet.]
character_words: With a poor stance, you are unbalanced, and you can be easily knocked over.

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: [Hands the knife back to Tycho.] With a solid stance, you are a much more serious threat. [Iroh demonstrates a proper stance, which Tycho attempts to imitate, but is still not assuming the correct form. Iroh walks over to him and holds his head still while he adjusts the man's stance with a light kick.] Much better! But to tell you the truth, you do not look like the criminal type.
character_words: With a solid stance, you are a much more serious threat.  Much better! But to tell you the truth, you do not look like the criminal type.

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: I know. I'm ... [He sighs.] I'm just confused.
character_words: I know. I'm ...  I'm just confused.

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: So you really think I could be a good masseur?
character_words: So you really think I could be a good masseur?

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: Of course!
character_words: Of course!

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: This is so great. No one has ever believed in me.
character_words: This is so great. No one has ever believed in me.

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: [Smiling.] While it is always best to believe in oneself, a little help from others can be a great blessing.
character_words: While it is always best to believe in oneself, a little help from others can be a great blessing.

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: Happy birthday, my son. [Cut to his face, as he starts to cry.] If only I could have helped you. [He sings, but his voice cracks due to him crying.] Leaves from the vine, falling so slow. Like fragile, tiny shells, drifting in the foam. Little soldier boy, come marching home. Brave soldier boy, comes marching home.
character_words: Happy birthday, my son.  If only I could have helped you.  Leaves from the vine, falling so slow. Like fragile, tiny shells, drifting in the foam. Little soldier boy, come marching home. Brave soldier boy, comes marching home.

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: [Kneeling on one knee and holding his hand out.] Hey there, fellow. You look hungry.
character_words: Hey there, fellow. You look hungry.

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: They are hungry. [Shot cuts to Kenji and Aang walking around in the zoo.] The Dai Li won't give me any money because the kids stopped coming. And the kids won't come because my zoo's nasty and broke.
character_words: They are hungry.  The Dai Li won't give me any money because the kids stopped coming. And the kids won't come because my zoo's nasty and broke.

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: [Looking at a cage.] What kinda animal is that? [They both stop walking.]
character_words: What kinda animal is that?

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: Oh, that's a rabaroo. I wish I could get her a big open prairie like she likes. [Shot cuts to the depressed rabaroo.] I'd let her hop away to happiness.
character_words: Oh, that's a rabaroo. I wish I could get her a big open prairie like she likes.  I'd let her hop away to happiness.

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: [Smiling.] Let's do it!
character_words: Let's do it!

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: [Surprised.] Say again?
character_words: Say again?

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: There's a big open space right outside the walls of the city.
character_words: There's a big open space right outside the walls of the city.

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: But how're you gonna transport all these wild critters?
character_words: But how're you gonna transport all these wild critters?

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: Don't worry, I'm great with animals.

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: Uncle, we have a problem. [Iroh descends from the ladder.] One of the customers is on to us. Don't look now but there is a girl over there at the corner table. [Cut to a shot of a girl sitting in the corner of the shop, drinking tea.] She knows we're Fire Nation. [Iroh looks at the girl, but is quickly pulled back by Zuko.] Didn't I say don't look?!
character_words: Uncle, we have a problem.  One of the customers is on to us. Don't look now but there is a girl over there at the corner table.  She knows we're Fire Nation.  Didn't I say don't look?!

full_text: [Bewildered.] What?

full_text: Great. I'll meet you in front of the shop at sundown.

full_text: [He yells in an assertive tone, pounding the table.] She is not my girlfriend!
character_words: She is not my girlfriend!

full_text: You have ... quite an appetite for a girl. [He fiddles his thumbs awkwardly.]
character_words: You have ... quite an appetite for a girl.

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: [Uncomfortably.] Umm ... thanks? So, Lee, where were you and your uncle living before you came here?
character_words: Umm ... thanks? So, Lee, where were you and your uncle living before you came here?

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: Umm ... well, we've been traveling around for a long time.
character_words: Umm ... well, we've been traveling around for a long time.

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: Oh. Why were you traveling so much?
character_words: Oh. Why were you traveling so much?

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: We were ... uh, part of this traveling circus.
character_words: We were ... uh, part of this traveling circus.

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: Really? What did you do? Wait, lemme guess. [She thinks for a moment and quickly points at him.] You juggled!
character_words: Really? What did you do? Wait, lemme guess.  You juggled!

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: [Zuko folds his arms and looks annoyed.] Yes, I juggled.
character_words: Yes, I juggled.

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: I've always wanted to learn how to juggle. [She holds out some objects.] Can you show me something?
character_words: I've always wanted to learn how to juggle.  Can you show me something?

full_text: I haven't practiced for a while. [Wipes the pieces of the objects from his hair.]
character_words: I haven't practiced for a while.

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: It's all right. Hey, I want to show you one of my favorite places in the city.
character_words: It's all right. Hey, I want to show you one of my favorite places in the city.

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: I'm so excited for you to see the Firelight Fountain. The lamps make the water sparkle and reflect in the pool in the most beautiful way.
character_words: I'm so excited for you to see the Firelight Fountain. The lamps make the water sparkle and reflect in the pool in the most beautiful way.

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: I can't believe it! They aren't lit.
character_words: I can't believe it! They aren't lit.

full_text: Close your eyes, and don't peek.
character_words: Close your eyes, and don't peek.

full_text: Okay, now you can look.
character_words: Okay, now you can look.

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: [Removes her palms from her eyes.] Oh, wow, [Cut to a shot showing the candles lit. Jin looks at Zuko, amazed. She walks up to him, looking at the candles.] What happened? How did they light? What did you? [She looks at a smiling Zuko.]
character_words: Oh, wow,  What happened? How did they light? What did you?

full_text: I've brought you something. [Jin becomes surprised.] It's a coupon for a free cup of tea.

full_text: Lee, this is so sweet.

full_text: Your uncle is a good teacher. [She walks close to him and turns his head toward her.] I have something for you too. Now it's your turn to close your eyes.
character_words: Your uncle is a good teacher.  I have something for you too. Now it's your turn to close your eyes.

full_text: What's wrong?

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: How was your night, Prince Zuko?
character_words: How was your night, Prince Zuko?

chapter: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
full_text: It was nice.
character_words: It was nice.

full_text: No! Stop sinking!
character_words: No! Stop sinking!

full_text: Don't make me put this down! [Lets go of the library and sends a slice of sand at the sandbenders, which misses completely. She grabs the library again.]
character_words: Don't make me put this down!

full_text: Put a muzzle on him!
character_words: Put a muzzle on him!

full_text: [Regretfully.] I'm sorry, Appa. [She sniffles and closes her eyes.]
character_words: I'm sorry, Appa.

full_text: Ransack his saddle. Who knows what treasures are stashed in there!
character_words: Ransack his saddle. Who knows what treasures are stashed in there!

full_text: He's tied up good. He can't hurt you.
character_words: He's tied up good. He can't hurt you.

full_text: [To Ghashiun.] What's your father gonna do when he finds out we lost a sand-sailer?
character_words: What's your father gonna do when he finds out we lost a sand-sailer?

full_text: Nothing. It's the one we stole from the Hami Tribe. [To the two sandbenders on Appa's saddle.] Did you empty the saddle? [Walks up to Sokka's club among a sleeping pad and parasol.] That's it? Nothing but garbage!
character_words: Nothing. It's the one we stole from the Hami Tribe.  Did you empty the saddle?  That's it? Nothing but garbage!

full_text: [Jumps off Appa with the other sandbender and kicks a box.] Doesn't matter. We'll still make a profit from selling him to those beetle-headed merchants.
character_words: Doesn't matter. We'll still make a profit from selling him to those beetle-headed merchants.

full_text: [Walks to the side of Appa's head.] How's his temper?
character_words: How's his temper?

full_text: Uh, pretty good. [Appa roars, startling two of the merchants. Ghashiun chuckles.] Most of the time.
character_words: Uh, pretty good.  Most of the time.

full_text: I bet someone will pay a fortune for him in Ba Sing Se.
character_words: I bet someone will pay a fortune for him in Ba Sing Se.

full_text: All right, you've got a deal.
character_words: All right, you've got a deal.

full_text: Appa! Appa! [Closer shot of Aang, who blows his bison whistle.]
character_words: Appa! Appa!

full_text: [Sailing away with his sandbenders.] He's your problem now! [Laughs.]
character_words: He's your problem now!

full_text: What?
character_words: What?

full_text: We need the shirshu spit darts!
character_words: We need the shirshu spit darts!

full_text: [Pulls a dart out of his robe.] Got 'em! Okay big fella, you're gonna take a nice little snoozle. [Blows three darts at Appa's feet.]
character_words: Got 'em! Okay big fella, you're gonna take a nice little snoozle.

full_text: Appa! [The camera pans up to the empty desert. Aang's eyes start watering and he closes them.] No. [Opens his eyes with anger.] No! [Slams his glider against the ground, using airbending to send sand up into the air.]
character_words: Appa!  No.  No!

full_text: We've gotta get rid of this one. He's too much trouble.
character_words: We've gotta get rid of this one. He's too much trouble.

full_text: [Appa's vision starts blacking out.] We could sell it for parts.
character_words: We could sell it for parts.

full_text: [Sighs.] I understand [The camera fades from black to show a circus trainer standing outside a cage.] you've had a rather hard time lately. That's too bad. You probably felt you had no choice but to behave outrageously, like a wild animal. [Cut to outside the cage, where the trainer pats Appa on the head.] But don't worry. You won't anymore. [Frontal shot. Darkly.] Because I am going to break you.
character_words: I understand  you've had a rather hard time lately. That's too bad. You probably felt you had no choice but to behave outrageously, like a wild animal.  But don't worry. You won't anymore.  Because I am going to break you.

full_text: Hungry? [Walks up to Appa.] Don't worry, I'm going to feed you too. [Shows a cabbage to the drooling Appa.] But not yet. [Takes away the cabbage as Appa tries to slurp it up. Walks up to the lion vulture.] First, I'm going to show you how you'll earn it. [Gives the cabbage to the lion vulture and opens the cage.]
character_words: Hungry?  Don't worry, I'm going to feed you too.  But not yet.  First, I'm going to show you how you'll earn it.

full_text: Of course, when you perform, the hoops will be flaming. And if you are careful, you won't get burned. [Appa belches loudly and the circus trainer quickly turns around.] You're about to be sorry. [Firebends a whip and creates a fire in front of Appa's cage, causing Appa to panic.] It's obvious that whoever your previous owner was, he had no idea how to handle you properly.
character_words: Of course, when you perform, the hoops will be flaming. And if you are careful, you won't get burned.  You're about to be sorry.  It's obvious that whoever your previous owner was, he had no idea how to handle you properly.

full_text: [To the boy.] I'm gonna to go get a bag of sizzle crisps. [Pointing at the ground.] Stay here and [Pointing at Appa.] stay away from that monster. Behave yourself or [The boy flinches slightly.] you'll regret it.
character_words: I'm gonna to go get a bag of sizzle crisps.  Stay here and  stay away from that monster. Behave yourself or  you'll regret it.

full_text: [Walking in front of Appa with the circus master, Shuzumu.] He's a difficult creature, stubborn and willful. I need more time with him. It's too risky right now.
character_words: He's a difficult creature, stubborn and willful. I need more time with him. It's too risky right now.

full_text: [Closer shot of him and the trainer.] Too risky? What are you talking about? [Raises his hands up.] This is the circus, home of fear and danger. [Points at Appa.] I want the wind buffalo to perform tonight.
character_words: Too risky? What are you talking about?  This is the circus, home of fear and danger.  I want the wind buffalo to perform tonight.

full_text: [Turns to Appa.] If you don't behave yourself, you'll regret it. [Firebends a flame in front of Appa, causing the bison to reel back in fear, and walks away.]
character_words: If you don't behave yourself, you'll regret it.

full_text: [Grabs the boy's shoulder.] Let's go.
character_words: Let's go.

full_text: [Waves at Appa.] See you later, buddy.
character_words: See you later, buddy.

full_text: [Voice-over.] Ladies and gentlemen, now for something truly special. [Frontal shot. Creates two flames with his hands.] A noble beast, so magnificent and rare, it hasn't been seen by human eyes in generations. I give you ... the wind buffalo!
character_words: Ladies and gentlemen, now for something truly special.  A noble beast, so magnificent and rare, it hasn't been seen by human eyes in generations. I give you ... the wind buffalo!

full_text: Up. [Appa shakes his head and turns around in a circle. The audience laughs.] Up, you insolent cow! [Summons a firebending whip and snaps it at Appa.]
character_words: Up.  Up, you insolent cow!

full_text: [Stands up.] Run away! Get away from him! [His father makes him sit back down.]
character_words: Run away! Get away from him!

full_text: Fabulous!
character_words: Fabulous!

full_text: Go, you can do it.
character_words: Go, you can do it.

full_text: Get back here, you stupid beast! [Creates a fire whip.]
character_words: Get back here, you stupid beast!

full_text: Choose well. A sky bison is a companion for life.
character_words: Choose well. A sky bison is a companion for life.

full_text: I guess this means we'll always be together. [Laughs as Appa continues licking his face.]
character_words: I guess this means we'll always be together.

full_text: Always.
character_words: Always.

full_text: [Wielding a pitchfork.] Ahhh! It's some kind of monster!
character_words: Ahhh! It's some kind of monster!

full_text: [Sitting up on the deck floor.] Uncle? What are you looking at? Is there something out there?
character_words: Uncle? What are you looking at? Is there something out there?

full_text: [Nervously.] Uh, it's nothing. Go back to sleep. [Zuko lies back down and Iroh sighs.]
character_words: Uh, it's nothing. Go back to sleep.

full_text: Must have been some fight.
character_words: Must have been some fight.

full_text: Wait, let me see that. [The Kyoshi Warrior hands the clump of fur to her.] No, it couldn't be. [The camera pans up to show Appa's trail of fur on the cliff. Suki follows the trail and gasps when she reaches the top.] Appa? Oh, no. [Close-up of Appa, who backs away into the passage in fear as Suki walks up. She stops and kneels down, putting several berries and an apple on the ground.] It's gonna be okay, Appa. [Stands up and back away.] I have to leave, but I'm gonna be back soon with help.
character_words: Wait, let me see that.  No, it couldn't be.  Appa? Oh, no.  It's gonna be okay, Appa.  I have to leave, but I'm gonna be back soon with help.

full_text: No sudden movements. He's been lost for a while and he looks like he's hurt. [Closer shot of the Kyoshi Warriors.] He's shy around people and scared. Stay low and stay quiet.
character_words: No sudden movements. He's been lost for a while and he looks like he's hurt.  He's shy around people and scared. Stay low and stay quiet.

full_text: I can't believe you found the Avatar's bison. Didn't you just see the Avatar a few days ago?
character_words: I can't believe you found the Avatar's bison. Didn't you just see the Avatar a few days ago?

full_text: Yes, so he can't be too far from here. [Walking up the hill.] It's our responsibility to get Appa back to him safely. This could be our most important mission yet. [The Kyoshi Warriors peer over the top of the hill at Appa, who growls and shakes his head at the intruders.] Give him some space! [The other Kyoshi Warriors take a step back. Suki takes a step forward.] Appa, it's me, Suki. I'm a friend. [Appa growls and Suki slowly approaches Appa.] I want to help you. You're hurt. We can help you feel better. [Appa growls in response.] And we can help you find Aang. [Appa softly growls and Suki places her hands Appa's nose and Appa lies down with Suki kneeling in front.]
character_words: Yes, so he can't be too far from here.  It's our responsibility to get Appa back to him safely. This could be our most important mission yet.  Give him some space!  Appa, it's me, Suki. I'm a friend.  I want to help you. You're hurt. We can help you feel better.  And we can help you find Aang.

full_text: [Holding a clump of Appa's fur.] My, my, you're easy to find. It's really astounding my brother hasn't captured you yet.
character_words: My, my, you're easy to find. It's really astounding my brother hasn't captured you yet.

full_text: What do you want with us?
character_words: What do you want with us?

full_text: Who are you? The Avatar's fan girls?
character_words: Who are you? The Avatar's fan girls?

full_text: [Beat.] Oh, I get it. Good one, Azula.
character_words: Oh, I get it. Good one, Azula.

full_text: If you're looking for the Avatar, you're out of luck.
character_words: If you're looking for the Avatar, you're out of luck.

full_text: [Aerial view; Mai sighs.] I knew this was a waste of time.
character_words: I knew this was a waste of time.

full_text: No Avatar, huh. Well, that's okay. Any friend of the Avatar [Jumps off the mongoose lizard.] is an enemy of mine! [Firebends at Appa, who the Kyoshi Warriors protect by moving their shields together.]
character_words: No Avatar, huh. Well, that's okay. Any friend of the Avatar  is an enemy of mine!

full_text: Huh? [Looks at the weapons on her right arm in confusion.]
character_words: Huh?

full_text: You're so colorful, it's making me nauseous. [Throws a bunch of darts at the second Kyoshi Warrior.]
character_words: You're so colorful, it's making me nauseous.

full_text: You're not prettier than we are.
character_words: You're not prettier than we are.

full_text: Afraid of fire, I see. That's good. You should be.
character_words: Afraid of fire, I see. That's good. You should be.

full_text: [Unsheathes her sword.] Go, Appa! Fly away from here!
character_words: Go, Appa! Fly away from here!

full_text: Get out of here! You have to find Aang! We'll be okay!
character_words: Get out of here! You have to find Aang! We'll be okay!

full_text: [Calmly.] Don't you know fans just make flames stronger?
character_words: Don't you know fans just make flames stronger?

full_text: [Blinks in confusion.] Hello. I am Guru Pathik. [Aerial shot as Appa flies to the back of the balcony and closer shot as he growls at the guru.] I know I'm not the person you expected. And I didn't expect to be licked by a giant tongue just now. [Side shot of Appa and Pathik on the balcony.] The world is full of surprises.
character_words: Hello. I am Guru Pathik.  I know I'm not the person you expected. And I didn't expect to be licked by a giant tongue just now.  The world is full of surprises.

full_text: Oh, dear. You've been through so much recently. Hurt and betrayed. So twisted up inside. [Moves his hand.] You're still full of love. Ah. But fear has moved in where trust should be. [The camera shows a further shot of the balcony and pans up to the Air Temple; voice-over.] I've been expecting you and the young Avatar for quite a long time. I had a vision many years ago of helping him. That's why I came to the Eastern Air Temple. [Closer shot of Appa and Pathik.] Oh, your emotions are so turbulent. Like swirling storm clouds. [Puts his hand on Appa's forehead.] Let the clouds in your mind be gentle, peaceful ones. [Appa purrs and the shot fades to black.]
character_words: Oh, dear. You've been through so much recently. Hurt and betrayed. So twisted up inside.  You're still full of love. Ah. But fear has moved in where trust should be.  I've been expecting you and the young Avatar for quite a long time. I had a vision many years ago of helping him. That's why I came to the Eastern Air Temple.  Oh, your emotions are so turbulent. Like swirling storm clouds.  Let the clouds in your mind be gentle, peaceful ones.

full_text: Someone looks very well rested, [Cut to Appa, whose fur on one side of his head is slightly messed up.] judging by your bed head. [Appa growls and shakes away the bed head.]
character_words: Someone looks very well rested,  judging by your bed head.

full_text: I have prepared a message for Aang. May I attach it to your horn? [Appa mutter in agreement and Pathik ties the scroll to Appa's horn. Cut to the leaves falling overhead and pan down to Appa and Pathik.] You and the Avatar's energies are mixed. You have an unbreakable bond. By reading your energy, I can sense where Aang is. [Appa licks him.] Funny, what invisible strings connect us all. [Places his hand on Appa's forehead. Further shot of the Air Temple as a path of light illuminates a pathway.] I'll see you again, great beast. [Closer shot of Pathik and Appa.]
character_words: I have prepared a message for Aang. May I attach it to your horn?  You and the Avatar's energies are mixed. You have an unbreakable bond. By reading your energy, I can sense where Aang is.  Funny, what invisible strings connect us all.  I'll see you again, great beast.

full_text: [Cheerfully.] We found a printer to make our posters! [Reveals the poster and Aang smiles and points at it.]
character_words: We found a printer to make our posters!

full_text: Hey, I thought designing the lost Appa poster was my job. I've been working all day on my Appa! [Shows his crudely drawn picture of Appa with a proud smile. Cut to an exasperated Aang while Katara tries to hold back her laughter.]
character_words: Hey, I thought designing the lost Appa poster was my job. I've been working all day on my Appa!

full_text: Sokka, the arrow is on Appa's head.
character_words: Sokka, the arrow is on Appa's head.

full_text: [Dismayed.] This is his head. [Pointsto the sketch.]
character_words: This is his head.

full_text: [Takes the picture from Sokka, looks confused.] Why are feet coming out of it?
character_words: Why are feet coming out of it?

full_text: [Snatches back the picture indignantly.] Those are his horns. [Hangs his head.] I haven't seen him in a while, okay?
character_words: Those are his horns.  I haven't seen him in a while, okay?

full_text: [Mockingly.] It looks just like him to me!
character_words: It looks just like him to me!

full_text: Thank you, I worked really- [Suddenly remembering that she is blind.] Why do you feel the need to do that?
character_words: Thank you, I worked really-  Why do you feel the need to do that?

full_text: Let's just stick with the professional version.
character_words: Let's just stick with the professional version.

full_text: [Excitedly.] Come on, let's get busy! [Holds up some pamphlets.]
character_words: Come on, let's get busy!

full_text: So, you're the genius behind this incredible brew. The whole city is buzzing about you! I hope Pao pays you well.
character_words: So, you're the genius behind this incredible brew. The whole city is buzzing about you! I hope Pao pays you well.

full_text: Good tea is its own reward.
character_words: Good tea is its own reward.

full_text: But it doesn't have to be the only reward. How would you like to have your own tea shop?
character_words: But it doesn't have to be the only reward. How would you like to have your own tea shop?

full_text: [Frontal view. Pao looks around, concerned.] My own tea shop? This is a dream come true!
character_words: My own tea shop? This is a dream come true!

full_text: [Quickly moving to stand between the group.] What's going on here? Are you trying to poach my tea-maker?
character_words: What's going on here? Are you trying to poach my tea-maker?

full_text: Sorry Pao, but that's business for you, am I right?
character_words: Sorry Pao, but that's business for you, am I right?

full_text: Mushi, if you stay, I'll make you assistant manager. Wait, senior assistant manager!
character_words: Mushi, if you stay, I'll make you assistant manager. Wait, senior assistant manager!

full_text: I'll provide you with a new apartment in the Upper Ring. [Cut to Zuko, who was busy putting empty tea cups on a tray, but now looks up and glances over his shoulder to follow Quon's offer more closely; voice-over.] The tea shop is yours to do whatever you want, [Cut back to frontal shot of Quon.] complete creative freedom.
character_words: I'll provide you with a new apartment in the Upper Ring.  The tea shop is yours to do whatever you want,  complete creative freedom.

full_text: I even get to name the shop?
character_words: I even get to name the shop?

full_text: Of course!
character_words: Of course!

full_text: Uh, senior executive assistant manager?
character_words: Uh, senior executive assistant manager?

full_text: Did you hear, nephew? This man wants to give us our own tea shop in the Upper Ring of the city!
character_words: Did you hear, nephew? This man wants to give us our own tea shop in the Upper Ring of the city!

full_text: That's right, young man, your life is about to change for the better!
character_words: That's right, young man, your life is about to change for the better!

full_text: [Sarcastically.] I'll try to contain my joy. [Walks outside, slams door shut.]
character_words: I'll try to contain my joy.

full_text: I just finished dropping all the leaflets. Has anyone come in with news about Appa?
character_words: I just finished dropping all the leaflets. Has anyone come in with news about Appa?

full_text: It's only been a day. Just be patient. [Aang sits.]
character_words: It's only been a day. Just be patient.

full_text: Wow, you're right! Patience really pays off! [Opens the door.] Joo Dee?
character_words: Wow, you're right! Patience really pays off!  Joo Dee?

full_text: Hello, Aang, and Katara, and Sokka, and Toph.
character_words: Hello, Aang, and Katara, and Sokka, and Toph.

full_text: [They approach as Joo Dee enters.] What happened to you? Did the Dai Li throw you in jail?
character_words: What happened to you? Did the Dai Li throw you in jail?

full_text: What? Jail? Of course not. The Dai Li are the protectors of our cultural heritage.
character_words: What? Jail? Of course not. The Dai Li are the protectors of our cultural heritage.

full_text: But you disappeared at the Earth King's party.
character_words: But you disappeared at the Earth King's party.

full_text: Oh, I simply took a short vacation to Lake Laogai, out in the country. It was quite relaxing.
character_words: Oh, I simply took a short vacation to Lake Laogai, out in the country. It was quite relaxing.

full_text: But then they replaced you with some other woman who also said her name was Joo Dee.
character_words: But then they replaced you with some other woman who also said her name was Joo Dee.

full_text: [Surprised.] I'm Joo Dee.
character_words: I'm Joo Dee.

full_text: Why are you here?
character_words: Why are you here?

full_text: Dropping fliers and putting up posters isn't permitted within the city. Not without proper clearance.
character_words: Dropping fliers and putting up posters isn't permitted within the city. Not without proper clearance.

full_text: We can't wait around to get permission for everything.
character_words: We can't wait around to get permission for everything.

full_text: You are absolutely forbidden by the rules of the city to continue putting up posters.
character_words: You are absolutely forbidden by the rules of the city to continue putting up posters.

full_text: [Angrily yelling; during this brief argument, Aang is shown as a chibi.] We don't care about the rules and we're not asking permission! We're finding Appa on our own and you should just stay out of our way! [Slams the door as she exits.]
character_words: We don't care about the rules and we're not asking permission! We're finding Appa on our own and you should just stay out of our way!

full_text: That might come back to bite us in the blubber.
character_words: That might come back to bite us in the blubber.

full_text: [Calming down.] I don't care! From now on, we do whatever it takes to find Appa!
character_words: I don't care! From now on, we do whatever it takes to find Appa!

full_text: Yeah, let's break some rules! [Takes out a side of the house with earthbending.]
character_words: Yeah, let's break some rules!

full_text: I'm very disappointed in your work with the Avatar and his friends, Joo Dee. I had hoped that you would be able to control this situation.
character_words: I'm very disappointed in your work with the Avatar and his friends, Joo Dee. I had hoped that you would be able to control this situation.

full_text: I am so sorry, but they don't trust me anymore. [Starts getting upset.] I don't think I can keep working like this! [Begins to sob.]
character_words: I am so sorry, but they don't trust me anymore.  I don't think I can keep working like this!

full_text: Joo Dee, the Earth King has invited you to Lake Laogai.
character_words: Joo Dee, the Earth King has invited you to Lake Laogai.

full_text: [Camera zooms toward her eye as its iris dilates.] I am honored to accept his invitation.
character_words: I am honored to accept his invitation.

full_text: [Nods.] Good. Now go await further orders. [Joo Dee nods and begins to exit. Long Feng gets up and moves to the fireplace.] If the Avatar keeps searching for his bison, it could upset the delicate balance we've worked so hard to achieve in this city. It could even cost us control of the Earth King.
character_words: Good. Now go await further orders.  If the Avatar keeps searching for his bison, it could upset the delicate balance we've worked so hard to achieve in this city. It could even cost us control of the Earth King.

full_text: Should we take care of him?
character_words: Should we take care of him?

full_text: No. It's much too dangerous for us to confront him directly. Let's see if we can still handle this quietly.
character_words: No. It's much too dangerous for us to confront him directly. Let's see if we can still handle this quietly.

full_text: So, I was thinking about names for my new tea shop. How about the Jasmine Dragon? It's dramatic, poetic, has a nice ring to it.
character_words: So, I was thinking about names for my new tea shop. How about the Jasmine Dragon? It's dramatic, poetic, has a nice ring to it.

full_text: [Shows Iroh the flyer.] The Avatar is here in Ba Sing Se and he's lost his bison.
character_words: The Avatar is here in Ba Sing Se and he's lost his bison.

full_text: [Grabs the flyer.] We have a chance for a new life here. [Cut to Zuko looking out a window.] If you start stirring up trouble, we could lose all the good things that are happening for us.
character_words: We have a chance for a new life here.  If you start stirring up trouble, we could lose all the good things that are happening for us.

full_text: [Turns to Iroh.] Good things that are happening for you! Have you ever thought that I want more from life than a nice apartment and a job serving tea?
character_words: Good things that are happening for you! Have you ever thought that I want more from life than a nice apartment and a job serving tea?

full_text: There is nothing wrong with a life of peace and prosperity. I suggest you think about what it is that you want from your life and why.
character_words: There is nothing wrong with a life of peace and prosperity. I suggest you think about what it is that you want from your life and why.

full_text: I want my destiny.
character_words: I want my destiny.

full_text: What that means is up to you. [Zuko walks away.] The Tea Weevil! No, that's stupid.
character_words: What that means is up to you.  The Tea Weevil! No, that's stupid.

full_text: We'll split up to cover more area. Toph, I guess you should just come with me.
character_words: We'll split up to cover more area. Toph, I guess you should just come with me.

full_text: [Peevishly.] Why? Because you think I can't put up posters on my own?! [Angrily takes the paintbrush of glue from Sokka and throws glue on the wall. She puts up a poster, but it is backward.] It's upside-down, isn't it? I'll just go with Sokka.
character_words: Why? Because you think I can't put up posters on my own?!  It's upside-down, isn't it? I'll just go with Sokka.

full_text: Katara?
character_words: Katara?

full_text: [Walks closer. Smiling confidently.] I think I can help you. [Katara's shocked blush transforms into a look of pure outrage. With a sweep of her arms, she bends up water from a lake directly at him while screaming in rage. Jet looks at the wave in fright.] Katara, I've changed!
character_words: I think I can help you.  Katara, I've changed!

full_text: [Bending up remaining water from the wave.] Tell it to some other girl, Jet! [Turns the water to ice, which sends Jet back to a wall.]
character_words: Tell it to some other girl, Jet!

full_text: [Blocks the ice with his swords.] I don't want to fight you, I'm here to help!
character_words: I don't want to fight you, I'm here to help!

full_text: Katara, what is it?
character_words: Katara, what is it?

full_text: Jet's back. [Close-up of Jet's face. Cut to aerial view before switching to a closer view of the group.] We can't trust anything Jet says.
character_words: Jet's back.  We can't trust anything Jet says.

full_text: But we don't even know why he's here!
character_words: But we don't even know why he's here!

full_text: I don't care why he's here, whatever the reason is, it can't be good!
character_words: I don't care why he's here, whatever the reason is, it can't be good!

full_text: I'm here to help you find Appa! [Opens his hand and reveals he is holding a missing Appa poster.]
character_words: I'm here to help you find Appa!

full_text: [Turning from the leaflet back to Katara.] Katara, we have to give him a chance.
character_words: Katara, we have to give him a chance.

full_text: I swear, I've changed! I was a troubled person and I let my anger get out of control, but I don't even have the gang now! I've put all that behind me!
character_words: I swear, I've changed! I was a troubled person and I let my anger get out of control, but I don't even have the gang now! I've put all that behind me!

full_text: You're lying!
character_words: You're lying!

full_text: [Walks up to Jet and feels the wall he is pinned to.] He's not lying.
character_words: He's not lying.

full_text: How can you tell?
character_words: How can you tell?

full_text: I can feel his breathing and heartbeat. When people lie, there's a physical reaction. He's telling the truth.
character_words: I can feel his breathing and heartbeat. When people lie, there's a physical reaction. He's telling the truth.

full_text: Katara, we don't have any leads. If Jet says he can take us to Appa, we have to check it out.
character_words: Katara, we don't have any leads. If Jet says he can take us to Appa, we have to check it out.

full_text: All right. [Points and looks angrily at Jet.] But we're not letting you out of our sight.
character_words: All right.  But we're not letting you out of our sight.

full_text: This is the place I heard about.
character_words: This is the place I heard about.

full_text: There's nothing here.
character_words: There's nothing here.

full_text: [Preparing to waterbend in defense.] If this is a trap
character_words: If this is a trap

full_text: I told you, I work nearby! Two guys were talking about some giant furry creature they had, I figured it must be Appa!
character_words: I told you, I work nearby! Two guys were talking about some giant furry creature they had, I figured it must be Appa!

full_text: He was here! [She shows them a clump of Appa's fur.]
character_words: He was here!

full_text: [Sadly.] We missed him. [An old white haired man with a push-broom crosses behind the slumping Aang.]
character_words: We missed him.

full_text: They took that big thing yesterday. [Aang straightens with a shocked look.] Shipped him out to some island. About time, I've been cleaning up fur, and various, uhhh ... leavings all day.
character_words: They took that big thing yesterday.  Shipped him out to some island. About time, I've been cleaning up fur, and various, uhhh ... leavings all day.

full_text: [Aang swiftly moves closer to the man.] What island? Where's Appa?
character_words: What island? Where's Appa?

full_text: Foreman said some rich royal type on Whaletail Island bought him up. Guess for a zoo or such. Though, could be the meat that'd be good.
character_words: Foreman said some rich royal type on Whaletail Island bought him up. Guess for a zoo or such. Though, could be the meat that'd be good.

full_text: We've got to get to Whaletail Island! [Pauses.] Where's Whaletail Island? [Dejectedly.]
character_words: We've got to get to Whaletail Island!  Where's Whaletail Island?

full_text: [Looking at map.] Far, very far. [Puts the map on the ground as they all gather round.] Here it is. It's near the South Pole, almost all the way back home.
character_words: Far, very far.  Here it is. It's near the South Pole, almost all the way back home.

full_text: Aang, it will take us weeks just to get to the tip of the Earth Kingdom. And then we'll need to find a boat to get to the island.
character_words: Aang, it will take us weeks just to get to the tip of the Earth Kingdom. And then we'll need to find a boat to get to the island.

full_text: I don't care. We have a chance to find Appa! We have to try!
character_words: I don't care. We have a chance to find Appa! We have to try!

full_text: Must be nice to visit an island. I haven't had a vacation for years.
character_words: Must be nice to visit an island. I haven't had a vacation for years.

full_text: Don't you have some more hair to clean up?
character_words: Don't you have some more hair to clean up?

full_text: Shuffle on, I get you. No more need for Old Sweepy ...
character_words: Shuffle on, I get you. No more need for Old Sweepy ...

full_text: You're right Aang, right now our first concern has to be finding Appa. We can come back when we have him.
character_words: You're right Aang, right now our first concern has to be finding Appa. We can come back when we have him.

full_text: All right, let's get moving.
character_words: All right, let's get moving.

full_text: I'll come with you.
character_words: I'll come with you.

full_text: We don't need your help!
character_words: We don't need your help!

full_text: Why won't you trust me? [Walks after Sokka and Aang.]
character_words: Why won't you trust me?

full_text: Gee, I wonder.
character_words: Gee, I wonder.

full_text: [After Jet walks away.] Was this guy your boyfriend or something?
character_words: Was this guy your boyfriend or something?

full_text: What ... no!
character_words: What ... no!

full_text: [Smiles.] I can tell you're lying ... [Katara runs away from her.]
character_words: I can tell you're lying ...

full_text: We can take the train out to the wall but then we'll have to walk.
character_words: We can take the train out to the wall but then we'll have to walk.

full_text: Don't worry, on the way back we'll be flying!
character_words: Don't worry, on the way back we'll be flying!

full_text: We're finally leaving Ba Sing Se. [Spreads her arms outward in celebration.] Worst ... city ... ever!
character_words: We're finally leaving Ba Sing Se.  Worst ... city ... ever!

full_text: [Surprised.] Jet!
character_words: Jet!

full_text: [Looks at Jet angrily.] I thought you said you didn't have your "gang" anymore!
character_words: I thought you said you didn't have your "gang" anymore!

full_text: [Turns to look at Smellerbee, confused.] I don't!
character_words: I don't!

full_text: [Runs up to Jet and hugs him.] We were so worried. How did you get away from the Dai Li? [Camera quickly zooms in to Katara's shocked face.]
character_words: We were so worried. How did you get away from the Dai Li?

full_text: [Shocked.] The Dai Li?!
character_words: The Dai Li?!

full_text: I don't know what she's talking about!
character_words: I don't know what she's talking about!

full_text: He got arrested by the Dai Li a couple of weeks ago. We saw them drag him away!
character_words: He got arrested by the Dai Li a couple of weeks ago. We saw them drag him away!

full_text: Why would I be arrested? I've been living peacefully in the city!
character_words: Why would I be arrested? I've been living peacefully in the city!

full_text: [Feeling the ground between Jet and Smellerbee.] This doesn't make any sense. They're both telling the truth.
character_words: This doesn't make any sense. They're both telling the truth.

full_text: That's impossible.
character_words: That's impossible.

full_text: No it's not! Toph can't tell who's lying because they both think they're telling the truth. Jet's been brainwashed!
character_words: No it's not! Toph can't tell who's lying because they both think they're telling the truth. Jet's been brainwashed!

full_text: That's crazy! It can't be! [Glances to the sides.] Stay away from me!
character_words: That's crazy! It can't be!  Stay away from me!

full_text: Out of my way, skinny!
character_words: Out of my way, skinny!

full_text: Huh?
character_words: Huh?

full_text: If you don't want to end up like him, you'll do what I say.
character_words: If you don't want to end up like him, you'll do what I say.

full_text: The Dai Li must have sent Jet to mislead us, and that janitor was part of their plot, too!
character_words: The Dai Li must have sent Jet to mislead us, and that janitor was part of their plot, too!

full_text: I bet they have Appa here in the city. Maybe he's in the same place they took Jet! Where did they take you?
character_words: I bet they have Appa here in the city. Maybe he's in the same place they took Jet! Where did they take you?

full_text: Nowhere! I- I don't know what you're talking about!
character_words: Nowhere! I- I don't know what you're talking about!

full_text: We need to find a way to jog his real memories.
character_words: We need to find a way to jog his real memories.

full_text: [Teasingly.] Maybe Katara should kiss him. That should bring something back!
character_words: Maybe Katara should kiss him. That should bring something back!

full_text: Maybe you should kiss him, Sokka!
character_words: Maybe you should kiss him, Sokka!

full_text: Hey, just an idea!
character_words: Hey, just an idea!

full_text: A bad one.
character_words: A bad one.

full_text: Ooh, wait! I've got it!
character_words: Ooh, wait! I've got it!

full_text: I don't think it's working. [Spits it out.]
character_words: I don't think it's working.

full_text: Try to think of something from your past that triggers your emotions.
character_words: Try to think of something from your past that triggers your emotions.

full_text: The Fire Nation! Remember what they did to your family!
character_words: The Fire Nation! Remember what they did to your family!

full_text: Close your eyes. Picture it.
character_words: Close your eyes. Picture it.

full_text: [Sweating.] No! It's too painful!
character_words: No! It's too painful!

full_text: Maybe this will help. [Takes water and puts it around his ears, using healing to clear his mind.]
character_words: Maybe this will help.

full_text: They took me to a headquarters under the water. Like a lake!
character_words: They took me to a headquarters under the water. Like a lake!

full_text: Wait! Remember what Joo Dee said? She said she went on vacation to Lake Laogai!
character_words: Wait! Remember what Joo Dee said? She said she went on vacation to Lake Laogai!

full_text: [Stands up.] That's it! Lake Laogai.
character_words: That's it! Lake Laogai.

full_text: So where's this secret headquarters?
character_words: So where's this secret headquarters?

full_text: Under the water, I think.
character_words: Under the water, I think.

full_text: There's a tunnel right there by the shore.
character_words: There's a tunnel right there by the shore.

full_text: It's all starting to come back to me!
character_words: It's all starting to come back to me!

full_text: I'm Joo Dee. Welcome to Ba Sing Se.
character_words: I'm Joo Dee. Welcome to Ba Sing Se.

full_text: I'm Joo Dee. Welcome to Ba Sing Se.
character_words: I'm Joo Dee. Welcome to Ba Sing Se.

full_text: We're so lucky to have our walls to create order.
character_words: We're so lucky to have our walls to create order.

full_text: We're so lucky to have our walls to create order.
character_words: We're so lucky to have our walls to create order.

full_text: I think there might be a cell big enough to hold Appa up ahead. I think it's through here! [Opens a door.]
character_words: I think there might be a cell big enough to hold Appa up ahead. I think it's through here!

full_text: Expecting someone else?
character_words: Expecting someone else?

full_text: Now that's something different.
character_words: Now that's something different.

full_text: You have made yourselves enemies of the state. Take them into custody.
character_words: You have made yourselves enemies of the state. Take them into custody.

full_text: [Knocks away two agents with airbending.] Long Feng is escaping!
character_words: Long Feng is escaping!

full_text: All right, Avatar, you've caused me enough problems. This is your last chance ... if you want your bison back.
character_words: All right, Avatar, you've caused me enough problems. This is your last chance ... if you want your bison back.

full_text: You do have Appa! Tell me where he is!
character_words: You do have Appa! Tell me where he is!

full_text: Agree to exit the city now, and I'll waive all charges against you and allow you to leave with your lost pet.
character_words: Agree to exit the city now, and I'll waive all charges against you and allow you to leave with your lost pet.

full_text: [Gets in a fighting position.] You're in no position to bargain.
character_words: You're in no position to bargain.

full_text: Am I not?
character_words: Am I not?

full_text: [Gets into a fighting position.] You're definitely not!
character_words: You're definitely not!

full_text: Jet, the Earth King has invited you to Lake Laogai.
character_words: Jet, the Earth King has invited you to Lake Laogai.

full_text: [Close-up of his eye, his iris dilates.] I am honored to accept his invitation.
