character_words: I am honored to accept his invitation.

full_text: You're mine now.
character_words: You're mine now.

full_text: Uncle?
character_words: Uncle?

full_text: So, the Blue Spirit. I wonder who could be behind that mask ...
character_words: So, the Blue Spirit. I wonder who could be behind that mask ...

full_text: [Sighs and takes off the mask.] What are you doing here?
character_words: What are you doing here?

full_text: I was just about to ask you the same thing. What do you plan to do now that you've found the Avatar's bison? Keep him locked in our new apartment? Should I go put on a pot of tea for him?
character_words: I was just about to ask you the same thing. What do you plan to do now that you've found the Avatar's bison? Keep him locked in our new apartment? Should I go put on a pot of tea for him?

full_text: First I have to get it out of here.
character_words: First I have to get it out of here.

full_text: [Starts yelling.] And then what!? You never think these things through! [Points at him.] This is exactly what happened when you captured the Avatar at the North Pole! You had him, and then you had nowhere to go!
character_words: And then what!? You never think these things through!  This is exactly what happened when you captured the Avatar at the North Pole! You had him, and then you had nowhere to go!

full_text: I would have figured something out!
character_words: I would have figured something out!

full_text: No! If his friends hadn't found you, you would have frozen to death!
character_words: No! If his friends hadn't found you, you would have frozen to death!

full_text: I know my own destiny, Uncle!
character_words: I know my own destiny, Uncle!

full_text: Is it your own destiny, or is it a destiny someone else has tried to force on you?
character_words: Is it your own destiny, or is it a destiny someone else has tried to force on you?

full_text: Stop it, Uncle! I have to do this!
character_words: Stop it, Uncle! I have to do this!

full_text: I'm begging you, Prince Zuko! It's time for you to look inward and begin asking yourself the big questions. Who are you, and what do you want?
character_words: I'm begging you, Prince Zuko! It's time for you to look inward and begin asking yourself the big questions. Who are you, and what do you want?

full_text: Jet, it's me, Aang! [Runs back.] You don't have to do this!
character_words: Jet, it's me, Aang!  You don't have to do this!

full_text: I'm afraid he no longer has a choice.
character_words: I'm afraid he no longer has a choice.

full_text: Jet, I'm your friend! Look inside your heart!
character_words: Jet, I'm your friend! Look inside your heart!

full_text: Do your duty, Jet!
character_words: Do your duty, Jet!

full_text: He can't make you do this! [Cut to a close-up of Jet's face as he hangs his head, while panting and sweating.] You're a Freedom Fighter!
character_words: He can't make you do this!  You're a Freedom Fighter!

full_text: Do it! Do it now!
character_words: Do it! Do it now!

full_text: [Escaping upward to a pipe.] Foolish boy. You've chosen your own demise. [Exits.]
character_words: Foolish boy. You've chosen your own demise.

full_text: I'm sorry ... Aang.
character_words: I'm sorry ... Aang.

full_text: Don't be.
character_words: Don't be.

full_text: This isn't good.
character_words: This isn't good.

full_text: You guys go and find Appa. We'll take care of Jet.
character_words: You guys go and find Appa. We'll take care of Jet.

full_text: We're not going to leave you.
character_words: We're not going to leave you.

full_text: There's no time. Just go. We'll take care of him. He's our leader.
character_words: There's no time. Just go. We'll take care of him. He's our leader.

full_text: Don't worry, Katara. I'll be fine. [Smiles a little.]
character_words: Don't worry, Katara. I'll be fine.

full_text: [Whispering to Sokka.] He's lying ...
character_words: He's lying ...

full_text: Appa's gone! Long Feng beat us here.
character_words: Appa's gone! Long Feng beat us here.

full_text: If we keep moving, maybe we can catch up with them!
character_words: If we keep moving, maybe we can catch up with them!

full_text: You think we can outrun them?
character_words: You think we can outrun them?

full_text: I don't think it's gonna matter!
character_words: I don't think it's gonna matter!

full_text: What is it, Momo?
character_words: What is it, Momo?

full_text: Appa!
character_words: Appa!

full_text: I can handle you by myself.
character_words: I can handle you by myself.

full_text: Yeah! Appa!
character_words: Yeah! Appa!

full_text: [Happily crying.] I missed you, buddy.
character_words: I missed you, buddy.

full_text: You did the right thing, nephew. [Zuko looks at his Blue Spirit mask as Iroh rests a hand on its shoulder.] Leave it behind.
character_words: You did the right thing, nephew.  Leave it behind.

full_text: I missed you more than you'll ever know, buddy. [Momo flies into Appa to hug him too. Appa licks Aang, which causes Aang to laugh.]
character_words: I missed you more than you'll ever know, buddy.

full_text: Look, we escaped from the Dai Li. We got Appa back. I'm telling you, we should go to the Earth King now and tell him our plan. We're on a roll.
character_words: Look, we escaped from the Dai Li. We got Appa back. I'm telling you, we should go to the Earth King now and tell him our plan. We're on a roll.

full_text: One good hour after weeks of trouble isn't much of a roll.
character_words: One good hour after weeks of trouble isn't much of a roll.

full_text: We can build on it. If we want to invade the Fire Nation when the eclipse happens, we'll need the Earth King's support.
character_words: We can build on it. If we want to invade the Fire Nation when the eclipse happens, we'll need the Earth King's support.

full_text: What makes you think we'll get it? I don't know if you've noticed, but things don't usually go that smoothly for our little gang.
character_words: What makes you think we'll get it? I don't know if you've noticed, but things don't usually go that smoothly for our little gang.

full_text: I know, but I've got a good feeling about this. This time will be different.
character_words: I know, but I've got a good feeling about this. This time will be different.

full_text: Sokka, Long Feng is in control of the city. His conspiracy with the Dai Li is too powerful. I think we should just keep flying and leave this horrible place behind us.
character_words: Sokka, Long Feng is in control of the city. His conspiracy with the Dai Li is too powerful. I think we should just keep flying and leave this horrible place behind us.

full_text: I'm with Sweetness. I've seen enough of Ba Sing Se. [Raises arms and opens eyes wide.] And I can't even see!
character_words: I'm with Sweetness. I've seen enough of Ba Sing Se.  And I can't even see!

full_text: But now that we have Appa back, there's nothing stopping us from telling the Earth King the truth. About the conspiracy and the War.
character_words: But now that we have Appa back, there's nothing stopping us from telling the Earth King the truth. About the conspiracy and the War.

full_text: See? Aang's with me. [Puts his arm around Aang and smiles.] It's the whole reason we came here in the first place. We have to try.
character_words: See? Aang's with me.  It's the whole reason we came here in the first place. We have to try.

full_text: [Thinks for a moment.] Well, I guess if the Earth King knew the truth, things could change. [Sokka and Aang smile.]
character_words: Well, I guess if the Earth King knew the truth, things could change.

full_text: [Stands up.] I don't trust the new positive Sokka. [Points at Sokka in an accusing manner.] Long Feng brainwashed you, didn't he!?
character_words: I don't trust the new positive Sokka.  Long Feng brainwashed you, didn't he!?

full_text: That's probably the Dai Li searching for us. [To Katara.] So?
character_words: That's probably the Dai Li searching for us.  So?

full_text: [Determined.] Let's fly!
character_words: Let's fly!

full_text: Can we please buy a new saddle? Riding bareback is terrifying! [Buries face in Appa's back.]
character_words: Can we please buy a new saddle? Riding bareback is terrifying!

full_text: There it is! That whole thing is the palace! The Earth King's chamber should be in the center!
character_words: There it is! That whole thing is the palace! The Earth King's chamber should be in the center!

full_text: We have to be careful. Long Feng's probably warned the king that we're coming.
character_words: We have to be careful. Long Feng's probably warned the king that we're coming.

full_text: Why would you assume that? If you ask me, I think we're just gonna sail right in and- [A giant rock almost hits them.] Aahh!
character_words: Why would you assume that? If you ask me, I think we're just gonna sail right in and-  Aahh!

full_text: What was that?
character_words: What was that?

full_text: Surface-to-air rocks! [Sees more being launched.] More incoming!
character_words: Surface-to-air rocks!  More incoming!

full_text: [Water whips two guards.] Sorry!
character_words: Sorry!

full_text: Sorry! We just need to get through to see the Earth King!
character_words: Sorry! We just need to get through to see the Earth King!

full_text: Seriously, we're actually on your guys' side! [Pauses for a moment.] Sorry.
character_words: Seriously, we're actually on your guys' side!  Sorry.

full_text: In there! [They enter the palace.]
character_words: In there!

full_text: Toph, which way to the Earth King?
character_words: Toph, which way to the Earth King?

full_text: How should I know? I'm still voting we leave Ba Sing Se.
character_words: How should I know? I'm still voting we leave Ba Sing Se.

full_text: Burglar! [Tries to run, trips, and falls flat on her face.]
character_words: Burglar!

full_text: [Shuts the door.] Sorry. Wrong door.
character_words: Sorry. Wrong door.

full_text: You did the right thing. Letting the Avatar's bison go free.
character_words: You did the right thing. Letting the Avatar's bison go free.

full_text: I don't feel right. [Gets dizzy and passes out.]
character_words: I don't feel right.

full_text: Zuko! [Rushes to him.]
character_words: Zuko!

full_text: Now that's an impressive door. It's gotta go somewhere. [Drops down from the rubble and attempts to kick the door open.] Yaaah! [The door does not move even slightly. Sokka starts trying to push it open, but to no avail. Toph and Aang jump in from behind and bust the door down, knocking Sokka forward in the process. He starts rubbing the back of his head.] A little warning next time?
character_words: Now that's an impressive door. It's gotta go somewhere.  Yaaah!  A little warning next time?

full_text: We need to talk to you.
character_words: We need to talk to you.

full_text: [Turns to face the Earth King.] They're here to overthrow you.
character_words: They're here to overthrow you.

full_text: No, we're on your side. We're here to help.
character_words: No, we're on your side. We're here to help.

full_text: You have to trust us.
character_words: You have to trust us.

full_text: [Stands up with a rising aggravated tone.] You invade my palace, lay waste to all my guards, break down my fancy door, and you expect me to trust you?
character_words: You invade my palace, lay waste to all my guards, break down my fancy door, and you expect me to trust you?

full_text: He has a good point.
character_words: He has a good point.

full_text: If you are on my side, then drop your weapons and stand down!
character_words: If you are on my side, then drop your weapons and stand down!

full_text: [Smiles.] See? We're friends, Your Earthiness. [Gives a slight nervous chuckle.]
character_words: See? We're friends, Your Earthiness.

full_text: [Smiles sinisterly.] Detain the assailants!
character_words: Detain the assailants!

full_text: But we dropped our weapons. We're your allies.
character_words: But we dropped our weapons. We're your allies.

full_text: Make sure the Avatar and his friends never see daylight again. [The king looks at him shocked.]
character_words: Make sure the Avatar and his friends never see daylight again.

full_text: The Avatar? [Points at Sokka.] You're the Avatar?
character_words: The Avatar?  You're the Avatar?

full_text: Uh, no. Him. [Nudges his head at Aang.]
character_words: Uh, no. Him.

full_text: [Effortlessly breaks free of his earth cuffs and raises his arms.] Over here. [Re-attaches the cuffs.]
character_words: Over here.

full_text: What does it matter, Your Highness? They're enemies of the state.
character_words: What does it matter, Your Highness? They're enemies of the state.

full_text: Perhaps you're right. [Sees Bosco sniff and lick Aang, who laughs, and smiles at Long Feng.] Though Bosco seems to like him. [Looks back at the team.] I'll hear what he has to say. [Long Feng glares at Aang.]
character_words: Perhaps you're right.  Though Bosco seems to like him.  I'll hear what he has to say.

full_text: [Walks forward.] Well, sir, there's a war going on right now. For the past one hundred years in fact. The Dai Li's kept it secret from you. It's a conspiracy to control the city, and to control you.
character_words: Well, sir, there's a war going on right now. For the past one hundred years in fact. The Dai Li's kept it secret from you. It's a conspiracy to control the city, and to control you.

full_text: A secret war? That's crazy!
character_words: A secret war? That's crazy!

full_text: Completely!
character_words: Completely!

full_text: Long Feng didn't want us to tell you, so he stole our sky bison to blackmail us. And blackmail is the least of his crimes; he brainwashed our friend!
character_words: Long Feng didn't want us to tell you, so he stole our sky bison to blackmail us. And blackmail is the least of his crimes; he brainwashed our friend!

full_text: [Quickly turns to face the king.] All lies. I've never even seen a sky bison, Your Majesty. Frankly, I thought they were extinct.
character_words: All lies. I've never even seen a sky bison, Your Majesty. Frankly, I thought they were extinct.

full_text: [Sits down.] Your claim is difficult to believe. Even from an Avatar.
character_words: Your claim is difficult to believe. Even from an Avatar.

full_text: [Whispers in his ear.] These hooligans are part of an anarchist cell that my agents have been tracking for weeks. If you listen to them, you're playing right into your own destruction.
character_words: These hooligans are part of an anarchist cell that my agents have been tracking for weeks. If you listen to them, you're playing right into your own destruction.

full_text: [Thinks for a moment.] I have to trust my advisor.
character_words: I have to trust my advisor.

full_text: Wait! [Turns to face the king with a big smile.] I can prove he's lying. Long Feng said he's never seen a sky bison. Ask him to lift his robe.
character_words: Wait!  I can prove he's lying. Long Feng said he's never seen a sky bison. Ask him to lift his robe.

full_text: What? I am not disrobing! [The king looks thoughtful before looking at Sokka suspiciously.]
character_words: What? I am not disrobing!

full_text: Right there! Appa bit him!
character_words: Right there! Appa bit him!

full_text: Never met a sky bison, huh?
character_words: Never met a sky bison, huh?

full_text: [Lowers his robe.] That happens to be a large birth mark. [Sarcastically.] Thanks for showing everyone.
character_words: That happens to be a large birth mark.  Thanks for showing everyone.

full_text: Well I suppose there's no way to prove where those marks came from.
character_words: Well I suppose there's no way to prove where those marks came from.

full_text: Of course there is!
character_words: Of course there is!

full_text: Yup. That pretty much proves it. [Team Avatar cheers.] But it doesn't prove this crazy conspiracy theory. [Team Avatar becomes downcast.] Though, I suppose this matter's worth looking into. [Team Avatar look at each other approvingly, while Long Feng glares at the king before walking away with his agents.]
character_words: Yup. That pretty much proves it.  But it doesn't prove this crazy conspiracy theory.  Though, I suppose this matter's worth looking into.

full_text: You're burning up. [Dips a cloth in water.] You have an intense fever. [Places the cloth on Zuko's forehead.] This will help cool you down.
character_words: You're burning up.  You have an intense fever.  This will help cool you down.

full_text: So thirsty. [Sits up, but Iroh makes him lie back down.]
character_words: So thirsty.

full_text: [Grabs a bucket with a spoon in it; takes out the spoon.] Here's some clean water to drink. [Sits him up slightly.] Stay under the blankets and sweat this out.
character_words: Here's some clean water to drink.  Stay under the blankets and sweat this out.

full_text: [Feeling strange from exposition.] So this is what a train is like? I didn't realize it would be this ... public.
character_words: So this is what a train is like? I didn't realize it would be this ... public.

full_text: So you've never been outside the Upper Ring before?
character_words: So you've never been outside the Upper Ring before?

full_text: I've never been outside the palace. [Katara and Sokka look at each other; the Earth King looks outside and sees Aang flying on Appa.] Now that's the way to travel. [Looks at Katara and Sokka.] So, may I ask where we're going?
character_words: I've never been outside the palace.  Now that's the way to travel.  So, may I ask where we're going?

full_text: Underneath Lake Laogai, Your Kingliness. To the Dai Li's secret headquarters. You're about to see where all the brainwashing and conspiring took place.
character_words: Underneath Lake Laogai, Your Kingliness. To the Dai Li's secret headquarters. You're about to see where all the brainwashing and conspiring took place.

full_text: It's gone!
character_words: It's gone!

full_text: Oh don't tell me-! [Gives a thumbs up and a fake smile.] That's okay. Still got my positive attitude.
character_words: Oh don't tell me-!  That's okay. Still got my positive attitude.

full_text: The Dai Li must've known we were coming and destroyed the evidence!
character_words: The Dai Li must've known we were coming and destroyed the evidence!

full_text: [Looks suspicious.] Hm ... [Sarcastically.] That seems awfully convenient.
character_words: Hm ...  That seems awfully convenient.

full_text: Hey, if anything, this proves the conspiracy exists even more.
character_words: Hey, if anything, this proves the conspiracy exists even more.

full_text: Long Feng was right. This was a waste of time. [Turns to leave.] If you'll excuse me, I'm going back to the palace.
character_words: Long Feng was right. This was a waste of time.  If you'll excuse me, I'm going back to the palace.

full_text: [Smiles with realization.] The wall. They'll never be able to cover that up in time.
character_words: The wall. They'll never be able to cover that up in time.

full_text: Oh, yeah. [Hops to in front of the king.] If you come with us to the Outer Wall, we can prove to you that the secret war is real.
character_words: Oh, yeah.  If you come with us to the Outer Wall, we can prove to you that the secret war is real.

full_text: No Earth King has ever been to the Outer Wall. [Walks past Aang.] I don't have any more time for this nonsense. [Aang looks depressed.]
character_words: No Earth King has ever been to the Outer Wall.  I don't have any more time for this nonsense.

full_text: [Runs up to them.] If you come with us, this time you can ride on Appa. [The Earth King stops as Appa lows in the background. A pleased smile grows on his face.]
character_words: If you come with us, this time you can ride on Appa.

full_text: First time flying?
character_words: First time flying?

full_text: It's both thrilling and terrifying!
character_words: It's both thrilling and terrifying!

full_text: Yeah. I hate it too.
character_words: Yeah. I hate it too.

full_text: I have to be honest with you: part of me really hopes that what you're telling me about this war isn't true.
character_words: I have to be honest with you: part of me really hopes that what you're telling me about this war isn't true.

full_text: I wish it wasn't.
character_words: I wish it wasn't.

full_text: [In Azula's voice.] It's getting late. Are you planning to retire soon, my lord?
character_words: It's getting late. Are you planning to retire soon, my lord?

full_text: I'm not tired.
character_words: I'm not tired.

full_text: [Into Zuko's ear.] Relax, Fire Lord Zuko. Just let go. Give in to it. Shut your eyes for a while.
character_words: Relax, Fire Lord Zuko. Just let go. Give in to it. Shut your eyes for a while.

full_text: [In Iroh's voice.] No, Fire Lord Zuko! Do not listen to the blue dragon. You should get out of here right now. Go! Before it's too late! [Both dragons are poised to either side of Zuko.]
character_words: No, Fire Lord Zuko! Do not listen to the blue dragon. You should get out of here right now. Go! Before it's too late!

full_text: Sleep now, Fire Lord Zuko.
character_words: Sleep now, Fire Lord Zuko.

full_text: Sleep. [Voice grows louder and more hostile as it continues talking.]Just like mother!
character_words: Sleep. Just like mother!

full_text: Zuko! Help me! [A distraught Zuko is seen in her eyes.]
character_words: Zuko! Help me!

full_text: [Points at the drill.] It's still there!
character_words: It's still there!

full_text: [Shocked.] What is that?
character_words: What is that?

full_text: It's a drill. A giant drill [Cut to the drill.] made by the Fire Nation to break through your walls. [Cut to a close-up of the king who looks horrified.]
character_words: It's a drill. A giant drill  made by the Fire Nation to break through your walls.

full_text: I can't believe I never knew. [He looks to his right as Kuei hears something.]
character_words: I can't believe I never knew.

full_text: [Appears on an earth elevator with two Dai Li agents.] I can explain this, Your Majesty. [Walks toward the king.] This is nothing more than ... a construction project. [Gestures his hand to the drill.]
character_words: I can explain this, Your Majesty.  This is nothing more than ... a construction project.

full_text: [Sarcastically.] Really? Then perhaps you could explain why there's a [Points to the drill as Kuei follows to where she is pointing. Cut to the Fire Nation insignia clearly shown on the drill.] Fire Nation insignia on your "construction project".
character_words: Really? Then perhaps you could explain why there's a  Fire Nation insignia on your "construction project".

full_text: [The king looks at him suspiciously.] Well it's imported of course. You know you can't trust domestic machinery. [Looks at them worried.] Surely you don't believe these children instead of your most loyal attendant?
character_words: Well it's imported of course. You know you can't trust domestic machinery.  Surely you don't believe these children instead of your most loyal attendant?

full_text: [Looks at Team Avatar and Long Feng.] Dai Li! Arrest Long Feng! I want him to stand trial for crimes against the Earth Kingdom.
character_words: Dai Li! Arrest Long Feng! I want him to stand trial for crimes against the Earth Kingdom.

full_text: You can't arrest me! You all need me more than you know! [He is taken away.]
character_words: You can't arrest me! You all need me more than you know!

full_text: [Happily.] Looks like Long Feng is long gone! Ha! Ah, yeah, I've been waiting to use that one. [Katara gives him an unimpressed look.]
character_words: Looks like Long Feng is long gone! Ha! Ah, yeah, I've been waiting to use that one.

full_text: I want to thank you, young heroes, for opening my eyes. All this time, what I thought was a great metropolis was merely a city of fools. And that makes me the king fool. [Buries his face in one of his hands.] We're at war. With the Fire Nation.
character_words: I want to thank you, young heroes, for opening my eyes. All this time, what I thought was a great metropolis was merely a city of fools. And that makes me the king fool.  We're at war. With the Fire Nation.

full_text: That's why we came to Ba Sing Se, Your Highness: Because we think you can help us end the war.
character_words: That's why we came to Ba Sing Se, Your Highness: Because we think you can help us end the war.

full_text: [Momo climbs up Kuei's arm.] We don't have much time. There's a comet coming this summer. Its energy will give the firebenders unbelievable strength. They'll be unstoppable.
character_words: We don't have much time. There's a comet coming this summer. Its energy will give the firebenders unbelievable strength. They'll be unstoppable.

full_text: But there is hope. Before the comet comes, we have a window of opportunity: A solar eclipse is coming. The sun will be completely blocked out by the moon, and the firebenders will be helpless.
character_words: But there is hope. Before the comet comes, we have a window of opportunity: A solar eclipse is coming. The sun will be completely blocked out by the moon, and the firebenders will be helpless.

full_text: What are you suggesting, Sokka?
character_words: What are you suggesting, Sokka?

full_text: That's the day we need to invade the Fire Nation. [Cut to a close-up of the king. Cut back to Sokka.] The Day of Black Sun.
character_words: That's the day we need to invade the Fire Nation.  The Day of Black Sun.

full_text: I don't know. That would require moving troops out of Ba Sing Se. We'd be completely vulnerable.
character_words: I don't know. That would require moving troops out of Ba Sing Se. We'd be completely vulnerable.

full_text: You're already vulnerable. The Fire Nation won't stop until Ba Sing Se falls. You can either sit back and wait for that to happen, or take the offensive and give yourself a fighting chance.
character_words: You're already vulnerable. The Fire Nation won't stop until Ba Sing Se falls. You can either sit back and wait for that to happen, or take the offensive and give yourself a fighting chance.

full_text: [Thinks for a moment as everyone waits anxiously.] Very well. You have my support.
character_words: Very well. You have my support.

full_text: Your Majesty. [Walks up to Team Avatar and bows to the king.] I apologize for the interruption.
character_words: Your Majesty.  I apologize for the interruption.

full_text: [To Team Avatar.] This is General How. He's the leader of the Council of Five, my highest ranking generals.
character_words: This is General How. He's the leader of the Council of Five, my highest ranking generals.

full_text: We searched Long Feng's office. I think we found something that will interest everybody. [Team Avatar look at each other.]
character_words: We searched Long Feng's office. I think we found something that will interest everybody.

full_text: There are secret files on everyone in Ba Sing Se. Including you kids.
character_words: There are secret files on everyone in Ba Sing Se. Including you kids.

full_text: Secret files?
character_words: Secret files?

full_text: [Takes out a scroll and reads the side.] "Toph Beifong." [Hands the scroll to General How, who hands it to Toph, who hands it to Katara.]
character_words: "Toph Beifong."

full_text: [Opens the scroll and reads it.] It's a letter from your mom. Your mom's here in the city. And she wants to see you. [Toph's eyes widen with shock.]
character_words: It's a letter from your mom. Your mom's here in the city. And she wants to see you.

full_text: Long Feng intercepted our letters from home? [Shakes her head.] That's just sad.
character_words: Long Feng intercepted our letters from home?  That's just sad.

full_text: [Takes out another scroll and hands it to Aang.] Aang?
character_words: Aang?

full_text: This scroll was attached to the horn of your bison when the Dai Li captured it.
character_words: This scroll was attached to the horn of your bison when the Dai Li captured it.

full_text: [Opens the scroll and reads it.] It's from the Eastern Air Temple.
character_words: It's from the Eastern Air Temple.

full_text: Is there a letter for me and Sokka by any chance?
character_words: Is there a letter for me and Sokka by any chance?

full_text: [Looks in the box.] I'm afraid not.
character_words: I'm afraid not.

full_text: [He and Katara become downcast.] Oh.
character_words: Oh.

full_text: But there is an intelligence report that might interest you. [Hands a scroll to Katara.]
character_words: But there is an intelligence report that might interest you.

full_text: [Opens the scroll and reads it.] "A small fleet of Water Tribe ships."
character_words: "A small fleet of Water Tribe ships."

full_text: [Shocked. Appears on Katara's side.] What? That could be Dad!
character_words: What? That could be Dad!

full_text: [Reads the report with excitement.] "Protecting the mouth of Chameleon Bay. [Her and Sokka's eyes widen.] Led by Hakoda." [Katara and Sokka turn to each other in excitement.] It is Dad!
character_words: "Protecting the mouth of Chameleon Bay.  Led by Hakoda."  It is Dad!

full_text: You should know that this is not a natural sickness, but that shouldn't stop you from enjoying tea. [Feeds Zuko the tea.]
character_words: You should know that this is not a natural sickness, but that shouldn't stop you from enjoying tea.

full_text: What's happening?
character_words: What's happening?

full_text: Your critical decision. What you did beneath that lake. It was in such conflict with your image of yourself that you are now at war within your own mind and body. [Feeds Zuko more tea.]
character_words: Your critical decision. What you did beneath that lake. It was in such conflict with your image of yourself that you are now at war within your own mind and body.

full_text: What's that mean? [Coughs continuously and lies down.]
character_words: What's that mean?

full_text: You are going through a metamorphosis, my nephew. It will not be a pleasant experience, but when you come out of it, [Takes a cloth and wipes Zuko's head.] you will be the beautiful prince you were always meant to be.
character_words: You are going through a metamorphosis, my nephew. It will not be a pleasant experience, but when you come out of it,  you will be the beautiful prince you were always meant to be.

full_text: I can't believe it. There's a man living at the Eastern Air Temple. He says he's a guru.
character_words: I can't believe it. There's a man living at the Eastern Air Temple. He says he's a guru.

full_text: What's a guru? Some kind of poisonous blow fish?
character_words: What's a guru? Some kind of poisonous blow fish?

full_text: No, a spiritual expert. He wants to help me take the next step in the Avatar journey. He says he can teach me to control the Avatar State.
character_words: No, a spiritual expert. He wants to help me take the next step in the Avatar journey. He says he can teach me to control the Avatar State.

full_text: And I can't believe we know where our dad is now.
character_words: And I can't believe we know where our dad is now.

full_text: I know what you mean. My mom's in the city. And from her letter it sounds like she finally understands me.
character_words: I know what you mean. My mom's in the city. And from her letter it sounds like she finally understands me.

full_text: This is all such big news! Where do we even start?
character_words: This is all such big news! Where do we even start?

full_text: I hate to say it, but we have to split up.
character_words: I hate to say it, but we have to split up.

full_text: [Worriedly.] Split up? We just found Appa and got the family back together! Now you want us to separate?
character_words: Split up? We just found Appa and got the family back together! Now you want us to separate?

full_text: You have to meet this guru, Aang. If we're going to invade the Fire Nation, you need to be ready.
character_words: You have to meet this guru, Aang. If we're going to invade the Fire Nation, you need to be ready.

full_text: Well, if I'm going to the Eastern Air Temple, Appa and I can drop you off at Chameleon Bay to see your dad.
character_words: Well, if I'm going to the Eastern Air Temple, Appa and I can drop you off at Chameleon Bay to see your dad.

full_text: Someone has to stay here with the Earth King and help him plan for the invasion. [Stands up.] I guess that's me.
character_words: Someone has to stay here with the Earth King and help him plan for the invasion.  I guess that's me.

full_text: No, Sokka. I know how badly you wanna help Dad. You go to Chameleon Bay. I'll stay here with the king.
character_words: No, Sokka. I know how badly you wanna help Dad. You go to Chameleon Bay. I'll stay here with the king.

full_text: [Overjoyed with tears welling in his eyes. Stands up and dances happily.] You are the nicest ... sister ... ever! [Throws his arms around Katara and kisses her on the cheek.]
character_words: You are the nicest ... sister ... ever!

full_text: Easy there, big brother ... [Gives a slight chuckle.] Though you're right. I am.
character_words: Easy there, big brother ...  Though you're right. I am.

full_text: Katara? I need to tell you something. [Starts blushing.] I've been wanting to say it for a long time.
character_words: Katara? I need to tell you something.  I've been wanting to say it for a long time.

full_text: What is it, Aang?
character_words: What is it, Aang?

full_text: [Rubs the back of his head.] Katara, I- [He is cut off by Sokka.]
character_words: Katara, I-

full_text: [Throws Aang in a headlock.] All right. Who's ready to get going on our little men-only man trip? [Noogies Aang. Katara looks at him, annoyed.]
character_words: All right. Who's ready to get going on our little men-only man trip?

full_text: Aang and Sokka, [They look at him.] I wish you a good journey. Ba Sing Se owes you its thanks. We look forward to your safe return. [Aang, Katara, and Sokka bow.]
character_words: Aang and Sokka,  I wish you a good journey. Ba Sing Se owes you its thanks. We look forward to your safe return.

full_text: Your Majesty. There are three female warriors to see you. They're from the island of Kyoshi.
character_words: Your Majesty. There are three female warriors to see you. They're from the island of Kyoshi.

full_text: [Shocked.] That's Suki! [Falls off Appa.]
character_words: That's Suki!

full_text: You know these warriors?
character_words: You know these warriors?

full_text: [Gets up.] Oh yeah. The Kyoshi Warriors are a skilled group of fighters. Trustworthy too. They're good friends of ours.
character_words: Oh yeah. The Kyoshi Warriors are a skilled group of fighters. Trustworthy too. They're good friends of ours.

full_text: Then we shall welcome them as honored guests.
character_words: Then we shall welcome them as honored guests.

full_text: [Aang turns to Appa.] Wait. Aang. [Hugs him and kisses him on the cheek, which causes him to blush.]
character_words: Wait. Aang.

full_text: I'm really gonna miss you guys.
character_words: I'm really gonna miss you guys.

full_text: [Hugs Toph with Aang. Sokka looks away, crossing his arms.] Me too.
character_words: Me too.

full_text: Yeah.
character_words: Yeah.

full_text: [Everyone goes to hug him.] Aahh! Great. That's enough. [Smiles.] Okay, we love each other. [Pats Aang and Katara on the head.] Seriously.
character_words: Aahh! Great. That's enough.  Okay, we love each other.  Seriously.

full_text: You see, Aang? A little positive thinking works wonders. We got the king on our side, we got Long Feng arrested, and when we get back, Suki's waiting for me.
character_words: You see, Aang? A little positive thinking works wonders. We got the king on our side, we got Long Feng arrested, and when we get back, Suki's waiting for me.

full_text: Yeah. Girls are waiting for us. Thanks, positive attitude.
character_words: Yeah. Girls are waiting for us. Thanks, positive attitude.

full_text: Everything is gonna work out perfectly. From now on and forever. [Aang turns around and smiles at him.]
character_words: Everything is gonna work out perfectly. From now on and forever.

full_text: [Slides a tray of food underneath the door.] Dinner. [Long Feng grabs some food.] The Council of Five and the military are loyal to the Earth King, [Long Feng looks at him.] but the Dai Li remains loyal to you, Long Feng, sir. [Walks away as Long Feng eats his food while smiling sinisterly.]
character_words: Dinner.  The Council of Five and the military are loyal to the Earth King,  but the Dai Li remains loyal to you, Long Feng, sir.

full_text: [Enters.] Hello? Mom? Anyone home? [Walks to the center of the room. She senses something, but is quickly captured in a metal box.] Hey! Who do you think you're dealing with!?
character_words: Hello? Mom? Anyone home?  Hey! Who do you think you're dealing with!?

full_text: One loud-mouthed little brat who strayed too far from home.
character_words: One loud-mouthed little brat who strayed too far from home.

full_text: In our hour of need, it is with the highest honor that I welcome our esteemed allies, the Kyoshi Warriors!
character_words: In our hour of need, it is with the highest honor that I welcome our esteemed allies, the Kyoshi Warriors!

full_text: We are the Earth King's humble servants.
character_words: We are the Earth King's humble servants.

full_text: What's that smell?
character_words: What's that smell?

full_text: It's jook. I'm sure you wouldn't like it.
character_words: It's jook. I'm sure you wouldn't like it.

full_text: [Sniffs.] Actually, it smells delicious. I'd love a bowl, Uncle. [Holds a bowl up.]
character_words: Actually, it smells delicious. I'd love a bowl, Uncle.

full_text: Now that your fever is gone, you seem different somehow.
character_words: Now that your fever is gone, you seem different somehow.

full_text: [Optimistically.] It's a new day. We've got a new apartment, new furniture, and today's the grand opening of your new tea shop. [Moves to a table and sits.] Things are looking up, Uncle. [Iroh's shocked expression changes to a smile.]
character_words: It's a new day. We've got a new apartment, new furniture, and today's the grand opening of your new tea shop.  Things are looking up, Uncle.

full_text: You haven't seen your dad in over two years. You must be so excited!
character_words: You haven't seen your dad in over two years. You must be so excited!

full_text: [Almost throwing up.] I know I should be, but, I just feel sick to my stomach. [Holds his stomach.]
character_words: I know I should be, but, I just feel sick to my stomach.

full_text: Don't be nervous. He's going to be so happy to see you! [He puts his hand on Sokka's shoulder who smiles.]
character_words: Don't be nervous. He's going to be so happy to see you!

full_text: So what about you? Are you nervous to meet this guru?
character_words: So what about you? Are you nervous to meet this guru?

full_text: Not at all. I'm ready to master the Avatar State. I'll do whatever it takes. [Sokka gets off Appa.] See you in a week. Yip yip!
character_words: Not at all. I'm ready to master the Avatar State. I'll do whatever it takes.  See you in a week. Yip yip!

full_text: Sokka, good to see you.
character_words: Sokka, good to see you.

full_text: Sokka.
character_words: Sokka.

full_text: Hi, Dad.
character_words: Hi, Dad.

full_text: Look Bosco! The Kyoshi Warriors are here to protect us! Aren't you excited? [Bosco yawns.] It's been a difficult week for me. My most trusted advisor, Long Feng, and his Dai Li agents tried to take control of Ba Sing Se from me.
character_words: Look Bosco! The Kyoshi Warriors are here to protect us! Aren't you excited?  It's been a difficult week for me. My most trusted advisor, Long Feng, and his Dai Li agents tried to take control of Ba Sing Se from me.

full_text: It's terrible when you can't trust the people who are closest to you.
character_words: It's terrible when you can't trust the people who are closest to you.

full_text: [Pets Bosco.] But there is good news. As we speak, the Council of Five is meeting to plan an invasion of the Fire Nation this summer, on the day of a solar eclipse.
character_words: But there is good news. As we speak, the Council of Five is meeting to plan an invasion of the Fire Nation this summer, on the day of a solar eclipse.

full_text: Really? Now that sounds like a fascinating and brilliant plan. [Glances off as Mai and Ty Lee look at each other.]
character_words: Really? Now that sounds like a fascinating and brilliant plan.

full_text: General Fong's base will serve as the launching point for the attack. In exactly two months, the army and navy will invade the Fire Nation on the Day of Black Sun.
character_words: General Fong's base will serve as the launching point for the attack. In exactly two months, the army and navy will invade the Fire Nation on the Day of Black Sun.

full_text: Or we could send in Momo to do some damage! [Chuckles.] 'Cause, the ... sorry.
character_words: Or we could send in Momo to do some damage!  'Cause, the ... sorry.

full_text: [Uses earthbending to stand the pieces back up, scaring Momo.] All we need is the Earth King's seal in order to execute the plan. [Sends the scroll across the table to Katara.]
character_words: All we need is the Earth King's seal in order to execute the plan.

full_text: I'll get these scrolls to him right away. Thank you, General How.
character_words: I'll get these scrolls to him right away. Thank you, General How.

full_text: Uhhh ... hello? You're Guru Pathik, right? [Aang approaches Pathik.] The person who attached the note to Appa's horn?
character_words: Uhhh ... hello? You're Guru Pathik, right?  The person who attached the note to Appa's horn?

full_text: Indeed. I was a spiritual brother of your people, and a personal friend of Monk Gyatso.
character_words: Indeed. I was a spiritual brother of your people, and a personal friend of Monk Gyatso.

full_text: In your note, [Aang sits.] you said you could teach me how to gain control of the Avatar State. How?
character_words: In your note,  you said you could teach me how to gain control of the Avatar State. How?

full_text: You must gain balance within yourself, before you can bring balance to the world. And the first step to gaining balance begins with this. [Hands Aang a yellow beverage in a wooden cup.] Drink up!
character_words: You must gain balance within yourself, before you can bring balance to the world. And the first step to gaining balance begins with this.  Drink up!

full_text: [Takes it and looks at it. Drinks it and quickly spits it out to his left in disgust.] Uggh! It tastes like onion and banana juice!
character_words: Uggh! It tastes like onion and banana juice!

full_text: That's because it is! [Pathik empties another bowl and holds it over his head.] Yum yum!
character_words: That's because it is!  Yum yum!

full_text: I believe we need to go right!
character_words: I believe we need to go right!

full_text: What are you talking about? The Beifong Estate's this way!
character_words: What are you talking about? The Beifong Estate's this way!

full_text: I'm quite certain you're mistaken.
character_words: I'm quite certain you're mistaken.

full_text: [Banging at the cell.] Hey! Can you two old ladies quit your bickering for a second? I got to go to the bathroom!
character_words: Hey! Can you two old ladies quit your bickering for a second? I got to go to the bathroom!

full_text: Oooh ... uhhh, okay, but make it quick! [Getting up with a key in hand.]
character_words: Oooh ... uhhh, okay, but make it quick!

full_text: [Stopping Yu.] What's wrong with you?
character_words: What's wrong with you?

full_text: Ooh, very sneaky Toph! Nice try, but you can't trick me! [Sits down.]
character_words: Ooh, very sneaky Toph! Nice try, but you can't trick me!

full_text: Let me out of here so I can kick both your butts!
character_words: Let me out of here so I can kick both your butts!

full_text: Quit your banging! [Bangs the metal box.] You might think you're the greatest earthbender in the world, but even you can't bend metal!
character_words: Quit your banging!  You might think you're the greatest earthbender in the world, but even you can't bend metal!

full_text: We have been presented with an extraordinary opportunity, girls.
character_words: We have been presented with an extraordinary opportunity, girls.

full_text: Mai finally gets to wear make-up that's not totally depressing? [Azula walks past toward a window.]
character_words: Mai finally gets to wear make-up that's not totally depressing?

full_text: [With large, dark splotches of black makeup dripping down her eyes; Sarcastically.] Ha, ha.
character_words: Ha, ha.

full_text: I'm talking about conquering the whole Earth Kingdom. [The two girls turn with shocked looks.] For one hundred years, the Fire Nation has hammered away at Ba Sing Se from the outside. But now we're on the inside, and we can take it by ourselves.
character_words: I'm talking about conquering the whole Earth Kingdom.  For one hundred years, the Fire Nation has hammered away at Ba Sing Se from the outside. But now we're on the inside, and we can take it by ourselves.

full_text: [Admiringly.] Gosh, you're so confident. I really admire that about you.
character_words: Gosh, you're so confident. I really admire that about you.

full_text: From the inside, we're in perfect position to organize a coup and overthrow the Earth King. The key is the Dai Li. Whoever controls the Dai Li [Turns back into the room.] controls Ba Sing Se.
character_words: From the inside, we're in perfect position to organize a coup and overthrow the Earth King. The key is the Dai Li. Whoever controls the Dai Li  controls Ba Sing Se.

full_text: In order to master the Avatar State, you must open all the chakras. Aang, tell me everything you know about chakras.
character_words: In order to master the Avatar State, you must open all the chakras. Aang, tell me everything you know about chakras.

full_text: [Rubs eyes.] What are chakras?
character_words: What are chakras?

full_text: Oh, I see. I guess we'll start with the basics. [As he explains he points to the water and the moss within.] The water flows through this creek, much like the energy flows through your body. As you see, there are several pools where the water swirls around before flowing on. These pools are like our chakras.
character_words: Oh, I see. I guess we'll start with the basics.  The water flows through this creek, much like the energy flows through your body. As you see, there are several pools where the water swirls around before flowing on. These pools are like our chakras.

full_text: So chakras are pools of spiraling energy in our bodies?
character_words: So chakras are pools of spiraling energy in our bodies?

full_text: Exactly. If nothing else were around, this creek would flow pure and clear. However, life is messy, and things tend to fall in the creek. And then what happens?
character_words: Exactly. If nothing else were around, this creek would flow pure and clear. However, life is messy, and things tend to fall in the creek. And then what happens?

full_text: The creek can't flow?
character_words: The creek can't flow?

full_text: Yes. But, if we open the ponds between the pools ... [He removes moss blocking the exit for the water.]
character_words: Yes. But, if we open the ponds between the pools ...

full_text: The energy flows!
character_words: The energy flows!

full_text: There are seven chakras that go up the body. Each pool of energy has a purpose, and can be blocked by a specific kind of emotional muck. Be warned, opening the chakras is an intense experience, and once you begin the process, you cannot stop until all seven are open. Are you ready?
character_words: There are seven chakras that go up the body. Each pool of energy has a purpose, and can be blocked by a specific kind of emotional muck. Be warned, opening the chakras is an intense experience, and once you begin the process, you cannot stop until all seven are open. Are you ready?

full_text: [Momentarily looks down.] I'll do whatever it takes.
character_words: I'll do whatever it takes.

full_text: First we will open the Earth Chakra, located at the base of the spine. It deals with survival, and is blocked by fear. What are you most afraid of? Let your fears become clear to you.
character_words: First we will open the Earth Chakra, located at the base of the spine. It deals with survival, and is blocked by fear. What are you most afraid of? Let your fears become clear to you.

full_text: Aang, your vision is not real. You are concerned for your survival, but you must surrender those fears. Let your fears flow down the creek. [Aang clears the image away.] You have opened your Earth Chakra! [Aang wipes sweat off his forehead.]
character_words: Aang, your vision is not real. You are concerned for your survival, but you must surrender those fears. Let your fears flow down the creek.  You have opened your Earth Chakra!

full_text: Next is the ...
character_words: Next is the ...

full_text: Water Chakra?
character_words: Water Chakra?

full_text: Brilliant! Maybe one day you will be a guru too! This chakra deals with pleasure and is blocked by guilt. Now, look at all the guilt with burdens you so. What do you blame yourself for?
character_words: Brilliant! Maybe one day you will be a guru too! This chakra deals with pleasure and is blocked by guilt. Now, look at all the guilt with burdens you so. What do you blame yourself for?

full_text: [Sees the image of him leaving home.] I ran away. [Sees images of him in the Avatar State at General Fong's base.] I hurt all of those people.
character_words: I ran away.  I hurt all of those people.

full_text: Accept the reality that these things happened, but do not let them cloud and poison your energy. If you are to be a positive influence on the world, you need to forgive yourself.
character_words: Accept the reality that these things happened, but do not let them cloud and poison your energy. If you are to be a positive influence on the world, you need to forgive yourself.

full_text: This bay leads directly to the outskirts of Ba Sing Se. We've been using these tangle mines to stop the Fire Nation ships from getting through.
character_words: This bay leads directly to the outskirts of Ba Sing Se. We've been using these tangle mines to stop the Fire Nation ships from getting through.

full_text: [Filling the mine with skunk fish and seaweed before moving away.] Your father invented tangle mines himself.
character_words: Your father invented tangle mines himself.

full_text: Destructive? Buoyant? And ... [Sniffs and immediately becomes disgusted.] Aggh, ehhh! Terrible smelling!
character_words: Destructive? Buoyant? And ...  Aggh, ehhh! Terrible smelling!

full_text: Very perceptive. The mines are filled with skunk fish and seaweed. When a ship detonates the mine, the seaweed tangles up the propeller and the foul smell forces people to abandon the ship. I call it the "stink and sink."
character_words: Very perceptive. The mines are filled with skunk fish and seaweed. When a ship detonates the mine, the seaweed tangles up the propeller and the foul smell forces people to abandon the ship. I call it the "stink and sink."

full_text: [Laughs.] Good one, Dad!
character_words: Good one, Dad!

full_text: [Nearby, unamused.] You're definitely your father's son.
character_words: You're definitely your father's son.

full_text: [Approaching.] Hakoda, our scouts have spotted four Fire Nation ships!
character_words: Hakoda, our scouts have spotted four Fire Nation ships!

full_text: Bato, get these mines loaded up! The rest of you men, prepare for battle!
character_words: Bato, get these mines loaded up! The rest of you men, prepare for battle!

full_text: Uhhh ... what should I do, Dad?
character_words: Uhhh ... what should I do, Dad?

full_text: Aren't you listening? I said, "The rest of you men, get ready for battle".
character_words: Aren't you listening? I said, "The rest of you men, get ready for battle".

full_text: Who thought when we came to this city as refugees, that I'd end up owning my own tea shop? Follow your passion, Zuko, and life will reward you.
character_words: Who thought when we came to this city as refugees, that I'd end up owning my own tea shop? Follow your passion, Zuko, and life will reward you.

full_text: Congratulations, Uncle.
character_words: Congratulations, Uncle.

full_text: I am very thankful.
character_words: I am very thankful.

full_text: You deserve it. The Jasmine Dragon will be the best tea shop in the city.
character_words: You deserve it. The Jasmine Dragon will be the best tea shop in the city.

full_text: No. I'm thankful because you decided to share this special day with me. It means more than you know. [The two embrace.]
character_words: No. I'm thankful because you decided to share this special day with me. It means more than you know.

full_text: Now let's make these people some tea! [Walks away to the back.]
character_words: Now let's make these people some tea!

full_text: Yes, let's make some tea!
character_words: Yes, let's make some tea!

full_text: Third is the Fire Chakra, located in the stomach.
character_words: Third is the Fire Chakra, located in the stomach.

full_text: [Holding his stomach.] My Fire Chakra would like to eat something other than onion-banana juice.
character_words: My Fire Chakra would like to eat something other than onion-banana juice.

full_text: [Chuckles.] Good one! Moving on. This chakra deals with willpower, and is blocked by shame. What are you ashamed of? [Cuts to Aang's vision of his first attempt at firebending, which resulted in him accidentally burning Katara's hands.] What are your biggest disappointments in yourself?
character_words: Good one! Moving on. This chakra deals with willpower, and is blocked by shame. What are you ashamed of?  What are your biggest disappointments in yourself?

full_text: I'm never going to firebend again. I can't.
character_words: I'm never going to firebend again. I can't.

full_text: You will never find balance if you deny this part of your life. You are the Avatar and therefore, you are a firebender. [Aang breathes deeply.] Hmmm ... that chakra opened less like a flowing creek, and more like a ... burping bison.
character_words: You will never find balance if you deny this part of your life. You are the Avatar and therefore, you are a firebender.  Hmmm ... that chakra opened less like a flowing creek, and more like a ... burping bison.

full_text: [Loud belch.] Tastes like onions and bananas, but strangely something else. Pickles? [Pathik shrugs.]
character_words: Tastes like onions and bananas, but strangely something else. Pickles?

full_text: [Sighs.] I'm tired of wearing this girly disguise. I don't know how anyone could fight in this.
character_words: I'm tired of wearing this girly disguise. I don't know how anyone could fight in this.

full_text: Maybe that's why it was so easy to beat the Kyoshi Warriors and take their clothes.
character_words: Maybe that's why it was so easy to beat the Kyoshi Warriors and take their clothes.

full_text: How much longer do we have to serve the Earth King? If I have to clean up one more pile of bear poop, I'm going to throw up.
character_words: How much longer do we have to serve the Earth King? If I have to clean up one more pile of bear poop, I'm going to throw up.

full_text: Princess Azula promised we would go back to the Fire Nation as soon as we captured the Avatar. We just have to be patient.
character_words: Princess Azula promised we would go back to the Fire Nation as soon as we captured the Avatar. We just have to be patient.

full_text: [Stands up.] Shush up! Do you want the whole palace to know we're Fire Nation?
character_words: Shush up! Do you want the whole palace to know we're Fire Nation?

full_text: Sorry!
character_words: Sorry!

full_text: Good work, girls. I'm sure the Dai Li will deliver the message.
character_words: Good work, girls. I'm sure the Dai Li will deliver the message.

full_text: The fourth chakra is located in the heart. It deals with love and is blocked by grief. [Aang smiles and looks at a Air Nomad statue nearby before looking sad.] Lay all your grief out in front of you.
character_words: The fourth chakra is located in the heart. It deals with love and is blocked by grief.  Lay all your grief out in front of you.

full_text: You have indeed felt a great loss. [The airbenders appear floating in the clouds.] But love is a form of energy, and it swirls all around us. [Aang is lifted into the air and sees the Air Nomads floating in the smoke.] The Air Nomads' love for you has not left this world. It is still inside of your heart, and is reborn in the form of new love.
character_words: You have indeed felt a great loss.  But love is a form of energy, and it swirls all around us.  The Air Nomads' love for you has not left this world. It is still inside of your heart, and is reborn in the form of new love.

full_text: Let the pain flow away. [Aang wipes away his tears.] Very good.
character_words: Let the pain flow away.  Very good.

full_text: Can I have some onion-banana juice, please?
character_words: Can I have some onion-banana juice, please?

full_text: The fifth in the chain is the Sound Chakra, located in the throat. It deals with truth and is blocked by lies. The ones we tell ourselves.
character_words: The fifth in the chain is the Sound Chakra, located in the throat. It deals with truth and is blocked by lies. The ones we tell ourselves.

full_text: Why didn't you tell us you were the Avatar?
character_words: Why didn't you tell us you were the Avatar?

full_text: Because I never wanted to be.
character_words: Because I never wanted to be.

full_text: You cannot lie about your own nature. You must accept that you are the Avatar. [Aang inhales and, seeing an image of himself on a cliff looking down at the ground, exhales, and accepts his nature.] Very good, Aang. You have opened the chakra of truth.
character_words: You cannot lie about your own nature. You must accept that you are the Avatar.  Very good, Aang. You have opened the chakra of truth.

full_text: The sixth pool of energy is the light chakra, located in the center of the forehead. It deals with insight and is blocked by illusion. The greatest illusion of this world is the illusion of separation. Things you think are separate and different are actually one in the same.
character_words: The sixth pool of energy is the light chakra, located in the center of the forehead. It deals with insight and is blocked by illusion. The greatest illusion of this world is the illusion of separation. Things you think are separate and different are actually one in the same.

full_text: [An image is shown of the world, with the four nations' territories marked.] Like the four nations.
character_words: Like the four nations.

full_text: [The image changes so the territories become the same color.] Yes. We are all one people, [The territories become separate again.] but we live as if divided.
character_words: Yes. We are all one people,  but we live as if divided.

full_text: We're all connected. Everything is connected.
character_words: We're all connected. Everything is connected.

full_text: That's right! Even the separation of the four elements is an illusion. If you open your mind, you will see that all the elements are one. Four parts of the same whole. Even metal is just a part of earth that has been purified and refined.
character_words: That's right! Even the separation of the four elements is an illusion. If you open your mind, you will see that all the elements are one. Four parts of the same whole. Even metal is just a part of earth that has been purified and refined.

full_text: [Struggling.] Come on, metal. Budge! [She punches a hole in the metal and shakes her hand in pain.] Wooo! Toph, you rule.
character_words: Come on, metal. Budge!  Wooo! Toph, you rule.

full_text: What do you say, Momo? A cup of tea before we get back to the king? [Arrives at the shop.] Table for two, please.
character_words: What do you say, Momo? A cup of tea before we get back to the king?  Table for two, please.

full_text: Uncle! I need two jasmine, one green, and one lychee!
character_words: Uncle! I need two jasmine, one green, and one lychee!

full_text: I'm brewing as fast as I can!
character_words: I'm brewing as fast as I can!

full_text: This is the last chakra, isn't it?
character_words: This is the last chakra, isn't it?

full_text: Yes. Once you open this chakra, you will be able to go in and out of the Avatar State at will and when you are in the Avatar State, you will have complete control and awareness of all your actions.
character_words: Yes. Once you open this chakra, you will be able to go in and out of the Avatar State at will and when you are in the Avatar State, you will have complete control and awareness of all your actions.

full_text: Let's do this.
character_words: Let's do this.

full_text: The Thought Chakra is located at the crown of the head. It deals with pure cosmic energy, and is blocked by earthly attachment. Meditate on what attaches you to this world. [Images of Katara appear before Aang.] Now, let all of those attachments go. Let them flow down the river, forgotten.
character_words: The Thought Chakra is located at the crown of the head. It deals with pure cosmic energy, and is blocked by earthly attachment. Meditate on what attaches you to this world.  Now, let all of those attachments go. Let them flow down the river, forgotten.

full_text: [Coming out of his meditation.] What? Why would I let go of Katara? I ... I love her!
character_words: What? Why would I let go of Katara? I ... I love her!

full_text: Learn to let her go, or you cannot let the pure cosmic energy flow in from the universe.
character_words: Learn to let her go, or you cannot let the pure cosmic energy flow in from the universe.

full_text: Why would I choose cosmic energy over Katara? [Aang throws his hands up.] How could it be a bad thing that I feel an attachment to her? Three chakras ago that was a good thing!
character_words: Why would I choose cosmic energy over Katara?  How could it be a bad thing that I feel an attachment to her? Three chakras ago that was a good thing!

full_text: You must learn to let go.
character_words: You must learn to let go.

full_text: Thank goodness you're here, Suki. Something terrible is going on. The Fire Nation has infiltrated the city, I just saw Prince Zuko and his uncle! [Azula widens her eyes in surprise and smiles slyly.] We have to tell the Earth King right away!
character_words: Thank goodness you're here, Suki. Something terrible is going on. The Fire Nation has infiltrated the city, I just saw Prince Zuko and his uncle!  We have to tell the Earth King right away!

full_text: Oh, don't worry, I'll be sure to let him know.
character_words: Oh, don't worry, I'll be sure to let him know.

full_text: [While the three girls gather around the fallen Katara; pans to camera looking up to the three girls.] So, Zuzu's in the city, too? I think it's time for a family reunion. [Momo flies off.]
character_words: So, Zuzu's in the city, too? I think it's time for a family reunion.

full_text: I'm sorry, but I can't let go of Katara.
character_words: I'm sorry, but I can't let go of Katara.

full_text: Aang, to master the Avatar State, you must open all the chakras. Surrender yourself.
character_words: Aang, to master the Avatar State, you must open all the chakras. Surrender yourself.

full_text: Okay, I'll try.
character_words: Okay, I'll try.

full_text: Now think of your attachments and let them go. Let the pure cosmic energy flow.
character_words: Now think of your attachments and let them go. Let the pure cosmic energy flow.

full_text: Katara's in danger! I have to go! [Prepares to exit.]
character_words: Katara's in danger! I have to go!

full_text: No, Aang! By choosing attachment, you have locked the chakra! If you leave now, you won't be able to go into the Avatar State at all!
character_words: No, Aang! By choosing attachment, you have locked the chakra! If you leave now, you won't be able to go into the Avatar State at all!

full_text: It's another one her tricks!
character_words: It's another one her tricks!

full_text: There's a giant hole in the box! How is that a trick!?
character_words: There's a giant hole in the box! How is that a trick!?

full_text: [From behind them.] It's not! It's the real deal!
character_words: It's not! It's the real deal!

full_text: [Jumps on top of the box.] I am the greatest earthbender in the world! Don't you two dunderheads ever forget it! [Stomps on the box and exits using earth surfing.]
character_words: I am the greatest earthbender in the world! Don't you two dunderheads ever forget it!

full_text: [Inside the box.] I'm going to be stuck in here forever with you, aren't I?
character_words: I'm going to be stuck in here forever with you, aren't I?

full_text: I have to go the bathroom. [Xin Fu groans and slams his head against the box.]
character_words: I have to go the bathroom.

full_text: Ready to go knock some Fire Nation heads?
character_words: Ready to go knock some Fire Nation heads?

full_text: You don't know how much this means to me, Dad. I'll make you proud and I'll finally prove to you what a great warrior I am.
character_words: You don't know how much this means to me, Dad. I'll make you proud and I'll finally prove to you what a great warrior I am.

full_text: [Placing his hand on Sokka's shoulder.] Sokka, you don't have to prove anything to me. I'm already proud of you and I've always known you're a great warrior.
character_words: Sokka, you don't have to prove anything to me. I'm already proud of you and I've always known you're a great warrior.

full_text: Really?
character_words: Really?

full_text: Why do you think I trusted you to look after our tribe when I left?
character_words: Why do you think I trusted you to look after our tribe when I left?

full_text: This can't be good news.
character_words: This can't be good news.

full_text: What is this about? Your agents show up in the middle of the night and drag me down here? You will not treat a Kyoshi Warrior this way!
character_words: What is this about? Your agents show up in the middle of the night and drag me down here? You will not treat a Kyoshi Warrior this way!

full_text: But you're not a Kyoshi Warrior, are you, [Standing.] Princess Azula of the Fire Nation?
character_words: But you're not a Kyoshi Warrior, are you,  Princess Azula of the Fire Nation?

full_text: What do you want?
character_words: What do you want?

full_text: I want to make a deal. It's time that I regain control of Ba Sing Se and you have something I need.
character_words: I want to make a deal. It's time that I regain control of Ba Sing Se and you have something I need.

full_text: Oh?
character_words: Oh?

full_text: The Earth King's trust.
character_words: The Earth King's trust.

full_text: Why should I help you?
character_words: Why should I help you?

full_text: Because I can get you the Avatar.
character_words: Because I can get you the Avatar.

full_text: [Smirks.] I'm listening ...
character_words: I'm listening ...

full_text: A message from the Royal Palace.
character_words: A message from the Royal Palace.

full_text: [Reads through, becomes shocked, and smiles.] I ... I can't believe it!
character_words: I ... I can't believe it!

full_text: What is it, Uncle?
character_words: What is it, Uncle?

full_text: [Excited.] Great news! We've been invited to serve tea to the Earth King! [Runs off.]
character_words: Great news! We've been invited to serve tea to the Earth King!

full_text: So, what kind of trouble is Katara in?
character_words: So, what kind of trouble is Katara in?

full_text: I don't know. In my vision, I just knew she needed help.
character_words: I don't know. In my vision, I just knew she needed help.

full_text: It would be nice if your Avatar powers could be just a little more specific from time to time. [He looks down and notices a mound of earth passing nearby, heading to the wall.] What is that?
character_words: It would be nice if your Avatar powers could be just a little more specific from time to time.  What is that?

full_text: Need a ride?
character_words: Need a ride?

full_text: [While pacing back and forth.] The Earth King and the Council of Five do not trust the Dai Li. They imprisoned your leader, Long Feng. Soon they will turn on all of you and eliminate you. Seizing power today is a matter of life and death. [As she talks, an agent with a mustache starts looking nervous and slightly lowers his head.] This coup must be swift and decisive. The Earth King and each of the five generals must be taken out simultaneously. Long Feng has placed you in my command while we overthrow the government. [Walks over to her left, to another agent with a tiny, vertical scar on his right cheek. When she nears him, she stares sideways at the agent while still addressing all the agents.] If I sense any disloyalty, any hesitation, any weakness at all, [She stops right in front of the scarred agent.] I will snuff it out. [She continues walking, with the eyes of the now nervous scarred agent following her.] That is all.
character_words: The Earth King and the Council of Five do not trust the Dai Li. They imprisoned your leader, Long Feng. Soon they will turn on all of you and eliminate you. Seizing power today is a matter of life and death.  This coup must be swift and decisive. The Earth King and each of the five generals must be taken out simultaneously. Long Feng has placed you in my command while we overthrow the government.  If I sense any disloyalty, any hesitation, any weakness at all,  I will snuff it out.  That is all.

full_text: Nice speech, Azula. It was pretty and poetic, but also scary in a good way. [She hands the cup to Azula. Camera pans over to a close-up of Mai.]
character_words: Nice speech, Azula. It was pretty and poetic, but also scary in a good way.

full_text: [Amused.] Yeah. I thought you were going to make that one guy pee his pants.
character_words: Yeah. I thought you were going to make that one guy pee his pants.

full_text: There are still a few loose ends. The Avatar, and my brother and uncle.
character_words: There are still a few loose ends. The Avatar, and my brother and uncle.

full_text: Many times I imagined myself here, at the threshold of the palace. [Camera pans to show the Earth Kingdom Emblem above the palace doors.] But I always thought I would be here as a conqueror. Instead, we are the Earth King's personal guests, here to serve him tea. Destiny is a funny thing.
character_words: Many times I imagined myself here, at the threshold of the palace.  But I always thought I would be here as a conqueror. Instead, we are the Earth King's personal guests, here to serve him tea. Destiny is a funny thing.

full_text: It sure is, Uncle.
character_words: It sure is, Uncle.

full_text: So how did it go with the guru? Did you master the Avatar State?
character_words: So how did it go with the guru? Did you master the Avatar State?

full_text: Uh ...
character_words: Uh ...

full_text: If you leave now, you won't be able to go into the Avatar State at all!
character_words: If you leave now, you won't be able to go into the Avatar State at all!

full_text: Aang, are you okay?
character_words: Aang, are you okay?

full_text: I'm great! It went great with the guru. I completely mastered the Avatar State. [He laughs nervously and looks down.] Yeah.
character_words: I'm great! It went great with the guru. I completely mastered the Avatar State.  Yeah.

full_text: What's taking so long?
character_words: What's taking so long?

full_text: Maybe the Earth King overslept.
character_words: Maybe the Earth King overslept.

full_text: Something's not right.
character_words: Something's not right.

full_text: It's tea time!
character_words: It's tea time!

full_text: [He quickly stands up.] Azula!
character_words: Azula!

full_text: Have you met the Dai Li? They're earthbenders, but they have a killer instinct that's so firebender. I just love it.
character_words: Have you met the Dai Li? They're earthbenders, but they have a killer instinct that's so firebender. I just love it.

full_text: Did I ever tell you how I got the nickname "the Dragon of the West"?
character_words: Did I ever tell you how I got the nickname "the Dragon of the West"?

full_text: I'm not interested in a lengthy anecdote, Uncle.
character_words: I'm not interested in a lengthy anecdote, Uncle.

full_text: It's more of a demonstration, really.
character_words: It's more of a demonstration, really.

full_text: Come on! You'll be fine!
character_words: Come on! You'll be fine!

full_text: No! I'm tired of running! It's time I faced Azula!
character_words: No! I'm tired of running! It's time I faced Azula!

full_text: You're so dramatic. What? Are you going to challenge me to an Agni Kai?
character_words: You're so dramatic. What? Are you going to challenge me to an Agni Kai?

full_text: Yes! I challenge you!
character_words: Yes! I challenge you!

full_text: No thanks.
character_words: No thanks.

full_text: Katara's fine. You have nothing to worry about.
character_words: Katara's fine. You have nothing to worry about.

full_text: But, in my vision, I felt so sure she was in trouble.
character_words: But, in my vision, I felt so sure she was in trouble.

full_text: Well, she met with the Council of Generals to plan the invasion, and since then, she been off with your friends, the Kyoshi Warriors.
character_words: Well, she met with the Council of Generals to plan the invasion, and since then, she been off with your friends, the Kyoshi Warriors.

full_text: See, Aang? She's with Suki. They're probably back at our apartment right now talking about make-up or something.
character_words: See, Aang? She's with Suki. They're probably back at our apartment right now talking about make-up or something.

full_text: Okay. Maybe you're right.
character_words: Okay. Maybe you're right.

full_text: Believe me, if there was any danger at all, Bosco's animal instincts would sense it.
character_words: Believe me, if there was any danger at all, Bosco's animal instincts would sense it.

full_text: You've got company.
character_words: You've got company.

full_text: Zuko!
character_words: Zuko!

full_text: Momo!
character_words: Momo!

full_text: There's no one else here.
character_words: There's no one else here.

full_text: Katara is in trouble! I knew it!
character_words: Katara is in trouble! I knew it!

full_text: Oh, no!
character_words: Oh, no!

full_text: Wait! Someone's at the door. [Someone knocks on the door a second later.] Actually, I know who it is. It's an old friend of mine. [She walks over to the door and opens it, showing Iroh behind the door.] Glad to see you're okay.
character_words: Wait! Someone's at the door.  Actually, I know who it is. It's an old friend of mine.  Glad to see you're okay.

full_text: I need your help.
character_words: I need your help.

full_text: You guys know each other?
character_words: You guys know each other?

full_text: I met him in the woods once and knocked him down. Then he gave me some tea and some very good advice.
character_words: I met him in the woods once and knocked him down. Then he gave me some tea and some very good advice.

full_text: May I come in? [Toph nods, and he walks in before turning to the group.] Princess Azula is here in Ba Sing Se.
character_words: May I come in?  Princess Azula is here in Ba Sing Se.

full_text: She must have Katara.
character_words: She must have Katara.

full_text: She has captured my nephew as well.
character_words: She has captured my nephew as well.

full_text: Then we'll work together to fight Azula, and save Katara and Zuko.
character_words: Then we'll work together to fight Azula, and save Katara and Zuko.

full_text: [Approaching Aang and pointing at him.] Whoa there! You lost me at "Zuko".
character_words: Whoa there! You lost me at "Zuko".

full_text: I know how you must feel about my nephew. [Moving forward to place his hands on Sokka's shoulders.] But believe me when I tell you that there is good inside him.
character_words: I know how you must feel about my nephew.  But believe me when I tell you that there is good inside him.

full_text: [Pushing Iroh away.] "Good inside him" isn't enough! Why don't you come back when it's outside him too, okay?
character_words: "Good inside him" isn't enough! Why don't you come back when it's outside him too, okay?

full_text: Katara's in trouble. All of Ba Sing Se is in trouble. Working together is our best chance.
character_words: Katara's in trouble. All of Ba Sing Se is in trouble. Working together is our best chance.

full_text: I brought someone along who might help us.
character_words: I brought someone along who might help us.

full_text: Azula and Long Feng are plotting a coup! They're going to overthrow the Earth King!
character_words: Azula and Long Feng are plotting a coup! They're going to overthrow the Earth King!

full_text: My sister! Where are they keeping Katara?
character_words: My sister! Where are they keeping Katara?

full_text: In the Crystal Catacombs of Old Ba Sing Se, deep beneath the palace.
character_words: In the Crystal Catacombs of Old Ba Sing Se, deep beneath the palace.

full_text: The movements of the Earth King and all the generals have been plotted out step-by-step.
character_words: The movements of the Earth King and all the generals have been plotted out step-by-step.

full_text: Good. And the Fire Nation princess is cooperating?
character_words: Good. And the Fire Nation princess is cooperating?

full_text: Oh, yes. More than cooperating. She's really taken charge. She's terrifying and inspirational at the same time. It's hard to explain.
character_words: Oh, yes. More than cooperating. She's really taken charge. She's terrifying and inspirational at the same time. It's hard to explain.

full_text: Why did they throw you in here? [Zuko says nothing.] Oh, wait, let me guess. It's a trap. So that when Aang shows up to help me, you can finally have him in your little Fire Nation clutches!
character_words: Why did they throw you in here?  Oh, wait, let me guess. It's a trap. So that when Aang shows up to help me, you can finally have him in your little Fire Nation clutches!

full_text: [Continuing to lament.] You're a terrible person! You know that? Always following us! Hunting the Avatar! Trying to capture the world's last hope for peace! But what do you care? You're the Fire Lord's son. Spreading war and violence and hatred is in your blood!
character_words: You're a terrible person! You know that? Always following us! Hunting the Avatar! Trying to capture the world's last hope for peace! But what do you care? You're the Fire Lord's son. Spreading war and violence and hatred is in your blood!

full_text: You don't know what you're talking about!
character_words: You don't know what you're talking about!

full_text: [Angrily.] I don't? How dare you! You have no idea what this war has put me through! [Sits down.] Me personally! [She sits down and touches her necklace, begins to cry.] The Fire Nation took my mother away from me.
character_words: I don't? How dare you! You have no idea what this war has put me through!  Me personally!  The Fire Nation took my mother away from me.
