full_text: [He turns around to face Katara.] I'm sorry. [Pauses.] That's something we have in common.
character_words: I'm sorry.  That's something we have in common.

full_text: Well, what'd you know? There is an ancient city down there. But it's deep.
character_words: Well, what'd you know? There is an ancient city down there. But it's deep.

full_text: We should split up. Aang, you go with Iroh to look for Katara and the angry jerk, [Remembers Iroh is there and places his left hand on Iroh's right shoulder.] no offense.
character_words: We should split up. Aang, you go with Iroh to look for Katara and the angry jerk,  no offense.

full_text: [Shrugging.] None taken.
character_words: None taken.

full_text: And I'll go with Toph to warn the Earth King of Azula's coup.
character_words: And I'll go with Toph to warn the Earth King of Azula's coup.

full_text: So, Toph thinks you give pretty good advice, and great tea!
character_words: So, Toph thinks you give pretty good advice, and great tea!

full_text: The key to both is proper aging. What's on your mind?
character_words: The key to both is proper aging. What's on your mind?

full_text: Well, I met with this guru who was supposed to help me master the Avatar State and control this great power, but to do it, I had to let go of someone I love. [He and Iroh stop.] And I just couldn't.
character_words: Well, I met with this guru who was supposed to help me master the Avatar State and control this great power, but to do it, I had to let go of someone I love.  And I just couldn't.

full_text: Perfection and power are overrated. I think you were very wise to choose happiness and love.
character_words: Perfection and power are overrated. I think you were very wise to choose happiness and love.

full_text: [Earthbends again.] What happens if we can't save anyone and beat Azula? Without the Avatar State, what if I'm not powerful enough?
character_words: What happens if we can't save anyone and beat Azula? Without the Avatar State, what if I'm not powerful enough?

full_text: I don't know the answer. Sometimes, life is like this dark tunnel. You can't always see the light at the end of the tunnel, but if you just keep moving, [Aang earthbends the rocks away one last time. Iroh's fire blows out. He smiles.] you will come to a better place.
character_words: I don't know the answer. Sometimes, life is like this dark tunnel. You can't always see the light at the end of the tunnel, but if you just keep moving,  you will come to a better place.

full_text: There's General How!
character_words: There's General How!

full_text: What's going on here?
character_words: What's going on here?

full_text: You're under house arrest.
character_words: You're under house arrest.

full_text: The coup is happening right now! We've gotta warn the Earth King!
character_words: The coup is happening right now! We've gotta warn the Earth King!

full_text: Thank goodness we're in time!
character_words: Thank goodness we're in time!

full_text: In time for what?
character_words: In time for what?

full_text: Yeah. What are you in time for, [Cartwheels to Sokka.] cutie?
character_words: Yeah. What are you in time for,  cutie?

full_text: Uh, I'm kinda involved with Suki.
character_words: Uh, I'm kinda involved with Suki.

full_text: Who?
character_words: Who?

full_text: They're not the real Kyoshi Warriors!
character_words: They're not the real Kyoshi Warriors!

full_text: Sorry to disappoint you.
character_words: Sorry to disappoint you.

full_text: Oooh, it's like we're dancing together!
character_words: Oooh, it's like we're dancing together!

full_text: This fight is over.
character_words: This fight is over.

full_text: Get them all out of my sight.
character_words: Get them all out of my sight.

full_text: Now comes the part where I double cross you. Dai Li, arrest the Fire Nation princess! [None of the Dai Li agents move, to Long Feng's disappointment.] I said arrest her! What is wrong with you?!
character_words: Now comes the part where I double cross you. Dai Li, arrest the Fire Nation princess!  I said arrest her! What is wrong with you?!

full_text: It's because they haven't made up their minds. They're waiting to see how this is going to end.
character_words: It's because they haven't made up their minds. They're waiting to see how this is going to end.

full_text: What are you talking about?
character_words: What are you talking about?

full_text: I can see your whole history in your eyes. You were born with nothing, so you've had to struggle, and connive, and claw your way to power. But true power, the divine right to rule, is something you're born with. The fact is, they don't know which one of us is going to be sitting on that throne, and which one is going to be bowing down. [Long Feng looks worried.] But I know, and you know. [She sits down on the throne and crosses her legs.] Well?
character_words: I can see your whole history in your eyes. You were born with nothing, so you've had to struggle, and connive, and claw your way to power. But true power, the divine right to rule, is something you're born with. The fact is, they don't know which one of us is going to be sitting on that throne, and which one is going to be bowing down.  But I know, and you know.  Well?

full_text: [Walks up and bows to her.] You've beaten me at my own game.
character_words: You've beaten me at my own game.

full_text: Don't flatter yourself! You were never even a player.
character_words: Don't flatter yourself! You were never even a player.

full_text: [Apologetic.] I'm sorry I yelled at you before.
character_words: I'm sorry I yelled at you before.

full_text: It doesn't matter.
character_words: It doesn't matter.

full_text: It's just that for so long now, whenever I would imagine the face of the enemy, it was your face.
character_words: It's just that for so long now, whenever I would imagine the face of the enemy, it was your face.

full_text: My face? I see. [He touches his scar.]
character_words: My face? I see.

full_text: No, no, that's-that's not what I mean. [Approaches Zuko.]
character_words: No, no, that's-that's not what I mean.

full_text: It's okay. I used to think this scar marked me. The mark of the banished prince, cursed to chase the Avatar forever. But lately, I've realized I'm free to determine my own destiny, even if I'll never be free of my mark.
character_words: It's okay. I used to think this scar marked me. The mark of the banished prince, cursed to chase the Avatar forever. But lately, I've realized I'm free to determine my own destiny, even if I'll never be free of my mark.

full_text: Maybe you could be free of it.
character_words: Maybe you could be free of it.

full_text: What?
character_words: What?

full_text: I have healing abilities.
character_words: I have healing abilities.

full_text: It's a scar, it can't be healed.
character_words: It's a scar, it can't be healed.

full_text: [Holds up a vial.] This is water from the Spirit Oasis at the North Pole. It has special properties, so I've been saving it for something important. [Moves in front of Zuko.] I don't know if it would work, but ...
character_words: This is water from the Spirit Oasis at the North Pole. It has special properties, so I've been saving it for something important.  I don't know if it would work, but ...

full_text: Aang!
character_words: Aang!

full_text: Aang, I knew you would come. [She hugs Aang again.]
character_words: Aang, I knew you would come.

full_text: Uncle, I don't understand. What are you doing with the Avatar? [Points to Aang.]
character_words: Uncle, I don't understand. What are you doing with the Avatar?

full_text: Saving you, that's what.
character_words: Saving you, that's what.

full_text: Zuko, it's time we talked. [To Aang and Katara.] Go help you other friends. We'll catch up with you. [They walk away, Katara looks back at Zuko before moving on.]
character_words: Zuko, it's time we talked.  Go help you other friends. We'll catch up with you.

full_text: Why, Uncle?
character_words: Why, Uncle?

full_text: You're not the man you used to be, Zuko. You are stronger and wiser and freer than you have ever been. And now you have come to the crossroads of your destiny. It's time for you to choose. It's time for you to choose good.
character_words: You're not the man you used to be, Zuko. You are stronger and wiser and freer than you have ever been. And now you have come to the crossroads of your destiny. It's time for you to choose. It's time for you to choose good.

full_text: I expected this kind of treachery from Uncle. [Cut to Iroh, still trapped in crystals. Cut to a side shot, where Zuko protects his uncle.] But Zuko, Prince Zuko, you're a lot of things, but you're not a traitor, are you?
character_words: I expected this kind of treachery from Uncle.  But Zuko, Prince Zuko, you're a lot of things, but you're not a traitor, are you?

full_text: Release him immediately.
character_words: Release him immediately.

full_text: It's not too late for you, Zuko. You can still redeem yourself.
character_words: It's not too late for you, Zuko. You can still redeem yourself.

full_text: [To Zuko.] The kind of redemption she offers is not for you.
character_words: The kind of redemption she offers is not for you.

full_text: Why don't you let him decide, Uncle? [To Zuko.] I need you, Zuko. I've plotted every move of this day, [Makes a fist.] this glorious day in Fire Nation history, and the only way we win is together. At the end of this day, you will have your honor back. You will have Father's love. You will have everything you want.
character_words: Why don't you let him decide, Uncle?  I need you, Zuko. I've plotted every move of this day,  this glorious day in Fire Nation history, and the only way we win is together. At the end of this day, you will have your honor back. You will have Father's love. You will have everything you want.

full_text: Zuko, I am begging you. Look into your heart and see what it is that you truly want.
character_words: Zuko, I am begging you. Look into your heart and see what it is that you truly want.

full_text: You are free to choose.
character_words: You are free to choose.

full_text: We've got to find Sokka and Toph.
character_words: We've got to find Sokka and Toph.

full_text: See any Dai Li agents nearby?
character_words: See any Dai Li agents nearby?

full_text: Nope, all clear.
character_words: Nope, all clear.

full_text: Let's go.
character_words: Let's go.

full_text: I'm not leaving without Bosco!
character_words: I'm not leaving without Bosco!

full_text: I thought you had changed. [She grunts.]
character_words: I thought you had changed.

full_text: I have changed.
character_words: I have changed.

full_text: [To Bosco.] Come on, it's easy. You just walk on your front paws instead of your rear ones. [She demonstrates.] Like this.
character_words: Come on, it's easy. You just walk on your front paws instead of your rear ones.  Like this.

full_text: That is a nice trick.
character_words: That is a nice trick.

full_text: Just take the bear.
character_words: Just take the bear.

full_text: [Runs to Bosco.] Bosco!
character_words: Bosco!

full_text: There's too many. [He looks a Katara.]
character_words: There's too many.

full_text: [From Aang's memory.] The only way is to let her go.
character_words: The only way is to let her go.

full_text: I'm sorry, Katara.
character_words: I'm sorry, Katara.

full_text: You've got to get out of here! I'll hold them off as long as I can! [Fires some blasts at Zuko and Azula.]
character_words: You've got to get out of here! I'll hold them off as long as I can!

full_text: We've done it, Zuko. It's taken a hundred years, but the Fire Nation has conquered Ba Sing Se.
character_words: We've done it, Zuko. It's taken a hundred years, but the Fire Nation has conquered Ba Sing Se.

full_text: I betrayed Uncle.
character_words: I betrayed Uncle.

full_text: No, he betrayed you. [She stands up from the throne.] Zuko, when you return home, Father will welcome you as a war hero.
character_words: No, he betrayed you.  Zuko, when you return home, Father will welcome you as a war hero.

full_text: But I don't have the Avatar. What if Father doesn't restore my honor?
character_words: But I don't have the Avatar. What if Father doesn't restore my honor?

full_text: He doesn't need to, Zuko. [She puts a hand on Zuko's shoulder.] Today, you restored your own honor.
character_words: He doesn't need to, Zuko.  Today, you restored your own honor.

full_text: The Earth Kingdom ... has fallen.
character_words: The Earth Kingdom ... has fallen.

full_text: What happened? [Sees the Fire Nation designs and flag and immediately assumes he has been captured.] Oh no!
character_words: What happened?  Oh no!

full_text: You hear something? [Aang retreats behind the wall, where he dons a determined look and quickly steps out to send a weak air blast at them, which only ruffles their clothes, and moves past the hallway.] He's awake! [The two begin chasing Aang, who struggles to escape.] Stop! Wait!
character_words: You hear something?  He's awake!  Stop! Wait!

full_text: [Confused.] Momo?
character_words: Momo?

full_text: Twinkle Toes! That's got to be you!
character_words: Twinkle Toes! That's got to be you!

full_text: Aang, you're awake! [The two race over to him.]
character_words: Aang, you're awake!

full_text: Are you sure? [Rubs eyes.] I feel like I'm dreaming.
character_words: Are you sure?  I feel like I'm dreaming.

full_text: [Hugs Aang.] You're not dreaming. You're finally awake.
character_words: You're not dreaming. You're finally awake.

full_text: [Hugs Aang; is disguised as a Fire Nation guard.] Aang, good to see you back with the living, buddy!
character_words: Aang, good to see you back with the living, buddy!

full_text: Sokka? [Breathes heavily, appears to be passing out.]
character_words: Sokka?

full_text: Uh-oh, somebody catch him, he's going to-
character_words: Uh-oh, somebody catch him, he's going to-

full_text: Aren't you cold?
character_words: Aren't you cold?

full_text: I've got a lot on my mind. It's been so long, over three years since I was home. I wonder what's changed. I wonder how I've changed.
character_words: I've got a lot on my mind. It's been so long, over three years since I was home. I wonder what's changed. I wonder how I've changed.

full_text: [Yawns.] I just asked if you were cold, I didn't ask for your whole life story. [Giggles and holds his face in her hands.] Stop worrying.
character_words: I just asked if you were cold, I didn't ask for your whole life story.  Stop worrying.

full_text: Why are we on a Fire Nation ship? Why is everyone dressed this way? And why am I the only one who's completely out of it? [Katara and Aang are left alone.]
character_words: Why are we on a Fire Nation ship? Why is everyone dressed this way? And why am I the only one who's completely out of it?

full_text: You need to take it easy, okay? You got hurt pretty bad. [Smiling at him.] I like your hair.
character_words: You need to take it easy, okay? You got hurt pretty bad.  I like your hair.

full_text: I have hair? [Feels it.] How long was I out?
character_words: I have hair?  How long was I out?

full_text: A few weeks.
character_words: A few weeks.

full_text: Everything okay?
character_words: Everything okay?

full_text: [Looking away, annoyed. Annoyed tone.] We're fine, Dad.
character_words: We're fine, Dad.

full_text: [To Aang.] I'm Hakoda, Katara and Sokka's father. [Aang moves to shake his outstretched hand.]
character_words: I'm Hakoda, Katara and Sokka's father.

full_text: [Placing her hands on Aang's shoulders stopping him.] He knows who you are. I just called you "Dad", didn't I?
character_words: He knows who you are. I just called you "Dad", didn't I?

full_text: I guess you're right.
character_words: I guess you're right.

full_text: [Removing Katara's hand he shakes Hakoda's hand.] Nice to officially meet you, Chief Hakoda.
character_words: Nice to officially meet you, Chief Hakoda.

full_text: It's an honor to meet you.
character_words: It's an honor to meet you.

full_text: Great, great, so now you guys have finally met. So would you mind giving us a little privacy?
character_words: Great, great, so now you guys have finally met. So would you mind giving us a little privacy?

full_text: Of course. [Walks away.]
character_words: Of course.

full_text: Are you mad at your dad or something? [Katara looks at Hakoda leave with an expression of annoyance on her face.]
character_words: Are you mad at your dad or something?

full_text: [Confused look.] What, not at all. Why would you say that?
character_words: What, not at all. Why would you say that?

full_text: Maybe we should go upstairs. [Helping Aang up.] You need a healing session.
character_words: Maybe we should go upstairs.  You need a healing session.

full_text: Tell me where the pain feels most intense.
character_words: Tell me where the pain feels most intense.

full_text: Mmm, a little higher. Uhhh!
character_words: Mmm, a little higher. Uhhh!

full_text: Wow, you're definitely in the right area there.
character_words: Wow, you're definitely in the right area there.

full_text: I can feel a lot of energy twisted up around there. [Begins to remove the water.] Let me just see if I can-
character_words: I can feel a lot of energy twisted up around there.  Let me just see if I can-

full_text: I went down! I didn't just get hurt, did I? It was worse than that. I was gone! But you brought me back.
character_words: I went down! I didn't just get hurt, did I? It was worse than that. I was gone! But you brought me back.

full_text: I just used the spirit water from the North Pole. I don't know what I did exactly.
character_words: I just used the spirit water from the North Pole. I don't know what I did exactly.

full_text: [Turning to look at her.] You saved me.
character_words: You saved me.

full_text: [Placing a hand on the side of his face.] You need to rest.
character_words: You need to rest.

full_text: Your Princess Azula, clever and beautiful, disguised herself as the enemy and entered the Earth Kingdom's Capital. In Ba Sing Se, she found her brother Zuko, and together they faced the Avatar ...
character_words: Your Princess Azula, clever and beautiful, disguised herself as the enemy and entered the Earth Kingdom's Capital. In Ba Sing Se, she found her brother Zuko, and together they faced the Avatar ...

full_text: And the Avatar fell! And the Earth Kingdom fell!
character_words: And the Avatar fell! And the Earth Kingdom fell!

full_text: Azula's agents quickly overtook the entire city. They went to Ba Sing Se's great walls ...
character_words: Azula's agents quickly overtook the entire city. They went to Ba Sing Se's great walls ...

full_text: And brought them down!
character_words: And brought them down!

full_text: The armies of the Fire Nation surged through the walls and swarmed over Ba Sing Se, securing our victory.
character_words: The armies of the Fire Nation surged through the walls and swarmed over Ba Sing Se, securing our victory.

full_text: Now the heroes have returned home!
character_words: Now the heroes have returned home!

full_text: Your princess, Azula ... [Crowd cheers.]
character_words: Your princess, Azula ...

full_text: And after three long years, your prince has returned ...
character_words: And after three long years, your prince has returned ...

full_text: Zuko!
character_words: Zuko!

full_text: After what happened at Ba Sing Se, we had to get you to safety. We flew back to Chameleon Bay where we found my father and the other Water Tribe men. [Flashback preparing to leave by taking off his Earth King robes revealing traveling robes beneath.] The Earth King decided he wanted to travel the world in disguise, so he set off alone. [Bosco is shown taking off his own attire and hat before Kuei jumps on Bosco and they set off.] Well, not completely alone. [Cut back to Sokka continuing the story.] Soon, the bay was overrun by Fire Nation ships. Rather than fight them all, we captured a single ship and made it our disguise. Since then we've been traveling west. We crossed through the Serpent's Pass a few days ago. We've seen a few Fire Nation ships, but none have bothered us.
character_words: After what happened at Ba Sing Se, we had to get you to safety. We flew back to Chameleon Bay where we found my father and the other Water Tribe men.  The Earth King decided he wanted to travel the world in disguise, so he set off alone.  Well, not completely alone.  Soon, the bay was overrun by Fire Nation ships. Rather than fight them all, we captured a single ship and made it our disguise. Since then we've been traveling west. We crossed through the Serpent's Pass a few days ago. We've seen a few Fire Nation ships, but none have bothered us.

full_text: So what now?
character_words: So what now?

full_text: We've been working on a modified version of the invasion plan.
character_words: We've been working on a modified version of the invasion plan.

full_text: It's Sokka's invasion plan.
character_words: It's Sokka's invasion plan.

full_text: Yes, Sokka's plan. We won't be able to mount a massive invasion without the Earth King's armies, but the solar eclipse will still leave the Fire Nation vulnerable.
character_words: Yes, Sokka's plan. We won't be able to mount a massive invasion without the Earth King's armies, but the solar eclipse will still leave the Fire Nation vulnerable.

full_text: So we're planning a smaller invasion. Just a ragtag team of our friends and allies from around the Earth Kingdom. We already ran into Pipsqueak and The Duke.
character_words: So we're planning a smaller invasion. Just a ragtag team of our friends and allies from around the Earth Kingdom. We already ran into Pipsqueak and The Duke.

full_text: [Eating noodles with The Duke on his shoulder.] Good to see you again, Aang!
character_words: Good to see you again, Aang!

full_text: And the best part is, the eclipse isn't even our biggest advantage! [Whispers.] We have a secret ... you!
character_words: And the best part is, the eclipse isn't even our biggest advantage!  We have a secret ... you!

full_text: Me?
character_words: Me?

full_text: Yep, the whole world thinks you're dead! Isn't that great?
character_words: Yep, the whole world thinks you're dead! Isn't that great?

full_text: The world thinks I'm dead? How is that good news? That's terrible!
character_words: The world thinks I'm dead? How is that good news? That's terrible!

full_text: [Approaching Aang.] No, it's great! It means the Fire Nation won't be hunting us anymore! And even better, they won't be expecting you on the Day of Black Sun!
character_words: No, it's great! It means the Fire Nation won't be hunting us anymore! And even better, they won't be expecting you on the Day of Black Sun!

full_text: No, no, no, no, no. You have no idea. This is so messed up!
character_words: No, no, no, no, no. You have no idea. This is so messed up!

full_text: I'll handle this. The Avatar is back. [Opens glider and grunts in pain.]
character_words: I'll handle this. The Avatar is back.

full_text: [Approaching Aang.] Aang, wait! Remember, they don't know we're not Fire Nation!
character_words: Aang, wait! Remember, they don't know we're not Fire Nation!

full_text: Everyone just stay calm. [He and Bato put their helmets on.] Bato and I will take care of this.
character_words: Everyone just stay calm.  Bato and I will take care of this.

full_text: I hate not being able to do anything.
character_words: I hate not being able to do anything.

full_text: Hopefully, you won't need to.
character_words: Hopefully, you won't need to.

full_text: Commander, why are you off course? All Western Fleet ships are supposed to be moving toward Ba Sing Se to support the occupation!
character_words: Commander, why are you off course? All Western Fleet ships are supposed to be moving toward Ba Sing Se to support the occupation!

full_text: Actually, we're from the Eastern Fleet. We have orders to deliver some cargo.
character_words: Actually, we're from the Eastern Fleet. We have orders to deliver some cargo.

full_text: Ahhh ... Eastern Fleet. Well, nice of Admiral Chan to let us know he was sending one of his ships our way.
character_words: Ahhh ... Eastern Fleet. Well, nice of Admiral Chan to let us know he was sending one of his ships our way.

full_text: I'm sure Admiral Chan meant no disrespect, sir.
character_words: I'm sure Admiral Chan meant no disrespect, sir.

full_text: I mean, how hard is it to write a quick note and send a hawk our way?
character_words: I mean, how hard is it to write a quick note and send a hawk our way?

full_text: Next time, we'll send [Bato and Hakoda glance at each other.] two hawks to make sure you get the message.
character_words: Next time, we'll send  two hawks to make sure you get the message.

full_text: Sir ... Admiral Chan has been on leave for two months at Ember Island.
character_words: Sir ... Admiral Chan has been on leave for two months at Ember Island.

full_text: What? Why doesn't anyone ever tell me anything? Something's not right; they should have known that. I think this is a captured ship. [Whispering.] Just stay quiet until we're safely across the ramp. Then we'll sink this ship.
character_words: What? Why doesn't anyone ever tell me anything? Something's not right; they should have known that. I think this is a captured ship.  Just stay quiet until we're safely across the ramp. Then we'll sink this ship.

full_text: They know!
character_words: They know!

full_text: You seem so downcast. Has Mai gotten to you already? Though actually, Mai has been in a strangely good mood lately.
character_words: You seem so downcast. Has Mai gotten to you already? Though actually, Mai has been in a strangely good mood lately.

full_text: I haven't seen Dad yet. I haven't seen him in three years, since I was banished.
character_words: I haven't seen Dad yet. I haven't seen him in three years, since I was banished.

full_text: So what?
character_words: So what?

full_text: So, I didn't capture the Avatar.
character_words: So, I didn't capture the Avatar.

full_text: Who cares? The Avatar is dead ... [Zuko looks away.] unless you think he somehow miraculously survived.
character_words: Who cares? The Avatar is dead ...  unless you think he somehow miraculously survived.

full_text: [During flashback.] This is water from the spirit oasis at the north pole. It has special properties so I've been saving it for something important.
character_words: This is water from the spirit oasis at the north pole. It has special properties so I've been saving it for something important.

full_text: No. There's no way he could have survived. [They glare at each other.]
character_words: No. There's no way he could have survived.

full_text: Well, then I'm sure you have nothing to worry about.
character_words: Well, then I'm sure you have nothing to worry about.

full_text: Load the Toph!
character_words: Load the Toph!

full_text: I'm gonna give us some cover!
character_words: I'm gonna give us some cover!

full_text: I just can't stand by and do nothing! [Runs out.]
character_words: I just can't stand by and do nothing!

full_text: [Following.] Aang, no! [Grabs the staff.] You're still hurt, and you have to stay secret! Just let us handle this.
character_words: Aang, no!  You're still hurt, and you have to stay secret! Just let us handle this.

full_text: Fine. [Grabs his staff and walks away.]
character_words: Fine.

full_text: How are we doing?
character_words: How are we doing?

full_text: Things couldn't get much worse. [A serpent rises from the water near their ship.] The universe just loves proving me wrong, doesn't it?
character_words: Things couldn't get much worse.  The universe just loves proving me wrong, doesn't it?

full_text: You make it too easy!
character_words: You make it too easy!

full_text: Thank you, the universe!
character_words: Thank you, the universe!

full_text: Hey, Aang! We're going into town to find some dinner.
character_words: Hey, Aang! We're going into town to find some dinner.

full_text: [Clutching his stomach.] Well, I am pretty hungry. Maybe dinner's a good idea.
character_words: Well, I am pretty hungry. Maybe dinner's a good idea.

full_text: Here, [Offering a Fire Nation bandana.] tie this around your head. It will cover your arrow.
character_words: Here,  tie this around your head. It will cover your arrow.

full_text: I'm not going out if I can't wear my arrow proudly! [He lies back down.]
character_words: I'm not going out if I can't wear my arrow proudly!

full_text: Aang, come on. Be practical.
character_words: Aang, come on. Be practical.

full_text: [Placing a hand on Sokka's shoulder.] You guys go ahead without us. We'll catch up to you. [Toph and Sokka exit. Katara sits on Aang's bed, placing a hand on his shoulder.] I think I understand why being a secret bothers you so much. You don't want people to think you failed.
character_words: You guys go ahead without us. We'll catch up to you.  I think I understand why being a secret bothers you so much. You don't want people to think you failed.

full_text: You're right, I don't. But the problem is, I did fail!
character_words: You're right, I don't. But the problem is, I did fail!

full_text: Aang, that's not true.
character_words: Aang, that's not true.

full_text: [Getting up.] It is true. I was in Ba Sing Se. I was there! But I lost. And now the Earth Kingdom is fallen for good.
character_words: It is true. I was in Ba Sing Se. I was there! But I lost. And now the Earth Kingdom is fallen for good.

full_text: It's not for good. [Getting up too.] Remember, there's still a plan. The invasion!
character_words: It's not for good.  Remember, there's still a plan. The invasion!

full_text: And I hate the invasion plan, too! [Rips down the Fire Nation flag covering his staff.] I don't want you or anyone else risking your lives to fix my mistakes! I've always known that I would have to face the Fire Lord. But now I know I need to do it alone.
character_words: And I hate the invasion plan, too!  I don't want you or anyone else risking your lives to fix my mistakes! I've always known that I would have to face the Fire Lord. But now I know I need to do it alone.

full_text: [Moving to comfort him.] Aang ...
character_words: Aang ...

full_text: Katara, please! Just go ... please.
character_words: Katara, please! Just go ... please.

full_text: [Exiting.] Is there anything you need?
character_words: Is there anything you need?

full_text: I need to redeem myself. I need my honor back.
character_words: I need to redeem myself. I need my honor back.

full_text: I brought you some food! [Notices Aang has gone missing.] Oh no ... [Drops the food tray and runs.]
character_words: I brought you some food!  Oh no ...

full_text: You've been away for a long time. I see the weight of your travels has changed you. You have redeemed yourself, my son. [Approaches Zuko; the camera pans up to view Ozai's full face for the first time.] Welcome home.
character_words: You've been away for a long time. I see the weight of your travels has changed you. You have redeemed yourself, my son.  Welcome home.

full_text: I'll leave you two alone. [Exits.]
character_words: I'll leave you two alone.

full_text: What's wrong, Katara?
character_words: What's wrong, Katara?

full_text: He left.
character_words: He left.

full_text: What?
character_words: What?

full_text: Aang. He just took his glider and disappeared. He has this ridiculous notion that he has to save the world alone, that it's all his responsibility.
character_words: Aang. He just took his glider and disappeared. He has this ridiculous notion that he has to save the world alone, that it's all his responsibility.

full_text: Maybe that's his way of being brave.
character_words: Maybe that's his way of being brave.

full_text: It's not brave, it's selfish and stupid! We could be helping him and I know the world needs him, but doesn't he know how much we need him, too? How can he just leave us behind?
character_words: It's not brave, it's selfish and stupid! We could be helping him and I know the world needs him, but doesn't he know how much we need him, too? How can he just leave us behind?

full_text: You're talking about me too, aren't you?
character_words: You're talking about me too, aren't you?

full_text: How could you leave us, Dad? [She attempts to wipe away the tears.] I mean, I know we had Gran-Gran, and she loved us, but we were just so lost without you.
character_words: How could you leave us, Dad?  I mean, I know we had Gran-Gran, and she loved us, but we were just so lost without you.

full_text: I'm so sorry, Katara.
character_words: I'm so sorry, Katara.

full_text: [Embraces Hakoda.] I understand why you left. I really do, and I know that you had to go, so why do I still feel this way? I'm so sad and angry and hurt!
character_words: I understand why you left. I really do, and I know that you had to go, so why do I still feel this way? I'm so sad and angry and hurt!

full_text: I love you more than anything. You and your brother are my entire world. I thought about you every day when I was gone and every night when I went to sleep, I would lie awake missing you so much it would ache.
character_words: I love you more than anything. You and your brother are my entire world. I thought about you every day when I was gone and every night when I went to sleep, I would lie awake missing you so much it would ache.

full_text: I am proud of you, Prince Zuko. I am proud because you and your sister conquered Ba Sing Se. I am proud because when your loyalty was tested by your treacherous uncle, you did the right thing and captured the traitor. And I am proudest of all of your most legendary accomplishment: you slayed the Avatar.
character_words: I am proud of you, Prince Zuko. I am proud because you and your sister conquered Ba Sing Se. I am proud because when your loyalty was tested by your treacherous uncle, you did the right thing and captured the traitor. And I am proudest of all of your most legendary accomplishment: you slayed the Avatar.

full_text: [Shocked.] What did you hear?
character_words: What did you hear?

full_text: Azula told me everything. She said she was amazed and impressed at your power and ferocity at the moment of truth.
character_words: Azula told me everything. She said she was amazed and impressed at your power and ferocity at the moment of truth.

full_text: A blockade.
character_words: A blockade.

full_text: Why'd you do it?
character_words: Why'd you do it?

full_text: You're going to have to be a little more specific.
character_words: You're going to have to be a little more specific.

full_text: Why did you tell Father that I was the one who killed the Avatar?
character_words: Why did you tell Father that I was the one who killed the Avatar?

full_text: Can't this wait until the morning?
character_words: Can't this wait until the morning?

full_text: It. Can't.
character_words: It. Can't.

full_text: [Sighs and opens her eyes.] Fine. You seemed so worried about how Father would treat you because you hadn't captured the Avatar. I figured if I gave you the credit, you'd have nothing to worry about.
character_words: Fine. You seemed so worried about how Father would treat you because you hadn't captured the Avatar. I figured if I gave you the credit, you'd have nothing to worry about.

full_text: But why?
character_words: But why?

full_text: [Getting out of bed.] Call it a generous gesture. I wanted to thank you for your help and I was happy to share the glory.
character_words: Call it a generous gesture. I wanted to thank you for your help and I was happy to share the glory.

full_text: You're lying.
character_words: You're lying.

full_text: [Walking past Zuko.] If you say so ...
character_words: If you say so ...

full_text: You have another motive for doing this, I just haven't figured out what it is.
character_words: You have another motive for doing this, I just haven't figured out what it is.

full_text: Please Zuko, what ulterior motive could I have? What could I possibly gain by letting you get all the glory for defeating the Avatar? [Approaching close to Zuko she places a hand on his shoulder.] Unless, somehow, the Avatar was actually alive. All that glory would suddenly turn to shame and foolishness. But you said it yourself, that was impossible. [Zuko begins to leave.] Sleep well, Zuzu.
character_words: Please Zuko, what ulterior motive could I have? What could I possibly gain by letting you get all the glory for defeating the Avatar?  Unless, somehow, the Avatar was actually alive. All that glory would suddenly turn to shame and foolishness. But you said it yourself, that was impossible.  Sleep well, Zuzu.

full_text: I'm not gonna make it. I failed. [Within the lightning strikes, the spirit of Roku appears before Aang.] Roku?
character_words: I'm not gonna make it. I failed.  Roku?

full_text: You haven't failed, Aang.
character_words: You haven't failed, Aang.

full_text: But everyone thinks I'm dead again. They think I've abandoned them, and I'm losing this war. I'm letting the whole world down.
character_words: But everyone thinks I'm dead again. They think I've abandoned them, and I'm losing this war. I'm letting the whole world down.

full_text: If anyone is to blame for the state of the world, it is me. I should have seen this war coming and prevented it. You inherited my problems and my mistakes. But I believe you are destined to redeem me and save the world.
character_words: If anyone is to blame for the state of the world, it is me. I should have seen this war coming and prevented it. You inherited my problems and my mistakes. But I believe you are destined to redeem me and save the world.

full_text: I don't know.
character_words: I don't know.

full_text: You already saved the world. And you'll save the world again, but you can't give up.
character_words: You already saved the world. And you'll save the world again, but you can't give up.

full_text: You're right. I won't give up.
character_words: You're right. I won't give up.

full_text: You're okay!
character_words: You're okay!

full_text: I have so much to do.
character_words: I have so much to do.

full_text: I know, but you'll have our help.
character_words: I know, but you'll have our help.

full_text: You didn't think you could get out of training just by coming to the Fire Nation, did you?
character_words: You didn't think you could get out of training just by coming to the Fire Nation, did you?

full_text: What about the invasion?
character_words: What about the invasion?

full_text: We'll join up with my dad and the invasion force the day of the eclipse.
character_words: We'll join up with my dad and the invasion force the day of the eclipse.

full_text: [Notices Aang's damaged staff has washed ashore.] Hey! What's ... oh, it's your glider.
character_words: Hey! What's ... oh, it's your glider.

full_text: It's okay. If someone saw it, it would give away my identity. It's better for now that no one knows I'm alive.
character_words: It's okay. If someone saw it, it would give away my identity. It's better for now that no one knows I'm alive.

full_text: Who's there?!
character_words: Who's there?!

full_text: [From inside the cloud.] I think I see a cave below.
character_words: I think I see a cave below.

full_text: [Commanding.] Sh! Keep quiet!
character_words: Sh! Keep quiet!

full_text: Great job with the cloud camo, but next time, let's disguise ourselves as the kind of cloud that knows how to keep its mouth shut. [He reconnoiters again.]
character_words: Great job with the cloud camo, but next time, let's disguise ourselves as the kind of cloud that knows how to keep its mouth shut.

full_text: [Cut to the Toph, Katara, and Aang standing in front of Sokka, who is reconnoitering. Sarcastically.] Yeah, we wouldn't want a bird to hear us chatting up there and turn us in.
character_words: Yeah, we wouldn't want a bird to hear us chatting up there and turn us in.

full_text: [Turning back toward the other three.] Hey, we're in enemy territory. [He points above as camera zooms back to show four toucan puffins standing on a rock behind him.] Those are enemy birds.
character_words: Hey, we're in enemy territory.  Those are enemy birds.

full_text: Well, this is it. [Cut to Sokka standing in front of the other three.] This is how we'll be living until the invasion begins. [His head drops each time he says the word, "cave".] Hiding in cave after cave after cave after cave ...
character_words: Well, this is it.  This is how we'll be living until the invasion begins.  Hiding in cave after cave after cave after cave ...

full_text: [Cut to Katara, standing near Aang, from behind Sokka.] Sokka, we don't need to become cave people. What we need is some new clothes.
character_words: Sokka, we don't need to become cave people. What we need is some new clothes.

full_text: Yeah, blending in is better than hiding out. [Cut to Aang and Katara.] If we get Fire Nation disguises, [Smiling.] we would be just as safe as we would be hiding in a cave.
character_words: Yeah, blending in is better than hiding out.  If we get Fire Nation disguises,  we would be just as safe as we would be hiding in a cave.

full_text: [Cut to Toph, who is sitting down with her legs slightly folded.] Plus, they have real food out there. Does anyone want to sit in the dirt and eat cave hoppers?
character_words: Plus, they have real food out there. Does anyone want to sit in the dirt and eat cave hoppers?

full_text: Looks like we got outvoted, sport. Let's get some new clothes.
character_words: Looks like we got outvoted, sport. Let's get some new clothes.

full_text: [Whispering.] I don't know about this. [Cut to a view of Team Avatar from the clothes.] These clothes belong to somebody.
character_words: I don't know about this.  These clothes belong to somebody.

full_text: I call the silk robe! [Jumps out from behind the rock wall and grabs two outfits.]
character_words: I call the silk robe!

full_text: But if it's essential to our survival ... then I call the suit! [Jumps over the wall.]
character_words: But if it's essential to our survival ... then I call the suit!

full_text: [Puts on a headband.] Ta-dah! Normal kid.
character_words: Ta-dah! Normal kid.

full_text: Hm ... I should probably wear shoes. But then I won't be able to see as well. [Sits down.] Sorry, shoes. [Pulls on the shoe, launching the sole at Sokka's face, leaving a red mark.] Finally, a stylish shoe for the blind earthbender.
character_words: Hm ... I should probably wear shoes. But then I won't be able to see as well.  Sorry, shoes.  Finally, a stylish shoe for the blind earthbender.

full_text: [Walks partially on camera.] How do I look? [The camera pans from Katara's dress to her whole outfit.]
character_words: How do I look?

full_text: [Blushing, scratching his head.] Uh ... your mom's necklace.
character_words: Uh ... your mom's necklace.

full_text: Oh, [Touches necklace.] oh, yeah. I guess it's pretty obviously Water Tribe, isn't it? [Takes off the necklace and holds it in her hand.]
character_words: Oh,  oh, yeah. I guess it's pretty obviously Water Tribe, isn't it?

full_text: I used to visit my friend Kuzon here a hundred years ago. So, everyone just follow my lead and stay cool. Or, as they say in the Fire Nation, stay flamin'. [Walks around the building corner. To a man eating meat on a stick.] Greetings, my good hotman.
character_words: I used to visit my friend Kuzon here a hundred years ago. So, everyone just follow my lead and stay cool. Or, as they say in the Fire Nation, stay flamin'.  Greetings, my good hotman.

full_text: [Confused.] Uh, hi. [Sokka shrugs at him as he passes.] I guess ...
character_words: Uh, hi.  I guess ...

full_text: [Looking at a meat display.] Oh, we're going to a meat place?
character_words: Oh, we're going to a meat place?

full_text: Come on, Aang, everyone here eats meat. Even the meat. [Points at a hippo cow eating a piece of meat swarming with flies.]
character_words: Come on, Aang, everyone here eats meat. Even the meat.

full_text: You guys go ahead. I'll just get some lettuce out of the garbage. [Aang and Katara wave each at each other as the rest enter. Turns around to greet random people on the street.] Hotman. Hotman. Hotman. Hotman. Hotman. Hotman.
character_words: You guys go ahead. I'll just get some lettuce out of the garbage.  Hotman. Hotman. Hotman. Hotman. Hotman. Hotman.

full_text: It's over. We caught you.
character_words: It's over. We caught you.

full_text: [Guiltily.] Who, me?
character_words: Who, me?

full_text: It couldn't be more obvious that you don't belong here. [Cut to Aang looking very nervous.] Next time you play hooky, you might wanna take off your school uniform.
character_words: It couldn't be more obvious that you don't belong here.  Next time you play hooky, you might wanna take off your school uniform.

full_text: Oh. Is this a new mind ready for molding?
character_words: Oh. Is this a new mind ready for molding?

full_text: That's right. [Knocking on his head.] Let the molding begin. [The two guards turn away to leave.]
character_words: That's right.  Let the molding begin.

full_text: Wait a minute. [The two guards turn back.] You're not from the Fire Nation. [Walks around Aang.] Clearly you're from the colonies.
character_words: Wait a minute.  You're not from the Fire Nation.  Clearly you're from the colonies.

full_text: Yeah, the colonies, of course. The Fire Nation colonies in the Earth Kingdom. [The two guards walk away.]
character_words: Yeah, the colonies, of course. The Fire Nation colonies in the Earth Kingdom.

full_text: Your etiquette is terrible. In the homeland, we bow to our elders. [Walks in front of her desk.] Like so. [Bows.]
character_words: Your etiquette is terrible. In the homeland, we bow to our elders.  Like so.

full_text: Sorry, ma'am.
character_words: Sorry, ma'am.

full_text: And we don't wear head coverings indoors.
character_words: And we don't wear head coverings indoors.

full_text: Um ... I have a scar. It's really embarrassing.
character_words: Um ... I have a scar. It's really embarrassing.

full_text: Very well. What is your name? Or should we just call you "Mannerless Colony Slob"?
character_words: Very well. What is your name? Or should we just call you "Mannerless Colony Slob"?

full_text: [Chuckles.] Just "slob" is fine. Or, uh, Kuzon.
character_words: Just "slob" is fine. Or, uh, Kuzon.

full_text: We made it through the day Momo, and it was pretty fun.
character_words: We made it through the day Momo, and it was pretty fun.

full_text: [From behind Aang.] Don't let the headmaster catch you with that monkey. [The camera shifts to show her.]
character_words: Don't let the headmaster catch you with that monkey.

full_text: [Turns around, trying to act innocent.] What monkey?
character_words: What monkey?

full_text: Don't worry, I'm not a tattletale. My name's On Ji. I like your headband, by the way.
character_words: Don't worry, I'm not a tattletale. My name's On Ji. I like your headband, by the way.

full_text: [Walks past Aang, slightly bumping him away and puts a hand around On Ji's shoulders.] On Ji, you don't have to baby-sit the new kid.
character_words: On Ji, you don't have to baby-sit the new kid.

full_text: Wow. [Bows.] You must be one of those popular kids I've been hearing about.
character_words: Wow.  You must be one of those popular kids I've been hearing about.

full_text: That's right. Now listen, friend. I know you're from the colonies, so I'll say this slowly. [Leans close to Aang, talking slowly.] On Ji is my girlfriend. [Pokes Aang's chest.] Don't forget it.
character_words: That's right. Now listen, friend. I know you're from the colonies, so I'll say this slowly.  On Ji is my girlfriend.  Don't forget it.

full_text: [Waving goodbye to On Ji and Hide.] It was nice meeting you.
character_words: It was nice meeting you.

full_text: [Approaches Aang.] I don't believe it, he didn't beat you up. Not even a little.
character_words: I don't believe it, he didn't beat you up. Not even a little.

full_text: I guess I'm just lucky.
character_words: I guess I'm just lucky.

full_text: We were on our way to play hide and explode. You wanna come?
character_words: We were on our way to play hide and explode. You wanna come?

full_text: I'd love to.
character_words: I'd love to.

full_text: [Concernedly.] Where have you been? We've been worried sick.
character_words: Where have you been? We've been worried sick.

full_text: [Undoing his headband.] I got invited to play with some kids after school.
character_words: I got invited to play with some kids after school.

full_text: [Springs up to his feet in shock.] After what?!
character_words: After what?!

full_text: I enrolled in a Fire Nation school, and I'm going back tomorrow.
character_words: I enrolled in a Fire Nation school, and I'm going back tomorrow.

full_text: [With an exasperated facial expression.] Enrolled in what?! [Falls backward in disbelief.]
character_words: Enrolled in what?!

full_text: [Readies his spear, with it pointed directly at Zuko.] You again? Stop where you are! [Zuko raises his head, looking at the guard.] Prince Zuko ...
character_words: You again? Stop where you are!  Prince Zuko ...

full_text: I'm going in for a visit. You're going to stand guard here, and no one is going to know about this. [Zuko releases the guard, enters Iroh's cell, and approaches him.] Uncle, it's me. [Iroh, sitting on the floor, turns away from Zuko with a scowl on his face.]
character_words: I'm going in for a visit. You're going to stand guard here, and no one is going to know about this.  Uncle, it's me.

full_text: Aang, I'm trying to be mature and not immediately shoot down your idea, but it sounds ... really terrible.
character_words: Aang, I'm trying to be mature and not immediately shoot down your idea, but it sounds ... really terrible.

full_text: Yeah, we got our outfits. What do you need to go to school for?
character_words: Yeah, we got our outfits. What do you need to go to school for?

full_text: Every minute I'm in that classroom, I'm learning new things about the Fire Nation. I already have a picture of Fire Lord Ozai. [Holds up the picture.] And here's one that I made out of noodles! [Holds up his picture of Ozai.]
character_words: Every minute I'm in that classroom, I'm learning new things about the Fire Nation. I already have a picture of Fire Lord Ozai.  And here's one that I made out of noodles!

full_text: Impressive, I admit, but I still think it's too dangerous.
character_words: Impressive, I admit, but I still think it's too dangerous.

full_text: I guess we'll never find out about the secret river then. It goes right to the Fire Lord's palace. We were supposed to learn about it in class tomorrow.
character_words: I guess we'll never find out about the secret river then. It goes right to the Fire Lord's palace. We were supposed to learn about it in class tomorrow.

full_text: Hmm, I am a fan of secret rivers ... fine, let's stay a few more days.
character_words: Hmm, I am a fan of secret rivers ... fine, let's stay a few more days.

full_text: Flamey-o, hotman! [Runs off.]
character_words: Flamey-o, hotman!

full_text: [To Katara.] Flamey-o?
character_words: Flamey-o?

full_text: You brought this on yourself you know. We could have returned together. You could have been a hero! [Iroh shifts but does not look at him.] You have no right to judge me, Uncle. I did what I had to do in Ba Sing Se, and you're a fool for not joining me. [Iroh continues ignoring him.] You're not going to say anything? [Kicks up a small stool and destroys it with firebending.] You're a crazy old man! You're crazy! And if you weren't in jail, you'd be sleeping in a gutter! [Zuko leaves, slamming the door behind him as Iroh's head drops slightly and he closes his eyes.]
character_words: You brought this on yourself you know. We could have returned together. You could have been a hero!  You have no right to judge me, Uncle. I did what I had to do in Ba Sing Se, and you're a fool for not joining me.  You're not going to say anything?  You're a crazy old man! You're crazy! And if you weren't in jail, you'd be sleeping in a gutter!

full_text: Good morning class. Recite the Fire Nation oath. [Sits down at her desk.]
character_words: Good morning class. Recite the Fire Nation oath.

full_text: [Turns to a large painting of Ozai at the back of the class.] My life I give to my country, with my hands I fight for Fire Lord Ozai and our forefathers before him.
character_words: My life I give to my country, with my hands I fight for Fire Lord Ozai and our forefathers before him.

full_text: [Glances around the room as the class recites the oath.] Fire Lord ... forefathers ...
character_words: Fire Lord ... forefathers ...

full_text: With my mind I seek ways to better my country, and with my feet may our March of Civilization continue.
character_words: With my mind I seek ways to better my country, and with my feet may our March of Civilization continue.

full_text: Firebenders ... Fire Lord ... wah, bah, blah, blah. [The class snickers at him as they sit down as the teacher looks on with a stern expression.]
character_words: Firebenders ... Fire Lord ... wah, bah, blah, blah.

full_text: Since it's obviously hilarious to mock our national oath, we'll begin with a pop quiz on our great March of Civilization. [The class groans and picks up their pens.] Question one: What year did Fire Lord Sozin battle the Air Nation army? [Aang raises his hand.] Kuzon?
character_words: Since it's obviously hilarious to mock our national oath, we'll begin with a pop quiz on our great March of Civilization.  Question one: What year did Fire Lord Sozin battle the Air Nation army?  Kuzon?

full_text: Is that a trick question? The Air Nomads didn't have a formal military. Sozin defeated them by ambush. [The entire class stares at him, dumbfounded.]
character_words: Is that a trick question? The Air Nomads didn't have a formal military. Sozin defeated them by ambush.

full_text: Well, I don't know how you could possibly know more than our national history book. Unless you were there a hundred years ago.
character_words: Well, I don't know how you could possibly know more than our national history book. Unless you were there a hundred years ago.

full_text: I'll just write down my best guess.
character_words: I'll just write down my best guess.

full_text: Kuzon?
character_words: Kuzon?

full_text: [Stopping.] I know, I'm a terrible tsungi hornist.
character_words: I know, I'm a terrible tsungi hornist.

full_text: No, child. That hullabaloo going on with your feet. Is that a nervous disorder?
character_words: No, child. That hullabaloo going on with your feet. Is that a nervous disorder?

full_text: I was just dancing. You do dances here in the homeland, right?
character_words: I was just dancing. You do dances here in the homeland, right?

full_text: Not really, no.
character_words: Not really, no.

full_text: Dancing is not conducive to a proper learning environment. Young people must have rigid discipline and order.
character_words: Dancing is not conducive to a proper learning environment. Young people must have rigid discipline and order.

full_text: But what about expressing yourself?
character_words: But what about expressing yourself?

full_text: I know sometimes we're so ruled by our love for our nation that we can't control our own bodies. [He puts his hand to his face at what he is saying before continuing on.] If you must, you may march in place quietly next time the urge hits you.
character_words: I know sometimes we're so ruled by our love for our nation that we can't control our own bodies.  If you must, you may march in place quietly next time the urge hits you.

full_text: [Waves at Aang.] Uh, hi, Kuzon. I really liked that crazy dance you were doing.
character_words: Uh, hi, Kuzon. I really liked that crazy dance you were doing.

full_text: Thanks On Ji. I could show it to you again if you like. Ah! [He jumps as a blast of fire hits the ground at his feet.]
character_words: Thanks On Ji. I could show it to you again if you like. Ah!

full_text: What'd you say, colony trash? You're gonna show her something?
character_words: What'd you say, colony trash? You're gonna show her something?

full_text: [Nervously.] Just some dance movements.
character_words: Just some dance movements.

full_text: Nobody shows my On Ji anything, especially movements!
character_words: Nobody shows my On Ji anything, especially movements!

full_text: [Angrily.] Picking fights on your second day? We need to have a conference to discuss your punishment. Bring your parents to my office after school.
character_words: Picking fights on your second day? We need to have a conference to discuss your punishment. Bring your parents to my office after school.

full_text: [Worriedly.] Parents? But-
character_words: Parents? But-

full_text: Don't be late!
character_words: Don't be late!

full_text: Thank you for coming, Mr. and Mrs ... [Shot changes to show Sokka and Katara in disguise with Aang sitting between them.]
character_words: Thank you for coming, Mr. and Mrs ...

full_text: Fire. Wang Fire. [Pointing to Katara.] This is my wife, Sapphire.
character_words: Fire. Wang Fire.  This is my wife, Sapphire.

full_text: Sapphire Fire. Nice to meet you.
character_words: Sapphire Fire. Nice to meet you.

full_text: Mr. and Mrs ... Fire, your son has been enrolled here for two days and he's already causing problems. He's argued with his history teacher, disrupted music class, and roughed up my star pupil.
character_words: Mr. and Mrs ... Fire, your son has been enrolled here for two days and he's already causing problems. He's argued with his history teacher, disrupted music class, and roughed up my star pupil.

full_text: My goodness! That doesn't sound like our Kuzon.
character_words: My goodness! That doesn't sound like our Kuzon.

full_text: That's what any mother would say, Ma'am. Nonetheless, you're forewarned; if he acts up one more time, I'll have him sent to reform school- [Stands up.] by which I mean the coal mines. Are we clear?
character_words: That's what any mother would say, Ma'am. Nonetheless, you're forewarned; if he acts up one more time, I'll have him sent to reform school-  by which I mean the coal mines. Are we clear?

full_text: Don't you worry, Mr. Headmaster. I'll straighten this boy out somethin' fierce! [Turns to Aang.] Young man, as soon as we get home you're gonna get the punishment of a lifetime! [Aang and Katara are visibly alarmed.]
character_words: Don't you worry, Mr. Headmaster. I'll straighten this boy out somethin' fierce!  Young man, as soon as we get home you're gonna get the punishment of a lifetime!

full_text: That's what I like to hear.
character_words: That's what I like to hear.

full_text: Orange is such an awful color.
character_words: Orange is such an awful color.

full_text: [Snickers.] You're so beautiful when you hate the world.
character_words: You're so beautiful when you hate the world.

full_text: I don't hate you.
character_words: I don't hate you.

full_text: I don't hate you too. [They kiss, but are interrupted by Azula.]
character_words: I don't hate you too.

full_text: Ahem. [They turn to look at her, clearly annoyed.] Zuko, could I have a word with you?
character_words: Ahem.  Zuko, could I have a word with you?

full_text: Can't you see we're busy? [They kiss again.]
character_words: Can't you see we're busy?

full_text: Oh Mai, Ty Lee need your help untangling her braid.
character_words: Oh Mai, Ty Lee need your help untangling her braid.

full_text: [Stands up.] Sounds pretty serious. [Leaves, but throws an angry glance at Azula behind her back.]
character_words: Sounds pretty serious.

full_text: So, I've heard you've been to visit your uncle fatso in the prison tower.
character_words: So, I've heard you've been to visit your uncle fatso in the prison tower.

full_text: [Standing angrily.] That guard told you.
character_words: That guard told you.

full_text: No. You did. Just now.
character_words: No. You did. Just now.

full_text: [Sits back down.] Okay, you caught me. What is it that you want Azula?
character_words: Okay, you caught me. What is it that you want Azula?

full_text: Actually, nothing. Believe it or not, I'm looking out for you. If people find out you've been to see Uncle, they'll think you're plotting with him. Just be careful, Dum-Dum.
character_words: Actually, nothing. Believe it or not, I'm looking out for you. If people find out you've been to see Uncle, they'll think you're plotting with him. Just be careful, Dum-Dum.

full_text: [Frontal shot.] That settles it! No more school for you, young man! [Strokes his beard.]
character_words: That settles it! No more school for you, young man!

full_text: I'm not ready to leave yet. I'm having fun for once, just being a normal kid. You don't know what it's like, Sokka. You get to be normal all the time.
character_words: I'm not ready to leave yet. I'm having fun for once, just being a normal kid. You don't know what it's like, Sokka. You get to be normal all the time.

full_text: Ha ha! [Sokka glares at her.]
character_words: Ha ha!

full_text: Listen guys, those kids at school are the future of the Fire Nation. If we want to change this place for the better, we need to show them a little taste of freedom.
character_words: Listen guys, those kids at school are the future of the Fire Nation. If we want to change this place for the better, we need to show them a little taste of freedom.

full_text: What could you possibly do for a country of depraved little fire monsters?
character_words: What could you possibly do for a country of depraved little fire monsters?

full_text: I'm gonna throw them, [Starts dancing.] a secret dance party! [Everybody stares at Aang.]
character_words: I'm gonna throw them,  a secret dance party!

full_text: [In Wang Fire voice.] Go to your room!
character_words: Go to your room!

full_text: [Placing a candle.] I can't believe we're having a dance party. It seems so ... silly.
character_words: I can't believe we're having a dance party. It seems so ... silly.

full_text: Don't think of it as a dance party, but as a cultural event celebrating the art of fancy footwork! [Dances.]
character_words: Don't think of it as a dance party, but as a cultural event celebrating the art of fancy footwork!

full_text: [Feeling their approach.] They're coming! Everyone stop bending.
character_words: They're coming! Everyone stop bending.

full_text: [To Appa.] Sorry buddy, you should probably wait out back. [Appa grumbles as Aang herds him into the back.] I know, you got fancier feet than anybody. And six of 'em!
character_words: Sorry buddy, you should probably wait out back.  I know, you got fancier feet than anybody. And six of 'em!

full_text: [Jumps in front of the stage.] Ladies and gentlemen, the Flamey-O's! Yeah, this ought to get everybody moving. [He looks around at the kids standing shyly at the edge of the cave.]
character_words: Ladies and gentlemen, the Flamey-O's! Yeah, this ought to get everybody moving.

full_text: Now what do we do?
character_words: Now what do we do?

full_text: This is when you start dancing.
character_words: This is when you start dancing.

full_text: I don't think my parents want me dancing in a cave ...
character_words: I don't think my parents want me dancing in a cave ...

full_text: [Runs in front of the camera.] Yeah! What if someone finds out?! [Looks around nervously before exiting left.]
character_words: Yeah! What if someone finds out?!

full_text: Oh boy. Listen guys, dancing isn't something you think about. It's a form of self-expression that no one can ever take away from you.
character_words: Oh boy. Listen guys, dancing isn't something you think about. It's a form of self-expression that no one can ever take away from you.

full_text: Maybe it was different in the colonies, Kuzon, but we don't do that here.
character_words: Maybe it was different in the colonies, Kuzon, but we don't do that here.

full_text: Sure you do, you have for generations! It just so happens that I know several classic Fire Nation dances. A hundred years ago, this was known as the 'Phoenix Flight'. [The students ooh and aah as Aang runs low to the ground.] And, this was the 'Camelephant Strut'.
character_words: Sure you do, you have for generations! It just so happens that I know several classic Fire Nation dances. A hundred years ago, this was known as the 'Phoenix Flight'.  And, this was the 'Camelephant Strut'.

full_text: [To Katara.] Who knew Twinkle Toes could dance?
character_words: Who knew Twinkle Toes could dance?

full_text: [Sliding food into Iroh's cell as Iroh keeps his back to him.] I brought you some komodo chicken. I know you don't care for it, but I figure it beats prison food. I admit it, I have everything I always wanted, but it's not as all how I thought it would be. The truth is, I need your advice. [Grips the bars.] I think the Avatar is still alive, I know he's out there, I'm losing my mind. [Desperately.] Please, Uncle, I'm so confused I need your help. [Angrily.] Forget it, I'll solve it myself! Waste away in here for all I care! [He glances back before leaving, and a tear slides down Iroh's face.]
character_words: I brought you some komodo chicken. I know you don't care for it, but I figure it beats prison food. I admit it, I have everything I always wanted, but it's not as all how I thought it would be. The truth is, I need your advice.  I think the Avatar is still alive, I know he's out there, I'm losing my mind.  Please, Uncle, I'm so confused I need your help.  Forget it, I'll solve it myself! Waste away in here for all I care!

full_text: And this is how they do it in the ballrooms of Ba Sing Se. [He starts tapping his feet from side to side and On Ji joins him.]
character_words: And this is how they do it in the ballrooms of Ba Sing Se.

full_text: [Watching as Aang dances with On Ji.] Wow, they look pretty good together.
character_words: Wow, they look pretty good together.

full_text: [Barely hiding her envy as she looks away.] Eh, if that's what you like ... [She looks back surreptitiously.]
character_words: Eh, if that's what you like ...

full_text: Yeah, that's it! That's the sound of happy feet. [The rest of the kids start dancing with them.] All right, go with that! Everybody freestyle!
character_words: Yeah, that's it! That's the sound of happy feet.  All right, go with that! Everybody freestyle!

full_text: [Looks away nervously.] I don't know, Aang. These shoes aren't really right for dancing, and I-I'm not sure that I know how to-
character_words: I don't know, Aang. These shoes aren't really right for dancing, and I-I'm not sure that I know how to-

full_text: [Smiling.] Take my hand.
character_words: Take my hand.

full_text: [Smiles back'.] Okay.
character_words: Okay.

full_text: Aang, everyone's watching.
character_words: Aang, everyone's watching.

full_text: Don't worry about them. It's just you and me right now.
character_words: Don't worry about them. It's just you and me right now.

full_text: It is a dancing party. [Turns to Hide standing behind him.] You did the right thing by telling me, Hide.
character_words: It is a dancing party.  You did the right thing by telling me, Hide.

full_text: [Bows.] Anytime, Headmaster sir.
character_words: Anytime, Headmaster sir.

full_text: [Waving a hand in the air.] This is incredible! It's like my inhibitions just disappear! [He sees the Headmaster come into the cave, and immediately stops dancing and attempts to shrink into his robes.] Okay, they're back again.
character_words: This is incredible! It's like my inhibitions just disappear!  Okay, they're back again.

full_text: [Pointing.] He's the one we want! The boy with the headband!
character_words: He's the one we want! The boy with the headband!

full_text: Uh-oh. [Aang starts running away through the crowd as the soldiers chase him. One soldier sees a boy with a headband, and grabs him.]
character_words: Uh-oh.

full_text: Gotcha! [The boy turns, but the guard is confused upon seeing a different boy there.]
character_words: Gotcha!

full_text: Looking for me?
character_words: Looking for me?

full_text: That's not the one. He's here somewhere. Don't let him leave the cave!
character_words: That's not the one. He's here somewhere. Don't let him leave the cave!

full_text: Yes?
character_words: Yes?

full_text: [Picking his nose.] Hi there.
character_words: Hi there.

full_text: How're we doing?
character_words: How're we doing?

full_text: Looking for someone?
character_words: Looking for someone?

full_text: Who are you looking for?
character_words: Who are you looking for?

full_text: Do you need something?
character_words: Do you need something?

full_text: Over here.
character_words: Over here.

full_text: [To one of the soldiers, who starts dancing.] Stop that! [To another soldier, who is tapping her foot.] Stop that!
character_words: Stop that!  Stop that!

full_text: We're safe Sokka, you can take off the mustache now.
character_words: We're safe Sokka, you can take off the mustache now.

full_text: [He is seen with his Wang Fire mustache on and begins stroking it.] Oh, no I can't. It's permanently glued to my skin.
character_words: Oh, no I can't. It's permanently glued to my skin.

full_text: [To Aang.] Way to go, dancy pants. I think you really did help those kids, you taught them to be free.
character_words: Way to go, dancy pants. I think you really did help those kids, you taught them to be free.

full_text: I don't know, it was just a dance party, that's all.
character_words: I don't know, it was just a dance party, that's all.

full_text: Well, that was some dance party Aang. [She kisses him on the cheek, and Aang blushes.]
character_words: Well, that was some dance party Aang.

full_text: [Clapping lightly.] Flamey-o sir, flamey-o.
character_words: Flamey-o sir, flamey-o.

full_text: You're sure you weren't followed? I've heard about you. They say you're good at what you do, and even better at keeping secrets. The Avatar is alive. I want you to find him, and end him.
character_words: You're sure you weren't followed? I've heard about you. They say you're good at what you do, and even better at keeping secrets. The Avatar is alive. I want you to find him, and end him.

full_text: Momo! [Dives into the water.] Oh Momo! [Dives again and Momo flies to Aang.] Hahahahaha! You found me, buddy! [Looks down at the water in distaste and airbends up to Appa's saddle, where he stands dripping in sludge.] Hey guys, I think this river's polluted. [Airbends mud off himself, splattering the rest of Team Avatar with mud, which causes them to cry out in disgust.]
character_words: Momo!  Oh Momo!  Hahahahaha! You found me, buddy!  Hey guys, I think this river's polluted.

full_text: [Tastes mud on her mouth, and spits.] Pah! Plegh! [Aang airbends again, blowing the rest of the mud back into the river and messing up their hair.]
character_words: Pah! Plegh!

full_text: Well that explains why I can't catch a fish around here, because normally my fishing skills are off the hook! [Holds up a fishing hook.] Get it? Like a fishing hook? [Grinning.]
character_words: Well that explains why I can't catch a fish around here, because normally my fishing skills are off the hook!  Get it? Like a fishing hook?

full_text: [Countering.] Too bad your skills aren't on the hook.
character_words: Too bad your skills aren't on the hook.

full_text: It looks like we'll need to go somewhere else to get food, [Unrolls a long scroll in front of her.] assuming that'll fit into Sokka's master schedule.
character_words: It looks like we'll need to go somewhere else to get food,  assuming that'll fit into Sokka's master schedule.

full_text: Hmmm ... It's doable. But that means only two potty breaks today.
character_words: Hmmm ... It's doable. But that means only two potty breaks today.

full_text: Hey, maybe we can get food there! [Points at a village in the middle of the river.]
character_words: Hey, maybe we can get food there!

full_text: Now you look just like a little hill with horns! Bye, buddy!
character_words: Now you look just like a little hill with horns! Bye, buddy!

full_text: I don't feel anything. Where is the village?
character_words: I don't feel anything. Where is the village?

full_text: It's in the middle of the river! [Pointing at the village.]
character_words: It's in the middle of the river!

full_text: Sure is! My name's Dock. Mind if I ask who you are?
character_words: Sure is! My name's Dock. Mind if I ask who you are?

full_text: We're um ... from the Earth Kingdom colonies.
character_words: We're um ... from the Earth Kingdom colonies.

full_text: Wow ... Colonials. Hop on, I give you ride in the town.
character_words: Wow ... Colonials. Hop on, I give you ride in the town.

full_text: Why do you guys live on the river? [Looking at the village.]
character_words: Why do you guys live on the river?

full_text: [Turns his paddle to the right side, pointing at the Fire Nation factory.] Because we're a fishing town. At least that's how it was before the factory moved in. [Closer shot of the Fire Nation factory and pans down.] Army makes their metal there. Moved in a few years ago and started gunking up our river. [Shot changes back to the ferry. Aang and Katara glance sadly at each other.] Now our little village is struggling to survive.
character_words: Because we're a fishing town. At least that's how it was before the factory moved in.  Army makes their metal there. Moved in a few years ago and started gunking up our river.  Now our little village is struggling to survive.

full_text: Thanks for the ride! [Waves his hand to Dock, who waves back.]
character_words: Thanks for the ride!

full_text: [Cut to three villagers sitting on a porch.] Look at this place. [Cut to two other villagers, an old man and a young boy.] It's so sad. [Cut back to Katara looking down.] We have to do something to help.
character_words: Look at this place.  It's so sad.  We have to do something to help.

full_text: No, we can't waste our time here. We have a bigger mission that we need to stay focused on. These people are on their own.
character_words: No, we can't waste our time here. We have a bigger mission that we need to stay focused on. These people are on their own.

full_text: [Chases Sokka and grabs his shoulder.] These people are starving! But you'd turn your back on them? [Puts her hands on her hips.] How can you be so cold and heartless?
character_words: These people are starving! But you'd turn your back on them?  How can you be so cold and heartless?

full_text: [Shot changes to show their argument from the river as a barrel bobs up and down.] I'm not turning my back, I'm just being realistic. We can't go around helping every rinky-dink town we wander into. We'll be helping them all by taking out the Fire Lord. [Aang guides Toph toward the arguing siblings.]
character_words: I'm not turning my back, I'm just being realistic. We can't go around helping every rinky-dink town we wander into. We'll be helping them all by taking out the Fire Lord.

full_text: [Covering Sokka's mouth with her hand.] Hey, loud mouths! Maybe we should be a little quieter when we talk about "taking out the Fire Lord."
character_words: Hey, loud mouths! Maybe we should be a little quieter when we talk about "taking out the Fire Lord."

full_text: Come on, Katara, be reasonable about this. You know our mission has to come first.
character_words: Come on, Katara, be reasonable about this. You know our mission has to come first.

full_text: [Reluctantly.] I guess so. [Looks annoyed.]
character_words: I guess so.

full_text: Let's just get what we need and go. [Smiling to Katara, who smiles back.]
character_words: Let's just get what we need and go.

full_text: Hey, Dock. You work here too?
character_words: Hey, Dock. You work here too?

full_text: I'm not Dock. I'm Xu! Dock's my brother.
character_words: I'm not Dock. I'm Xu! Dock's my brother.

full_text: But we just saw you. You're even wearing the same clothes. [Close-up of his hat.] The only difference is your hat.
character_words: But we just saw you. You're even wearing the same clothes.  The only difference is your hat.

full_text: [Camera zooms out to Xu talking.] Dock works on the docks. That's why we call him, "Dock", and I work in the shop, that's why they call me, "Xu"!
character_words: Dock works on the docks. That's why we call him, "Dock", and I work in the shop, that's why they call me, "Xu"!

full_text: I don't get it.
character_words: I don't get it.

full_text: Me neither. [Jumps down behind the counter and pulls out a crate filled with rancid gray seafood.] What I can getcha? [Katara, Aang, and Sokka look disgusted.] Hey, I'll give you a special deal. If you buy three fish, I'll give you a clam for free. [Sokka pushes a clam, and mucus splashes out from it.]
character_words: Me neither.  What I can getcha?  Hey, I'll give you a special deal. If you buy three fish, I'll give you a clam for free.

full_text: [Picks up three fish. Carefully.] We'll just take the fish. [Xu takes the fish.] Mind telling your brother we need a ride back to shore? [Xu jumps down behind the counter and jumps up wearing Dock's hat.]
character_words: We'll just take the fish.  Mind telling your brother we need a ride back to shore?

full_text: Hey, colonials! My brother says you need a lift. [Jumps over the counter, and walks to the dock.]
character_words: Hey, colonials! My brother says you need a lift.

full_text: Can you spare some food?
character_words: Can you spare some food?

full_text: [Touched.] I wish I could help more. [Gives the boy a fish, and the boy bows to her and leaves to give the fish to his sick mother.]
character_words: I wish I could help more.

full_text: Our detour into town today has completely thrown off our schedule. It's gonna take some serious finagling to get us back on track.
character_words: Our detour into town today has completely thrown off our schedule. It's gonna take some serious finagling to get us back on track.

full_text: [Sarcastically.] Finagle away, oh schedule master.
character_words: Finagle away, oh schedule master.

full_text: Well, for starters, it looks like we'll need to wake up forty-three minutes earlier every day.
character_words: Well, for starters, it looks like we'll need to wake up forty-three minutes earlier every day.

full_text: Forty-three minutes?
character_words: Forty-three minutes?

full_text: [Pointing to various spots on his schedule.] Look, we only have a few weeks to get to the Fire Lord in time for the invasion and the eclipse, which, by the way, only lasts for eight minutes. And we just lost a whole day. So if we want to make up the time and stay on schedule, we have to wake up early!
character_words: Look, we only have a few weeks to get to the Fire Lord in time for the invasion and the eclipse, which, by the way, only lasts for eight minutes. And we just lost a whole day. So if we want to make up the time and stay on schedule, we have to wake up early!

full_text: Well I'm not waking up early.
character_words: Well I'm not waking up early.

full_text: Or we could just cut out all of our eating breaks.
character_words: Or we could just cut out all of our eating breaks.

full_text: What?
