full_text: I know you and your cronies are not smart enough to come up with that little escape plan. So you're gonna tell me ... [Leans in closer to Chit Sang.] who is?
character_words: I know you and your cronies are not smart enough to come up with that little escape plan. So you're gonna tell me ...  who is?

full_text: [To Hakoda.] So where's Bato? [Cut to inside the prison cell; Sokka turns away from the door.] Where's everyone else from the invasion?
character_words: So where's Bato?  Where's everyone else from the invasion?

full_text: The others are being held at a prison near the Fire Nation palace. They singled me out as their leader and sent me here. [Sokka comes by his father and sits down.] But before I left, I met some young women who said they knew you. The ... Oshinama Fighters?
character_words: The others are being held at a prison near the Fire Nation palace. They singled me out as their leader and sent me here.  But before I left, I met some young women who said they knew you. The ... Oshinama Fighters?

full_text: [Smiles.] You mean the Kyoshi Warriors?
character_words: You mean the Kyoshi Warriors?

full_text: That's right.
character_words: That's right.

full_text: Their leader Suki is here and she's gonna escape with us.
character_words: Their leader Suki is here and she's gonna escape with us.

full_text: [Lays a hand on Sokka's shoulder.] Good. We'll need all the help we can get.
character_words: Good. We'll need all the help we can get.

full_text: And you know Prince Zuko?
character_words: And you know Prince Zuko?

full_text: The son of the Fire Lord? I don't know him, but I know of him.
character_words: The son of the Fire Lord? I don't know him, but I know of him.

full_text: Well, he's here too.
character_words: Well, he's here too.

full_text: [Crosses his arms angrily.] Sounds like a major problem.
character_words: Sounds like a major problem.

full_text: Actually, he's on our side now. [Cut to Hakoda, who gives his son a suspicious look.] I know. I had the same reaction. After all he's done, it was hard to trust him. But he's really proven himself, and I never would've found you without his help. [Hakoda nods his head at Sokka, indicating that he understands.]
character_words: Actually, he's on our side now.  I know. I had the same reaction. After all he's done, it was hard to trust him. But he's really proven himself, and I never would've found you without his help.

full_text: So, do you have a plan?
character_words: So, do you have a plan?

full_text: [Downcast.] We had one, but some of the other prisoners got involved and ruined it. [Leans forward and rests his face in his arms.] I dunno if there's another way off this island.
character_words: We had one, but some of the other prisoners got involved and ruined it.  I dunno if there's another way off this island.

full_text: [Smiles and pats a hand on Sokka's back.] Sokka, there's no prison in the world that can hold two Water Tribe geniuses.
character_words: Sokka, there's no prison in the world that can hold two Water Tribe geniuses.

full_text: Then we'd better find two.
character_words: Then we'd better find two.

full_text: [In a hushed voice.] Zuko, are you there?
character_words: Zuko, are you there?

full_text: [A view of Zuko's eyes appears in the slit from inside the cell.] I'm here.
character_words: I'm here.

full_text: I just got done talking to my dad. We came up with an escape plan together.
character_words: I just got done talking to my dad. We came up with an escape plan together.

full_text: [Off-camera; startles Sokka.] What are you doing here?
character_words: What are you doing here?

full_text: [Pointing to the cell and trying to act gruff.] I was just telling this dirty lowlife what I think of him!
character_words: I was just telling this dirty lowlife what I think of him!

full_text: Well, you'll have to do that later. He's coming with us.
character_words: Well, you'll have to do that later. He's coming with us.

full_text: [Puzzled.] Why?
character_words: Why?

full_text: [Irritated.] Because we have orders straight from the warden, that's why!
character_words: Because we have orders straight from the warden, that's why!

full_text: Could I just get ten more seconds to rough him up a bit? [Punches his palm with his fist.]
character_words: Could I just get ten more seconds to rough him up a bit?

full_text: Fine, ten seconds.
character_words: Fine, ten seconds.

full_text: [Off-camera from inside the cell.] Take that ... and this! [Punching noises come from the cell.]
character_words: Take that ... and this!

full_text: [Amused.] Newbie.
character_words: Newbie.

full_text: [In a hushed voice while still punching the mattress.] We have a new plan, but it's gonna need a big distraction. [Cuts to shot of Zuko who peers from behind the blanket; off camera.] Be in the yard in one hour.
character_words: We have a new plan, but it's gonna need a big distraction.  Be in the yard in one hour.

full_text: [Separates the two.] All right, that's enough.
character_words: All right, that's enough.

full_text: [Voice-over.] What are you doing? Where are you taking me? [He is thrown into a chair in an interrogation room.] I didn't do anything wrong!
character_words: What are you doing? Where are you taking me?  I didn't do anything wrong!

full_text: Come on, [Zuko looks to the source of the voice.] Zuko. [Emerges from the corner of the room; annoyed.] We all know that's a lie.
character_words: Come on,  Zuko.  We all know that's a lie.

full_text: [Shocked.] Mai!
character_words: Mai!

full_text: How is he?
character_words: How is he?

full_text: I think he's ready to talk.
character_words: I think he's ready to talk.

full_text: [Approaches him from behind.] Have you had enough time to think about what I asked?
character_words: Have you had enough time to think about what I asked?

full_text: Yes.
character_words: Yes.

full_text: [Eager.] And?
character_words: And?

full_text: You're right. There was another person involved in the escape plan.
character_words: You're right. There was another person involved in the escape plan.

full_text: [Places his hand on Chit Sang's shoulder.] Who?
character_words: Who?

full_text: It's a guy who's disguised like a prison guard. Only he's not a prison guard. He's the mastermind. He came up with the plan.
character_words: It's a guy who's disguised like a prison guard. Only he's not a prison guard. He's the mastermind. He came up with the plan.

full_text: How did you know I was here?
character_words: How did you know I was here?

full_text: Because I know you so well.
character_words: Because I know you so well.

full_text: But, how-
character_words: But, how-

full_text: The warden's my uncle, you idiot. [Zuko sighs; Mai shows him a letter.] The truth is, I guess I don't know you. All I get is a letter? You could have least looked me in the eye when you ripped out my heart.
character_words: The warden's my uncle, you idiot.  The truth is, I guess I don't know you. All I get is a letter? You could have least looked me in the eye when you ripped out my heart.

full_text: I didn't mean to -
character_words: I didn't mean to -

full_text: You didn't mean to? [Reading the letter.] "Dear Mai, I'm sorry you that you have to find out this way, but I'm leaving."
character_words: You didn't mean to?  "Dear Mai, I'm sorry you that you have to find out this way, but I'm leaving."

full_text: Stop! This isn't about you. This is about the Fire Nation!
character_words: Stop! This isn't about you. This is about the Fire Nation!

full_text: [Sarcastically.] Thanks Zuko, that makes me feel all better. [Throws the letter at him.]
character_words: Thanks Zuko, that makes me feel all better.

full_text: [Stands up.] Mai, I never wanted to hurt you. But I have to do this to save my country.
character_words: Mai, I never wanted to hurt you. But I have to do this to save my country.

full_text: Save it? You're betraying your country!
character_words: Save it? You're betraying your country!

full_text: That's not how I see it.
character_words: That's not how I see it.

full_text: Sokka, what's going on?
character_words: Sokka, what's going on?

full_text: [Places his hand on her shoulder.] I don't have much time. If I'm seen with you the guards might think something's up. [Walks over to the door and peers outside.] I just talked to my dad.
character_words: I don't have much time. If I'm seen with you the guards might think something's up.  I just talked to my dad.

full_text: That's great.
character_words: That's great.

full_text: Yeah, and we're escaping today, on the gondola.
character_words: Yeah, and we're escaping today, on the gondola.

full_text: What?
character_words: What?

full_text: My dad and I came up with the plan together. We're gonna commandeer the gondola [Puts both hands on her shoulders.] and we're gonna take a hostage with us so they won't cut the lines.
character_words: My dad and I came up with the plan together. We're gonna commandeer the gondola  and we're gonna take a hostage with us so they won't cut the lines.

full_text: [Takes his hands off her shoulders.] We'll never make it onto the gondola. There's too many guards.
character_words: We'll never make it onto the gondola. There's too many guards.

full_text: My dad already thought of that. He said we'll need a distraction. That's why we're gonna start a prison riot.
character_words: My dad already thought of that. He said we'll need a distraction. That's why we're gonna start a prison riot.

full_text: Okay, let's say by some miracle this all works and we make it on the gondola. The warden will still just cut the lines, even if we have a captive.
character_words: Okay, let's say by some miracle this all works and we make it on the gondola. The warden will still just cut the lines, even if we have a captive.

full_text: Not if the warden is the captive. [Nearby noise occurs. Moves to look outside.] I have to go. [Suki hugs him.] I'll find you before we start the riot. [Cut to outside the cell, where he slides out of the cell.]
character_words: Not if the warden is the captive.  I have to go.  I'll find you before we start the riot.

full_text: Hey, you, the warden wants to see you!
character_words: Hey, you, the warden wants to see you!

full_text: Why?
character_words: Why?

full_text: I don't know, I didn't ask.
character_words: I don't know, I didn't ask.

full_text: Maybe I could schedule another time with him? How's tomorrow? [Walks off-screen.]
character_words: Maybe I could schedule another time with him? How's tomorrow?

full_text: He wants to see you ... now. [Sokka is escorted by two guards.]
character_words: He wants to see you ... now.

full_text: Put him in the line-up.
character_words: Put him in the line-up.

full_text: One of you is an impostor who thought he could fool me. [Chit Sang steps forward.] But now, that person is going to be in a lot of trouble. Who is it?
character_words: One of you is an impostor who thought he could fool me.  But now, that person is going to be in a lot of trouble. Who is it?

full_text: [Off-screen.] That's him, warden. He's the impostor! [The camera shifts to Chit Sang, who is pointing at the bully guard.]
character_words: That's him, warden. He's the impostor!

full_text: What?
character_words: What?

full_text: [Grabs Chit Sang by the shirt.] I am not! [Chit Sang just raises his hands nonchalantly in defense.] He's lying! [Another guard grabs him.] He's a liar!
character_words: I am not!  He's lying!  He's a liar!

full_text: I'm telling you ... it wasn't me!
character_words: I'm telling you ... it wasn't me!

full_text: Save your breath! I know you were working together. [Turns around and moves in closer to the guard.] You threw Chit Sang in the very cooler they used to escape. It was all part of your plan.
character_words: Save your breath! I know you were working together.  You threw Chit Sang in the very cooler they used to escape. It was all part of your plan.

full_text: That was just a coincidence!
character_words: That was just a coincidence!

full_text: Sir, there's someone to see you.
character_words: Sir, there's someone to see you.

full_text: [Angrily.] Who told you to interrupt me?
character_words: Who told you to interrupt me?

full_text: I did.
character_words: I did.

full_text: [Cut closer to Azula.] Princess Azula. [Azula and Ty Lee walk in.] Ah ... It is an honor to welcome you to the Fire Nation's most exemplary prison. [Stands up.] I didn't realize you were coming.
character_words: Princess Azula.  Ah ... It is an honor to welcome you to the Fire Nation's most exemplary prison.  I didn't realize you were coming.

full_text: [Walks in and notices the guard sitting in the chair.] Who is this?
character_words: Who is this?

full_text: [Cut to the bully guard, who looks away.] He's a guard who was involved in a recent and feeble escape attempt.
character_words: He's a guard who was involved in a recent and feeble escape attempt.

full_text: [Desperately.] It wasn't me!
character_words: It wasn't me!

full_text: [Angrily.] Quiet, you!
character_words: Quiet, you!

full_text: [Crossing her arms.] You're wasting your time. That's not one of them. [Turns and starts to leave.]
character_words: You're wasting your time. That's not one of them.

full_text: How do you know?
character_words: How do you know?

full_text: [Smiles sinisterly; quietly.] Because I'm a people person. [Exits.]
character_words: Because I'm a people person.

full_text: Hey, I just got orders. Let the prisoners out into the yard.
character_words: Hey, I just got orders. Let the prisoners out into the yard.

full_text: But we're in the middle of a lockdown.
character_words: But we're in the middle of a lockdown.

full_text: Oh, okay, I'll just go tell the warden you said that. [Walks off-screen; the guard raises his mask and looks at him speechless.] I'm sure he'll be glad to hear about you undermining his authority. [Guard grows more nervous. Walks back on-screen, lifting his helmet mask.] What's your name again?
character_words: Oh, okay, I'll just go tell the warden you said that.  I'm sure he'll be glad to hear about you undermining his authority.  What's your name again?

full_text: [Starts to sweat; horrified.] Wait! Don't tell the warden. I'm just a little confused.
character_words: Wait! Don't tell the warden. I'm just a little confused.

full_text: Hey, I'm confused too, but the warden's in a bad mood, and ... irrational, so if you ask me, it's best not to question it, and just do what he says. [Places his arm around the guard's shoulder.]
character_words: Hey, I'm confused too, but the warden's in a bad mood, and ... irrational, so if you ask me, it's best not to question it, and just do what he says.

full_text: Yeah ... you're right. We're letting them out!
character_words: Yeah ... you're right. We're letting them out!

full_text: This is it! We have to start a riot.
character_words: This is it! We have to start a riot.

full_text: Okay. But how do we do that?
character_words: Okay. But how do we do that?

full_text: [Smiles smugly.]I'll show you. [Shoves a prisoner.]
character_words: I'll show you.

full_text: Hey! What'd you do that for? That hurt my feelings.
character_words: Hey! What'd you do that for? That hurt my feelings.

full_text: Aren't you mad at me?
character_words: Aren't you mad at me?

full_text: Uh, well, normally I would be, but I've been learning to control my anger.
character_words: Uh, well, normally I would be, but I've been learning to control my anger.

full_text: This isn't working.
character_words: This isn't working.

full_text: Hey you! You're lucky I didn't rat you out, [Smiles.] but my generosity comes with a price. I know you're planning another escape attempt, and I want in.
character_words: Hey you! You're lucky I didn't rat you out,  but my generosity comes with a price. I know you're planning another escape attempt, and I want in.

full_text: [Gets an idea.] Actually, we're trying to escape right now, but we need a riot. [Points to him.] You wouldn't happen to know how to start one, would you?
character_words: Actually, we're trying to escape right now, but we need a riot.  You wouldn't happen to know how to start one, would you?

full_text: A prison riot? Please. [Grabs a prisoner and lifts him in the air, bouncing him up and down.] Hey! [All the prisoners look at him.] Riot!
character_words: A prison riot? Please.  Hey!  Riot!

full_text: [Looks shocked for a moment.]Impressive.
character_words: Impressive.

full_text: Forget about controlling my anger ... [Raises his arms.] let's riot! [He is taken down by another prisoner. The riot is in full swing. Cut the floor of the yard as chaos and dust ensues everywhere. Cut to a prisoner sitting on another prisoner's shoulders, attempting to choke him. Cut to the bottom of a tower as various guards look down at the scene.]
character_words: Forget about controlling my anger ...  let's riot!

full_text: Who let these prisoners into the yard? [Cut to the warden on a balcony.] This is supposed to be a lockdown!
character_words: Who let these prisoners into the yard?  This is supposed to be a lockdown!

full_text: Ma'am, there's a riot going on! I'm here to protect you!
character_words: Ma'am, there's a riot going on! I'm here to protect you!

full_text: I don't need any protection.
character_words: I don't need any protection.

full_text: [Gives a slight chuckle; proudly.] Believe me, she doesn't.
character_words: Believe me, she doesn't.

full_text: I'm sorry, but I'm under direct orders from your uncle to make sure nothing happens. [Zuko gives a serious look.]
character_words: I'm sorry, but I'm under direct orders from your uncle to make sure nothing happens.

full_text: Get off of me! [She throws the guard away from her and chases Zuko.]
character_words: Get off of me!

full_text: Zuko! Good, we're all here. Now all we need to do is grab the warden, and get to the gondolas!
character_words: Zuko! Good, we're all here. Now all we need to do is grab the warden, and get to the gondolas!

full_text: And how do we do that?
character_words: And how do we do that?

full_text: I'm not sure.
character_words: I'm not sure.

full_text: [Groans.] I thought you thought this through!
character_words: I thought you thought this through!

full_text: I thought you told me it's okay not to think everything through!
character_words: I thought you told me it's okay not to think everything through!

full_text: Maybe not everything, but this is kind of important! [Rubs his forehead.]
character_words: Maybe not everything, but this is kind of important!

full_text: Hey, uh, fellas. I think your girlfriend's taking care of it.
character_words: Hey, uh, fellas. I think your girlfriend's taking care of it.

full_text: You wouldn't dare.
character_words: You wouldn't dare.

full_text: [Ties his hands together and uses his headband as a gag.] Sorry, warden. You're my prisoner now. [Slams the warden against the wall; the rest of the escapees arrive.] We've got the warden! Now let's get out of here!
character_words: Sorry, warden. You're my prisoner now.  We've got the warden! Now let's get out of here!

full_text: That's some girl.
character_words: That's some girl.

full_text: [Proudly.] Tell me about it.
character_words: Tell me about it.

full_text: We're almost there!
character_words: We're almost there!

full_text: Back off! We've got the warden! [The guards see the warden on Chit Sang's shoulder, bound and gagged, and clear the way.] Let's go!
character_words: Back off! We've got the warden!  Let's go!

full_text: Everyone in!
character_words: Everyone in!

full_text: What are you doing?
character_words: What are you doing?

full_text: I'm making it so they can't stop us.
character_words: I'm making it so they can't stop us.

full_text: Way to think ahead.
character_words: Way to think ahead.

full_text: We're on our way!
character_words: We're on our way!

full_text: Wait! Who's that?
character_words: Wait! Who's that?

full_text: That's a problem. It's my sister and her friend.
character_words: That's a problem. It's my sister and her friend.

full_text: [Determined.] This is a rematch I've been waiting for.
character_words: This is a rematch I've been waiting for.

full_text: Me too.
character_words: Me too.

full_text: There's the warden! I see him!
character_words: There's the warden! I see him!

full_text: [Frees himself and runs to look out of the gondola.] Cut the line! [Chit Sang notices and grabs the warden.]
character_words: Cut the line!

full_text: He wants us to cut the line.
character_words: He wants us to cut the line.

full_text: But if we cut the line, there's no way he'll survive!
character_words: But if we cut the line, there's no way he'll survive!

full_text: [Puts down his telescope.] He knows that.
character_words: He knows that.

full_text: They're about to cut the line!
character_words: They're about to cut the line!

full_text: [Smirks.] Then it's time to leave. [Blasts herself up.] Goodbye, Zuko. [Reaches the other gondola.]
character_words: Then it's time to leave.  Goodbye, Zuko.

full_text: They're cutting the line! The gondola's about to go!
character_words: They're cutting the line! The gondola's about to go!

full_text: I hope this thing floats.
character_words: I hope this thing floats.

full_text: What are you doing?
character_words: What are you doing?

full_text: Saving the jerk who dumped me.
character_words: Saving the jerk who dumped me.

full_text: Who's that?
character_words: Who's that?

full_text: [Shocked.] It's Mai!
character_words: It's Mai!

full_text: [Angrily.] What is she doing?
character_words: What is she doing?

full_text: Sorry, warden. Your record is officially broken. [The warden struggles against his bindings.]
character_words: Sorry, warden. Your record is officially broken.

full_text: Well, we made it out. Now what?
character_words: Well, we made it out. Now what?

full_text: Zuko, what are you doing?
character_words: Zuko, what are you doing?

full_text: My sister was on that island.
character_words: My sister was on that island.

full_text: Yeah, and she's probably right behind us, so let's not stop!
character_words: Yeah, and she's probably right behind us, so let's not stop!

full_text: What I mean is she must have come here somehow. [Walks up to a large hill by the sea.] There! [Pan down to a large airship.] That's our way out of here!
character_words: What I mean is she must have come here somehow.  There!  That's our way out of here!

full_text: Leave us alone. [The guards give the Fire Nation salute and exit. Mai raises her head a little, looking defiant.] I never expected this from you. [Cut to a side view of Mai, followed by a frontal shot of Ty Lee, who looks from one to the other, tears in her eyes, and back to Azula.] The thing I don't understand is "Why?". Why would you do it? You know the consequences.
character_words: Leave us alone.  I never expected this from you.  The thing I don't understand is "Why?". Why would you do it? You know the consequences.

full_text: I guess you just don't know people as well as you think you do. You miscalculated. I love Zuko more than I fear you.
character_words: I guess you just don't know people as well as you think you do. You miscalculated. I love Zuko more than I fear you.

full_text: [Her intrigued expression contorts into one of absolute rage.] No, you miscalculated! You should have feared me more!
character_words: No, you miscalculated! You should have feared me more!

full_text: [Runs to a shocked Mai, shaking her from her stupor.] Come on! Let's get out of here!
character_words: Come on! Let's get out of here!

full_text: [Still on the ground; angrily.] You're both fools!
character_words: You're both fools!

full_text: What shall we do with them, princess?
character_words: What shall we do with them, princess?

full_text: Put them somewhere I'll never have to see their faces again, and let them rot!
character_words: Put them somewhere I'll never have to see their faces again, and let them rot!

full_text: What are you doing in this thing? What happened to the war balloon?
character_words: What are you doing in this thing? What happened to the war balloon?

full_text: It kind of got destroyed.
character_words: It kind of got destroyed.

full_text: Sounds like a crazy fishing trip.
character_words: Sounds like a crazy fishing trip.

full_text: Did you at least get some good meat?
character_words: Did you at least get some good meat?

full_text: I did. The best meat of all. The meat of friendship and fatherhood.
character_words: I did. The best meat of all. The meat of friendship and fatherhood.

full_text: [Waving.] I'm new. What's up, everybody?
character_words: I'm new. What's up, everybody?

full_text: [Tearing up; overjoyed.] Dad? [Runs to him.]
character_words: Dad?

full_text: Hi, Katara. [They embrace.]
character_words: Hi, Katara.

full_text: How are you here? What is going on? Where did you go?
character_words: How are you here? What is going on? Where did you go?

full_text: We kind of went to a Fire Nation prison.
character_words: We kind of went to a Fire Nation prison.

full_text: Seriously? You guys didn't find any meat?
character_words: Seriously? You guys didn't find any meat?

full_text: [As he runs and pushes her out of harm's way.] Watch out!
character_words: Watch out!

full_text: [Angrily.] What are you doing?
character_words: What are you doing?

full_text: [Calmly.] Keeping rocks from crushing you.
character_words: Keeping rocks from crushing you.

full_text: Okay, I'm not crushed. You can get off me now!
character_words: Okay, I'm not crushed. You can get off me now!

full_text: I'll take that as a thank you. [Rises.]
character_words: I'll take that as a thank you.

full_text: [Pointing to the exit.] Come on! We can get out through here!
character_words: Come on! We can get out through here!

full_text: [To Zuko.] What are you doing?
character_words: What are you doing?

full_text: Go ahead! I'll hold them off. I think this is a family visit. [Runs off.]
character_words: Go ahead! I'll hold them off. I think this is a family visit.

full_text: [In the background, Sokka and Katara run up to him.] Zuko! No!
character_words: Zuko! No!

full_text: Come on! We've gotta get out of here!
character_words: Come on! We've gotta get out of here!

full_text: What are you doing here?
character_words: What are you doing here?

full_text: [Smiling.] You mean it's not obvious yet? I am about to celebrate becoming an only child!
character_words: You mean it's not obvious yet? I am about to celebrate becoming an only child!

full_text: I can't get him to go in there! Appa hates tunnels!
character_words: I can't get him to go in there! Appa hates tunnels!

full_text: Aang, there's no way we can fly out of here.
character_words: Aang, there's no way we can fly out of here.

full_text: We'll have to find a way!
character_words: We'll have to find a way!

full_text: We need to split up. [To the others.] Take the tunnel and get to the stolen airship.
character_words: We need to split up.  Take the tunnel and get to the stolen airship.

full_text: [Turns around and suddenly grows angry.] No! [Walks up to her father.] The Fire Nation can't separate our family again!
character_words: No!  The Fire Nation can't separate our family again!

full_text: It'll be okay. It's not forever.
character_words: It'll be okay. It's not forever.

full_text: I can clear that away and we can fly out through there!
character_words: I can clear that away and we can fly out through there!

full_text: Um, there's an awful lot of fire in that general direction ...
character_words: Um, there's an awful lot of fire in that general direction ...

full_text: We'll get through. Let's go.
character_words: We'll get through. Let's go.

full_text: She's ... not gonna make it ... [Azula uses her firebending to propel herself toward the wall, stopping her fall with her hair pin and saving herself.] Of course she did.
character_words: She's ... not gonna make it ...  Of course she did.

full_text: Wow, camping ... it really seems like old times again, doesn't it?
character_words: Wow, camping ... it really seems like old times again, doesn't it?

full_text: [Jokingly.] If you really want it to feel like old times, I could, uh ... chase you around a while and try to capture you. [He smiles and the rest of the group laughs, except for Katara.]
character_words: If you really want it to feel like old times, I could, uh ... chase you around a while and try to capture you.

full_text: [Sarcastically.] Ha, ha.
character_words: Ha, ha.

full_text: [Holding up his cup.] To Zuko! Who knew after all those times he tried to snuff us out, today he'd be our hero?
character_words: To Zuko! Who knew after all those times he tried to snuff us out, today he'd be our hero?

full_text: [Everybody except Katara holds up their cups.] Hear! Hear! [Aang nudges him with his elbow, before Toph lightly punches him.]
character_words: Hear! Hear!

full_text: [Smiling.] I'm touched. [Stops smiling.] I don't deserve this.
character_words: I'm touched.  I don't deserve this.

full_text: [Angrily.] Yeah, no kidding. [Walks away.]
character_words: Yeah, no kidding.

full_text: What's with her?
character_words: What's with her?

full_text: I wish I knew. [Follows her.]
character_words: I wish I knew.

full_text: [Voice-over.] What's with him?
character_words: What's with him?

full_text: This isn't fair! Everyone else seems to trust me now! What is it with you?
character_words: This isn't fair! Everyone else seems to trust me now! What is it with you?

full_text: [Turns around; furiously.] Oh, everyone trusts you now! I was the first person to trust you! [Places her left hand on her heart.] Remember, back in Ba Sing Se. [Points to the ocean.] And you turned around and betrayed me, betrayed all of us!
character_words: Oh, everyone trusts you now! I was the first person to trust you!  Remember, back in Ba Sing Se.  And you turned around and betrayed me, betrayed all of us!

full_text: [Closes eyes in resentment.] What can I do to make it up to you?
character_words: What can I do to make it up to you?

full_text: [Cuts to shot of her and Zuko standing on the cliff as she approaches him while snapping at him angrily.] You really want to know? Hmm, maybe you could reconquer Ba Sing Se in the name of the Earth King. [Cuts to side-view of her and Zuko.] Or, I know! You could bring my mother back!
character_words: You really want to know? Hmm, maybe you could reconquer Ba Sing Se in the name of the Earth King.  Or, I know! You could bring my mother back!

full_text: [Embarrassed.] Oops, wrong tent!
character_words: Oops, wrong tent!

full_text: Sorry, do you need to talk to Sokka, too?
character_words: Sorry, do you need to talk to Sokka, too?

full_text: Nope, not me! [Walks away.]
character_words: Nope, not me!

full_text: [Holding a rose in his mouth, surrounded by lit candles.] Well, hello ... [Surprised to find Zuko in his tent, destroying the rose in his mouth.] Uh, Zuko! Yes, why would I be expecting anyone different? [Painfully swallows rose petals and thorns.] So what's on your mind?
character_words: Well, hello ...  Uh, Zuko! Yes, why would I be expecting anyone different?  So what's on your mind?

full_text: Your sister. She hates me! And I don't know why, but I do care what she thinks of me.
character_words: Your sister. She hates me! And I don't know why, but I do care what she thinks of me.

full_text: Nah, she doesn't hate you. Katara doesn't hate anyone. Except maybe some people in the Fire Nation. [His eyes widen as he realizes his mistake.] No, I mean, uh, not people who are good, but used to be bad. I mean, bad people. Fire Nation people who are still bad, who've never been good and probably won't be, ever!
character_words: Nah, she doesn't hate you. Katara doesn't hate anyone. Except maybe some people in the Fire Nation.  No, I mean, uh, not people who are good, but used to be bad. I mean, bad people. Fire Nation people who are still bad, who've never been good and probably won't be, ever!

full_text: [Interrupting him.] Stop. Okay, listen. I know this may seem out of nowhere, but I want you to tell me what happened to your mother.
character_words: Stop. Okay, listen. I know this may seem out of nowhere, but I want you to tell me what happened to your mother.

full_text: [Slightly taken aback.] What? Why would you want to know that?
character_words: What? Why would you want to know that?

full_text: Katara mentioned it before when we were imprisoned together in Ba Sing Se, and again just now when she was yelling at me. I think somehow she's connected her anger at that to her anger at me.
character_words: Katara mentioned it before when we were imprisoned together in Ba Sing Se, and again just now when she was yelling at me. I think somehow she's connected her anger at that to her anger at me.

full_text: [Sadly.] It's not a day I like to remember.
character_words: It's not a day I like to remember.

full_text: I'm going to find Mom! [Runs off.]
character_words: I'm going to find Mom!

full_text: [Voice-over.] Many of the warriors had seen the black snow before and they knew what it meant: a Fire Nation raid. [A battle scene is depicted of Water Tribe Warriors and Fire Nation soldiers charging and attacking one another.] We were badly outnumbered, but somehow, we managed to drive them off. As quickly as they came, they just left.
character_words: Many of the warriors had seen the black snow before and they knew what it meant: a Fire Nation raid.  We were badly outnumbered, but somehow, we managed to drive them off. As quickly as they came, they just left.

full_text: I was so relieved when it was over, but that's because I didn't know yet what had happened. I didn't know we had lost our mother.
character_words: I was so relieved when it was over, but that's because I didn't know yet what had happened. I didn't know we had lost our mother.

full_text: Wait. Can you remember any details about the soldiers who raided your village? Like what the lead ship looked like?
character_words: Wait. Can you remember any details about the soldiers who raided your village? Like what the lead ship looked like?

full_text: Yeah ... sea ravens. [Scene shows flashback of three red flags waving in the breeze, bearing sea ravens.] The main ship had flags with sea ravens on them.
character_words: Yeah ... sea ravens.  The main ship had flags with sea ravens on them.

full_text: The symbol of the Southern Raiders. Thanks, Sokka.
character_words: The symbol of the Southern Raiders. Thanks, Sokka.

full_text: [Urging Zuko hurriedly out of the tent.] No problem. Thanks for stopping by! [Zuko leaves.] I'd thought he'd never leave. [Peaks head out excitedly and whispers.] Suki!
character_words: No problem. Thanks for stopping by!  I'd thought he'd never leave.  Suki!

full_text: [Angrily.] You look terrible.
character_words: You look terrible.

full_text: I waited out here all night.
character_words: I waited out here all night.

full_text: [Brushing her hair.] What do you want?
character_words: What do you want?

full_text: I know who killed your mother, [She abruptly stops.] and I'm going to help you find him.
character_words: I know who killed your mother,  and I'm going to help you find him.

full_text: I need to borrow Appa.
character_words: I need to borrow Appa.

full_text: [Jokingly.] Why? Is it your turn to take a little field trip with Zuko?
character_words: Why? Is it your turn to take a little field trip with Zuko?

full_text: Yes, it is.
character_words: Yes, it is.

full_text: [Slightly surprised.] Oh. What's going on?
character_words: Oh. What's going on?

full_text: We're going to find the man who took my mother from me.
character_words: We're going to find the man who took my mother from me.

full_text: Sokka told me the story of what happened. I know who did it and I know how to find him.
character_words: Sokka told me the story of what happened. I know who did it and I know how to find him.

full_text: Um ... and what exactly do you think this will accomplish?
character_words: Um ... and what exactly do you think this will accomplish?

full_text: [Shakes her head in dismay.] Ugh, I knew you wouldn't understand. [Begins to walk away.]
character_words: Ugh, I knew you wouldn't understand.

full_text: Wait! Stop! I do understand. You're feeling unbelievable pain and rage. How do think I felt about the sandbenders when they stole Appa? How do you think I felt about the Fire Nation when I found out what happened to my people?
character_words: Wait! Stop! I do understand. You're feeling unbelievable pain and rage. How do think I felt about the sandbenders when they stole Appa? How do you think I felt about the Fire Nation when I found out what happened to my people?

full_text: She needs this, Aang. This is about getting closure and justice.
character_words: She needs this, Aang. This is about getting closure and justice.

full_text: I don't think so. I think it's about getting revenge.
character_words: I don't think so. I think it's about getting revenge.

full_text: [Angrily.] Fine, maybe it is! Maybe that's what I need! Maybe that's what he deserves!
character_words: Fine, maybe it is! Maybe that's what I need! Maybe that's what he deserves!

full_text: Katara, you sound like Jet.
character_words: Katara, you sound like Jet.

full_text: It's not the same! Jet attacked the innocent. This man, he's a monster.
character_words: It's not the same! Jet attacked the innocent. This man, he's a monster.

full_text: Katara, she was my mother, too, but I think Aang might be right.
character_words: Katara, she was my mother, too, but I think Aang might be right.

full_text: Then you didn't love her the way I did!
character_words: Then you didn't love her the way I did!

full_text: [Hurt.] Katara!
character_words: Katara!

full_text: The monks used to say that revenge is like a two-headed rat viper. While you watch your enemy go down, you're being poisoned yourself.
character_words: The monks used to say that revenge is like a two-headed rat viper. While you watch your enemy go down, you're being poisoned yourself.

full_text: That's cute, but this isn't air temple preschool. It's the real world.
character_words: That's cute, but this isn't air temple preschool. It's the real world.

full_text: Now that I know he's out there ... now that I know we can find him, I feel like I have no choice.
character_words: Now that I know he's out there ... now that I know we can find him, I feel like I have no choice.

full_text: Katara, you do have a choice: forgiveness.
character_words: Katara, you do have a choice: forgiveness.

full_text: That's the same as doing nothing!
character_words: That's the same as doing nothing!

full_text: No, it's not. It's easy to do nothing, but it's hard to forgive.
character_words: No, it's not. It's easy to do nothing, but it's hard to forgive.

full_text: It's not just hard, it's impossible. [Cuts to overhead shot of the field as she walks away, Zuko following behind.]
character_words: It's not just hard, it's impossible.

full_text: So you were just gonna take Appa anyway?
character_words: So you were just gonna take Appa anyway?

full_text: Yes.
character_words: Yes.

full_text: It's okay, because I forgive you. [Pauses.] That give you any ideas?
character_words: It's okay, because I forgive you.  That give you any ideas?

full_text: Don't try to stop us.
character_words: Don't try to stop us.

full_text: I wasn't planning to. This is a journey you need to take. You need to face this man. [Katara situates herself on Appa's head.] But when you do, please don't choose revenge. Let your anger out, and then let it go. Forgive him.
character_words: I wasn't planning to. This is a journey you need to take. You need to face this man.  But when you do, please don't choose revenge. Let your anger out, and then let it go. Forgive him.

full_text: [Sarcastically.] Okay, we'll be sure to do that, guru goody-goody. [Climbs aboard Appa.]
character_words: Okay, we'll be sure to do that, guru goody-goody.

full_text: Thanks for understanding, Aang. Yip-yip. [Appa takes flight; Aang and Sokka look up at the departing bison, their backs facing the camera.]
character_words: Thanks for understanding, Aang. Yip-yip.

full_text: You know, you're pretty wise for a kid.
character_words: You know, you're pretty wise for a kid.

full_text: Thanks, Sokka.
character_words: Thanks, Sokka.

full_text: [Cuts to shot of the two standing together looking up.] Usually it's annoying, but right now, I'm impressed.
character_words: Usually it's annoying, but right now, I'm impressed.

full_text: I appreciate that.
character_words: I appreciate that.

full_text: So, can I borrow Momo for a week?
character_words: So, can I borrow Momo for a week?

full_text: [Surprised.] Why do you need Momo?
character_words: Why do you need Momo?

full_text: We need to find the Fire Navy communication tower. All the navy's movements are coordinated by messenger hawk. And every tower has to be up to date on where everyone is deployed.
character_words: We need to find the Fire Navy communication tower. All the navy's movements are coordinated by messenger hawk. And every tower has to be up to date on where everyone is deployed.

full_text: [Cuts to shot of the communication tower situated on an island in the middle of the ocean; off-camera.] So once we find the communication tower, we bust in and take the information we need.
character_words: So once we find the communication tower, we bust in and take the information we need.

full_text: [Voice-over.] Not exactly. We need to be stealthy and make sure no one spots us, [Cuts to shot of the communication tower, the camera panning downward.] otherwise they'll warn the Southern Raiders long before we reach them.
character_words: Not exactly. We need to be stealthy and make sure no one spots us,  otherwise they'll warn the Southern Raiders long before we reach them.

full_text: Okay, Southern Raiders. [Opens a scroll.] Bam. [Points to location on map; off-camera.] On patrol near Whaletail Island.
character_words: Okay, Southern Raiders.  Bam.  On patrol near Whaletail Island.

full_text: [Cuts to shot of Zuko and Katara looking at the map.] Whaletail Island, here we come.
character_words: Whaletail Island, here we come.

full_text: You should get some rest. We'll be there in a few hours. You'll need all your strength.
character_words: You should get some rest. We'll be there in a few hours. You'll need all your strength.

full_text: Oh, don't you worry about my strength. I have plenty. I'm not the helpless little girl I was when they came.
character_words: Oh, don't you worry about my strength. I have plenty. I'm not the helpless little girl I was when they came.

full_text: I'm going to find Mom.
character_words: I'm going to find Mom.

full_text: Mom!
character_words: Mom!

full_text: Just let her go and I'll give you the information you want.
character_words: Just let her go and I'll give you the information you want.

full_text: You heard your mother. Get out of here!
character_words: You heard your mother. Get out of here!

full_text: Mommy, I'm scared.
character_words: Mommy, I'm scared.

full_text: Go find your dad, sweetie. I'll handle this.
character_words: Go find your dad, sweetie. I'll handle this.

full_text: [Voice-over.] I ran as fast as I could.
character_words: I ran as fast as I could.

full_text: [Arrives to where her father is battling Fire Nation soldiers.] Dad, Dad! Please, I think Mom's in trouble! There's a man in our house!
character_words: Dad, Dad! Please, I think Mom's in trouble! There's a man in our house!

full_text: Kya!
character_words: Kya!

full_text: But we were too late. When we got there, the man was gone. [Voice begins breaking.] And so was she.
character_words: But we were too late. When we got there, the man was gone.  And so was she.

full_text: Your mother was a brave woman.
character_words: Your mother was a brave woman.

full_text: [Clutches her necklace.] I know.
character_words: I know.

full_text: There! [Katara looks up.] See those sea raven flags? [Tosses the telescope to Katara.] It's the Southern Raiders.
character_words: There!  See those sea raven flags?  It's the Southern Raiders.

full_text: [Determined.] Let's do this.
character_words: Let's do this.

full_text: So there I was, and I was like, 'You know ...'
character_words: So there I was, and I was like, 'You know ...'

full_text: This is it, Katara. Are you ready to face him?
character_words: This is it, Katara. Are you ready to face him?

full_text: Who are you?
character_words: Who are you?

full_text: You don't remember her? You will soon, trust me.
character_words: You don't remember her? You will soon, trust me.

full_text: What's ... [He attempts to control his arm which bends about uncontrollably.] happening to me?
character_words: What's ...  happening to me?

full_text: Think back. Think back to your last raid on the Southern Water Tribe.
character_words: Think back. Think back to your last raid on the Southern Water Tribe.

full_text: [Helplessly subdued.] I don't know what you're talking about. Please, I don't know!
character_words: I don't know what you're talking about. Please, I don't know!

full_text: [Bending down closer to the commander.] Don't lie! You look her in the eye and you tell me you don't remember what you did.
character_words: Don't lie! You look her in the eye and you tell me you don't remember what you did.

full_text: It's not him. [She frees him from her grip.] He's not the man.
character_words: It's not him.  He's not the man.

full_text: What? What do you mean he's not? He's the leader of the Southern Raiders! He has to be the guy!
character_words: What? What do you mean he's not? He's the leader of the Southern Raiders! He has to be the guy!

full_text: If you're not the man we're looking for, who is?
character_words: If you're not the man we're looking for, who is?

full_text: You must be looking for Yon Rha. He retired four years ago.
character_words: You must be looking for Yon Rha. He retired four years ago.

full_text: Yon Rha! You lazy piece of work, I need something.
character_words: Yon Rha! You lazy piece of work, I need something.

full_text: [Stops his work and attempts to placate.] Yes, Mother. What is it?
character_words: Yes, Mother. What is it?

full_text: The tomato-carrots from your garden are too hard for my gums. I need something soft and juicy!
character_words: The tomato-carrots from your garden are too hard for my gums. I need something soft and juicy!

full_text: Would you like something else from the garden? I would be happy to ...
character_words: Would you like something else from the garden? I would be happy to ...

full_text: [Angrily. Her fists clench as she interrupts.] Forget your stupid garden! [Cut to a close-up of her as she yells at him; irritatingly.] Get your grimy hind to the market and buy me some real food!
character_words: Forget your stupid garden!  Get your grimy hind to the market and buy me some real food!

full_text: [Suspiciously.] Hello? [To stand owner.] Did you see someone?
character_words: Hello?  Did you see someone?

full_text: Hello? [Camera view shifts to show someone hiding.] Is someone there?
character_words: Hello?  Is someone there?

full_text: That was him. That was the monster.
character_words: That was him. That was the monster.

full_text: Nobody sneaks up on me without getting burned! [Drops basket of vegetables and firebends at a nearby bush.]
character_words: Nobody sneaks up on me without getting burned!

full_text: We weren't behind the bush. [Cut to a side view of the confrontation as Zuko takes a step forward to threaten Yon Rha.] And I wouldn't try firebending again!
character_words: We weren't behind the bush.  And I wouldn't try firebending again!

full_text: [Cut to Yon Rha on the ground with his arm shielding his face. Frightened.] Whoever you are, take my money. Take whatever you want. I'll cooperate.
character_words: Whoever you are, take my money. Take whatever you want. I'll cooperate.

full_text: Do you know who I am?
character_words: Do you know who I am?

full_text: No. I'm not sure.
character_words: No. I'm not sure.

full_text: Oh, you better remember me like your life depends on it! Why don't you take a closer look? [Camera focuses on front view of her face.]
character_words: Oh, you better remember me like your life depends on it! Why don't you take a closer look?

full_text: [Camera focuses on him.] Yes, yes, I remember you now. [Focuses on Katara again.] You're that little Water Tribe girl.
character_words: Yes, yes, I remember you now.  You're that little Water Tribe girl.

full_text: Just let her go and [Camera zooms out to show Kya kneeling on the floor in front of Yon Rha.] I'll give you the information you want.
character_words: Just let her go and  I'll give you the information you want.

full_text: You heard your mother. Get out of here!
character_words: You heard your mother. Get out of here!

full_text: [Holds her hands together.] Mommy, I'm scared.
character_words: Mommy, I'm scared.

full_text: Go find your dad, sweetie. I'll handle this.
character_words: Go find your dad, sweetie. I'll handle this.

full_text: Now tell me, who is it? Who's the waterbender?
character_words: Now tell me, who is it? Who's the waterbender?

full_text: There are no waterbenders here. The Fire Nation took them all away a long time ago.
character_words: There are no waterbenders here. The Fire Nation took them all away a long time ago.

full_text: You're lying. My source says there's one waterbender left in the Southern Water Tribe. We're not leaving until we find the waterbender!
character_words: You're lying. My source says there's one waterbender left in the Southern Water Tribe. We're not leaving until we find the waterbender!

full_text: If I tell you, do you promise [She lowers her head and closes her eyes to make a decision.] to leave the rest of the village alone? [Cut to a side view of Yon Rha who nods.] It's me. [Cut to Kya who looks up.] Take me as your prisoner.
character_words: If I tell you, do you promise  to leave the rest of the village alone?  It's me.  Take me as your prisoner.

full_text: [Cut to a close-up of Yon Rha who smiles evilly.] I'm afraid I'm not taking prisoners today ...
character_words: I'm afraid I'm not taking prisoners today ...

full_text: She lied to you! [Cut to a close-up of Katara who turns away from Yon Rha as she closes her eyes sadly.] She was protecting the last waterbender!
character_words: She lied to you!  She was protecting the last waterbender!

full_text: [Shocked.] What? Who?
character_words: What? Who?

full_text: [Cut back to Katara who turns to face him again as she opens her eyes and looks back furiously.] Me!
character_words: Me!

full_text: [Falls to his knees.] I did a bad thing! I know I did and you deserve revenge, so why don't you take my mother? That would be fair! [Attempts to smile weakly.]
character_words: I did a bad thing! I know I did and you deserve revenge, so why don't you take my mother? That would be fair!

full_text: [Sorrowfully.] I always wondered what kind of person could do such a thing, but now that I see you, I think I understand. There's just nothing inside you, nothing at all. You're pathetic and sad and empty.
character_words: I always wondered what kind of person could do such a thing, but now that I see you, I think I understand. There's just nothing inside you, nothing at all. You're pathetic and sad and empty.

full_text: [Humbly.] Please, spare me! [Cries.]
character_words: Please, spare me!

full_text: But as much as I hate you ... I just can't do it.
character_words: But as much as I hate you ... I just can't do it.

full_text: Katara? Are you okay?
character_words: Katara? Are you okay?

full_text: I'm doing fine.
character_words: I'm doing fine.

full_text: Zuko told me what you did. Or what you didn't do, I guess. I'm proud of you.
character_words: Zuko told me what you did. Or what you didn't do, I guess. I'm proud of you.

full_text: I wanted to do it. I wanted to take out all my anger at him, but I couldn't. I don't know if it's because I'm too weak to do it or because I'm strong enough not to.
character_words: I wanted to do it. I wanted to take out all my anger at him, but I couldn't. I don't know if it's because I'm too weak to do it or because I'm strong enough not to.

full_text: You did the right thing. Forgiveness is the first step you have to take to begin healing.
character_words: You did the right thing. Forgiveness is the first step you have to take to begin healing.

full_text: [Rises from boardwalk.] But I didn't forgive him. I'll never forgive him. [Smiles at Zuko and walks up to him.] But I am ready to forgive you.
character_words: But I didn't forgive him. I'll never forgive him.  But I am ready to forgive you.

full_text: You were right about what Katara needed. Violence wasn't the answer.
character_words: You were right about what Katara needed. Violence wasn't the answer.

full_text: It never is.
character_words: It never is.

full_text: Then I have a question for you. [Turns to look at him.] What are you gonna do when you face my father?
character_words: Then I have a question for you.  What are you gonna do when you face my father?

full_text: Doesn't it seem kind of weird that we're hiding from the Fire Lord in his own house?
character_words: Doesn't it seem kind of weird that we're hiding from the Fire Lord in his own house?

full_text: I told you, [Cut to Zuko sitting on a dry fountain and wiping his head with a cloth.] my father hasn't come here since our family was actually happy. And that was a long time ago. It's the last place anyone would think to look for us.
character_words: I told you,  my father hasn't come here since our family was actually happy. And that was a long time ago. It's the last place anyone would think to look for us.

full_text: You guys are not gonna believe this! There's a play about us.
character_words: You guys are not gonna believe this! There's a play about us.

full_text: [Cut to close-up of her and Sokka.] We were just in town and we found this poster! [Sokka shows the poster for the play to the team. It depicts Katara, Aang, and Sokka with Zuko's scarred face in the background.]
character_words: We were just in town and we found this poster!

full_text: What? How is that possible?
character_words: What? How is that possible?

full_text: Listen to this ... [Turns the poster toward him.] "The Boy in the Iceberg is a new production from acclaimed playwright Pu-on Tim, [Cut to a close shot of the poster as the camera pans up.] who scoured the globe gathering information on the Avatar, from the icy South Pole to the heart of Ba Sing Se. [Shot changes to show Team Avatar.] His sources include singing nomads, pirates, prisoners of war, and a surprisingly knowledgeable merchant of cabbage."
character_words: Listen to this ...  "The Boy in the Iceberg is a new production from acclaimed playwright Pu-on Tim,  who scoured the globe gathering information on the Avatar, from the icy South Pole to the heart of Ba Sing Se.  His sources include singing nomads, pirates, prisoners of war, and a surprisingly knowledgeable merchant of cabbage."

full_text: "Brought to you by the critically acclaimed Ember Island Players."
character_words: "Brought to you by the critically acclaimed Ember Island Players."

full_text: [Recalling a memory.] Ugh! My mother used to take us to see them. They butchered Love Amongst the Dragons every year!
character_words: Ugh! My mother used to take us to see them. They butchered Love Amongst the Dragons every year!

full_text: Sokka, do you really think it's a good idea to attend a play about ourselves?
character_words: Sokka, do you really think it's a good idea to attend a play about ourselves?

full_text: [Persuasively.] Come on, a day at the theater? This is the kind of wacky time-wasting nonsense I've been missing! [He holds up the poster anxiously and smiles sheepishly; Katara looks away, appears nonplussed.]
character_words: Come on, a day at the theater? This is the kind of wacky time-wasting nonsense I've been missing!

full_text: [To Zuko; points to his seat and tries to act casual.] Hey, uh ... I wanted to sit there.
character_words: Hey, uh ... I wanted to sit there.

full_text: [Removing his hood.] Just sit next to me. What's the big deal?
character_words: Just sit next to me. What's the big deal?

full_text: I was just, I wanted to ... okay. [Sits down.]
character_words: I was just, I wanted to ... okay.

full_text: Why are we sitting in the nosebleed section? My feet can't see a thing from up here!
character_words: Why are we sitting in the nosebleed section? My feet can't see a thing from up here!

full_text: Don't worry, I'll tell your feet what's happening.
character_words: Don't worry, I'll tell your feet what's happening.

full_text: [Sighs.] Sokka, my only brother! We constantly roam these icy South Pole seas, and yet never do we find anything fulfilling!
character_words: Sokka, my only brother! We constantly roam these icy South Pole seas, and yet never do we find anything fulfilling!

full_text: [Cut to Actor Sokka, a thin, lanky man.] All I want is a full feeling in my stomach! I'm starving!
character_words: All I want is a full feeling in my stomach! I'm starving!

full_text: Is food the only thing on your mind?
character_words: Is food the only thing on your mind?

full_text: [Cut to shot of the actor.] Well, I'm trying to it get out of my mind and into my mouth! I'm starving! [Audience laughs.]
character_words: Well, I'm trying to it get out of my mind and into my mouth! I'm starving!

full_text: [Leans forward in his seat; clearly annoyed.] This is pathetic! My jokes are way funnier than this! [Extends his arm in a dramatic gesture.]
character_words: This is pathetic! My jokes are way funnier than this!

full_text: [Laughing.] I think he's got you pegged!
character_words: I think he's got you pegged!

full_text: [Cut to the stage where Actress Katara now stands in the canoe.] Every day, the world awaits a beacon to guide us, yet none appears! [Cut to close-up of the actress who holds her hand out and clasps her hands together dramatically.] Still, we cannot give up hope! For hope, [Begins to cry.] is all we have! And we must never relinquish it, even ... [Sniffs and falls back into a sitting position.] even to our dying breath! [Leans over the side of the canoe and buries her face in her hands, crying.]
character_words: Every day, the world awaits a beacon to guide us, yet none appears!  Still, we cannot give up hope! For hope,  is all we have! And we must never relinquish it, even ...  even to our dying breath!

full_text: [With crossed arms, displeased.] Well, that's just silly. I don't sound like that.
character_words: Well, that's just silly. I don't sound like that.

full_text: [Elated.] Oh man! This writer's a genius!
character_words: Oh man! This writer's a genius!

full_text: It appears to be someone frozen in ice, perhaps for a hundred years.
character_words: It appears to be someone frozen in ice, perhaps for a hundred years.

full_text: [Closer shot of the silhouette swaying from side to side inside the iceberg prop.] But who? Who is the boy in the iceberg?
character_words: But who? Who is the boy in the iceberg?

full_text: Waterbend! Hi-yah!
character_words: Waterbend! Hi-yah!

full_text: Who are you, frozen boy?
character_words: Who are you, frozen boy?

full_text: [Laughs; in a high-pitched voice.] I'm the Avatar, silly, here to spread joy and fun! [She leans toward Actress Katara, laying a finger on her lips, and also motions toward Actor Sokka before standing upright and spreading her arms out in a cheery gesture.]
character_words: I'm the Avatar, silly, here to spread joy and fun!

full_text: Wait, is that a woman playing me?
character_words: Wait, is that a woman playing me?

full_text: [Gasps.] An airbender! [Clasps her hands to her chest.] My heart is so full of hope, [Drops down on one knee emotionally.] that it's making me tearbend! [Begins to cry and grabs on to Actress Aang's leg. Cut to close-up of Actress Katara who continues to bawl dramatically. Cut back to shot of the entire trio.]
character_words: An airbender!  My heart is so full of hope,  that it's making me tearbend!

full_text: My stomach is so empty, that it's making me tearbend! [Throws his arms up hopelessly before dropping to his knees, clutching on to Actress Aang's other leg, and crying.] I need meat! [Cut to close-up of Actor Sokka.]
character_words: My stomach is so empty, that it's making me tearbend!  I need meat!

full_text: [Stoops down, puts her arm around Actor Sokka's shoulders, and points upward.] But wait! Is that a platter of meaty dumplings? [Cut to actual Aang whose head and arm rest lazily on the railing, unimpressed.]
character_words: But wait! Is that a platter of meaty dumplings?

full_text: [Excitedly; shielding his eyes with his hand and turning his head, searching for the alleged dumplings.] Ooh, where, where?
character_words: Ooh, where, where?

full_text: [Laughs and swings arm jovially.] Did I mention that I'm an incurable prankster? [Crosses her legs as the audience laughs.]
character_words: Did I mention that I'm an incurable prankster?

full_text: [Cut to wide shot of Team Avatar. Aang extends his arm toward the stage, angry with the actress' bad portrayal.] I don't do that! That's not what I'm like! And I'm not a woman! [Throws hands up in frustration.]
character_words: I don't do that! That's not what I'm like! And I'm not a woman!

full_text: [Laughs and turns to face Aang.] Oh, they nailed you, Twinkle Toes! [Continues to laugh.]
character_words: Oh, they nailed you, Twinkle Toes!

full_text: Prince Zuko, you must try this cake! [Holds up a platter of cake with one slice missing.]
character_words: Prince Zuko, you must try this cake!

full_text: I don't have time to stuff my face! [Lowers his telescope and turns to Actor Iroh.] I must capture the Avatar to regain my honor! [Faces out into the audience, clutching his hand in a fist assertively.]
character_words: I don't have time to stuff my face!  I must capture the Avatar to regain my honor!

full_text: [Cut to wide shot of the model ship.] Well, while you do that, maybe I'll capture another slice. [He holds the cake up higher before bringing it toward his face and proceeding to gobble it down ravenously and noisily.]
character_words: Well, while you do that, maybe I'll capture another slice.

full_text: [Viewing Actor Iroh.] You sicken me!
character_words: You sicken me!

full_text: [Gestures toward the stage.] They make me look totally stiff and humorless.
character_words: They make me look totally stiff and humorless.

full_text: [Complacently amused.] Actually, I think that actor's pretty spot on.
character_words: Actually, I think that actor's pretty spot on.

full_text: [In protest; holding his arms out.] How could you say that?
character_words: How could you say that?

full_text: [Completely at ease.] Let's forget about the Avatar and get massages!
character_words: Let's forget about the Avatar and get massages!

full_text: [Turns toward his uncle, leaning forward menacingly; shouting.] How could you say that?
character_words: How could you say that?

full_text: Hey look, I think I found something! [Tiptoes to the bush. Actor Sokka scratches his head while Actress Katara shrugs. Actress Aang picks up the Momo prop, a rabbit-monkey puppet.] It's a flying rabbit-monkey! I think I'll name him, Momo! [Laughs; using puppet.] Hi everybody, I love you! [The audience laughs.]
character_words: Hey look, I think I found something!  It's a flying rabbit-monkey! I think I'll name him, Momo!  Hi everybody, I love you!

full_text: Ugh.
character_words: Ugh.

full_text: [Pointing to his backside.] Does this dress make my butt look fat?
character_words: Does this dress make my butt look fat?

full_text: Riddles and challenges you must face, [Camera pans back to show the whole stage.] if you are ever to leave this place! [Laughs.]
character_words: Riddles and challenges you must face,  if you are ever to leave this place!

full_text: [Lifting up a piece of the jennamite prop.] Ugh! Oh!
character_words: Ugh! Oh!

full_text: Why did you have to steal that waterbending scroll?
character_words: Why did you have to steal that waterbending scroll?

full_text: [Crying.] It just gave me so much hope! [Katara narrows her eyes.]
character_words: It just gave me so much hope!

full_text: The Avatar is mine! [Looking of stage.] Wait, who's coming?
character_words: The Avatar is mine!  Wait, who's coming?

full_text: [Jumps on stage holding two swords and has a large mask.] I'm the Blue Spirit, the scourge of the Fire Nation, here to save the Avatar!
character_words: I'm the Blue Spirit, the scourge of the Fire Nation, here to save the Avatar!

full_text: My hero! [Jumps on top of the Blue Spirit's large mask.]
character_words: My hero!

full_text: Don't cry, baby! Jet will wipe out that nasty town for you!
character_words: Don't cry, baby! Jet will wipe out that nasty town for you!

full_text: Oh Jet, you're so bad.
character_words: Oh Jet, you're so bad.

full_text: [Gasps.] Look! It's the Great Divide! The biggest canyon in the Earth Kingdom!
character_words: Look! It's the Great Divide! The biggest canyon in the Earth Kingdom!

full_text: Eh, let's keep flying.
character_words: Eh, let's keep flying.

full_text: Don't go, Yue! You're the only woman who has taken my mind off of food! [Kisses Yue. Gags.] Wait, did you have pickled fish for dinner?
character_words: Don't go, Yue! You're the only woman who has taken my mind off of food!  Wait, did you have pickled fish for dinner?

full_text: Goodbye, Sokka! I have important moon duties to take care of! [Exits on the moon prop.] And yes, I did have pickled fish!
character_words: Goodbye, Sokka! I have important moon duties to take care of!  And yes, I did have pickled fish!

full_text: [Laughs.] You never told me you made out with a Moon Spirit.
character_words: You never told me you made out with a Moon Spirit.

full_text: Shhh! [Tearing up.] I'm trying to watch! [Suki looks away, and folds her arms.]
character_words: Shhh!  I'm trying to watch!

full_text: [Laughs.] The Avatar is back to save the day! Yay! [Actress Aang stomps three more miniature ships before tripping over her Koizilla costume and falling.]
character_words: The Avatar is back to save the day! Yay!

full_text: Ugh!
character_words: Ugh!

full_text: So far, this intermission is the best part of the play.
character_words: So far, this intermission is the best part of the play.

full_text: [Walks down the stairs holding a bag of flaming fire flakes and sits next to Suki.] Apparently, the playwright thinks I'm an idiot who tells bad jokes about meat all the time!
character_words: Apparently, the playwright thinks I'm an idiot who tells bad jokes about meat all the time!

full_text: [Hint of sarcasm.] Yeah, you tell bad jokes about plenty of other topics.
character_words: Yeah, you tell bad jokes about plenty of other topics.

full_text: [Eats a fire flake.] I know!
character_words: I know!

full_text: [Angry.] At least the Sokka actor kind of looks like you. That woman playing the Avatar doesn't resemble me at all!
character_words: At least the Sokka actor kind of looks like you. That woman playing the Avatar doesn't resemble me at all!

full_text: I don't know, you are more in touch with your feminine side than most guys.
character_words: I don't know, you are more in touch with your feminine side than most guys.

full_text: [Standing up.] Argh!
character_words: Argh!

full_text: Relax, Aang. They're not accurate portrayals. It's not like I'm a preachy crybaby who can't resist giving overemotional speeches about hope all the time. [Everyone looks at her.] What?
character_words: Relax, Aang. They're not accurate portrayals. It's not like I'm a preachy crybaby who can't resist giving overemotional speeches about hope all the time.  What?

full_text: [Turns around and sits down. Sarcastically.] Yeah, that's not you at all.
character_words: Yeah, that's not you at all.

full_text: Listen friends, it's obvious that the playwright did his research. I know it must hurt, but what you're seeing up there on that stage is the truth.
character_words: Listen friends, it's obvious that the playwright did his research. I know it must hurt, but what you're seeing up there on that stage is the truth.

full_text: Well, here we are in the Earth Kingdom!
character_words: Well, here we are in the Earth Kingdom!

full_text: [Opens up her miniature air glider prop.] I'd better have a look around to see if I can find an earthbending teacher! [Jumps up into the air with a cable lifting her up.]
character_words: I'd better have a look around to see if I can find an earthbending teacher!

full_text: This is it, this must be where I come in!
character_words: This is it, this must be where I come in!

full_text: I flew all over town, but I couldn't find a single earthbending master!
character_words: I flew all over town, but I couldn't find a single earthbending master!

full_text: Here it comes ...
character_words: Here it comes ...

full_text: [Enters the stage from a trapdoor beneath the rock prop and holds it above his head.] You can't find an earthbending master in the sky, you have to look underground! [Throws away the prop.]
character_words: You can't find an earthbending master in the sky, you have to look underground!

full_text: Who are you?
character_words: Who are you?

full_text: [Spits.] My name's Toph, [Flexes.] because it sounds like tough, and that's just what I am! [Audience laughs.]
character_words: My name's Toph,  because it sounds like tough, and that's just what I am!

full_text: Wait a minute, [Picks at her ear with her pinky.] I sound like a guy. A really buff guy.
character_words: Wait a minute,  I sound like a guy. A really buff guy.

full_text: Well Toph, what you hear up there is the truth. It hurts, doesn't it?
character_words: Well Toph, what you hear up there is the truth. It hurts, doesn't it?

full_text: Are you kidding me? I wouldn't have cast it any other way! [Laughs as Katara looks away in dismay.] At least it's not a flying bald lady! [Camera pans to Aang, who turns toward the stage in annoyance.]
character_words: Are you kidding me? I wouldn't have cast it any other way!  At least it's not a flying bald lady!

full_text: So, you're blind? [Waves hand in front of Actor Toph's eyes.]
character_words: So, you're blind?

full_text: [Laughs.] I can see you doing that. I see everything that you see, except I don't "see" like you do. I release a sonic wave from my mouth. [Screams very loudly at the Team Avatar players. The audience and Team Avatar grimace at the scream; Aang claps his hands over his ears, Zuko grips the railing in front of him, Suki and Sokka hug each other in terror, and Katara grits her teeth while Toph looks excited.] There. I got a pretty good look at you. [Actress Aang and the audience claps.]
character_words: I can see you doing that. I see everything that you see, except I don't "see" like you do. I release a sonic wave from my mouth.  There. I got a pretty good look at you.

full_text: Zuko, it's time we had a talk ... [Points to Zuko, who now wears a large wig.] about your hair, it's gone too far!
character_words: Zuko, it's time we had a talk ...  about your hair, it's gone too far!

full_text: Maybe it's best if we ... split ... up! [Actors Zuko and Iroh walk away from each other.]
character_words: Maybe it's best if we ... split ... up!

full_text: Azula, my sister, what are you doing here?
character_words: Azula, my sister, what are you doing here?

full_text: You caught me. Wait, what's that? [Points in the distance.] I think it's your honor!
character_words: You caught me. Wait, what's that?  I think it's your honor!

full_text: Where? [Everybody looks while Actress Azula escapes through a door.]
character_words: Where?

full_text: [Turning to audience.] She escaped, but how?
character_words: She escaped, but how?

full_text: If she continues drilling, this wall will come down for sure!
character_words: If she continues drilling, this wall will come down for sure!

full_text: [Blocks the rock prop.] Haha, yes! Continue drilling! The city of Ba Sing Se can hide no longer!
character_words: Haha, yes! Continue drilling! The city of Ba Sing Se can hide no longer!

full_text: No, Jet! What did they do to you?
character_words: No, Jet! What did they do to you?

full_text: Must ... serve ... Earth King! [Begins swinging his hook hand wildly at Actress Aang and Actor Sokka.] Must ... destroy!
character_words: Must ... serve ... Earth King!  Must ... destroy!

full_text: Did Jet just ... die?
character_words: Did Jet just ... die?

full_text: You know, it was really unclear.
character_words: You know, it was really unclear.

full_text: I have to admit Prince Zuko, I really find you attractive!
character_words: I have to admit Prince Zuko, I really find you attractive!

full_text: [Shot changes to show him sitting on a rock bench.] You don't have to make fun of me.
character_words: You don't have to make fun of me.

full_text: But I mean it! [Sits down with Actor Zuko.] I've had eyes for you since the day you first captured me! [Zuko and Katara inch away from each other, slightly uncomfortable. Aang narrows his eyebrows.]
character_words: But I mean it!  I've had eyes for you since the day you first captured me!

full_text: [Stands up.] Wait, I thought you were the Avatar's girl! [Aang nods.]
character_words: Wait, I thought you were the Avatar's girl!

full_text: [Laughs.] The Avatar? [Stands up and walks toward Actor Zuko.] Why, he's like a little brother to me! [Laughs.] I certainly don't think of him in a romantic way. [Aang grows concerned.] Besides, how could he ever find out about ... this? [Actress Katara and Actor Zuko embrace and hold hands while Actress Katara pops up one leg. Aang gets up.]
character_words: The Avatar?  Why, he's like a little brother to me!  I certainly don't think of him in a romantic way.  Besides, how could he ever find out about ... this?

full_text: [Whispering.] Oh, you're getting up? [As Aang leaves.] Can you get me some fire flakes? [Puts his arm around Suki, but whispers to Aang again.] Ooh, and fire gummies! [Puts his arm back around Suki, who looks slightly annoyed.]
character_words: Oh, you're getting up?  Can you get me some fire flakes?  Ooh, and fire gummies!

full_text: Well, my brother, what's it going to be? Your nation, or a life of treachery?
character_words: Well, my brother, what's it going to be? Your nation, or a life of treachery?

full_text: [Stops drinking from a cup.] Choose treachery, it's more fun! [Winks and gives a thumbs up sign.]
character_words: Choose treachery, it's more fun!

full_text: No way!
character_words: No way!

full_text: [Pushes Actor Iroh over and walks to Actress Azula.] I hate you, Uncle! You smell, and I hate you for all time!
character_words: I hate you, Uncle! You smell, and I hate you for all time!

full_text: [To Zuko.] You didn't really say that, did you?
character_words: You didn't really say that, did you?

full_text: I might as well have.
character_words: I might as well have.

full_text: Avatar State, yip yip!
character_words: Avatar State, yip yip!

full_text: Not if my lightning can help it!
character_words: Not if my lightning can help it!

full_text: The Avatar is no more!
character_words: The Avatar is no more!

full_text: It seems like every time there's a big battle, you guys barely make it out alive. I mean, you guys lose a lot!
character_words: It seems like every time there's a big battle, you guys barely make it out alive. I mean, you guys lose a lot!

full_text: You're one to talk, Suki. Didn't Azula take you captive? That's right, she did!
character_words: You're one to talk, Suki. Didn't Azula take you captive? That's right, she did!

full_text: [Looks at Sokka seriously.] Are you trying to get on my bad side?
character_words: Are you trying to get on my bad side?

full_text: I'm just saying ...
character_words: I'm just saying ...

full_text: Does anyone know where Aang is?
character_words: Does anyone know where Aang is?

full_text: He left to get me fire gummies, like, ten minutes ago. And I'm still waiting!
character_words: He left to get me fire gummies, like, ten minutes ago. And I'm still waiting!

full_text: I'm gonna check outside.
character_words: I'm gonna check outside.

full_text: Are you all right?
character_words: Are you all right?

full_text: [Angered.] No, I'm not! I hate this play! [Yanks his hat off and throws it on the ground.]
character_words: No, I'm not! I hate this play!

full_text: I know it's upsetting, but it sounds like you're overreacting.
character_words: I know it's upsetting, but it sounds like you're overreacting.

full_text: Overreacting? If I hadn't blocked my chakra, I'd probably be in the Avatar State right now!
character_words: Overreacting? If I hadn't blocked my chakra, I'd probably be in the Avatar State right now!

full_text: Suki, what are the chances you can get me backstage? I got some jokes I want to give to the actor me.
character_words: Suki, what are the chances you can get me backstage? I got some jokes I want to give to the actor me.

full_text: [Seriously.] I'm an elite warrior who's trained for many years in the art of stealth. [Smiling.] I think I could get you backstage! [Sokka and Suki leave.]
character_words: I'm an elite warrior who's trained for many years in the art of stealth.  I think I could get you backstage!

full_text: [To Zuko, after observing everyone's reactions.] Geez, everyone's getting so upset about their characters. Even you seem more down than usual, and that's saying something!
character_words: Geez, everyone's getting so upset about their characters. Even you seem more down than usual, and that's saying something!

full_text: You don't get it, it's different for you. You get a muscly version of yourself, taking down ten bad guys at once, and making sassy remarks.
character_words: You don't get it, it's different for you. You get a muscly version of yourself, taking down ten bad guys at once, and making sassy remarks.

full_text: Yeah, that's pretty great!
character_words: Yeah, that's pretty great!

full_text: But for me, it takes all the mistakes I've made in my life, and shoves them back in my face. My uncle, he's always been on my side, even when things were bad. He was there for me, he taught me so much, and how do I repay him? With a knife in his back. It's my greatest regret, and I may never get to redeem myself.
character_words: But for me, it takes all the mistakes I've made in my life, and shoves them back in my face. My uncle, he's always been on my side, even when things were bad. He was there for me, he taught me so much, and how do I repay him? With a knife in his back. It's my greatest regret, and I may never get to redeem myself.

full_text: [Sits down next to him.] You have redeemed yourself to your uncle. You don't realize it, but you already have.
character_words: You have redeemed yourself to your uncle. You don't realize it, but you already have.

full_text: How do you know?
character_words: How do you know?

full_text: Because I once had a long conversation with the guy, and all he would talk about was you.
