character_words: Because I once had a long conversation with the guy, and all he would talk about was you.

full_text: Really?
character_words: Really?

full_text: Yeah, and it was kind of annoying.
character_words: Yeah, and it was kind of annoying.

full_text: Oh, sorry.
character_words: Oh, sorry.

full_text: But it was also very sweet. All your uncle wanted was for you to find your own path, and see the light. Now you're here with us. He'd be proud. [Punches Zuko on the shoulder.]
character_words: But it was also very sweet. All your uncle wanted was for you to find your own path, and see the light. Now you're here with us. He'd be proud.

full_text: Ow! What was that for?
character_words: Ow! What was that for?

full_text: That's how I show affection.
character_words: That's how I show affection.

full_text: Your Zuko costume's pretty good, but your scar's on the wrong side. [Runs off.]
character_words: Your Zuko costume's pretty good, but your scar's on the wrong side.

full_text: The scar's not on the wrong side! [Covers his face with his hood.]
character_words: The scar's not on the wrong side!

full_text: He's coming this way!
character_words: He's coming this way!

full_text: Can I help you?
character_words: Can I help you?

full_text: Actually, I think I can help you. I'm a big Sokka fan, but I don't think you're representing him quite as well as you could be.
character_words: Actually, I think I can help you. I'm a big Sokka fan, but I don't think you're representing him quite as well as you could be.

full_text: [Starts walking away.] Aww no, another fan with ideas.
character_words: Aww no, another fan with ideas.

full_text: [Runs in front of him.] Just hear me out. [Pulls out some cards.] Here's something I think the real Sokka would say. [Clears throat.] What does the cabbage merchant use to fix his cabbages? A cabbage patch!
character_words: Just hear me out.  Here's something I think the real Sokka would say.  What does the cabbage merchant use to fix his cabbages? A cabbage patch!

full_text: [Chuckles.] That's actually pretty good! Let me see those! [Takes the cards from Sokka. Reads one and laughs.] "A rocky relationship" ... not bad!
character_words: That's actually pretty good! Let me see those!  "A rocky relationship" ... not bad!

full_text: [Puts his arm around Actor Sokka's shoulder.] Also, don't be afraid to make up some phrases, especially before an attack. Something like ... "Flying kick-a-pow!". [The two begin to walk away.]
character_words: Also, don't be afraid to make up some phrases, especially before an attack. Something like ... "Flying kick-a-pow!".

full_text: Who are you, anyway?
character_words: Who are you, anyway?

full_text: I'm just a guy who likes comedy.
character_words: I'm just a guy who likes comedy.

full_text: Katara, did you really mean what you said in there?
character_words: Katara, did you really mean what you said in there?

full_text: In where? What are you talking about?
character_words: In where? What are you talking about?

full_text: On stage, when you said I was just like a ... brother to you, and you didn't have feelings for me.
character_words: On stage, when you said I was just like a ... brother to you, and you didn't have feelings for me.

full_text: I didn't say that. An actor said that.
character_words: I didn't say that. An actor said that.

full_text: But it's true, isn't it? We kissed at the Invasion, and I thought we were gonna be together. But we're not.
character_words: But it's true, isn't it? We kissed at the Invasion, and I thought we were gonna be together. But we're not.

full_text: Aang, I don't know.
character_words: Aang, I don't know.

full_text: Why don't you know?
character_words: Why don't you know?

full_text: Because, we're in the middle of a war, and, we have other things to worry about. This isn't the right time.
character_words: Because, we're in the middle of a war, and, we have other things to worry about. This isn't the right time.

full_text: Well, when is the right time?
character_words: Well, when is the right time?

full_text: Aang, I'm sorry, but right now I'm just a little confused.
character_words: Aang, I'm sorry, but right now I'm just a little confused.

full_text: I just said I was confused! I'm going inside. [Exits the balcony.]
character_words: I just said I was confused! I'm going inside.

full_text: Ugh, I'm such an idiot! [Puts down his head on the balcony railing.]
character_words: Ugh, I'm such an idiot!

full_text: Here's what you missed ... we went to the Fire Nation, and you got better, and Katara was the Painted Lady, and I got a sword, and I think Combustion Man died. Oh, look, the Invasion's about to start! Shhh!
character_words: Here's what you missed ... we went to the Fire Nation, and you got better, and Katara was the Painted Lady, and I got a sword, and I think Combustion Man died. Oh, look, the Invasion's about to start! Shhh!

full_text: I just wanted to let you know, Aang, that I'll always love you. Like a brother.
character_words: I just wanted to let you know, Aang, that I'll always love you. Like a brother.

full_text: [Punching the air.] I wouldn't want it any other way!
character_words: I wouldn't want it any other way!

full_text: Hey Toph, would you say you and Aang have a "rocky relationship"? [Audience laughs.]
character_words: Hey Toph, would you say you and Aang have a "rocky relationship"?

full_text: [Laughs hysterically at Suki and Aang. Lifts up Aang's hat.] I told him to say that!
character_words: I told him to say that!

full_text: I hope everyone's ready for the Invasion! Slap-a-pow! [The audience and Sokka laugh.]
character_words: I hope everyone's ready for the Invasion! Slap-a-pow!

full_text: We finally made it to the Royal Palace, but no one's home!
character_words: We finally made it to the Royal Palace, but no one's home!

full_text: Actually, I'm home, and I want to join you!
character_words: Actually, I'm home, and I want to join you!

full_text: [Lowers his boomerang.] I guess we have no choice. Come on! [All exit stage left, except for Actress Aang, who is lifted off stage.]
character_words: I guess we have no choice. Come on!

full_text: [Stands up and stretches.] I guess that's it. The play's caught up to the present now.
character_words: I guess that's it. The play's caught up to the present now.

full_text: Wait, the play's not over!
character_words: Wait, the play's not over!

full_text: [Sits back down.] But it is over, unless ... [Dramatically.] this is the future.
character_words: But it is over, unless ...  this is the future.

full_text: With the energy harnessed from that comet, no one will be able to stop ... [Lifts his hands in the air.] the Fire Nation!
character_words: With the energy harnessed from that comet, no one will be able to stop ...  the Fire Nation!

full_text: Father, Zuko and the Avatar are at the Palace. They're trying to stop you!
character_words: Father, Zuko and the Avatar are at the Palace. They're trying to stop you!

full_text: You take care of Zuko. I shall face the Avatar myself! [Disappears behind a smokescreen.]
character_words: You take care of Zuko. I shall face the Avatar myself!

full_text: Aang! You find the Fire Lord, I'll hold her off!
character_words: Aang! You find the Fire Lord, I'll hold her off!

full_text: You are no longer my brother. You are an enemy!
character_words: You are no longer my brother. You are an enemy!

full_text: No! I am the rightful heir to the throne!
character_words: No! I am the rightful heir to the throne!

full_text: We'll see!
character_words: We'll see!

full_text: Honor! [He drops off stage through a trapdoor with the flames.]
character_words: Honor!

full_text: So, you have mastered all four elements?
character_words: So, you have mastered all four elements?

full_text: [Pointing her staff prop at him.] Yeah, and now you're going down!
character_words: Yeah, and now you're going down!

full_text: No! It is you who are going down! [Stands up.] You see, you are too late! The comet is already here, [Actress Aang looks in concern at the audience. Aang widens his eyes.] and I'm unstoppable!
character_words: No! It is you who are going down!  You see, you are too late! The comet is already here,  and I'm unstoppable!

full_text: [Becomes wrapped in the fire blanket.] Noooo ...! [Falls to the stage with her eyes closed.]
character_words: Noooo ...!

full_text: It is over, Father. We've done it!
character_words: It is over, Father. We've done it!

full_text: Yes! We have done it! The dreams of my father, [Large fire sheets rise behind him and a platform lifts him up.] and my father's father, have now been realized! [A Fire Nation flag drops.] The world ... is ... mine!
character_words: Yes! We have done it! The dreams of my father,  and my father's father, have now been realized!  The world ... is ... mine!

full_text: That ... wasn't a good play.
character_words: That ... wasn't a good play.

full_text: I'll say.
character_words: I'll say.

full_text: No kidding.
character_words: No kidding.

full_text: Horrible.
character_words: Horrible.

full_text: You said it.
character_words: You said it.

full_text: [Walking with Suki.] But the effects were decent!
character_words: But the effects were decent!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: More ferocious! Imagine striking through your opponent's heart!
character_words: More ferocious! Imagine striking through your opponent's heart!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: [Stops firebending and turns to Zuko while growling in irritance.] I'm trying.
character_words: I'm trying.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Now let me hear you roar like a tigerdillo! [Aang gives a light roar as fire bursts come out of his hands and mouth; cuts to a front scene of his embarrassed grin.] That sounded pathetic! I said roar!
character_words: Now let me hear you roar like a tigerdillo!  That sounded pathetic! I said roar!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: [Holding up two watermelons.] Who wants a nice cool glass of watermelon juice?
character_words: Who wants a nice cool glass of watermelon juice?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: [Brightens up upon hearing this.] Ooh, ooh! Me, me, me! [Runs to Katara.]
character_words: Ooh, ooh! Me, me, me!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: [Zuko's hand comes into screen and grabs Aang by the shirt of his robes.] Hey! [Aang keeps trying to run off, but it is useless.] Your lesson's not over yet! Get back here! [Holds Aang up.]
character_words: Hey!  Your lesson's not over yet! Get back here!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: [Lounging on stairs with Sokka.]Come on, Zuko. Just take a break. What's the big deal?
character_words: Come on, Zuko. Just take a break. What's the big deal?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: [Lets Aang go.] Fine! [Aang happily runs off and takes a watermelon.] If you want to lounge around like a bunch of snail sloths all day, then go ahead! [Walks away.]
character_words: Fine!  If you want to lounge around like a bunch of snail sloths all day, then go ahead!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Maybe Zuko's right. Sitting around the house has made us pretty lazy. But I know [Lays his watermelon aside and stands up slowly.] just the thing to change all that. [Takes off his robe, revealing a bathing suit.] Beach party!
character_words: Maybe Zuko's right. Sitting around the house has made us pretty lazy. But I know  just the thing to change all that.  Beach party!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Check out my Appa sand sculpture. [Appa roars at the sculpture.]
character_words: Check out my Appa sand sculpture.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Not bad, baldy, [Aang jumps off the sculpture.] but I've been working on my sandbending. [Cracks her fingers.] You're gonna love this.
character_words: Not bad, baldy,  but I've been working on my sandbending.  You're gonna love this.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: [Amazed.] Whoa! Wow, you've even made a little Earth King and Bosco.
character_words: Whoa! Wow, you've even made a little Earth King and Bosco.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Try and top that, Sokka.
character_words: Try and top that, Sokka.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: [Reveals a grotesque looking sculpture with seaweed for hair, a starfish for a nose, and rocks and shells for eyes and mouth.] Ta da!
character_words: Ta da!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Is that a blubbering blob monster?
character_words: Is that a blubbering blob monster?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: [Defensively.] No, it's Suki!
character_words: No, it's Suki!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Suki, we'll all understand if you break up with him over this.
character_words: Suki, we'll all understand if you break up with him over this.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: [Sitting on a beach towel.] I think it's sweet.
character_words: I think it's sweet.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: But it doesn't even look like- Aah!
character_words: But it doesn't even look like- Aah!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: [Peeking out from behind the sculpture fearfully.] What are you doing?
character_words: What are you doing?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Teaching you a lesson!
character_words: Teaching you a lesson!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: What happened?
character_words: What happened?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: [While rebuilding his sculpture.] Zuko's gone crazy! I made a sand sculpture of Suki and he destroyed it! [Pauses a moment.] Oh, and he's attacking Aang.
character_words: Zuko's gone crazy! I made a sand sculpture of Suki and he destroyed it!  Oh, and he's attacking Aang.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Get a grip before I blast you off this roof!
character_words: Get a grip before I blast you off this roof!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Go ahead and do it!
character_words: Go ahead and do it!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Enough!
character_words: Enough!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: [Worried.] What's wrong with you? You could have hurt Aang!
character_words: What's wrong with you? You could have hurt Aang!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: What's wrong with me? What's wrong with all of you? How can you sit around having beach parties when Sozin's Comet is only three days away? [Everybody looks at Zuko.] Why are you all looking at me like I'm crazy?
character_words: What's wrong with me? What's wrong with all of you? How can you sit around having beach parties when Sozin's Comet is only three days away?  Why are you all looking at me like I'm crazy?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: About Sozin's Comet ... I was actually gonna wait to fight the Fire Lord until after it came.
character_words: About Sozin's Comet ... I was actually gonna wait to fight the Fire Lord until after it came.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: [Shocked.] After?
character_words: After?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: I'm not ready. I need more time to master firebending.
character_words: I'm not ready. I need more time to master firebending.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: And frankly, your earthbending could still use some work too. [Aang grimaces.]
character_words: And frankly, your earthbending could still use some work too.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: So, you all knew Aang was going to wait?
character_words: So, you all knew Aang was going to wait?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Honestly, if Aang tries to fight the Fire Lord now, he's going to lose. [Aang looks over to Sokka as he says this, frowns, and closes his eyes in defeat. To Aang.] No offense.
character_words: Honestly, if Aang tries to fight the Fire Lord now, he's going to lose.  No offense.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: The whole point of fighting the Fire Lord before the Comet was to stop the Fire Nation from winning the War, but they pretty much won the War when they took Ba Sing Se. Things can't get any worse.
character_words: The whole point of fighting the Fire Lord before the Comet was to stop the Fire Nation from winning the War, but they pretty much won the War when they took Ba Sing Se. Things can't get any worse.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: You're wrong. [Turns away from them.] It's about to get worse than you can even imagine. [Flashes back to one day before the Day of Black Sun. Servants help Zuko get dressed on his way to a meeting. Once done, they stay behind and bow to him as he walks on. Voice-over.] The day before the eclipse, my father asked me to attend an important war meeting. It was what I dreamed about for so many years. My father had finally accepted me back.
character_words: You're wrong.  It's about to get worse than you can even imagine.  The day before the eclipse, my father asked me to attend an important war meeting. It was what I dreamed about for so many years. My father had finally accepted me back.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Welcome, Prince Zuko. We waited for you. [Zuko walks up to his father. He bows to Ozai and sits down next to him.] General Shinu, your report.
character_words: Welcome, Prince Zuko. We waited for you.  General Shinu, your report.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Thank you, sir. [Stands up and walks up to the opposite side of Ozai across the table.] Ba Sing Se is still under our control. However, earthbender rebellions have prevented us from achieving total victory in the Earth Kingdom.
character_words: Thank you, sir.  Ba Sing Se is still under our control. However, earthbender rebellions have prevented us from achieving total victory in the Earth Kingdom.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: What is your recommendation?
character_words: What is your recommendation?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Our army is spread too thin, but once the eclipse is over and the invasion defeated, we should transfer more domestic forces into the Earth Kingdom.
character_words: Our army is spread too thin, but once the eclipse is over and the invasion defeated, we should transfer more domestic forces into the Earth Kingdom.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Hmm. Prince Zuko, you've been among the Earth Kingdom commoners. Do you think that adding more troops will stop these rebellions?
character_words: Hmm. Prince Zuko, you've been among the Earth Kingdom commoners. Do you think that adding more troops will stop these rebellions?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: The people of the Earth Kingdom are proud and strong. They can endure anything, as long as they have hope.
character_words: The people of the Earth Kingdom are proud and strong. They can endure anything, as long as they have hope.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Yes, you're right. We need to destroy their hope.
character_words: Yes, you're right. We need to destroy their hope.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Well, that's not exactly what I-
character_words: Well, that's not exactly what I-

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: I think you should take their precious hope and the rest of their land and burn it all to the ground.
character_words: I think you should take their precious hope and the rest of their land and burn it all to the ground.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Yes ... [Cuts to Azula looking pleased.]Yes you're right, Azula. [Stands up and walks to the world map.] Sozin's Comet is almost upon us, and on that day, it will endow us with the strength and power of a hundred suns. No bender will stand a chance against us.
character_words: Yes ... Yes you're right, Azula.  Sozin's Comet is almost upon us, and on that day, it will endow us with the strength and power of a hundred suns. No bender will stand a chance against us.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: What are you suggesting, sir?
character_words: What are you suggesting, sir?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: When the comet last came, my grandfather, Fire Lord Sozin, used it to wipe out the Air Nomads. [Cut to Zuko.] Now, I will use its power to end the Earth Kingdom ... [Zuko looks astonished. Cut back to Ozai smiling.] permanently. [The shot changes to an aerial view of the map which Ozai walks to the center.] From our airships, we will rain fire over their lands, a fire that will destroy everything; and out of the ashes, a new world will be born, a world in which all the lands are Fire Nation and I am the supreme ruler of everything! [War generals applaud.]
character_words: When the comet last came, my grandfather, Fire Lord Sozin, used it to wipe out the Air Nomads.  Now, I will use its power to end the Earth Kingdom ...  permanently.  From our airships, we will rain fire over their lands, a fire that will destroy everything; and out of the ashes, a new world will be born, a world in which all the lands are Fire Nation and I am the supreme ruler of everything!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: [Voice-over.] I wanted to speak out against this horrifying plan, but I'm ashamed to say I didn't. [Fade to the present.] My whole life, I struggled to gain my father's love and acceptance, but once I had it, I realized I'd lost myself getting there. I'd forgotten who I was.
character_words: I wanted to speak out against this horrifying plan, but I'm ashamed to say I didn't.  My whole life, I struggled to gain my father's love and acceptance, but once I had it, I realized I'd lost myself getting there. I'd forgotten who I was.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: [Sinks to her knees.] I can't believe this.
character_words: I can't believe this.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: I always knew the Fire Lord was a bad guy, but his plan is just pure evil.
character_words: I always knew the Fire Lord was a bad guy, but his plan is just pure evil.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: What am I gonna do?
character_words: What am I gonna do?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: [Stands up from his rock seat and walks to Aang.] I know you're scared, and I know you're not ready to save the world, but if you don't defeat the Fire Lord before the comet comes, there won't be a world to save anymore.
character_words: I know you're scared, and I know you're not ready to save the world, but if you don't defeat the Fire Lord before the comet comes, there won't be a world to save anymore.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Why didn't you tell me about your dad's crazy plan sooner? [Walks away.]
character_words: Why didn't you tell me about your dad's crazy plan sooner?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: I didn't think I had to. I assumed you were still going to fight him before the comet. No one told me you decided to wait.
character_words: I didn't think I had to. I assumed you were still going to fight him before the comet. No one told me you decided to wait.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: [Holding his head with both hands.] This is bad. [Sinks down to his knees.] This is really, really bad.
character_words: This is bad.  This is really, really bad.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Aang, you don't have to do this alone.
character_words: Aang, you don't have to do this alone.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Yeah, if we all fight the Fire Lord together, we got a shot at taking him down.
character_words: Yeah, if we all fight the Fire Lord together, we got a shot at taking him down.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: All right! Team Avatar is back! Air. [Shot of Aang.] Water. [Shot of Katara.] Earth. [Shot of Toph.] Fire. [Shot of Zuko. Sokka gives Suki a clump of leaves and holds up a large leaf.] Fan and sword! [Sokka's leaf wilts.]
character_words: All right! Team Avatar is back! Air.  Water.  Earth.  Fire.  Fan and sword!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Fighting the Fire Lord is going to be the hardest thing we've ever done together, but I wouldn't want to do it any other way.
character_words: Fighting the Fire Lord is going to be the hardest thing we've ever done together, but I wouldn't want to do it any other way.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Yeah.
character_words: Yeah.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: All right.
character_words: All right.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Get over here, Zuko. Being part of the group also means being part of group hugs.
character_words: Get over here, Zuko. Being part of the group also means being part of group hugs.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: There's one technique you need to know before facing my father - how to redirect lightning. [Aang smiles.] If you let the energy in your own body flow, the lightning will follow it. [Uses his fingers to show how the energy should flow through the body.] You turn your opponents' energy against them.
character_words: There's one technique you need to know before facing my father - how to redirect lightning.  If you let the energy in your own body flow, the lightning will follow it.  You turn your opponents' energy against them.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: That's like waterbending. [Joins Zuko in practicing the lightning redirection form.]
character_words: That's like waterbending.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Exactly. My uncle invented this technique himself by studying waterbenders.
character_words: Exactly. My uncle invented this technique himself by studying waterbenders.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: So, have you ever redirected lightning before?
character_words: So, have you ever redirected lightning before?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Once, against my father.
character_words: Once, against my father.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: What did it feel like?
character_words: What did it feel like?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: [Stops practicing the lightning redirection form.] Exhilarating ... [Flashes back to the moment for a few seconds.] but terrifying. You feel so powerful holding that much energy in your body, but you know if you make the wrong move, it's over.
character_words: Exhilarating ...  but terrifying. You feel so powerful holding that much energy in your body, but you know if you make the wrong move, it's over.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: [Chuckles.] Well, not over over. I mean there's always Katara and a little Spirit Water action, [Turns to Katara.] am I right?
character_words: Well, not over over. I mean there's always Katara and a little Spirit Water action,  am I right?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Actually, I used it all up after Azula shot you.
character_words: Actually, I used it all up after Azula shot you.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: [Disappointed.] Oh.
character_words: Oh.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: You'll have to take the Fire Lord's life before he takes yours.
character_words: You'll have to take the Fire Lord's life before he takes yours.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Yeah, I'll just do that.
character_words: Yeah, I'll just do that.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Gather round, Team Avatar. [Puts a carved melon on a draped mannequin.] In order to take out the Fire Lord - or in this case, the Melon Lord - our timing has to be perfect. [Kneels down on the ground and uses a stick to draw a line heading toward the Melon Lord symbol.] First, Suki and I will draw his fire. Then, Katara and Zuko charge in with some liquidy hot offense, [Draws another line.] and while the Melon Lord is distracted, [Draws a third line.] Aang swoops in ... and bam! [Destroys the Melon Lord symbol with the line.] He delivers the final blow.
character_words: Gather round, Team Avatar.  In order to take out the Fire Lord - or in this case, the Melon Lord - our timing has to be perfect.  First, Suki and I will draw his fire. Then, Katara and Zuko charge in with some liquidy hot offense,  and while the Melon Lord is distracted,  Aang swoops in ... and bam!  He delivers the final blow.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Uh ... what about me?
character_words: Uh ... what about me?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: For now, you're the Melon Lord's forces.
character_words: For now, you're the Melon Lord's forces.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: [Excited.] So I get to chuck flaming rocks at all of you?
character_words: So I get to chuck flaming rocks at all of you?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Whatever makes the training feel more realistic.
character_words: Whatever makes the training feel more realistic.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Sweetness.
character_words: Sweetness.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Mwah-ha-ha-ha!
character_words: Mwah-ha-ha-ha!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Watch it, Toph!
character_words: Watch it, Toph!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: I am not Toph. I am Melon Lord! Mwah-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha!
character_words: I am not Toph. I am Melon Lord! Mwah-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Now, Aang!
character_words: Now, Aang!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: What are you waiting for? Take him out!
character_words: What are you waiting for? Take him out!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: [Shaking his head.] I can't.
character_words: I can't.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: [Walks up to Aang.] What's wrong with you? If this was the real deal, you'd be shot full of lightning right now.
character_words: What's wrong with you? If this was the real deal, you'd be shot full of lightning right now.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: I'm sorry, but it just didn't feel right. I didn't feel like myself.
character_words: I'm sorry, but it just didn't feel right. I didn't feel like myself.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: [Off-camera.] There, that's how it's done.
character_words: There, that's how it's done.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: [Holding a scroll.] I have a surprise for everyone!
character_words: I have a surprise for everyone!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: I knew it! You did have a secret thing with Haru! [She smiles while Sokka, Suki, and Zuko look at her strangely.]
character_words: I knew it! You did have a secret thing with Haru!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Uh, no. [Everybody else starts eating again.] I was looking for cooking pots in the attic, and I found this! [Unravels the scroll showing a painting of a happy dark-haired baby playing at the beach.] Look at baby Zuko. Isn't he cute?
character_words: Uh, no.  I was looking for cooking pots in the attic, and I found this!  Look at baby Zuko. Isn't he cute?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: [To Zuko.] Oh, lighten up. I'm just teasing.
character_words: Oh, lighten up. I'm just teasing.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: That's not me. It's my father.
character_words: That's not me. It's my father.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: But he looks so sweet and innocent.
character_words: But he looks so sweet and innocent.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Well, that sweet little kid grew up to be a monster, and the worst father in the history of fathers.
character_words: Well, that sweet little kid grew up to be a monster, and the worst father in the history of fathers.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: [The camera pans to him.] But he's still a human being.
character_words: But he's still a human being.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: You're going to defend him?
character_words: You're going to defend him?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: No, I agree with you. [Stands up.] Fire Lord Ozai is a horrible person, and the world would probably be better off without him, but there's got to be another way.
character_words: No, I agree with you.  Fire Lord Ozai is a horrible person, and the world would probably be better off without him, but there's got to be another way.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Like what?
character_words: Like what?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: I don't know. [Perking up.] Maybe we can make some big pots of glue, and then I can use gluebending to stick his arms and legs together so he can't bend anymore.
character_words: I don't know.  Maybe we can make some big pots of glue, and then I can use gluebending to stick his arms and legs together so he can't bend anymore.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: [Sarcastically.] Yeah, then you can show him his baby pictures, and all those happy memories will make him good again. [Suki and Sokka laugh in the background.]
character_words: Yeah, then you can show him his baby pictures, and all those happy memories will make him good again.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: [Excitedly.]Do you really think that would work?
character_words: Do you really think that would work?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: [Bluntly.] No!
character_words: No!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: [Sighs. Paces back and forth.] This goes against everything I learned from the monks. I can't just go around wiping out people I don't like.
character_words: This goes against everything I learned from the monks. I can't just go around wiping out people I don't like.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Sure you can. You're the Avatar. If it's in the name of keeping balance, I'm pretty sure the universe will forgive you.
character_words: Sure you can. You're the Avatar. If it's in the name of keeping balance, I'm pretty sure the universe will forgive you.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: [Turns back to Sokka; losing his temper.] This isn't a joke, Sokka! None of you understand the position I'm in.
character_words: This isn't a joke, Sokka! None of you understand the position I'm in.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Aang, we do understand. It's just ...
character_words: Aang, we do understand. It's just ...

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Just what, Katara? What?
character_words: Just what, Katara? What?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: We're trying to help!
character_words: We're trying to help!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Then, when you figure out a way for me to beat the Fire Lord without taking his life, I'd love to hear it! [Walks away.]
character_words: Then, when you figure out a way for me to beat the Fire Lord without taking his life, I'd love to hear it!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Aang, don't walk away from this. [Walks toward Aang.]
character_words: Aang, don't walk away from this.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: [Puts a hand on Katara's shoulder to stop her.] Let him go. He needs time to sort it out by himself.
character_words: Let him go. He needs time to sort it out by himself.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: [Stroking the lemur's head.]Hey, Momo. I don't suppose you know what I should do. [Momo squawks.] I didn't think so.
character_words: Hey, Momo. I don't suppose you know what I should do.  I didn't think so.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Okay, that's everything.
character_words: Okay, that's everything.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: No, it's not. Where's Aang?
character_words: No, it's not. Where's Aang?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Aang? Aang!
character_words: Aang? Aang!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Come on, lazy bones, let's go.
character_words: Come on, lazy bones, let's go.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: He left his staff. [Picks up the staff.] That's so strange.
character_words: He left his staff.  That's so strange.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: [Walks onto the porch with Toph.] Aang's not in the house. Let's check the beach. [Turns his head toward the beach.]
character_words: Aang's not in the house. Let's check the beach.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Look, there's his footprints. [The camera pans up toward Aang's footprints, which stop at the beach.] The trail ends here.
character_words: Look, there's his footprints.  The trail ends here.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: So, he went for a midnight swim and never came back?
character_words: So, he went for a midnight swim and never came back?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Maybe he was captured.
character_words: Maybe he was captured.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: I don't think so. [Examining the footprints.] There's no sign of a struggle.
character_words: I don't think so.  There's no sign of a struggle.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: I bet he ran away again.
character_words: I bet he ran away again.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Uh-uh. He left behind his glider and Appa.
character_words: Uh-uh. He left behind his glider and Appa.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Then what do you think happened to him, oh sleuthy one?
character_words: Then what do you think happened to him, oh sleuthy one?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: It's pretty obvious. Aang mysteriously disappears before an important battle? He's definitely on a Spirit World journey.
character_words: It's pretty obvious. Aang mysteriously disappears before an important battle? He's definitely on a Spirit World journey.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: But if he was, wouldn't his body still be here?
character_words: But if he was, wouldn't his body still be here?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: [Downcast.] Oh, yeah. Forgot about that.
character_words: Oh, yeah. Forgot about that.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Then he's got to be somewhere on Ember Island. Let's split up and look for him.
character_words: Then he's got to be somewhere on Ember Island. Let's split up and look for him.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: I'm going with Zuko! [Sokka, Suki, and Katara stare at her.] What?! Everyone else went on a life-changing field trip with Zuko. Now it's my turn.
character_words: I'm going with Zuko!  What?! Everyone else went on a life-changing field trip with Zuko. Now it's my turn.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: [Chanting.] Aang! Aang! Aang! Aang! Aang! Aang! Aang! Aang! Aang! Aang! Aang! Aang! Aang! Aang! [Shocked, Katara and Suki glance at each other and simultaneously run into the circle.]
character_words: Aang! Aang! Aang! Aang! Aang! Aang! Aang! Aang! Aang! Aang! Aang! Aang! Aang! Aang!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: [In the center of the crowd.] Avatar State! [Actor Toph lifts her up in the air.] Yip-yip! [Crowd cheers.]
character_words: Avatar State!  Yip-yip!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: And then when I was nine, I ran away again.
character_words: And then when I was nine, I ran away again.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Uh-huh.
character_words: Uh-huh.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: I know I shouldn't complain. My parents gave me everything I ever asked for, but they never gave me the one thing I really wanted, their love. You know what I mean?
character_words: I know I shouldn't complain. My parents gave me everything I ever asked for, but they never gave me the one thing I really wanted, their love. You know what I mean?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: [Sighs and stops walking.] Look, I know you had a really rough childhood, but we should really focus on finding Aang. [Continues walking.]
character_words: Look, I know you had a really rough childhood, but we should really focus on finding Aang.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: This is the worst field trip ever. [Sighs and continues walking.]
character_words: This is the worst field trip ever.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Judging by the looks on your faces, I'm guessing you guys didn't find Aang, either. [Jumps off Appa.]
character_words: Judging by the looks on your faces, I'm guessing you guys didn't find Aang, either.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: No. It's like he just ... disappeared.
character_words: No. It's like he just ... disappeared.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Hey, wait a minute. Has anyone noticed that Momo is missing, too?
character_words: Hey, wait a minute. Has anyone noticed that Momo is missing, too?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: [Turns back to Appa.] Oh no! I knew it was only a matter of time! [Jumps down to Appa.] Appa ate Momo! [Lifts up Appa's mouth.] Momo, I'm coming for you, buddy.
character_words: Oh no! I knew it was only a matter of time!  Appa ate Momo!  Momo, I'm coming for you, buddy.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Sokka, Appa didn't eat Momo. He's probably with Aang.
character_words: Sokka, Appa didn't eat Momo. He's probably with Aang.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: That's just what Appa wants you to think. [Climbs into Appa's mouth.]
character_words: That's just what Appa wants you to think.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Get out of the bison's mouth, Sokka. We have a real problem here. Aang is nowhere to be found and the comet is only two days away.
character_words: Get out of the bison's mouth, Sokka. We have a real problem here. Aang is nowhere to be found and the comet is only two days away.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: What should we do Zuko?
character_words: What should we do Zuko?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: [Stands up.] I don't know. [They keep staring.] Why are you all looking at me?
character_words: I don't know.  Why are you all looking at me?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Well, you are kind of the expert on tracking Aang.
character_words: Well, you are kind of the expert on tracking Aang.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Yeah, if anyone's got experience hunting the Avatar ... it's you.
character_words: Yeah, if anyone's got experience hunting the Avatar ... it's you.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Zuko, I don't wanna tell you how to do your job, but why are we heading towards the Earth Kingdom? There's no way Aang's there.
character_words: Zuko, I don't wanna tell you how to do your job, but why are we heading towards the Earth Kingdom? There's no way Aang's there.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Just trust me.
character_words: Just trust me.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: [To her palanquin bearers.] Come on slowpokes! Faster!
character_words: Come on slowpokes! Faster!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: [Pants.] Sorry I'm late, father. Good palanquin bearers are so hard to come by these days. So, is everything ready for our departure?
character_words: Sorry I'm late, father. Good palanquin bearers are so hard to come by these days. So, is everything ready for our departure?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: [Facing the ship.] There has been a change of plans, Azula.
character_words: There has been a change of plans, Azula.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: [Worried.] What?
character_words: What?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: I've decided to lead the fleet of airships to Ba Sing Se alone. You will remain here in the Fire Nation.
character_words: I've decided to lead the fleet of airships to Ba Sing Se alone. You will remain here in the Fire Nation.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: But I thought we were going to do this together.
character_words: But I thought we were going to do this together.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: My decision is final.
character_words: My decision is final.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: You ... you can't treat me like this! [Rising.] You can't treat me like Zuko!
character_words: You ... you can't treat me like this!  You can't treat me like Zuko!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Azula, silence yourself.
character_words: Azula, silence yourself.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: But it was my idea to burn everything to the ground! I deserve to be by your side!
character_words: But it was my idea to burn everything to the ground! I deserve to be by your side!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Azula! [She bows her head.] Listen to me. I need you here to watch over the homeland. It's a very important job that I can only entrust to you.
character_words: Azula!  Listen to me. I need you here to watch over the homeland. It's a very important job that I can only entrust to you.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Really?
character_words: Really?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: And for your loyalty, I've decided to declare you the new Fire Lord.
character_words: And for your loyalty, I've decided to declare you the new Fire Lord.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Fire Lord Azula? It does seem appropriate, but what about you?
character_words: Fire Lord Azula? It does seem appropriate, but what about you?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: Fire Lord Ozai is no more. Just as the world will be reborn in fire, I shall be reborn as the supreme ruler of the world. [Three Fire Sages help Ozai put on his new royal garments.] From this moment on, I will be known as ... [Raises his arms in the air.] the Phoenix King.
character_words: Fire Lord Ozai is no more. Just as the world will be reborn in fire, I shall be reborn as the supreme ruler of the world.  From this moment on, I will be known as ...  the Phoenix King.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: And the reason you've brought us to a seedy Earth Kingdom tavern is what now?
character_words: And the reason you've brought us to a seedy Earth Kingdom tavern is what now?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: [Pointing.] June.
character_words: June.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: [Off-camera.] Oh yeah, that weird bounty hunter with the giant mole.
character_words: Oh yeah, that weird bounty hunter with the giant mole.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: [Off-camera.] Mole? Her skin is flawless.
character_words: Mole? Her skin is flawless.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: No, she has this giant mole creature she rides around on.
character_words: No, she has this giant mole creature she rides around on.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: The shirshu. It's the only animal that can track Aang's scent anywhere in the world. It's the one shot we have of finding him.
character_words: The shirshu. It's the only animal that can track Aang's scent anywhere in the world. It's the one shot we have of finding him.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: [Stepping forward, grinning broadly.] I don't know who this June lady is, but I like her.
character_words: I don't know who this June lady is, but I like her.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
full_text: [Waking up.] Hey, Momo. I just had the strangest dream. [Looks around surprised at his new setting.] Wait. [The camera pans toward the ocean and shows an aerial shot of the island.] Where are we?
character_words: Hey, Momo. I just had the strangest dream.  Wait.  Where are we?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [To Zuko.] Hey, I remember her! [Cut to frontal view of Zuko, Sokka standing behind.] She helped you attack us!
character_words: Hey, I remember her!  She helped you attack us!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: Yup. [Walks forward.] Back in the good old days.
character_words: Yup.  Back in the good old days.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: Oh great. It's Prince Pouty. [Close-up.] Where's your creepy grandpa?
character_words: Oh great. It's Prince Pouty.  Where's your creepy grandpa?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Frontal view of Katara and Zuko.] He's my uncle. And he's not here.
character_words: He's my uncle. And he's not here.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Close-up.] I see you worked things out with your girlfriend.
character_words: I see you worked things out with your girlfriend.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Angrily.] I'm not his girlfriend!
character_words: I'm not his girlfriend!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Speaking at the same time.] She's not my girlfriend!
character_words: She's not my girlfriend!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Frontal view.] Okay, okay. Sheesh. I was only teasing. So what do you want?
character_words: Okay, okay. Sheesh. I was only teasing. So what do you want?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Frontal view of June with Zuko and Suki behind.] I need your help finding the Avatar.
character_words: I need your help finding the Avatar.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: Hm. Doesn't sound too fun. [Sips her tea.]
character_words: Hm. Doesn't sound too fun.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Angrily; leans closer, while clenching his fists.] Does the end of the world sound like more fun?
character_words: Does the end of the world sound like more fun?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Shaking the piece of meat.] Nyla. [She throws the meat to Nyla. Cut to frontal view of Nyla, who catches it in his mouth and starts chewing it before swallowing it; June walks up to him and starts petting him.] Who's my little, hmm, Snuffly-Wuffly? [Nyla sticks his toxins-coated tongue out and she dodges it and forces his mouth closed.] Whoa! Careful there. [To Team Avatar.] Okay. So who's got something with the Avatar's scent on it?
character_words: Nyla.  Who's my little, hmm, Snuffly-Wuffly?  Whoa! Careful there.  Okay. So who's got something with the Avatar's scent on it?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Pulls out Aang's glider from Appa's saddle.] I have Aang's staff.
character_words: I have Aang's staff.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Frontal view.] Well, what does that mean?
character_words: Well, what does that mean?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Frontal view. Petting Nyla.] Means your friend's gone.
character_words: Means your friend's gone.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Frontal view.] We know he's gone. That's why we're trying to find him.
character_words: We know he's gone. That's why we're trying to find him.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Close-up as June stands up.] No, I mean he's gone gone. [Turns to face everyone else.] He doesn't exist.
character_words: No, I mean he's gone gone.  He doesn't exist.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: Where are we, Momo? [Cut to view of the sky through the trees as dragonflies fly past. The camera pans down as Aang speaks.] Maybe I'm in the Spirit World? [Cut to frontal view of Aang stepping under a branch.] But wait. You can see me. [Momo approaches on the branch. Cut to a close-up of Momo.] We could both be in the Spirit World. [Cut back to Aang. He uses airbending and the camera pans across as he moves.] Nope. My bending works. [Momo lands on him. Points to the hilltop. Cut to path up a hill. Camera pans up as Aang talks.] Maybe if we climb to the top of the island, we can figure out where we are.
character_words: Where are we, Momo?  Maybe I'm in the Spirit World?  But wait. You can see me.  We could both be in the Spirit World.  Nope. My bending works.  Maybe if we climb to the top of the island, we can figure out where we are.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [To June.] What do you mean Aang doesn't exist? [Side-view of the group.] Do you mean he's ... you know, dead?
character_words: What do you mean Aang doesn't exist?  Do you mean he's ... you know, dead?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Frontal view as she pets Nyla.] Nope. We could find him if he were dead. Wow, it's a real head-scratcher. See ya. [Cut to a wide-view of the group as she starts climbing on top of Nyla.]
character_words: Nope. We could find him if he were dead. Wow, it's a real head-scratcher. See ya.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Sarcastically.] Helpful. Real helpful.
character_words: Helpful. Real helpful.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [To June.] Wait. I have another idea. [Frontal view.] There's only one other person in this world who can help us face the Fire Lord. I'll be right back with a smell sample.
character_words: Wait. I have another idea.  There's only one other person in this world who can help us face the Fire Lord. I'll be right back with a smell sample.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: You saved your uncle's sweaty sandal? Ugh! [Pinches nose even tighter.]
character_words: You saved your uncle's sweaty sandal? Ugh!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Smiles.] I think it's kind of sweet.
character_words: I think it's kind of sweet.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Frontal view. Determined.] Let's do this. [Cut to wide-view as she and Nyla run off.]
character_words: Let's do this.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: Hey! Wait up!
character_words: Hey! Wait up!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: We're going to Ba Sing Se?
character_words: We're going to Ba Sing Se?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Cut to side-view of the group as Nyla continues scratching the wall.] Your uncle's somewhere beyond the wall. [Nyla stops digging and walks away.] Nyla's getting twitchy so he can't be too far. [Close-up.] Good luck.
character_words: Your uncle's somewhere beyond the wall.  Nyla's getting twitchy so he can't be too far.  Good luck.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: It's been a long day. [Aerial view. Camera zooms out.] Let's camp and start our search again at dawn.
character_words: It's been a long day.  Let's camp and start our search again at dawn.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: It's a hexagon. [Cut to Aang's feet as Momo jumps off his shoulder. Bends down to place a hand on the ground.] It doesn't seem like normal rock. [Stands back up. Cut to a side-view as he attempts earthbending, but nothing happens.] It's not made of earth. [Sits down.] This is so strange. [Frontal view of Aang with Momo in the foreground, his back to the camera.] I wish I had some help right now. I wish I had Roku. [Suddenly realizes something.] I do have Roku! [Takes a deep breath and starts meditating. Fade to close-up of Aang. Cut to side-view as Momo runs off and the spirit of Avatar Roku appears before Aang.]
character_words: It's a hexagon.  It doesn't seem like normal rock.  It's not made of earth.  This is so strange.  I wish I had some help right now. I wish I had Roku.  I do have Roku!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: You're right, Aang. [Close-up.] All the past Avatars, all their experience and wisdom, is available to you [Cut to close-up of Aang.] if you look deep inside yourself.
character_words: You're right, Aang.  All the past Avatars, all their experience and wisdom, is available to you  if you look deep inside yourself.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Looking around.] So where am I, Roku? What is this place?
character_words: So where am I, Roku? What is this place?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Side-view.] I ... don't know, Aang. [Close-up of Aang.] But I see you are lost in more ways than one right now.
character_words: I ... don't know, Aang.  But I see you are lost in more ways than one right now.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: I am. I need to figure out what to do once I face the Fire Lord.
character_words: I am. I need to figure out what to do once I face the Fire Lord.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: Well, look who's here! [Starts laughing and snorting.]
character_words: Well, look who's here!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: Everyone expects me to take the Fire Lord's life, [Side-view.] but I just don't know if I can do that.
character_words: Everyone expects me to take the Fire Lord's life,  but I just don't know if I can do that.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Frontal view.] In my life, I tried to be disciplined and show restraint, but it backfired when Fire Lord Sozin took advantage of my restraint and mercy. [Fade to a flashback of Sozin, close-up shot. Sozin moves forward and the camera cuts to a side-view of him attempting to attack Roku from behind. The camera pans left to show the flames engulf Roku. Cut to a shot inside the flames as they dissipate to reveal Roku gone. Fade to a close-up shot of Sozin from behind looking at his army. Fade to a panning shot of air temples on fire. Overlaid shot of close-up Sozin.] If I had been more decisive and acted sooner, I could have stopped Sozin and stopped the war before it started. [Cut back to side-view of Aang and Roku.] I offer you this wisdom, Aang: You must be decisive. [Cut behind Roku as he vanishes. Cut close-up to Aang, disappointed.]
character_words: In my life, I tried to be disciplined and show restraint, but it backfired when Fire Lord Sozin took advantage of my restraint and mercy.  If I had been more decisive and acted sooner, I could have stopped Sozin and stopped the war before it started.  I offer you this wisdom, Aang: You must be decisive.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Confused.] What's going on? [Cut to closer view from behind the masters.] We're surrounded by old people.
character_words: What's going on?  We're surrounded by old people.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: Not just any old people. [Walks up to Pakku. Side-view of the masters.] These are great masters and friends of ours. [Camera pans and zooms in on Katara and Pakku as she bows to Pakku.] Pakku.
character_words: Not just any old people.  These are great masters and friends of ours.  Pakku.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Bows back.] It is respectful to bow to an old master, [Frontal view. Extends his arms out.] but how about a hug for your new grandfather?
character_words: It is respectful to bow to an old master,  but how about a hug for your new grandfather?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Frontal view. Surprised and overjoyed, as is Sokka behind her.] That's so exciting! [Frontal view of Pakku as she hugs Pakku.] You and Gran-Gran must be so happy to have found each other again!
character_words: That's so exciting!  You and Gran-Gran must be so happy to have found each other again!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: I made her a new betrothal necklace and everything.
character_words: I made her a new betrothal necklace and everything.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Runs up and hugs Pakku. Camera zooms in on Pakku.] Welcome to the family, Gramp-Gramp!
character_words: Welcome to the family, Gramp-Gramp!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Gently pushes Sokka away; slightly annoyed.] You can still just call me Pakku.
character_words: You can still just call me Pakku.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Frontal view.] How about Grand-Pakku?
character_words: How about Grand-Pakku?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Close-up. Not amused.] No. [Side-view of Zuko and Pakku as Sokka walks away behind Katara sadly. Camera zooms out to show Jeong Jeong.]
character_words: No.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Zuko walks up to Jeong Jeong.] And this was Aang's first firebending teacher.
character_words: And this was Aang's first firebending teacher.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Close-up. Bows.] Jeong Jeong.
character_words: Jeong Jeong.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Side-view. Bows to Piandao.] Master Piandao.
character_words: Master Piandao.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Bows back.] Hello, Sokka.
character_words: Hello, Sokka.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Cut to over-head view from behind the masters.] So wait. How do you all know each other?
character_words: So wait. How do you all know each other?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Close-up side-view.] All old people know each other. Don't you know that? [Laughs and snorts.]
character_words: All old people know each other. Don't you know that?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: We're all part of the same ancient secret society. A group that transcends the divisions of the four nations.
character_words: We're all part of the same ancient secret society. A group that transcends the divisions of the four nations.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Frontal view.] The Order of the White Lotus.
character_words: The Order of the White Lotus.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Frontal view of Piandao and Jeong Jeong. Bumi slides in front of the camera.] That's the one. [Slides off camera.]
character_words: That's the one.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: The White Lotus has always been about philosophy and beauty and truth. [Aerial view.] But about a month ago, a call went out that we were needed for something important.
character_words: The White Lotus has always been about philosophy and beauty and truth.  But about a month ago, a call went out that we were needed for something important.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Cut close-up behind Zuko with Pakku and Katara in the background. To Zuko.] It came from a Grand Lotus: your uncle, [Close-up of Zuko.] Iroh of the Fire Nation. [Zuko smiles.]
character_words: It came from a Grand Lotus: your uncle,  Iroh of the Fire Nation.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Camera zooms out to show Toph behind Zuko.] Well, that's who we're looking for.
character_words: Well, that's who we're looking for.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Frontal view.] Then we'll take you to him.
character_words: Then we'll take you to him.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Appears behind Piandao and Jeong Jeong and pushes them out of the way.] Wait! Someone's missing from your group. [Walks up to the camera.] Someone very important. [Walks right up to the camera.] Where's Momo?
character_words: Wait! Someone's missing from your group.  Someone very important.  Where's Momo?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Side-view. Leaning backward almost all the way, as Bumi is right in his face.] He's gone. [Pauses.] And so is Aang.
character_words: He's gone.  And so is Aang.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Camera zooms out.] Oh well. [Pats Sokka on the chest, which causes him to almost fall back.] So long as they have each other, I'm sure we have nothing to worry about. Let's go! [Slams in to the ground. Cut to underneath Bumi as he launches himself away using earthbending while laughing and snorting.]
character_words: Oh well.  So long as they have each other, I'm sure we have nothing to worry about. Let's go!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: Avatar Kyoshi. I need your wisdom.
character_words: Avatar Kyoshi. I need your wisdom.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: In my day, [Flashback to frontal view of Chin the Conqueror. Cut to close-up of Avatar Kyoshi.] Chin the Conqueror threatened to throw the world out of balance. [Kyoshi enters the Avatar State briefly and begins to earthbend. Cut to wide shot as a dust cloud appears as she separates the land.] I stopped him. [Cut to side-view of Kyoshi as she uses airbending to push the land apart.] And the world entered a great era of peace. [Cut to aerial view of the land separating.]
character_words: In my day,  Chin the Conqueror threatened to throw the world out of balance.  I stopped him.  And the world entered a great era of peace.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Voice-over; Side-view of Chin as he falls to his death.] You didn't really kill Chin. [Camera cuts back to close-up view looking up at Aang.] Technically, he fell to his own doom because he was too stubborn to get out of the way.
character_words: You didn't really kill Chin.  Technically, he fell to his own doom because he was too stubborn to get out of the way.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Close-up side-view.] Personally, I don't really see the difference, but I assure you, I would have done whatever it took to stop Chin. [Frontal view.] I offer you this wisdom, Aang: Only justice will bring peace. [Vanishes.]
character_words: Personally, I don't really see the difference, but I assure you, I would have done whatever it took to stop Chin.  I offer you this wisdom, Aang: Only justice will bring peace.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Close-up. Disappointed. Side-view as he leans back.] I knew I shouldn't have asked Kyoshi.
character_words: I knew I shouldn't have asked Kyoshi.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: So, Bumi ... [Cut closer, side-view. Camera follows them as they walk.] how did you end up escaping your imprisonment in Omashu?
character_words: So, Bumi ...  how did you end up escaping your imprisonment in Omashu?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: Escape? I didn't escape. Everybody else escaped. [Close-up.] There I was back in Omashu, [Flashback of Omashu while under control of the Fire Nation during the Day of Black Sun.] waiting for just the right moment. [Cut to close-up of Bumi suspended in a metal box.] I didn't know what or when, but I knew I'd know it when I knew it. [Camera pans round as he looks up to see the solar eclipse. Speaking in flashback.] An eclipse. That'll do it.
character_words: Escape? I didn't escape. Everybody else escaped.  There I was back in Omashu,  waiting for just the right moment.  I didn't know what or when, but I knew I'd know it when I knew it.  An eclipse. That'll do it.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: What do you think you're doing? [Zooms in on the firebender.]
character_words: What do you think you're doing?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: Taking back my city! You've got no firepower. And it's payback time!
character_words: Taking back my city! You've got no firepower. And it's payback time!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Amazed.] Wow! You took back your whole city all by yourself!
character_words: Wow! You took back your whole city all by yourself!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Side-view of entire group.] So what about you guys? Did you do anything interesting on the day of the eclipse?
character_words: So what about you guys? Did you do anything interesting on the day of the eclipse?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Nonchalantly.] Nah.
character_words: Nah.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Nonchalantly.] No, not really.
character_words: No, not really.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: I need to look deep inside myself.
character_words: I need to look deep inside myself.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Close-up.] I am Avatar Kuruk. [Cut to flashback to a close-up view of a younger Avatar Kuruk. The camera zooms out to show him surfing.] When I was young, I was always a go-with-the-flow kind of Avatar. [The camera pans round to follow his movements on the wave before holding steady as he surfs away.] People seemed to work out their own problems, and there was peace and good times in the world. [Cut to shot of the sun and the camera pans down to Kuruk with Ummi and they kiss.] But then, [Fade to a side-view of Koh in the Spirit World. Koh moves in front of the camera to reveal the face of Ummi.] I lost the woman I loved to Koh, the Face Stealer. [Fade back to close-up side-view of present-day Kuruk.] It was my fault. If I had been more attentive and more active, [Close-up of Aang.] I could've saved her. Aang, [Close-up of Kuruk.] you must actively shape your own destiny and the destiny of the world. [Vanishes. Frontal view of Aang, even more disappointed as he places his head in his hands.]
character_words: I am Avatar Kuruk.  When I was young, I was always a go-with-the-flow kind of Avatar.  People seemed to work out their own problems, and there was peace and good times in the world.  But then,  I lost the woman I loved to Koh, the Face Stealer.  It was my fault. If I had been more attentive and more active,  I could've saved her. Aang,  you must actively shape your own destiny and the destiny of the world.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Stepping into the camp.] Well, here we are. Welcome to Old People Camp.
character_words: Well, here we are. Welcome to Old People Camp.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Side-view of Jeong Jeong, Piandao, and Pakku. As Zuko speaks, Jeong Jeong and Pakku walk off and Appa stops behind Zuko and Piandao.] Where ... where is he?
character_words: Where ... where is he?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Points to a tent on the other side of the camp. Camera cuts and zooms in showing a tent.] Your uncle's in there, Prince Zuko.
character_words: Your uncle's in there, Prince Zuko.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: Are you okay?
character_words: Are you okay?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Frontal view.] No, I'm not okay. My uncle hates me, I know it. [Katara sits down next to him.] He loved and supported me in every way he could, and I still turned against him. How can I even face him?
character_words: No, I'm not okay. My uncle hates me, I know it.  He loved and supported me in every way he could, and I still turned against him. How can I even face him?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Close-up side-view of Zuko.] Zuko, you're sorry for what you did, right?
character_words: Zuko, you're sorry for what you did, right?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: More sorry than I've been about anything in my entire life.
character_words: More sorry than I've been about anything in my entire life.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: Then he'll forgive you. He will.
character_words: Then he'll forgive you. He will.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: Uncle?
character_words: Uncle?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Voice-over.] All these past Avatars. [Cut to frontal view of Aang.] They keep telling me I'm gonna have to do it. They don't get it. [Momo chitters.] You're right. Maybe an Air Nomad Avatar will understand where I'm coming from. [Close-up of Momo, who stares at him. Frontal view of Aang as Momo jumps to his other side.] I know you can't really talk. Pretending you can just helps me think. [Momo chitters again; Aang becomes annoyed.] I'm going to pretend I didn't pretend to hear that.
character_words: All these past Avatars.  They keep telling me I'm gonna have to do it. They don't get it.  You're right. Maybe an Air Nomad Avatar will understand where I'm coming from.  I know you can't really talk. Pretending you can just helps me think.  I'm going to pretend I didn't pretend to hear that.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Side-view.] I am Avatar Yangchen, young airbender.
character_words: I am Avatar Yangchen, young airbender.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: Avatar Yangchen, [Close-up of Aang.] the monks always taught me that all life is sacred. Even the life of the tiniest spider-fly caught in its own web.
character_words: Avatar Yangchen,  the monks always taught me that all life is sacred. Even the life of the tiniest spider-fly caught in its own web.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Close-up side-view.] Yes. All life is sacred.
character_words: Yes. All life is sacred.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Frontal view. Smiles.] I know, I'm even a vegetarian. I've always tried to solve my problems by being quick or clever. And I've only had to use violence for necessary defense. And I've certainly never used it to take a life.
character_words: I know, I'm even a vegetarian. I've always tried to solve my problems by being quick or clever. And I've only had to use violence for necessary defense. And I've certainly never used it to take a life.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Cut to behind Aang as the camera pans up to show Yangchen.] Avatar Aang, I know that you're a gentle spirit, and the monks have taught you well, but this isn't about you. [Close-up side-view of Aang.] This is about the world.
character_words: Avatar Aang, I know that you're a gentle spirit, and the monks have taught you well, but this isn't about you.  This is about the world.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: But the monks taught me that I had to detach myself from the world so my spirit could be free.
character_words: But the monks taught me that I had to detach myself from the world so my spirit could be free.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Side-view of Aang and Yangchen. Camera pans slowly to the right.] Many great and wise Air Nomads have detached themselves and achieved spiritual enlightenment, [Close-up.] but the Avatar can never do it. Because your sole duty is to the world. Here is my wisdom for you: [Close-up of Aang. Camera zooms out.] Selfless duty calls you to sacrifice your own spiritual needs, and do whatever it takes to protect the world. [Yangchen's spirit vanishes.]
character_words: Many great and wise Air Nomads have detached themselves and achieved spiritual enlightenment,  but the Avatar can never do it. Because your sole duty is to the world. Here is my wisdom for you:  Selfless duty calls you to sacrifice your own spiritual needs, and do whatever it takes to protect the world.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Momo appears behind a tree and approaches Aang. Close-up aerial view of Aang. Sorrowfully.] I guess I don't have a choice, Momo. [Camera zooms out as Aang looks up.] I have to kill the Fire Lord.
character_words: I guess I don't have a choice, Momo.  I have to kill the Fire Lord.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Cut to view of Iroh from behind.] Uncle, [Cut to view of Zuko over Iroh's shoulder.] I know you must have mixed feelings about seeing me. [Cut briefly to view of Iroh from behind before back to a frontal view of Zuko.] But I want you to know, [Starts to cry.] I am so, so, sorry, Uncle. I am so sorry and ashamed of what I did. I don't know how I can ever make it up to you. But I'll- [He is cut off. Cut to side-view as Iroh pulls him into a hug, while starting to cry as well. Close-up of Iroh who starts to smile. Close-up of Zuko who becomes shocked and confused.] How can you forgive me so easily? I thought you would be furious with me.
character_words: Uncle,  I know you must have mixed feelings about seeing me.  But I want you to know,  I am so, so, sorry, Uncle. I am so sorry and ashamed of what I did. I don't know how I can ever make it up to you. But I'll-  How can you forgive me so easily? I thought you would be furious with me.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Close-up.] I was never angry with you. I was sad because I was afraid you lost your way.
character_words: I was never angry with you. I was sad because I was afraid you lost your way.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Side-view of the two.] I did lose my way.
character_words: I did lose my way.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
