full_text: [Releases him.] But you found it again. [Frontal view.] And you did it by yourself. [Frontal view of Zuko over Iroh's shoulder.] And I am so happy you found your way here. [Side-view. Hugs him again.]
character_words: But you found it again.  And you did it by yourself.  And I am so happy you found your way here.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: It wasn't that hard, Uncle. You have a pretty strong scent.
character_words: It wasn't that hard, Uncle. You have a pretty strong scent.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: Wait. [Cut to view of "approaching" mountains.] Is it just me, or are those mountains getting bigger?
character_words: Wait.  Is it just me, or are those mountains getting bigger?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: They're not getting larger, [Turning back. Excitedly.] They're getting closer! [Aang jumps off the tree. Cut to side-view as he runs toward the edge of the island, Momo in his wake.] The whole island is moving!
character_words: They're not getting larger,  They're getting closer!  The whole island is moving!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: It's amazing Momo! The biggest animal in the world! I've gotta to swim around and find its face. [Momo chitters in response and he swims off toward the front of the "island". Momo follows him.]
character_words: It's amazing Momo! The biggest animal in the world! I've gotta to swim around and find its face.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Voice-over.] Uncle, you're the only person other than the Avatar who can [Side-view of Iroh with Zuko sat next to him. Toph sits to Zuko's right and Katara has her back to the camera opposite Toph.] possibly defeat the Father Lord.
character_words: Uncle, you're the only person other than the Avatar who can  possibly defeat the Father Lord.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: You mean the Fire Lord.
character_words: You mean the Fire Lord.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Angrily.] That's what I just said!
character_words: That's what I just said!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: Hmmm ...
character_words: Hmmm ...

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: We need you to come with us!
character_words: We need you to come with us!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Close-up.] No, Zuko, it won't turn out well.
character_words: No, Zuko, it won't turn out well.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Aerial view of the group.] You can beat him! [Turns to the others.] And we'll be there to help.
character_words: You can beat him!  And we'll be there to help.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: Even if I did defeat Ozai, [Close-up.] and I don't know that I could, it would be the wrong way to end the war. [Aerial view of the group.] History would see it as just more senseless violence, a brother killing a brother to grab power. The only way for this war to end peacefully is for the Avatar to defeat the Fire Lord.
character_words: Even if I did defeat Ozai,  and I don't know that I could, it would be the wrong way to end the war.  History would see it as just more senseless violence, a brother killing a brother to grab power. The only way for this war to end peacefully is for the Avatar to defeat the Fire Lord.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Close-up of Zuko from over Iroh's shoulder.] And then ... then you would come and take your rightful place on the throne?
character_words: And then ... then you would come and take your rightful place on the throne?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Close-up.] No. Someone new must take the throne. An idealist with a pure heart [Frontal view from the side of Iroh as the camera zooms in on Zuko.] and unquestionable honor. It has to be you, Prince Zuko.
character_words: No. Someone new must take the throne. An idealist with a pure heart  and unquestionable honor. It has to be you, Prince Zuko.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Zuko briefly looks away.] Unquestionable honor? But I've made so many mistakes.
character_words: Unquestionable honor? But I've made so many mistakes.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: Yes, you have. [Close-up of Iroh from over Zuko's shoulder.] You've struggled; you've suffered, but you have always followed your own path. [Close-up of Zuko.] You restored your own honor, and only you can restore the honor of the Fire Nation.
character_words: Yes, you have.  You've struggled; you've suffered, but you have always followed your own path.  You restored your own honor, and only you can restore the honor of the Fire Nation.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Zuko looks away.] I'll try, Uncle.
character_words: I'll try, Uncle.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Side-view of Toph.] Well, what if Aang doesn't come back?
character_words: Well, what if Aang doesn't come back?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Aerial view of group.] Sozin's Comet is arriving, and our destinies are upon us. Aang will face the Fire Lord. [Extreme close-up.] When I was a boy, I had a vision that I would one day take Ba Sing Se. [Cut to Zuko and the camera pans across to right showing Toph, Sokka, Suki, and Katara.] Only now do I see that my destiny is to take it back from the Fire Nation, [Extreme close-up.] so the Earth Kingdom can be free again.
character_words: Sozin's Comet is arriving, and our destinies are upon us. Aang will face the Fire Lord.  When I was a boy, I had a vision that I would one day take Ba Sing Se.  Only now do I see that my destiny is to take it back from the Fire Nation,  so the Earth Kingdom can be free again.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Side-view of Suki and Katara.] That's why you gathered the members of the White Lotus.
character_words: That's why you gathered the members of the White Lotus.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: Yes. [Close-up from over Zuko's shoulder.] Zuko, you must return to the Fire Nation, so that when the Fire Lord falls, you can assume the throne and restore peace and order. [Extreme close-up of Zuko.] But Azula will be there, waiting for you.
character_words: Yes.  Zuko, you must return to the Fire Nation, so that when the Fire Lord falls, you can assume the throne and restore peace and order.  But Azula will be there, waiting for you.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: I can handle Azula.
character_words: I can handle Azula.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: Not alone! [Frontal view of Iroh from the side of Zuko.] You'll need help.
character_words: Not alone!  You'll need help.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Extreme close-up.] You're right. Katara, [Frontal view of Katara over Zuko's shoulder.] how would you like to help me put Azula in her place?
character_words: You're right. Katara,  how would you like to help me put Azula in her place?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: It would be my pleasure.
character_words: It would be my pleasure.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: What about us? [Side-view of Toph with Sokka sitting to the right and behind.] What is our destiny today?
character_words: What about us?  What is our destiny today?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Close-up.] What do you think it is?
character_words: What do you think it is?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Frontal view.] I think that, even though we don't know where Aang is, we need to do everything we can to stop the airship fleet.
character_words: I think that, even though we don't know where Aang is, we need to do everything we can to stop the airship fleet.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Camera pans back and to the left to Toph.] And that means when Aang does face the Fire Lord, we'll be right there if he needs us. [Close-up of Iroh, who smiles.]
character_words: And that means when Aang does face the Fire Lord, we'll be right there if he needs us.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: Nothing runs faster over land or swims quicker than a giant eel hound. [Frontal view of Piandao with Sokka's back to the camera. Piandao hands Sokka a map, who examines it.] The air ship base is on a small island just off the Earth Kingdom shore. [Frontal view of Sokka over the shoulder of Piandao.] You should be able to intercept the fleet within a day's journey.
character_words: Nothing runs faster over land or swims quicker than a giant eel hound.  The air ship base is on a small island just off the Earth Kingdom shore.  You should be able to intercept the fleet within a day's journey.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [He puts the map away.] Thank you, Master.
character_words: Thank you, Master.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [To Iroh.] So if I'm going to be Fire Lord after the war is over, [Side-view of Zuko.] what are you going to do?
character_words: So if I'm going to be Fire Lord after the war is over,  what are you going to do?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Frontal view.] After I re-conquer Ba Sing Se, I'm going to re-conquer my tea shop, and I'm going to play Pai Sho every day. [Flips a Pai Sho piece and catches it as he speaks.]
character_words: After I re-conquer Ba Sing Se, I'm going to re-conquer my tea shop, and I'm going to play Pai Sho every day.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: Goodbye, General Iroh.
character_words: Goodbye, General Iroh.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Close-up.] Goodbye, everyone. Today, destiny is our friend. [Whispers.] I know it.
character_words: Goodbye, everyone. Today, destiny is our friend.  I know it.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Side-view.] A lion turtle! [Frontal view. Bows to it. Frontal view of Lion turtle.] Maybe you can help me. Everyone, even my own past lives, are expecting me to end someone's life. [Frontal view.] But I don't know if I can do it.
character_words: A lion turtle!  Maybe you can help me. Everyone, even my own past lives, are expecting me to end someone's life.  But I don't know if I can do it.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Frontal view of the lion turtle's face from behind Aang. The lion turtle's mouth is not moving, yet it is speaking to Aang.] The true mind can weather all the lies and illusions without being lost. The true heart can tough the poison of hatred without being harmed. [Extreme close-up of its left eye.] Since beginningless time, [Side-view of the lion turtle as it lifts it's other paw out of the water and moves it toward Aang.] darkness thrives in the void but always yields to purifying light.
character_words: The true mind can weather all the lies and illusions without being lost. The true heart can tough the poison of hatred without being harmed.  Since beginningless time,  darkness thrives in the void but always yields to purifying light.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: Wait for him. He will come.
character_words: Wait for him. He will come.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
full_text: [Close-up.] It's time for this world to end in fire, and for a new world to be born from the ashes.
character_words: It's time for this world to end in fire, and for a new world to be born from the ashes.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: Zuko, don't worry. We can take Azula.
character_words: Zuko, don't worry. We can take Azula.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: It's not her I'm worried about. I'm worried about Aang. What if he doesn't have the guts to take out my father? What if he loses?
character_words: It's not her I'm worried about. I'm worried about Aang. What if he doesn't have the guts to take out my father? What if he loses?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: [Somewhat confidently.] Aang won't lose. He's gonna come back. [Looks forward with narrowed eyes.] He has to. [Close-up of Zuko's face as he follows Katara's lead and looks forward.]
character_words: Aang won't lose. He's gonna come back.  He has to.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: [Holding a cherry pit in her hand.] What am I holding?
character_words: What am I holding?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: A cherry pit, Princess.
character_words: A cherry pit, Princess.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: Correct. And what day is this?
character_words: Correct. And what day is this?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: It is the day of your coronation.
character_words: It is the day of your coronation.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: Yes, it is. So, please. Tell me why, on the most important day of my life, you've decided to leave a pit in my cherry? [Throws the pit at the servant, who winces slightly from the impact.]
character_words: Yes, it is. So, please. Tell me why, on the most important day of my life, you've decided to leave a pit in my cherry?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: It wasn't a decision; it was just a small mistake.
character_words: It wasn't a decision; it was just a small mistake.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: Small? Do you realize what could've happened if I hadn't sensed the pit in time?
character_words: Small? Do you realize what could've happened if I hadn't sensed the pit in time?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: [Nervously.] I suppose you could've ... choked?
character_words: I suppose you could've ... choked?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: Yes, then you will understand the severity of your crime.
character_words: Yes, then you will understand the severity of your crime.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: I understand, Princess. Please, forgive me.
character_words: I understand, Princess. Please, forgive me.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: Oh very well, since it is a special day, I will show mercy. You are banished. Leave this palace immediately.
character_words: Oh very well, since it is a special day, I will show mercy. You are banished. Leave this palace immediately.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: What are you all looking at? I have two feet that need scrubbing. And make sure you get in between the toes. I won't have my first day as Fire Lord marred by poor foot hygiene.
character_words: What are you all looking at? I have two feet that need scrubbing. And make sure you get in between the toes. I won't have my first day as Fire Lord marred by poor foot hygiene.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: It's weird to say, but the comet actually looks beautiful.
character_words: It's weird to say, but the comet actually looks beautiful.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: Too bad the Fire Lord's about to use it to destroy the world.
character_words: Too bad the Fire Lord's about to use it to destroy the world.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: We're too late! The fleet's already taking off!
character_words: We're too late! The fleet's already taking off!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: Then we're taking off, too! Where's the closest airship?
character_words: Then we're taking off, too! Where's the closest airship?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: It's right ... [Points to the closest airship.]
character_words: It's right ...

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: You sent for us, Princess. Is everything all right?
character_words: You sent for us, Princess. Is everything all right?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: Actually, everything's not all right! Do you know how long it took you to get here?
character_words: Actually, everything's not all right! Do you know how long it took you to get here?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: Uh ... a few minutes, I guess.
character_words: Uh ... a few minutes, I guess.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: Five, to be precise, in which time an assassin could've snuck in, done away with me and been on his merry way!
character_words: Five, to be precise, in which time an assassin could've snuck in, done away with me and been on his merry way!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: My apologies, Princess.
character_words: My apologies, Princess.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: Is this how you plan to treat your new Fire Lord? With tardiness and disloyalty?
character_words: Is this how you plan to treat your new Fire Lord? With tardiness and disloyalty?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: The Dai Li would never betray you!
character_words: The Dai Li would never betray you!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: And I'm sure that's just what you told Long Feng before you turned against him and joined me! [Hesitates for a moment.] You're all banished!
character_words: And I'm sure that's just what you told Long Feng before you turned against him and joined me!  You're all banished!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: But ...
character_words: But ...

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: Goodbye!
character_words: Goodbye!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: Please send in the next group on your way out! [Looks menacingly.]
character_words: Please send in the next group on your way out!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: [Backed against the wall.] Sshhh ...
character_words: Sshhh ...

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: That's how it's done!
character_words: That's how it's done!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: Good work, Toph! Time to take control of the ship, take the wheel.
character_words: Good work, Toph! Time to take control of the ship, take the wheel.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: [Sarcastically.] That's a great idea! Let the blind girl steer the giant airship!
character_words: That's a great idea! Let the blind girl steer the giant airship!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: I was talking to Suki.
character_words: I was talking to Suki.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: That would make a lot more sense.
character_words: That would make a lot more sense.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: [Approaches the steering wheel.] What are we going to do about the rest of the crew?
character_words: What are we going to do about the rest of the crew?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: Take us down closer to the water. I've got an idea. [Grabs a tube-like speaker.] Attention, crew, this is your captain speaking. Everyone please report to the bomb bay immediately for hot cakes and sweet cream. We have a very special birthday to celebrate.
character_words: Take us down closer to the water. I've got an idea.  Attention, crew, this is your captain speaking. Everyone please report to the bomb bay immediately for hot cakes and sweet cream. We have a very special birthday to celebrate.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: [To a nearby engineer.] Hey, I'm Qin Lee. I work up in communications.
character_words: Hey, I'm Qin Lee. I work up in communications.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: Oh, hi. I work down in the engine room. That's probably why we never met before. Big airship, you know?
character_words: Oh, hi. I work down in the engine room. That's probably why we never met before. Big airship, you know?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: Yep.
character_words: Yep.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: So, do you know whose birthday it is?
character_words: So, do you know whose birthday it is?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: I can't believe the captain remembered my birthday. He really does care.
character_words: I can't believe the captain remembered my birthday. He really does care.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: [To the crew member.] Happy birthday. [He frowns at him.]
character_words: Happy birthday.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: Fire Lord Ozai, here we come.
character_words: Fire Lord Ozai, here we come.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: [To Azula.] Azula, we heard what happened. Why have you banished all your servants?
character_words: Azula, we heard what happened. Why have you banished all your servants?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: All your Dai Li agents ...
character_words: All your Dai Li agents ...

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: And the Imperial Firebenders?
character_words: And the Imperial Firebenders?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: None of them could be trusted. Sooner or later, they all would have betrayed me. Just like Mai and Ty Lee did.
character_words: None of them could be trusted. Sooner or later, they all would have betrayed me. Just like Mai and Ty Lee did.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: Azula, we are concerned for you and your well-being.
character_words: Azula, we are concerned for you and your well-being.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: [Glaring at Lo and Li.] My father asked you to come here and talk to me, didn't he? He thinks I can't handle the responsibility of being Fire Lord. But I will be the greatest leader in Fire Nation history.
character_words: My father asked you to come here and talk to me, didn't he? He thinks I can't handle the responsibility of being Fire Lord. But I will be the greatest leader in Fire Nation history.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: I'm sure you will. But considering everything that has happened today ...
character_words: I'm sure you will. But considering everything that has happened today ...

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: Perhaps it's best if you postponed your coronation.
character_words: Perhaps it's best if you postponed your coronation.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: [In anger, glaring at Lo and Li.] What? Which one of you just said that?
character_words: What? Which one of you just said that?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: What a shame ... there's only one way to resolve this. You two must duel each other. I order you to fight an Agni Kai!
character_words: What a shame ... there's only one way to resolve this. You two must duel each other. I order you to fight an Agni Kai!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: But ...
character_words: But ...

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: We're not firebenders.
character_words: We're not firebenders.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: All right, fine. [Pointing at Li.] Lo, you're banished. [Pointing at Lo, while actually talking to Li.] Li, you can stay. [Walks away.]
character_words: All right, fine.  Lo, you're banished.  Li, you can stay.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: But, I'm Li. So who's banished?
character_words: But, I'm Li. So who's banished?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: Ba Sing Se, the Order of the White Lotus is here.
character_words: Ba Sing Se, the Order of the White Lotus is here.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: Here to set you free.
character_words: Here to set you free.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: [Cut to a shot of Iroh.] Only once every hundred years can a firebender experience this kind of power.
character_words: Only once every hundred years can a firebender experience this kind of power.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: All right hair, it's time to face your doom.
character_words: All right hair, it's time to face your doom.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: What a shame, you always had such beautiful hair.
character_words: What a shame, you always had such beautiful hair.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: What are you doing here?
character_words: What are you doing here?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: I didn't want to miss my own daughter's coronation.
character_words: I didn't want to miss my own daughter's coronation.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: Don't pretend to act proud. I know what you really think of me. You think I'm a monster.
character_words: Don't pretend to act proud. I know what you really think of me. You think I'm a monster.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: [Cuts to shot of Azula looking at her reflection in the mirror, clearly angered; off-camera.] I think you're confused. All your life you used fear to control people, like your friends Mai and Ty Lee.
character_words: I think you're confused. All your life you used fear to control people, like your friends Mai and Ty Lee.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: [Closes her eyes before turning around sharply to face her mother.] Well what choice do I have?! [Cuts to shot of her standing in the room, her back to the mirror which still shows the reflection of her mother.] Trust is for fools. Fear is the only reliable way. Even you fear me.
character_words: Well what choice do I have?!  Trust is for fools. Fear is the only reliable way. Even you fear me.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: [Sincerely.] No. I love you, Azula. I do.
character_words: No. I love you, Azula. I do.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: We're not gonna catch up to him in time.
character_words: We're not gonna catch up to him in time.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: [Sadly.] No ...
character_words: No ...

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: Momo, time for you to go.
character_words: Momo, time for you to go.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: What just happened?
character_words: What just happened?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: [Excited.] It's Aang! He's back!
character_words: It's Aang! He's back!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: After generations of Fire Lords failed to find you, now the universe delivers you to me as an act of providence.
character_words: After generations of Fire Lords failed to find you, now the universe delivers you to me as an act of providence.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: Please listen to me. We don't have to fight. You have the power to end it here and stop what you're doing.
character_words: Please listen to me. We don't have to fight. You have the power to end it here and stop what you're doing.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: You are right. I do have the power. I have all the power in the world!
character_words: You are right. I do have the power. I have all the power in the world!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: [Excited.] Go, Aang! Airbending slice! [Swings hand down, slicing through the air.]
character_words: Go, Aang! Airbending slice!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: Shouldn't we be helping him?
character_words: Shouldn't we be helping him?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: The Fire Lord is Aang's fight. We need to stay focused on stopping that fleet from burning down the Earth Kingdom.
character_words: The Fire Lord is Aang's fight. We need to stay focused on stopping that fleet from burning down the Earth Kingdom.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: [Sarcastically.] And how do we do that, Captain Boomerang? [Normal.] I can't see outside of this floating hunk of metal.
character_words: And how do we do that, Captain Boomerang?  I can't see outside of this floating hunk of metal.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: [Smiles as he comes up with his idea before turning to face Suki and Toph; excitedly.] Airship slice!
character_words: Airship slice!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: Whoa. That's a lot of fire, isn't it.
character_words: Whoa. That's a lot of fire, isn't it.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: It's gonna be a rough ride! We need to get to the top of this thing, fast.
character_words: It's gonna be a rough ride! We need to get to the top of this thing, fast.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: [Responding to Sokka's last comment.] Then what?
character_words: Then what?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: Watch each other's backs, and if we make it that far, I'll let you know.
character_words: Watch each other's backs, and if we make it that far, I'll let you know.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: Suki!
character_words: Suki!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: I'm okay! Just finish the mission!
character_words: I'm okay! Just finish the mission!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: [Heartbroken.] No ...
character_words: No ...

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: Sokka, I think we've gotta ...
character_words: Sokka, I think we've gotta ...

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: Jump!
character_words: Jump!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: By decree of Phoenix King Ozai, I now crown you Fire Lord ...
character_words: By decree of Phoenix King Ozai, I now crown you Fire Lord ...

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: [Somewhat annoyed.] What are you waiting for? Do it!
character_words: What are you waiting for? Do it!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: Sorry, but you're not gonna become Fire Lord today. [Jumps off Appa.] I am.
character_words: Sorry, but you're not gonna become Fire Lord today.  I am.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: [Laughs.] You're hilarious.
character_words: You're hilarious.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: [Jumps off of Appa to stand beside Zuko.] And you're going down.
character_words: And you're going down.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: Wait. You want to be Fire Lord? Fine. Let's settle this. Just you and me, brother. The showdown that was always meant to be. Agni Kai!
character_words: Wait. You want to be Fire Lord? Fine. Let's settle this. Just you and me, brother. The showdown that was always meant to be. Agni Kai!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: [Seriously.] You're on.
character_words: You're on.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: What are you doing? She's playing you. She knows she can't take us both, so she's trying to separate us.
character_words: What are you doing? She's playing you. She knows she can't take us both, so she's trying to separate us.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: I know. But I can take her this time.
character_words: I know. But I can take her this time.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: But even you admitted to your uncle that you would need help facing Azula.
character_words: But even you admitted to your uncle that you would need help facing Azula.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: There's something off about her; I can't explain it but she's slipping. And this way, no one else has to get hurt.
character_words: There's something off about her; I can't explain it but she's slipping. And this way, no one else has to get hurt.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: [Slightly sarcastic.] I'm sorry it has to end this way, brother.
character_words: I'm sorry it has to end this way, brother.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: [Getting in his stance.] No you're not.
character_words: No you're not.

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: [Angrily and somewhat mockingly.] No lightning today? What's the matter? [Quickly assuming his lightning redirection stance.] Afraid I'll redirect it?
character_words: No lightning today? What's the matter?  Afraid I'll redirect it?

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: Oh, I'll show you lightning!
character_words: Oh, I'll show you lightning!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: [In slow motion as he comes in front of Katara.] No!
character_words: No!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: [Yelling.] Zuko!
character_words: Zuko!

chapter: Sozin's Comet, Part 3: Into the Inferno
full_text: You're weak, just like the rest of your people! They did not deserve to exist in this world ... in my world! Prepare to join them. Prepare to die!
character_words: You're weak, just like the rest of your people! They did not deserve to exist in this world ... in my world! Prepare to join them. Prepare to die!

full_text: [Yelling out to Aang tauntingly while using a flamethrower blast with his hair swaying in the wind.] Come on out, Avatar! You can't hide in there forever!
character_words: Come on out, Avatar! You can't hide in there forever!

full_text: Toph, metalbend the rudder so it's jammed in a turning position. The ship will spiral and slam into the others.
character_words: Toph, metalbend the rudder so it's jammed in a turning position. The ship will spiral and slam into the others.

full_text: Got it! [She moves Sokka out of the way, spits into her hands, and rubs them together. Toph grips and metalbends the rudder while grunting in effort, and the Imperial Firebenders inside the ship crash into the wall, and due to the action, the ship crashes into the others.]
character_words: Got it!

full_text: Have I ever mentioned how sweet it is that you invented metalbending?
character_words: Have I ever mentioned how sweet it is that you invented metalbending?

full_text: [Pleased.] You could stand to mention it more.
character_words: You could stand to mention it more.

full_text: [In pain.] My leg! Hang on Toph!
character_words: My leg! Hang on Toph!

full_text: Aye, aye, Captain.
character_words: Aye, aye, Captain.

full_text: [Sadly.] Bye, space sword.
character_words: Bye, space sword.

full_text: I don't think boomerang's coming back, Toph. It looks like this is the end. [Toph starts crying and the firebenders run away. The airship gets struck by a different one and Sokka lets Toph fall onto it before jumping down himself, hurting his leg again in the process. He falls over in pain.]
character_words: I don't think boomerang's coming back, Toph. It looks like this is the end.

full_text: How did that happen? Did boomerang come back?
character_words: How did that happen? Did boomerang come back?

full_text: [Looking up.] No, Suki did. [They see Suki riding on the last functioning airship with a triumphant smile.]
character_words: No, Suki did.

full_text: Come on out, little boy. You're about to be ...
character_words: Come on out, little boy. You're about to be ...

full_text: I'd really rather our family physician look after Little Zuzu if you don't mind. [Azula shoots lightning and fire at her from the roof of a building. Katara manages to dodge them all and hides behind a column nearby. To Zuko in a taunting manner.] Zuzu, you don't look so good!
character_words: I'd really rather our family physician look after Little Zuzu if you don't mind.  Zuzu, you don't look so good!

full_text: There you are, filthy peasant!
character_words: There you are, filthy peasant!

full_text: Thank you, Katara.
character_words: Thank you, Katara.

full_text: I think I'm the one who should be thanking you.
character_words: I think I'm the one who should be thanking you.

full_text: Fire Lord Ozai, you and your forefathers have devastated the balance of this world, and now you shall pay the ultimate price! [Aang, under control of his past lives, combines all four elements together for his final attack. At the last second, however, he manages to regain control; he comes out of the Avatar State, lets his attack die out, and floats to the ground, freeing Ozai in the process.] No, I'm not gonna end it like this.
character_words: Fire Lord Ozai, you and your forefathers have devastated the balance of this world, and now you shall pay the ultimate price!  No, I'm not gonna end it like this.

full_text: Even with all the power in the world, you are still weak!
character_words: Even with all the power in the world, you are still weak!

full_text: In the era before the Avatar, we bent not the elements but the energy within ourselves.
character_words: In the era before the Avatar, we bent not the elements but the energy within ourselves.

full_text: [Aang remembering.] To bend another's energy, your own spirit must be unbendable or you will be corrupted and destroyed.
character_words: To bend another's energy, your own spirit must be unbendable or you will be corrupted and destroyed.

full_text: [Out of breath.] What? What did you do to me?
character_words: What? What did you do to me?

full_text: I took away your firebending. You can't use it to hurt or threaten anyone else ever again.
character_words: I took away your firebending. You can't use it to hurt or threaten anyone else ever again.

full_text: You did it! You should've seen yourself, it was amazing! You were all like [Pretends to be Aang fighting Ozai while adding sound effects.] and the Fire Lord was all like [Pretends to be Ozai struggling and groaning.]
character_words: You did it! You should've seen yourself, it was amazing! You were all like  and the Fire Lord was all like

full_text: [Pointing to the exhausted Ozai while approaching him.] So did you, you know ... finish the job?
character_words: So did you, you know ... finish the job?

full_text: [Defiantly and slowly.] I'm still alive. [Suki backs away from him.]
character_words: I'm still alive.

full_text: I learned there was another way to defeat him and restore balance. I took his bending away.
character_words: I learned there was another way to defeat him and restore balance. I took his bending away.

full_text: [Surprised.] Wow! Who taught you that?
character_words: Wow! Who taught you that?

full_text: A giant lion turtle.
character_words: A giant lion turtle.

full_text: [Smiling.] You have the craziest adventures when you disappear.
character_words: You have the craziest adventures when you disappear.

full_text: Well, look at you, buster. Now that your firebending's gone I guess we should call you the Loser Lord.
character_words: Well, look at you, buster. Now that your firebending's gone I guess we should call you the Loser Lord.

full_text: [Weakly.] I am the Phoenix King! [Flops on the ground while semi-conscious and drooling.]
character_words: I am the Phoenix King!

full_text: [Mockingly.] Oh, sorry. Didn't mean to offend you, Phoenix King of Getting His Butt Whooped.
character_words: Oh, sorry. Didn't mean to offend you, Phoenix King of Getting His Butt Whooped.

full_text: [Patheically.] Yeah! Or how about King of the ... Guys Who ... Don't Win?
character_words: Yeah! Or how about King of the ... Guys Who ... Don't Win?

full_text: [Pointing at Suki before pointing to herself; gently.] Leave the nicknames to us, honey.
character_words: Leave the nicknames to us, honey.

full_text: You need some help with that?
character_words: You need some help with that?

full_text: Mai! You're okay! They let you out of prison?
character_words: Mai! You're okay! They let you out of prison?

full_text: My uncle pulled some strings. And it doesn't hurt when the new Fire Lord is your boyfriend.
character_words: My uncle pulled some strings. And it doesn't hurt when the new Fire Lord is your boyfriend.

full_text: So does this mean you don't hate me anymore?
character_words: So does this mean you don't hate me anymore?

full_text: [Blushes.] I think it means I actually kind of like you. [They kiss. When they break apart, Mai's tone and expression changes to a serious and stern one.] But don't ever break up with me again! [Zuko grins nervously, before they hug again.]
character_words: I think it means I actually kind of like you.  But don't ever break up with me again!

full_text: Dad! [They run to Hakoda and embrace him.]
character_words: Dad!

full_text: I heard what you two did. I am the proudest father in the world. [Turns to Katara.] And your mother would be proud, too. [Katara sheds a few tears of joy while touching her necklace.]
character_words: I heard what you two did. I am the proudest father in the world.  And your mother would be proud, too.

full_text: There's my favorite warriors! I have to admit, I kind of missed the face paint. So how does it feel to be in uniform again?
character_words: There's my favorite warriors! I have to admit, I kind of missed the face paint. So how does it feel to be in uniform again?

full_text: [Appearing from behind.] It feels great!
character_words: It feels great!

full_text: [Protects Suki and points his crutch at Ty Lee.] Careful, Suki! Ty Lee is pretending to be a Kyoshi Warrior again.
character_words: Careful, Suki! Ty Lee is pretending to be a Kyoshi Warrior again.

full_text: It's okay. She's one of us now. [Sokka turns to Ty Lee before turning back to Suki, with a stunned look for both.]
character_words: It's okay. She's one of us now.

full_text: Yeah, the girls and I really bonded in prison. And after a few chi blocking lessons, they said I could join their group. We're going to be best friends forever. [She hugs two other warriors and they all smile.]
character_words: Yeah, the girls and I really bonded in prison. And after a few chi blocking lessons, they said I could join their group. We're going to be best friends forever.

full_text: I can't believe a year ago my purpose in life was hunting you down. And now ...
character_words: I can't believe a year ago my purpose in life was hunting you down. And now ...

full_text: And now we're friends.
character_words: And now we're friends.

full_text: Yeah, we are friends.
character_words: Yeah, we are friends.

full_text: I can't believe a year ago I was still frozen in a block of ice. The world's so different now.
character_words: I can't believe a year ago I was still frozen in a block of ice. The world's so different now.

full_text: [Puts a hand on Aang's shoulder.] And it's gonna be even more different... when we build it together. [They hug warmly and go outside.]
character_words: And it's gonna be even more different... when we build it together.

full_text: Please. The real hero is the Avatar. [Aang walks next to Zuko. Crowd cheers again. Aang turns his head slightly. Cut to side-view of Katara. The camera rotates as she smiles up at Aang proudly. Cut to overhead view of Aang and Zuko, their backs to the camera, looking out at the crowd.] Today this war is finally over! [Cut briefly to Haru, Tyro, Mechanist and Teo as the crowd cheers. Cut to front view of Zuko.] I promised my uncle that I would restore the honor of the Fire Nation. And I will. [Panning front view of Zuko and Aang, as seen from the crowd's perspective.] The road ahead of us is challenging. A hundred years of fighting has left the world scarred and divided. [Cut to side shot of Aang, rotating around, as he turns to see Zuko smile at him, before turning back to the crowd.] But with the Avatar's help, we can get it back on the right path and begin a new era of love and peace.
character_words: Please. The real hero is the Avatar.  Today this war is finally over!  I promised my uncle that I would restore the honor of the Fire Nation. And I will.  The road ahead of us is challenging. A hundred years of fighting has left the world scarred and divided.  But with the Avatar's help, we can get it back on the right path and begin a new era of love and peace.

full_text: [Puts the Fire Lord headpiece into Zuko's top knot.] All hail Fire Lord Zuko! [Everyone cheers again. Zuko rises.]
character_words: All hail Fire Lord Zuko!

full_text: [Sarcastically.] I should count myself lucky. The new Fire Lord has graced me with his presence in my lowly prison cell.
character_words: I should count myself lucky. The new Fire Lord has graced me with his presence in my lowly prison cell.

full_text: You should count yourself lucky that the Avatar spared your life.
character_words: You should count yourself lucky that the Avatar spared your life.

full_text: Hmph.
character_words: Hmph.

full_text: Banishing me was the best thing you could have done for my life. It put me on the right path. Perhaps your time in here could do the same for you.
character_words: Banishing me was the best thing you could have done for my life. It put me on the right path. Perhaps your time in here could do the same for you.

full_text: Why are you really here?
character_words: Why are you really here?

full_text: Because you're going to tell me something. [Bends closer to Ozai; gravely.] Where is my mother?
character_words: Because you're going to tell me something.  Where is my mother?

full_text: Zuko, stop moving! I'm trying to capture the moment. I wanted to do a painting, so we always remember the good times together.
character_words: Zuko, stop moving! I'm trying to capture the moment. I wanted to do a painting, so we always remember the good times together.

full_text: That's very thoughtful of you, Sokka. [Suddenly looks annoyed. Cuts to Sokka's painting, which is very unlike the group.] Wait, why did you give me Momo's ears?
character_words: That's very thoughtful of you, Sokka.  Wait, why did you give me Momo's ears?

full_text: Those are your hair loopies!
character_words: Those are your hair loopies!

full_text: At least you don't look like a boar-q-pine! My hair is not that spiky!
character_words: At least you don't look like a boar-q-pine! My hair is not that spiky!

full_text: I look like a man.
character_words: I look like a man.

full_text: And why did you paint me firebending?
character_words: And why did you paint me firebending?

full_text: I thought it looked more exciting that way. [Momo jumps on to the table and chitters.] Oh, you think you can do a better job, Momo? [Momo chitters again as Aang goes outside.]
character_words: I thought it looked more exciting that way.  Oh, you think you can do a better job, Momo?

full_text: [Points at painting.] Hey, my belly's not that big anymore. I've really trimmed down.
character_words: Hey, my belly's not that big anymore. I've really trimmed down.

full_text: Well I think you all look perfect! [They laugh.]
character_words: Well I think you all look perfect!
